name: Ambrosia
ingredients: 1 can pineapple chunks (in juice, 20 oz., drained), 1 1/3 cups mandarin orange (drained), 1 banana (peeled and sliced), 1 1/2 cups rape (seedless), 3/4 cup marshmallows (miniature), 1/3 cup coconut (flaked), 1 cup vanilla yoghurt, low-fat (8 ounces)
directions: Drain pineapple and oranges. Use juice as beverae., Combine fruit with marshmallows and coconut., Fold in yoghurt., Chill., Serve.

name: Baked Cauliflower Tots
ingredients: 2 cups rated or finely chopped cauliflower rice (about half a medium head), 1 e, 3 tablespoons flour, 1/4 cup rated cheddar cheese, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Lihtly rease a baking sheet., In a medium bowl, combine all inredients and mix well., Press mixture toether to make about 15 small balls or los and put them on the baking sheet with space between each one., Bake for 20 minutes or until cooked throuh. For extra crispy tots, broil for an extra 2 minutes. Watch closely to avoid burnin.

name: Baked Chicken Nuets
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds chicken thihs, boneless, skinless, 1 cup ready-to-eat cereal, cornflakes, crumb, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon Italian herb seasonin, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder
directions: Remove skin and bone; cut thihs into bite-sized pieces., Place cornflakes in plastic ba and crush by usin a rollin pin., Add remainin inredients to crushed cornflakes. Close ba tihtly and shake until blended., Add a few chicken pieces at a time to crumb mixture. Shake to coat evenly.

name: Baked Tortilla Chips
ingredients: 3 whole wheat flour tortillas, 10" across (or corn), 3 sprays of cookin oil spray, salt (dash, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven or toaster oven to 400 °F., Lihtly rease a baking sheet with the cookin spray., Cut tortillas into 8 sections (as if you were cuttin a pizza) and place on baking sheet., Spray tops of tortilla sections with cookin spray and lihtly salt, if desired., "Bake for 10 minutes, until crisp and liht brown, watchin closely so the chips dont burn."

name: Beet & White Bean Salad
ingredients: Dressing: 2 tablespoons cider vinegar, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, 1/2 teaspoon sugar, 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, salt and ground black pepper, to taste, Salad: 2 3/4 cups whole beets, well drained and each cut in half (or 16-ounce can), 1 can white kidney beans (cannellini) (15-ounce can), 1/2 cup reduced fat crumbled blue cheese, 1/2 cup coarsely chopped walnuts, toasted, baby arugula leaves (optional)
directions: Prepare dressin: In small bowl combine cider vinear, Dijon mustard, and suar. Gradually add olive oil until well blended. Season with salt and pepper., Prepare Salad: In lare bowl combine beets and white kidney beans; toss with dressin., To serve, place aruula leaves on platter or in serving bowl; top with beet mixture., Sprinkle with crumbled blue cheese and walnuts.

name: Bell Pepper Nachos
ingredients: 4 bell peppers, 1 cup salsa, 2 teaspoons seasonin (try a mixture-chili powder, arlic powder, round cumin, pepper), 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded or chopped (or beans or tofu -- or try a combination), 3/4 cup cheddar cheese, shredded
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F., Wash bell peppers, remove seeds and cut into bite-sized pieces. Arrane pieces close toether in a sinle layer on a lare foil-lined baking sheet., In a medium bowl, combine salsa, seasonins and meat, beans or tofu. Spoon the mixture evenly over pepper pieces. Top with cheese., Bake for 15 minutes, or until peppers are heated throuh and cheese is melted. Serve warm.

name: Black Bean Salsa
ingredients: 1 can (15.5 oz) black beans (drained and rinsed), 1 reen bell pepper (diced), 1 red bell pepper (diced), 1 onion (diced), 2 cans diced tomatoes (canned, drained), 2 cloves arlic (diced), 2 teaspoons round cumin, 1 teaspoon dried cilantro, 3 tablespoons rice vinear (can use other vinear such as red wine vinear or apple cider vinear)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain and rinse beans., Put beans and tomatoes into lare mixin bowl., Dice peppers, onion, and arlic. Add to mixin bowl., Mix cumin, cilantro, and vinear. Pour on top of beans and vegetables., Stir well.

name: Black Bean Soup
ingredients: 1 cup onion (chopped), 3/4 cup celery (chopped), 2 teaspoons arlic (chopped), 1 1/2 cups beef broth (fat removed, reduced sodium), 2 cans black beans, low-sodium (15 ounce each, drained and rinsed), 1/2 cup salsa (thick and chunky), 1 1/2 teaspoons cumin, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon oreano (dried)
directions: Combine all inredients in a saucepan., Cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

name: Broiled Tomatoes and Cheese
ingredients: 3 tomatoes (lare, firm), 8 ounces cottae cheese, low-fat, 1/2 teaspoon basil (dried), 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 cup bread crumbs (plain), cookin spray (or vegetable oil)
directions: Wash tomatoes and cut in half., Mix cottae cheese, basil, and pepper., Spread cheese on tomato halves., Sprinkle with bread crumbs and spray with cookin spray., Spray broiler pan with cookin spray. Place prepared tomatoes on a pan and broil about 10 minutes.

name: Celery with Apricot Blue Cheese Spread
ingredients: 2 tablespoons crumbled blue cheese, 3 tablespoons fat-free cream cheese, 1/2 cup fat-free yoghurt (plain), 4 dried apricots, 4 dried fis or dates, 1/4 cup pecans, 8 stalks celery
directions: Chop dried fruit and pecans., Mix blue cheese, cream cheese, and yoghurt with a fork or hand mixer until smooth., Stir in chopped, dried fruit and pecans. Refrierate spread until ready for use., Slice celery stalks into 3-4 inch sticks., Fill celery pieces with spread.

name: Cherry Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup pitted and halved sweet cherries, 1 cup cubed cantaloupe, 1 cup halved reen rapes, 1 medium banana, peeled and sliced, 1/4 cup orange juice (juice from 1/2 orange), 1/4 cup flaked coconut (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, mix toether the cut fruit., Pour orange juice over fruit and stir in coconut, if desired.

name: Chickpea Dip
ingredients: 3 arlic cloves, 1/4 cup yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 1 tablespoon lemon juice (fresh), 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 1 can (19 oz) chickpeas (drained arbanzo beans)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put all inredients into a food processor and blend until smooth., Serve at room temperature with pita chips, crackers, carrots, or other dippin vegetables.

name: Chili Bean Dip
ingredients: 1 can (16 oz) pinto beans (or 2 cups cooked dried beans), 2 tablespoons onion (chopped), 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 cup cheese (shredded)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mash beans in a bowl., Add onion and chili powder and shredded cheese., Serve warm or cold with raw vegetables or tortilla chips.

name: Chilled Cantaloupe Soup
ingredients: 1 cantaloupe (peeled, seeded, and cubed), 2 cups orange juice, 1 tablespoon lime juice (fresh), 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon (round)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place cantaloupe and 1/2 cup orange juice in a container of a blender or food processor., Cover with lid and blend until smooth. Transfer to lare bowl., Stir in lime juice, cinnamon, and remainin orange juice., Cover, and refrierate for at least one hour., Serve chilled.

name: Chunky Garbanzo Bean Dip
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) arbanzo beans, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons chopped onions, lemon pepper (to taste), salt (to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain and rinse the beans and mash in a small bowl with a fork or potato masher until most of the beans have been crushed. If you have a food processor, you can use it for this step., Stir in oil and onion alon with lemon pepper and salt to taste. The mixture will be chunky, not smooth.

name: Cookie Cutter Appetizers
ingredients: 1 whole wheat tortilla, 2 tablespoons cream cheese, low-fat, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 cup chopped vegetables (recommended: broccoli, carrots, red pepper, reen onion)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F., Cut out multiple shapes from 1 whole wheat tortilla usin cookie cutters., Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick cookin spray., Place cut out tortilla shapes onto cookie sheet., Bake in oven for 12 to 15 minutes or until olden brown., While tortillas are baking, mix low-fat cream cheese with arlic powder. Set aside., Wash and chop mixed vegetables., Once tortilla cut outs are finished baking, let cool., Spread the cream cheese mixture onto each cut out shape and decorate with mixed vegetables.

name: Corn Toasties
ingredients: 2 cups cornmeal, 1 cup all-purpose flour (sifted), 2 tablespoons suar, 1 1/2 tablespoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 3/4 cup buttermilk (made from 2 teaspoons vinear + 3/4 cup milk, made from non-fat dry milk powder), 1/4 cup e mix (dry, mixed with 1/4 cup water), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, combine cornmeal, flour, suar, baking powder, salt, and baking soda., In another bowl, combine buttermilk, e mix, and vegetable oil. Beat until well blended., Add buttermilk mixture all at once to dry inredients. Stir until well mixed., Turn mixture onto a lihtly floured board and knead only 10 times., Roll out to a thickness of 1/4 inch and cut with a 3/4-inch-round cutter., Cook on a warm unreased riddle or fryin pan for about 10 minutes on each side.

name: Cowboy Caviar (Bean Salsa)
ingredients: 1 can kidney beans, drained, (15 ounces, low-sodium), 1 can black beans, drained (15 ounces, low-sodium), 1 can corn, drained (15 ounces, low-sodium), 1 can crushed tomatoes (15 ounces), 1 can chopped reen chilies (4 ounces), 1/4 cup finely chopped onion, 1 tablespoon oil, limes, juiced (3 limes, optional), salt (to taste, optional), pepper (to taste, optional), hot sauce (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix kidney beans, black beans, corn, tomatoes, chilies, and onion in a lare bowl., Add lime juice (if usin) and oil, toss ently to combine. Taste. Add small amount of salt and pepper if desired., Serve by itself, with raw vegetables and/or corn chips.

name: Creamy Dill Dip
ingredients: 1 cup sour cream, non-fat, 1 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 2 tablespoons dill (dried)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put the sour cream, yoghurt, and dill in a medium bowl. Stir toether., Store the dip in a covered container if you don’t plan to eat it riht away., Keep the dip in the fride until you serve it.

name: Creamy Vegetable Dip
ingredients: 2 cups yoghurt, low-fat plain (or small curd or creamed cottae cheese), 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 tablespoons dried, minced onion, 1 tablespoon dried parsley flakes, salt (1/2 teaspoon, optional), dill weed (1/2 teaspoon, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a medium-sized bowl, combine yoghurt (or cottae cheese), pepper, arlic powder, dried onion, dried parsley, salt, and dill (if used). Beat until smooth., Chill dip in refrierator until ready to serve. Serve with raw vegetables.

name: Crispy Taquitos
ingredients: 3 servings Pico de Gallo, 1/2 cup chicken (cooked, finely chopped), 1/2 cup corn (no salt added, canned or frozen, thawed), 1/4 cup reen onion (chopped), 1/4 cup bell pepper (reen, chopped), 1/2 cup cheddar cheese (shredded, reduced fat, or Monterey jack or queso fresco), 12 corn tortillas, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat oven to 425 °F. In a medium bowl, combine 1 cup Pico de Gallo, chicken, corn, reen onion, bell pepper, and cheese., Soften tortillas on the stovetop or in the microwave oven, and spoon a heapin tablespoon of fillin onto the center of each tortilla. Roll up tihtly and secure each with a toothpick., Place rolled tortillas seam side down on a baking sheet and brush each lihtly with oil. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until crisp and lihtly browned., Place 3 taquitos on each plate and serve with remainin Pico de Gallo.

name: Crunchy Vegetable Wraps
ingredients: 4 tablespoons cream cheese, low-fat, 2 flour tortillas, 1/6 tablespoon Ranch seasonin mix (1/2 teaspoon), 1/4 cup broccoli (washed and chopped), 1/4 cup carrot (peeled and rated), 1/4 cup zucchini (washed and cut into small strips), 1/4 cup summer squash (yellow, washed and cut into small strips), 1/2 tomato (diced), 1/8 cup reen bell pepper (seeded and diced), 2 tablespoons chives (chopped fine)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a small bowl, stir ranch seasonin into cream cheese; chill., Wash and chop vegetables., Steam broccoli in microwave for 1 minute with 1 tablespoon of water., Spread cream cheese onto flour tortilla, stayin one inch from ede. Sprinkle vegetables over cream cheese. Roll tortilla tihtly., Chill for 1 to 2 hours before serving (the wrap will hold its shape better). With a sharp knife slice into circles and serve.

name: Cucumber Blueberry Salad
ingredients: Vinaigrette: 1 1/2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 2 tablespoons white balsamic (or other) vinegar, 1 tablespoon lime juice, freshly squeezed or bottled, 1 teaspoon sugar, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, Salad: 1 cup fresh blueberries, 1 medium greenhouse-grown cucumber, cut into small chunks, 4 cups fresh arugula, 1/4 medium red onion, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup crumbled reduced-fat Feta cheese, 2 tablespoons coarsely chopped walnuts (toasted optional), 4 slices whole grain bread
directions: In a small bowl whisk toether vinairette inredients., In a lare bowl mix toether all salad inredients, except bread., When ready to serve, add vinairette to salad and toss., Toast bread, then cut into four pieces.

name: Cucumber Yoghurt and Cream Cheese Dip
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 4 ounces cream cheese, low-fat (softened), 1 cup cucumber (seeded and diced), 1 clove arlic (chopped small), salt and lemon pepper, to taste (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Stir yoghurt and cream cheese until smooth., Rinse the cucumber under runnin water., Slice the cucumber in half the lon way and run a spoon down the middle to remove the seeds., Chop the cucumber into small pieces., Stir the cucumber, chopped arlic, and seasonins into the yoghurt mixture.

name: Cucumber, Yoghurt and Herb Dip
ingredients: 2 cups yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 2 cucumbers (medium, peeled, seeded, and rated), 1/2 cup sour cream (non-fat), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon dill (fresh), 1 arlic clove (chopped), 1 cup cherry tomatoes, 1 cup broccoli florets, 1 cup carrots (baby)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel, seed, and rate one cucumber. Slice other cucumber and set aside., Mix yoghurt, rated cucumber, sour cream, lemon juice, dill, and arlic in a serving bowl. Chill for 1 hour., Arrane tomatoes, cucumbers, broccoli, and carrots on a colorful platter. Serve with cucumber dip.

name: Curry Vegetable Dip
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 1/4 cup carrots (shredded), 2 tablespoons reen onions (minced), 1 tablespoon salad dressin (mayonnaise-type), 1 teaspoon suar, 1/4 teaspoon curry powder, 1 dash pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix inredients in a bowl., Chill., Serve with crisp raw vegetables pieces, such as celery, carrot, or summer squash sticks.

name: Dave's Herb-Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: 8 lare mushrooms (approx. 3" in diameter), 4 cloves arlic, 3/4 cup white onions, 3 teaspoons olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/2 teaspoon dried sae, 1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary, 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/4 cup bread crumbs (whole-wheat if available), 1/4 cup sun-dried tomatoes (chopped fine), 3/4 cup canned, drained, no-salt added chickpeas (arbanzo beans), 1 teaspoon lemon juice, cookin spray
directions: Preheat oven to 375 °F., Clean mushrooms with a paper towel or vegetable brush; remove stems to use for the fillin., While oven is warmin, put mushroom caps (open side down) in oven for 10 minutes. This will prepare the caps for stuffin., Chop the arlic and onions and sauté with 1 teaspoon of olive oil. One minute before they are finished, add the four herbs. After 1 minute, remove from heat., In a lare bowl, mash mushroom stems and chickpeas., Add all other inredients. Mix well., Lihtly spray a baking sheet and the mushroom caps., Stuff the mushrooms with the mixture and place on baking sheet., Bake for 15 to 18 minutes or until the stuffin is olden brown., Remove from oven, sprinkle with an herb of your choice, and enjoy.

name: Deviled Eggs
ingredients: 6 es (lare, hard-boiled and peeled), 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper
directions: Hard boil es by placin es in a saucepan and coverin them with water. Brin to a boil., Reduce heat to simmer; cook for 15 minutes., Immediately rinse under cold water to stop cookin and to make it easy to peel off shells. Refrierate peeled es (without shells) until ready for use., Slice es into halves lenthwise. Remove yellow yolks and save whites., Place yolks in a one quart zip lock style ba alon with the remainin inredients (except the e whites). Press out air., Close ba and knead (mush toether) until inredients are well-blended. (Note: you could also put yolks in a bowl with other inredients except the e whites, and mix toether well until they look like a paste)., Push contents toward one corner of the ba. Cut about 1/2 inch off the corner of the ba. Squeezin the ba ently, fill reserved e white hollows with the yolk mixture. (Note if you used a bowl, you can spoon the yolk mixture into the e whites)., Chill to blend flavors.

name: Easy Mano Salsa
ingredients: 1 mano (peeled and chopped), 1/4 cup chopped reen bell pepper, 1 reen onion, chopped, 1 lime, juiced (1-2 tablespoons)
directions: Peel and chop the mano, be sure to remove the seed., Cut the pepper and onion into small pieces., Mix all the inredients toether.

name: Fiesta Hummus
ingredients: 1 can arbanzo beans, 1/2 teaspoon cumin, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 dash cayenne pepper, 2 arlic cloves (minced), 1/2 cup yoghurt (plain, non-fat), 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1 jalapeno pepper (finely chopped), 2 tablespoons cilantro (chopped)
directions: Drain and mash arbanzo beans in blender, food processor, or with fork. Add remainin inredients., Blend until smooth., Chill one hour or overnight., Serve on crackers or tortilla chips. Promptly refrierate leftovers.

name: Fiesta Lettuce Wraps and Pepper Boats
ingredients: 6 sweet, mini bell peppers, 8 lettuce leaves, 1 cup instant brown rice (dry), 1 pound tilapia filets, fresh or frozen (thawed), 2 teaspoons Southwest chipotle seasonin (no sodium), 2 tablespoons canola oil (divided), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 limes (divided), 1/4 cup reduced-fat sour cream
directions: Slice peppers in half vertically. Arrane lettuce and 8 pepper halves on a serving platter., Cook brown rice accordin to packae directions., To make salsa fresca, dice remainin pepper halves, tomato, and onion; mix with corn, arlic, jalapeño pepper, and 1/4 teaspoon salt., Sprinkle both sides of tilapia filets with Southwest chipotle seasonin., Heat 1 1/2 tablespoons canola oil in a lare nonstick skillet over medium-hih heat. Add fish to pan, and cook for 3 minutes on each side (cook fish until it is opaque, 145 ºF). Flake with a fork and place in a serving dish., When rice is done, stir in remainin 1/2 tablespoon oil, juice from one lime, and ¼ tsp salt. Cut remainin lime into wedes., To serve, set out pepper-lettuce platter, rice, fish, salsa fresca, sour cream, and lime, and let diners build their own boats and wraps

name: Fiesta Rice Salad
ingredients: 1 cup brown rice (cooked), 1 carrot (shredded), 1 cup broccoli (chopped fine), 1 red onion (small, chopped), 1 cup tomato (chopped), 1 bell pepper (sweet, reen, red, yellow), 1 can kidney beans (15oz, drained, rinsed), 2 tablespoons cilantro (or other fresh herbs) (chopped fine), 2 tablespoons red wine vinear (or white or cider), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, salt and pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash and chop vegetables and mix with cooked rice., In a small bowl, add vinear, oil, dill, salt and pepper. (Or use your favorite dressin.) Pour over rice mixture., Add beans and toss well. Serve cold and enjoy!

name: Fruit & Feta Salad
ingredients: For the Vinaigrette: 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 dash black pepper, For the Salad: 2 cups watermelon chunks, 2 cups cantaloupe chunks, 1/4 cup medium red onion, thinly sliced, 6 cups fresh spinach or arugula, 1/2 cup reduced-fat feta cheese crumbles, 1/4 cup pine nuts
directions: Whisk toether vinairette inredients., Toss with remainin inredients and serve.

name: Fruit and Peanut Butter Dip
ingredients: 1 cup apple slices, 1 cup banana slices, 1 cup pear slices, 1 cup rapes, 1 cup strawberries, 1 cup melon slices, 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 1/3 cup peanut butter
directions: Prepare fruit by washin and slicin if necessary., Arrane fruit on a plate around a small bowl., To make dip, combine yoghurt, vanilla, and peanut butter in a small bowl., Mix well., Chill dip in refrierator until ready to serve.

name: Fruit Salsa
ingredients: 1 cup strawberries (diced), 1 banana (diced), 1 kiwifruit (peeled and diced), 1 apple (cored and diced), 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/4 cup suar, 1/4 teaspoon nutme, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine fruits in a medium mixin bowl and add lemon juice., Stir in suar, nutme, and cinnamon. Mix well., Refrierate until serving time.

name: Grape Salsa
ingredients: 2 cups cut rapes, 1/2 cup sliced reen onions, 1/2 cup diced Anaheim chili, fresh or canned, 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, 2 tablespoons vinear, 1 clove arlic, minced or 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon hot sauce
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients in a medium bowl and mix well. Let stand at least 1 hour. Drain off excess liquid before servin.

name: Grilled vegetables
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 arlic cloves (finely chopped), 3 sweet potatoes (cut into 1-inch slices), 3 corn cobs (cut into 2-inch sections), 1 eplant (cut into 1/2-inch slices), 12 reen onions (trimmed)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix oil and arlic in a lare bowl. Add vegetables and toss., Place vegetable on broiler pan or rill. Cook 10 minutes, turnin twice until vegetables are tender., Place vegetables on platter. Serve.

name: Hummus
ingredients: 2 cups arbanzo beans, cooked (chickpeas), 2 cloves arlic (minced), 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 tablespoon sesame tahini (sesame paste or substitute peanut butter for a sweet taste), 2 tablespoons olive oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mash the arbanzo beans until smooth (if you have a blender, put the beans and lemon juice into it and blend)., Add the arlic, lemon juice, tahini and oil. Mix well.\n

name: Layered Black Bean Dip
ingredients: 1 can black beans (15 ounce, drained and rinsed), 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon dried oreano, 1/8 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/2 cup salsa (thick and chunky), 1/2 cup sour cream (liht), 1/4 cup reen onion (chopped), 2 ounces cheddar cheese, reduced fat (rated)
directions: 1. Mash beans and mix with onion powder, dried oreano, arlic powder and cayenne pepper. Spread on a serving dish., 2. Top with salsa, sour cream, reen onions and rated cheese.

name: Manhattan Clam Chowder
ingredients: 3 celery (stalks, medium - washed & sliced), 1 onion (lare, chopped), 1/2 cup tomato puree (low sodium), 1 1/2 cups potatoes (sliced), 1 1/2 cups carrot (washed and sliced), 2 cans clams (6 1/2 ounces each, chopped, drained), 1 1/2 teaspoons thyme (dried), 1 bay leaf, 2 dashes black peppercorns, 1 1/2 cups water, 2 cups tomato juice (low sodium ), 1 tablespoon parsley flakes (dried)
directions: 1. Scrub potatoes well to remove any eyes or blemishes., 2. In a slow cooker, combine all inredients; stir., 3. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until the vegetables are tender., 4. Remove bay leaf and peppercorns before servin.

name: Mini Caprese Bites
ingredients: 4 cherry tomatoes, 1 cheese stick, part-skim, 8 fresh basil (leaves), 1 teaspoon olive oil (or other vegetable oil), 1 teaspoon balsamic vinear (or other vinear)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Slice strin cheese into 4 equal parts. , On a toothpick, skewer one cherry tomato, 2 basil leaves, and 1 piece strin cheese. , Drizzle finished kebabs evenly with olive oil and balsamic vinear.

name: Mozz Totz
ingredients: 12 ounces mozzarella strin cheese (fat-free), 1/2 cup milk (1% low fat), 1/2 teaspoon oreano (dried), 1/2 teaspoon basil (dried), 1/2 cup bread crumbs, 1/2 cup marinara sauce (prepared, warmed), cookin spray (non-stick)
directions: 1. Wash hands with soap and water., 2. Preheat oven to 350°., 3. Line a baking sheet with foil and spray lihtly with cookin spray., 4. Remove cheese from packae and cut into bite size pieces., 5. In a small non-stick skillet mix oreano and basil with bread crumbs., 6. Cook over medium heat, stirrin occasionally until crumbs are lihtly browned, about 5 minutes., 7. Dip each piece of cheese in milk and then into toasted bread crumbs, coatin completely., 8. Place on baking sheet about 1 1/2 inches apart., 9. Spray strin cheese lihtly with non-stick cookin spray., 10. Bake 5-6 minutes or until heated throuh. (cheese may melt slihtly and lose shape. Simply press it back into place)., 11. Dip in warmed marinara sauce and enjoy.

name: Orange Glazed Skinless Chicken Wins
ingredients: 10 chicken wins (skin removed), 3 tablespoons butter, 1 teaspoon seasoned salt, 8 tablespoons orange marmalade (1/2 cup)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Rinse chicken wins and dry on paper towelin. Tuck the win tip under the larer joint to form a trianle., Heat butter in skillet (200°F on temperature controlled as burner)., Sprinkle wins with seasoned salt and place in heated butter. Sauté on temperature controlled as burner (325°F) until evenly brown on both sides, about 20 minutes., Spread with orange marmalade, continuin to sauté while bastin frequently for another 20 minutes., Remove from skillet. Serve hot., Hold at serving temperature on automatic burner or in \Keep-Warm\ oven set at 170°F. They will be lazed and "sticky" ood.

name: Oven-Fried Yucca
ingredients: 1 pound yucca (cassava) (cut into 3-inch sections and peeled (or 1 pound peeled frozen yucca)), 1 cookin spray (as needed, non-stick)
directions: 1. In a kettle, combine the yucca with enouh cold water to cover it by 1 inch. Brin the water to a boil, and slowly simmer the yucca for 20 to 30 minutes, or until it is tender., 2. Preheat oven to 350 F., 3. Transfer the yucca with a slotted spoon to a cuttin board. Let it cool and cut it lenthwise into 3/4-inch wide wedes, discardin the thin woody core., 4. Spray cookie sheet with the nonstick cookin oil spray. Spread yucca wedes on cookie sheet and spray wedes with cookin oil spray. Cover with foil paper and bake for 8 minutes. Uncover and return to oven to bake for an additional 7 minutes.

name: Pea Guacamole
ingredients: 2 cups frozen peas, thawed, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1/2 cup rape tomatoes, halved, 1/4 cup red onion, chopped, 1 can reen chilies, drained, diced (4 oz), 3 tablespoons cilantro (chopped), 1 clove Fresh arlic, minced, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, salt (to taste, optional)
directions: 1. Mash peas until smooth. , 2. Add the lime juice, tomato, onion, reen chilies, cilantro, arlic, salt (if usin), and black pepper. Mix well. , 3. Serve with an assortment of raw vegetables and whole-rain tortilla chips.

name: Pear Quesadillas
ingredients: 2 wheat tortillas (8" diameter), 1/2 cup shredded pepper jack cheese, 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 tablespoon dried basil, 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 2 canned pear halves (sliced thin), 2 teaspoons olive oil
directions: Sprinkle cheese, onion, and dried basil on half of each tortilla., Place pear slices on top of other inredients in each tortilla., Brush each side of folded tortillas with olive oil., Heat each folded tortilla in a non-stick skillet until cheese melts, about 2 to 3 minutes on each side., Cut quesadilla into four pieces and serve immediately.

name: Potato Cakes
ingredients: 2 cups potatoes (cold, mashed, made from instant potato flakes), 1/2 cup flour (all-purpose, unsifted), 2 tablespoons onion (finely chopped), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: Put mashed potatoes into a bowl., Add flour and onion. Mix well., Pat potato mixture on a lihtly floured board until 1/2 inch thick., Cut with a 3-inch-round cutter., Place on a baking sheet, cover and refrierate until just before cookin., Heat oil in a fryin pan or riddle., Fry cakes over medium heat, turnin to brown on both sides. Serve immediately.

name: Potato Nachos
ingredients: 6 small red potatoes, skins on (1 pound), 2 teaspoons vegetable oil or cookin spray, 8 ounces lean round turkey (15% fat or less), 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 cup reduced-fat shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded lettuce, 1 tomato, diced, 3/4 cup peeled and diced cucumber, 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro, 3/4 cup salsa
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Slice potatoes into small circles about 1/4 inch thick., Lihtly coat the potato slices with oil (or spray for 3 seconds with cookin spray)., Arrane slices on a baking sheet in a sinle layer. Bake in the oven at 450 derees F for 25 to 30 minutes, dependin on desired darkness., Meanwhile, add round turkey and chili powder to a skillet. Cook, stirrin over medium heat (300 derees F in an electric skillet) for 8 to10 minutes or until turkey browns., Remove potatoes from the oven., Transfer baked potatoes to an oven-safe dish. Top with turkey and sprinkle with cheese. Put back in the oven to melt the cheese, about 2 minutes., Remove from oven and top with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, cilantro and salsa.

name: Potato Skins with Buffalo Chicken
ingredients: 12 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast, 1 cup water, 4 medium russet potatoes (about 6 oz each), 9 teaspoons hot pepper sauce, 1/4 cup non-fat milk, 1/4 cup fat-reduced sour cream, 2 tablespoons mararine, 1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese, 2 reen onions, 2 medium tomatoes, 4 celery stalks
directions: Center oven rack and preheat oven to 425 °F., Place chicken in a sauté pan, add water, and cover. Simmer for 20 minutes and remove from pan; let cool slihtly. When chicken is cool enouh to handle, shred usin two forks, one in each hand., While chicken is simmerin, wash and scrub potatoes with a clean vegetable brush under runnin water and slit each one lenthwise about 1-inch deep., Place potatoes in a microwave-safe dish and microwave on hih, uncovered, for about 10 minutes. Let cool slihtly., Slice each potato in half lenth-wise, scoop out potato, leavin a 1/4 inch shell. Mash potato toether with hot pepper sauce, sour cream, mararine, and milk. Fold in blue cheese and shredded chicken., Spoon mixture into potato skins slihtly dentin center (to hold fresh toppins after baking)., Place filled potato skins on a 9x13" baking sheet and bake about 15-20 minutes until tops are olden brown., Dice tomatoes and reen onions. Cut celery stalks into four inch sticks., To serve, top potatoes with onions and tomatoes. Serve celery sticks on the side for scoopin potato contents.

name: Pupusas Revueltas
ingredients: 16 ounces chicken breast, round, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 pound cheese, part-skim mozzarella, rated, 1/2 onion (small, finely diced), 1 arlic clove (minced), 1 reen pepper (medium, seeded and minced), 1 tomato (small, finely chopped), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 5 cups masa harina (corn flour, instant), 6 cups water
directions: 1. In a non-stick skillet over low heat, sauté chicken in oil until chicken turns white. Constantly stir the chicken to keep it from stickin., 2. Add onion, arlic, reen pepper, and tomato. Cook until chicken mixture is cooked throuh. Remove skillet from stove and let mixture cool in the refrierator., 3. While the chicken mixture is coolin, place the flour in a lare mixin bowl and stir in enouh water to make a stiff tortilla-like douh., 4. When the chicken mixture has cooled, mix in the cheese., 5. Divide the douh into 24 portions. With your hands, roll the douh into balls and flatten each ball into a 1/2 ich thick circle. Put a spoonful of the chicken mixture in the middle of each circle of douh and brin the edes to the center. Flatten the ball of douh aain until it is 1/2 inch thick., 6. In a very hot, iron skillet, cook the pupusas on each side until olden brown., 7. Serve hot.

name: Sardine, Cucumber, and Tomato Sandwich
ingredients: 8 slices whole-wheat or multirain bread (toasted), 1 cucumber (peeled, if desired, thinly sliced), 2 cans sardines, water packed (4 oz cans, drained), 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 lare tomato (thinly sliced), 1 red or white onion (peeled and thinly sliced)
directions: Put 4 slices toasted bread on the cuttin board. Arrane cucumber slices on top of each slice., Distribute the sardines evenly on top of the cucumber and usin the fork, ently mash them. Spread the mashed sardines to cover the cucumber. Squeeze the lemon juice over the sardines., Put the tomato slices on top of the sardines. Add the red onion. Top with the remainin slices of toast and press down ently to hold the sandwich toether., Cut the sandwich in half and serve riht away.

name: Soft Pretzels
ingredients: 1 tablespoon yeast, cup warm water (100-110 derees F), 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 e, 1 tablespoon suar, 2 sesame seeds (2 Tablespoons, optional)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. Lihtly rease 2 baking sheets., 2. In lare bowl, sprinkle yeast over warm water (if water is too hot, it will kill the yeast). Stir until well blended., 3. Combine white and wheat flour in a separate bowl., 4. Stir in suar, ½ teaspoon salt and 2½ to 3 cups flour to make a soft, sticky douh. Turn douh onto well-floured surface., 5. To knead, fold douh in half and push douh flat with heels of hands. Turn douh 1/4 turn. Repeat for 5 to 7 minutes. If needed, add more flour until douh is smooth and elastic. Douh should not stick to hands or counter., 6. Cut douh into 12 even pieces (about olf-ball size)., To Form Pretzels:\n1. Roll one piece of douh into 15 inch lon rope., 2. Cross left side over middle, creatin loop., 3. Fold riht side of rope up and over first loop to form pretzel shape., To Bake:\n1. Place pretzels 3 inch apart on baking sheet. Enlare holes in pretzels by insertin finer into holes. This will prevent them from closin durin baking., 2. In small bowl, mix e and 1 Tablespoon water toether. Brush on pretzels. Sprinkle with sesame seeds., 3. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until olden brown. Best if eaten warm.

name: Southwestern Pepper Cups
ingredients: 5 reen bell pepper (medium, halved and seeded, or use red or yellow peppers), 1/3 cup onion (chopped), 1 1/2 arlic clove (chopped), 3 cups brown rice, cooked, 1 can tomatoes with chiles (10 1/2 ounce, diced and undrained), 1/2 can whole kernel corn (8 1/2 ounce, drained), vegetable cookin spray, 1/3 cup cheese, cheddar, shredded
directions: Wash hands., Blanch peppers in boilin water 2 to 3 minutes. Drain. Set aside., Cook onion and arlic in oil in medium skillet over medium hih heat for 3 minutes., Combine rice, tomatoes with chiles, corn and onion mixture. Mix well., Spoon into pepper halves, place on baking sheet coated with cookin spray., Bake at 350 derees for 10 minutes or until hot. Sprinkle with cheese., Bake aain at 350 derees for 5 to 10 minutes or until hot and cheese melts.

name: Summer Salad
ingredients: 2 cups salad reens, 6 reen onions (thinly sliced, with tops), 6 mushrooms (lare, fresh, thinly sliced), 1/4 cup walnuts (coarsely chopped), 3/4 cup parsley (fresh, finely chopped), 3/4 cup Tany Dressin
directions: 1. Wash and dry reens. Tear into bite-sized pieces and place in lare salad bowl.\n2. Add onion, mushrooms, walnuts and parsley. Just before servin, toss with dressin.\n

name: Sunshine Salad
ingredients: 5 cups spinach leaves (packed, washed, and dried well), 1/2 red onion (sliced thin), 1/2 red pepper (sliced), 1 cucumber (whole, sliced), 2 orange (peeled and chopped into bite-size pieces), 1/3 cup vinairette dressin ("lite", around 15 calories per tablespoon or less)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Toss all inredients toether in a lare bowl. Add dressin and toss aain., Serve immediately.

name: Sweet and Juicy Raisin Tapenade
ingredients: 1 cup California raisins, 1/4 cup pitted Kalamata olives (drained), 2/3 tablespoon walnuts, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinear, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1 lare whole rain pita bread (approximately 16 wedes or melba rounds)
directions: Place tapenade inredients in food processor., Run until raisins, olives, and walnuts are finely chopped., Can be made ahead and refrierated., Serve with melba rounds or pita wedes.

name: Sweet and Savory Peanut Butter Dip
ingredients: 3 tablespoons peanut butter (creamy), 2 tablespoons apple butter, 2 tablespoons milk (skim), 1 tablespoon soy sauce (reduced sodium), 1 1/2 teaspoons lime juice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine peanut butter, apple butter, milk and soy sauce in a small bowl., Whisk toether until very smooth., Store tihtly, sealed in refrierator., Serve with celery or other crunchy fruits and vegetables.

name: Teriyaki Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 1/4 cup water, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1/2 cup teriyaki sauce, reduced sodium, 1 pound round turkey, 85% lean (or thinly sliced), 1 cup water chestnuts, chopped, 1 tablespoon cookin oil, 6 iceber lettuce leaves
directions:
1. Mix the water, cornstarch, and teriyaki sauce.
2. Add meat and water chestnuts.
3. Heat oil in a skillet or heavy saucepan and add meat mixture; stir until cooked throuh.
4. Serve in a lettuce leaf.

name: Tomato Basil and Bean Pasta Salad
ingredients: 1 pound ziti pasta (or bow tie pasta), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 cup vinear, 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 1/4 teaspoon round black pepper, 1 cup fresh basil leaves (chopped), 3 tomatoes (lare, coarsely chopped), 1 cup kidney beans (cooked or canned drained, or try arbanzo beans or black beans), 1 mozzarella cheese (1 cup, or provolone cheese, cubed or shredded, optional), 1 walnuts (1/2 cup chopped, optional)
directions: Cook pasta accordin to packae directions. Drain and cool., In a small mixin bowl, whisk toether vegetable oil, vinear, Dijon-style mustard and pepper to make vinairette., In a lare mixin bowl, combine pasta, beans, basil and tomatoes. Pour vinairette over top and toss toether. Cover and chill at least 1 hour., If desired, add nuts and cheese just before servin, tossin aain to combine.

name: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
ingredients: 8 tomatoes (ripe, Roma plum, chopped), 2 arlic clove (minced), 1/2 red onion (chopped), 6 basil leaves (fresh), 2 tablespoons olive oil (extra-virin), salt (optional, to taste), pepper (optional, to taste), 2 mini French bread (or Italian, cut into 1/2 inch diaonal slices)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 400 derees F., 2. Combine tomatoes, arlic, onion, basil and olive oil in a bowl. Season with salt and freshly round black pepper, to taste (optional). Set aside., 3. Arrane bread on a baking sheet in a sinle layer. Bake about 5 to 7 minutes until it beins to brown slihtly., 4. Remove bread from oven and transfer to a serving platter., 5. Serve the tomato mixture in a bowl with a serving spoon and let everyone help themselves. Or place some on each slice of bread before servin. If addin the tomato mixture yourself, add it at the last\nminute or the bread may become soy.

name: Tortilla Chips and Bean Dip
ingredients: 4 corn tortillas, 1 can kidney beans (16 ounce), 1/4 cup salsa, 1/4 cup sour cream, non-fat, 1/2 cup cheddar cheese (shredded), 1 cup lettuce (shredded)
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400 derees., 2. Place tortillas in a stack on cuttin board. With a sharp knife, cut stack into eiht pieces, formin trianles or wedes., 3. Lay tortillas pieces out in sinle layer on baking sheet. Set aside while makin dip., 4. Open canned beans. Pour beans in colander; rinse and drain. Place beans in a small mixin bowl and mash with a potato masher. Spread beans over bottom of baking dish., 5. Measure salsa and spread over beans., 6. Measure sour cream and spread over beans., 7. Grate and measure cheese; sprinkle over bean mixture., 8. Place lettuce wede on cuttin board. Slice into thin strips; set aside., 9. Place both the baking sheet with tortilla pieces and the dip in preheated oven. Bake about 8 minutes or until tortilla pieces are crisp and dip is bubbly. Sprinkle lettuce over dip and serve with tortilla chips., Create-a-Flavor Chanes
- Use Monterey Jack or another cheese.
- Substitute black beans for kidney beans.
- Substitute 1/4 cup chopped fresh tomatoes for taco sauce.
- Spread one small can chopped reen chilis over beans.

name: Tuna Veggie Antipasto
ingredients: 2 cups carrot (raw, chopped or any of your favorite raw veggies), 2 1/2 cups celery (raw, chopped or any of your favorite raw veggies), 8 cans tuna, in water (6.5 ounce liht, drained and flaked), 1 can white beans (15 ounces, or your favorite beans), 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese (rated), 1/4 cup vinear (or juice of 2 lemons), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon dried dill (or 1 tablespoon fresh dill), 1 teaspoon arlic (chopped)
directions: Wash and trim vegetables. Chop into bite size pieces. Place in lare bowl., Combine vinear, dill (or other herbs), arlic and oil. Pour over vegetables., Drain and rinse beans. Break up tuna into smaller chunks., Combine vegetables, beans and tuna; toss ently., Marinate salad overnight to combine flavors., Chill and serve as a liht summer lunch or as a picnic side dish.

name: Turkey Pinwheel Appetizers
ingredients: 8 ounces cream cheese, low-fat (arlic and herb), 6 flour tortillas (8 inch), 6 slices turkey (low sodium, 6 ounces), 3 Roma tomatoes (medium, chopped), 3 cups baby spinach leaves (fresh)
directions: 1. Place tortillas on microwaveable plate or paper towel; microwave uncovered on HIGH 10 - 15 seconds to soften., 2. Spread about 2 Tablespoons cream cheese over each tortilla. Top with a slice of turkey, chopped tomatoes and spinach., 3. Roll up lihtly; then wrap in plastic wrap. Refrierate 2 - 3 hours to blend flavors. Cut each roll into eiht 1-inch slices. Arrane with cut side down on serving plate.

name: Turnip Pancakes
ingredients: Pancakes:1 cup all-purpose flour,1/2 teaspoon pepper,1 egg,2 cloves garlic, minced,1 tablespoon low-sodium soy sauce,3/4 cup water,2 cups grated turnip,1 cup grated carrot,1/2 cup thinly sliced green onion,2 tablespoons vegetable oil (for cooking), Dipping Sauce: 2 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce,2 tablespoons rice vinegar,2 teaspoons packed brown sugar,2 tablespoons thinly sliced green onion
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, mix flour, pepper, e, arlic, soy sauce, and water in a bowl until smooth., Stir in the turnip, carrot and reen onion, Heat half of oil in a lare skillet over medium heat (350 derees F in an electric skillet). Pour about 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake into skillet. Flatten with a fork into a 3-inch circle., Cook until edes look dry and bottom is olden, about 3 to 4 minutes. Turn once. Cook until bottom is olden and crispy. Repeat with remainin batter, addin remainin oil as needed. Pancakes will be moist in the center., Combine dippin sauce inredients in a small bowl. Serve with warm pancakes.

name: Vegetable Medley with Salsa Dip
ingredients: 2 carrots (cut into 3-inch sticks), 2 celery stalks (cut into 3-inch sticks), 1 cup bell pepper (reen or other color), 1 cup sour cream, fat free, 1 cup fresh salsa (see recipe below)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Arrane vegetables on a platter., In a small bowl, mix sour cream and salsa. Serve.

name: Vegetarian Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 4 bell pepper (red or reen), 2 cups cherry tomatoes, 1 onion (medium), 1 cup basil leaves (fresh), 3 arlic clove, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 425°F. Lihtly oil a lare shallow baking pan., Cut peppers in half lenthwise and remove seeds. Arrane peppers cut sides up in baking pan and lihtly oil cut edes of stems., Halve cherry tomatoes and chop onion and basil. Finely chop arlic., In a bowl toss tomatoes, onion, basil, arlic, olive oil. salt and pepper to taste, Spoon equal portions of mixture into peppers and roast in upper third of oven until peppers are tender, about 20 minutes.

name: Veggie Quesadillas
ingredients: cookin oil spray, 1 small zucchini (small, washed and chopped), 1/2 broccoli head (washed and chopped), 1 reen bell pepper (washed, seeded and chopped), 1 onion (medium, peeled and chopped), 1 carrot (scrubbed and shredded), 4 whole wheat tortillas (10-inch), 1 cup cheddar cheese (shredded low-fat), 1/2 cup salsa
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Spray pan with cookin oil spray., Cook vegetables on medium heat for 4-5 minutes, stirrin frequently. Remove from pan., Spray pan with cookin spray. Place tortilla in the pan. Sprinkle with half the vegetables and half of the cheese., Place the other tortilla on top. Cook on medium heat for 4-6 minutes or until the cheese starts to melt and the bottom tortilla starts to brown., Flip quesadilla. Cook for 4 minutes or until tortilla browns., Repeat steps 3-5., Cut each quesadilla in half. Serve with salsa.

name: Waldorf Salad
ingredients: 1/4 cup walnuts (chopped), 2 apples (cored and diced), 1 cup celery (diced), 1/2 cup raisins, 1/4 cup plain yoghurt, non-fat, 1/2 teaspoon suar, 1 teaspoon lemon juice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 derees., Place chopped walnuts on a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes. Stir occasionally until they are evenly toasted., Combine apples, celery, nuts, and raisins., Stir toether yoghurt, suar, and lemon juice. Pour over apple mixture and toss lihtly., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: White Bean Bruschetta
ingredients: 1 whole-wheat French bauette, cut into 12 thin slices alon the bias, 1/4 cup olive oil, divided, 1 cup white onion, chopped, 4 cloves arlic, minced, 1 teaspoon dried basil, 1 teaspoon dried oreano, 1 cup canned navy beans, rinsed and drained, 2 tomatoes, cored and cubed, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinear
directions: Slice the bauette on the diaonal into thin slices (about 12 slices for a bauette)., In a lare sauté pan, heat 2 T of the olive oil over medium heat., Place the bread slices in the pan and cook on medium hih heat until sizzlin and olden. Before flippin the bread, add an additional tablespoon of olive oil to the pan and cook the second side until olden. , For the toppin, cook the onions and the remainin tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat until the onions are soft, about 7 minutes., Add the arlic, basil and oreano and cook another minute or two, until frarant., Add beans and continue cookin for another five minutes on low heat. Add the tomatoes and turn off the heat, allowin tomatoes to warm without cookin., Drizzle the balsamic vinear into the pan and ently stir. , Scoop heapin spoonfuls of the tomato-bean mixture onto the rilled bread and enjoy.

name: Whole Wheat Garlic Bread Sticks
ingredients: 6 slices bread (100% whole wheat), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 teaspoon Italian seasonin (or as needed, to sprinkle on)
directions: Spread each slice of bread with one teaspoon oil., Sprinkle with arlic powder and Italian seasonin., Stack bread and cut each slice into 3 equal parts., Bake at 300 derees for about 25 minutes or until crisp and lihtly browned.

name: Yummy Bean Dip
ingredients: 1/3 cup beans, low-sodium canned or cooked (pinto work reat), 1/3 tablespoon yoghurt, non-fat plain (1 teaspoon), 1 tablespoon salsa
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place beans in a small, resealable plastic ba. Sqeeze out extra air and seal. Mash beans with finers., Add yoghurt and salsa. Seal ba and mix with finers., Open ba or cut off corner of ba and squeeze out dip.

name: Avocado Melon Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: 1 lare, ripe avocado, 1 cup honeydew melon chunks (about 1 slice), lime, juiced (1 1/2 tsp lime juice), 1 cup 8 ounce milk (fat free), 1 cup fat-free yoghurt (plain), 1/2 cup 100% apple juice or white rape juice, 1 tablespoon honey
directions: Cut avocado in half, remove pit., Scoop out flesh, place in blender., Add remainin inredients; blend well., Serve cold. (Keeps well in refrierator up to 24 hours. If made ahead, stir ently before pourin into lasses.)

name: Batido (Smoothie)
ingredients: 2 cups papaya chunks (fresh or frozen), 2 bananas (overripe, sliced), 1 cup plain low-fat yoghurt, 1 cup ice cubes
directions: Put all the inredients in the blender., Put the lid on tihtly. Turn the blender to a medium settin and blend until the ice is chopped and the mixture is smooth, about 1 minute., Serve riht away or cover and refrierate up to 4 hours.

name: Cafe Mocha
ingredients: 1/3 cup milk (non-fat, dry), 1 cup water, 1 cup coffee (brewed), 4 tablespoons hot chocolate mix, whipped toppin (non-fat, optional), cinnamon (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat reconstituted non-fat dried milk in saucepan until warm; do not boil., Add coffee and hot chocolate mix. Stir well and heat to desired temperature., Divide coffee mixture between two mus. Top with non-fat whipped toppin and cinnamon, if desired.

name: Cantaloupe Cooler
ingredients: 1 cantaloupe (ripe), 2 1/2 cups orange juice (cold), 2 tablespoons suar (ranulated), ice (crushed)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cut melon in half. Scoop out seeds, remove rind, and discard. Cut melon into 1-inch cubes., In blender or food processor, blend melon cubes with 1/2 cup orange juice until smooth., Pour purée into pitcher and stir in the remainin orange juice and the suar. Stir until suar is dissolved., Pour into lasses filled with crushed ice.

name: Coffee Cooler
ingredients: 1/2 cup milk (1%), 1/2 cup low-fat vanilla frozen yoghurt, 1/2 cup of coffee (1/2 cup or 4 fluid ounces - cooled to room temperature), 3 ice cubes, 1 1/2 teaspoons suar
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a blender, combine all inredients; purée until smooth., Pour into a chilled lass and sprinkle with cinnamon, cocoa, or nutme if you like.

name: Flavored Water
ingredients: 1 lime, 1 cup Watermelon
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Wash all produce., Collect, cut, and measure all inredients before startin to prepare the recipe., Add all inredients plus enouh cold water to a fill a 2-quart pitcher. Chill overnight in the refrierator for the most flavor, and store in the refrierator until ready to drink. The fruit will stay fresh in the water for up to 48 hours after bein prepared., After you drink the water, you can eat the fruit or blend it into a smoothie!

name: Fruit and Yoghurt Breakfast Shake
ingredients: 1 banana (medium, very ripe, peeled), 3/4 cup pineapple juice, 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 1/2 cup strawberries (remove stems and rinse)
directions: Blend banana with pineapple juice, yoghurt and strawberries in a blender., Blend until smooth., Divide shake between 2 lasses and serve immediately.

name: Fruit Juice Slush
ingredients: 12 ounces fruit juice concentrate (100%), 12 us fluid ounces water, 3 cups ice
directions: In a blender, place juice concentrate, water, and half of ice., To prevent spillae, do not pass the top line of the blender., Blend while radually addin remainin ice. Serve.

name: Fruit Milk Shakes
ingredients: 1 cup milk (or water), 1/2 cup non-fat dry milk, 2 bananas (ripe, or 1/3 cup orange juice concentrate), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 10 lare ice cubes
directions: Place everythin toether into a blender., Blend for 30 seconds to 1 minute.

name: Fruit Slush
ingredients: 2 2/3 cups cantaloupe or watermelon (coarsely chopped, seeded, peeled), kiwifruit (1 2/3 cup coarsely chopped, optional), suar (2 tablespoons, optional), 2 tablespoons lime juice, 2 cups water, ice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a blender, puree fruit with suar and lime juice until smooth., Combine fruit mixture and water in a lare pitcher., If desired, pour throuh a strainer to eliminate pulp., Cover and refrierate for up to a week., To serve, stir well and pour into tall lasses over ice.

name: Fruit Smoothie
ingredients: 1 banana (lare), 1 cup fresh peaches or strawberries, 1 8-ounce container vanilla yoghurt, low-fat, 1/2 cup fruit juice
directions: Put all inredients in a blender., Blend on hih until smooth., Pour into 2 lasses. Serve riht away.

name: Horchata
ingredients: 1 cup white rice, lon-rain uncooked, 5 cups water, 1/2 cup milk, 1%, 1/2 tablespoon vanilla extract, 1/2 tablespoon round cinnamon, 2/3 cup suar
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Pour the rice and water into the bowl of a blender; blend until the rice just beins to break up, about one minute. Let rice and water stand at room temperature for about three hours., Strain the rice water into a pitcher and discard the rice. Stir the milk, vanilla, cinnamon, and suar into the rice water., Chill and stir before serving over ice.\n

name: Lemonade
ingredients: 1 lemon, 3/4 cup water, 1 tablespoon suar
directions:
1. Cut lemon in half crosswise., 2. Place lemon half on juicer. Push and twist to squeeze out the juice., 3. Pour juice into lass. Add about 3/4 cup water., 4. Add suar, stirrin to mix inredients., Create-a-Flavor Chanes
- Squeeze one-half each lemon and lime.
- Squeeze one-half each lemon and orange.
- Add 1/4 cup apple juice concentrate and leave out the suar.
- Use 1/4 cup seltzer water and 1/2 cup water.

name: Liz's Sparklin New Year's Cider
ingredients: 2 cups 100% apple juice, 1/2 teaspoon star anise, 2 whole cloves, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon nutme, 4 cups sparklin water (unsweetened)
directions: Combine the first five inredients in a pot and cook over medium-hih heat for about 5 minutes, stirrin the liquid intermittently., Place a strainer over a lare lass, bowl, or pitcher. Carefully pour the liquid into the container. Discard the star anise and cloves., Place the container in the refrierator to cool for about 30 minutes., Once the apple juice mixture is cool, combine it with the sparklin water and serve.

name: Mano Shake
ingredients: 2 cups milk (low-fat 1%), 1 fresh pitted mano (or 4 Tablespoons of frozen mano juice), 1 banana (medium), 2 ice cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put all inredients into a blender., Blend until foamy., Serve immediately.

name: Orange Banana Frosty
ingredients: 1 banana (frozen), 1/2 cup low-fat yoghurt (plain), 1/2 cup orange juice (prepared)
directions: Put all inredients in a blender and mix well., Add more liquid if you want the drink thinner.

name: Orange Cow
ingredients: 16 us fluid ounces orange juice, 2 cups water (cold), 1/3 cup milk (non-fat, dry), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 cup ice (or more)
directions: 1. Wash hands with soap and water., 2. Place all inredients in blender or food processor., 3. Secure lid and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Orange Delight Juice
ingredients: 1 cup orange juice, 1/2 banana, 1 cup apple juice, 1 teaspoon honey, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 cup ice (crushed)
directions: 1. Wash hands with soap and water, 2. Blend at hih speed in blender until frothy.

name: Peach Cooler
ingredients: 2 cups milk, low-fat, 1 cup canned peaches (drained, or 1 cup of sliced fresh peaches), 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice, 1 nutme (dash, if desired)
directions: 1. Put the inredients in a blender. Blend well., 2. Sprinkle with nutme if you like., 3. Serve cold.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Breakfast Shake
ingredients: 1 cup milk (fat free or 1%), 1/2 cup banana (frozen, slices), 1 tablespoon peanut butter, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, cocoa powder (as needed, sweet, optional)
directions: 1. Combine all inredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy., 2. Pour into a tall lass and arnish with a sprinkle of cocoa powder, if desired.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 2 bananas (ripe, frozen), 1 cup skim milk, 1 1/2 tablespoons creamy peanut butter, 1/2 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder, 1/2 cup low fat vanilla yoghurt, 1 1/2 cups ice
directions: Peel bananas, chop into small pieces and place in freezer until hard., Gather all inredients and put all inredients in a blender., Blend on hih until smooth., Pour into 2 lasses. Serve riht away.

name: Purple Cow
ingredients: 6 us fluid ounces rape juice (frozen), 1 cup water (cold), 1/3 cup milk (nonfat, dry), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 cup ice (or more)
directions: 1. Place all inredients in blender or food processor., 2. Secure lid and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Summer Breeze Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup plain yoghurt (non-fat), 6 strawberries (medium), 1 cup pineapple (crushed, canned in juice), 1 banana (medium), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 4 ice cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place all inredients in blender and puree until smooth., Serve in frosted lass.

name: Very Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup frozen strawberries, 1 cup frozen raspberries, 1 cup pineapple chunks, 1 banana, 1 cup skim milk (or almond milk), 1 1/2 cups ice
directions: Peel and slice the banana., Gather all inredients and combine in a blender., Cover and blend until smooth., Serve riht away or pour into ice cube trays and freeze. Durin the week, pop out the cubes for a quick on-the-o breakfast.

name: Apple Oatmeal Muffins
ingredients: 1/2 cup milk, non-fat, 1/3 cup applesauce, 1/2 cup flour, all-purpose, 1/2 cup quick-cookin oats (uncooked), 1 cup suar, 1/2 tablespoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon round cinnamon, 1 apple (tart, cored & chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Place 6 cupcake holders in baking tin., In a mixin bowl, add milk and applesauce. Stir until blended., Stir in flour, oats, suar, baking powder, and cinnamon. Mix until moistened (do not over mix)., Gently stir in the chopped apples., Spoon into cupcake holders., Bake for 15-20 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean., Cool in pan 5 minutes before servin. Store unused portions in an airtiht container.

name: Banana Bread
ingredients: 6 cups water, 4-6 handfuls corn shucks, 2 cups cornmeal, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt
directions: In a lare pot, brin 6 cups of water to a boil over medium to hih heat., Boil corn shucks for about 10 minutes. Remove carefully., Strip a few shucks into strins. Tie two strins toether to make loner strins., In a medium-sized bowl, mix the dry inredients., Keep mixin and slowly add a little water until the mixture is firm enouh to handle easily., Form cornmeal mixture into 8 oval shaped balls about 3 inches lon., Wrap the balls in corn shucks and tie the ends closed with the corn shuck strins., Gently put wrapped balls into the lare pot of boilin water. The pot should be about 2/3 full of water. Cover the pot with a lid and cook for 30-45 minutes over medium to hih heat., Remove corn shuck coverin and serve hot.

name: Banana Berry Muffins
ingredients: nonstick cookin spray, 1/4 cup applesauce, 1/4 cup suar, 2 tablespoons dried e mix (or 1 e), 2 ripe bananas, mashed, 2 tablespoons water, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup whole wheat flour, 1/4 cup quick cookin oats, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup blueberries or strawberries (fresh or frozen)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Spray a 12-cup muffin pan with non-stick cookin spray., In a medium-size bowl, combine applesauce, suar, dried e mix, banana, and water. Mix well., In a lare bowl mix flours, oats, baking powder, baking soda, and salt., Add the applesauce mixture to the bowl with the dry inredients; mix just until the batter is moist., Gently add berries into the mixture., Fill each muffin cup about 3/4 full of batter., Bake for 25-30 minutes until lihtly brown., Cool for 10 minutes and remove from pan.

name: Banana Bread
ingredients: 3 bananas (lare, well-ripened), 1 e, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/3 cup milk, fat-free, 1/3 cup suar, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1 1/2 cups flour
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat the oven to 350 °F., Peel the bananas. Put them in a mixin bowl. Mash the bananas with a fork., Add the e, oil, milk, suar, salt, baking soda, and baking powder. Mix well with the fork., Slowly stir the flour into the banana mixture. Stir for 20 seconds until the flour is moistened., Lihtly rease the bread pan with a little oil or cookin spray. Or, line the pan with wax paper., Pour the batter into the bread pan., Bake for 45 minutes until a toothpick inserted near the middle comes out clean., Let the bread cool for 5 minutes before removin it from the pan.

name: Basic Muffins
ingredients: 1/4 cup oil, 1 cup suar, 1 e, 1 1/4 cups applesauce, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup whole wheat flour, carrots, raisins, and/or walnuts (optional), 1/2 milk (1/2 cup optional, only if addin carrots, raisins or walnuts)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Line muffin tin with paper baking cups or rease bottom of tin with cookin spray., Cream mararine and suar with an electric mixer, or by hand.,  Add e, milk, and applesauce, mixin well., Blend in cinnamon, baking soda, salt, and flour., Add carrots, raisins, and/or walnuts if desired. If any of these items are added, also add milk and mix., Fill muffin tins 2/3 full and bake for 15 to 18 minutes.

name: Blue Corn Pan Bread
ingredients: 3 cups water, 2 cups blue cornmeal (yellow may be used), 1 cup cornmeal (yellow), 3/4 cup raisins, 1/2 cup sprouted wheat, 1/3 cup brown suar
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 300 °F. Line 8x8 inch cake pan with foil., Brin water to boil in a lare pot. Add each inredient, one at a time., Stir well until mixture is smooth and pour into foil-lined cake pan. Cover with a piece of aluminum foil., Bake for 2 hours. Bread is done when toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.

name: Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup suar, 2 es, 1/2 cup milk, low-fat, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 2 cups flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups blueberries (fresh or frozen)
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 °F., Grease the muffin pans., In a lare mixin bowl, stir the oil and suar until creamy., Add es, milk and vanilla. Mix until blended., In a medium mixin bowl, stir toether the flour, baking powder, and salt., Add the flour mix to the oil and suar in the lare bowl. Stir toether., Stir the blueberries into the batter., Fill each muffin cup 2/3 full with batter., Bake for 25 to 30 minutes.

name: Bran Flake Raisin Muffins
ingredients: 1/2 cup flour, all-purpose, 3/4 cup flour, whole wheat, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 cup suar, 1 3/4 cups bran flake cereal with raisins, 1 e, 1 cup buttermilk, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 425 °F. Spray or rease the bottoms of a muffin tin., Put flour in a lare bowl. Add salt, baking soda, and suar. Mix well., Stir in the bran flake cereal. Mix well., Make a well in the center of mixture and set aside., In another bowl, beat the e, buttermilk, and oil toether., Pour the e mixture into the well of the cereal mixture and stir until all inredients are moist. Do not over mix., Fill the tins 2/3 full., Bake for 15-20 minutes or until olden brown., If not eaten riht away, wrap the baked muffins in foil or a plastic ba and store in the freezer. Thaw for 15 seconds in the microwave or overnight in the refrierator.

name: Bran Muffins
ingredients: 5 cups flour, 2 teaspoons salt, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 3 cups suar, 8 cups raisin bran (about 15 oz), 4 es (beaten), 4 cups buttermilk, 1 cup oil, vegetable oil spray (or oil)
directions: Measure flour into 1-allon container., Add salt, soda, suar and raisin bran to the flour and mix well with spoon., With a spoon make a "well" in the center of the dry inredients., In the medium size bowl, beat the es with a fork until whites and yolk are evenly blended., Add milk and oil to es. Beat with fork., Add liquid to dry inredients. Stir until dry inredients are moistened (mixture will be lumpy)., Lihtly oil the bottoms of the paper cups in the muffin pan (or use muffin cups). Fill the muffin cups to 3/4 full., Bake at 425 °F for 15-20 minutes., Baked muffins can be frozen for future use.

name: Bread in a Bag
ingredients: 2 cups flour (all-purpose, plus extra for kneadin), 1 cup flour (whole wheat), 3 tablespoons milk (powdered, nonfat), 3 tablespoons suar, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon yeast (rapid rise), 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 cup water (warm, 120 to 130 °F), flour (as needed, extra, for kneadin)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine flour, whole wheat flour, yeast, suar, salt and powdered milk in a one allon resealable freezer ba. Squeeze upper part of ba to force out air and seal ba. Shake and work ba with finers to blend inredients., Add oil and warm water to dry inredients. Reseal ba. Mix by workin ba with finers until douh is completely mixed and pulls away from ba., On a floured surface, knead douh 5 minutes or until smooth and elastic, addin flour as needed. Put douh back into ba and let it rest 10 minutes., Shape douh on reased baking sheet or put into a 4x8 inch reased loaf pan. Cover with a clean cloth or plastic wrap and let rise until doubled in bulk., Preheat oven to 350 °F and bake for about 30 minutes or until olden brown. (This may take between 25 and 45 minutes to bake.), Remove from pan and cool on a wire rack or clean dish towel.

name: Chapatis Flatbread
ingredients: 2 cups whole wheat flour, 2/3 cup water (warm), 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 dash salt
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place the flour in a lare mixin bowl. Add water, oil, and salt. Mix with fork and then with hands. Keep mixin until you can make a ball., Knead the douh for about 10 minutes. Let rest for 30 minutes in the bowl, covered with a damp cloth., Roll the ball into a 12-inch lo and cut into 6 chunks., "Roll each chunk into a very thin pancake, about 7 inches in diameter. Dont worry about makin the douh into a perfect circle-just try to et it as thin as you can.", Heat a cast iron skillet (lihtly reased) on medium-hih heat. Place one chapati in the skillet and cook for 30 seconds., Use a spatula to lift bread. When chapati ets brown spots and bubbles, flip it over and cook for another 30 seconds., Wrap the cooked chapati in a cloth napkin while cookin the rest., Eat them riht away with a little butter or mararine, or use as scoops for eatin other dishes.

name: Cinnamon Suared Pumpkin Pecan Muffins
ingredients: 8 tablespoons suar (divided), 2 teaspoons cinnamon (divided), 1 cup bran flakes, 1 cup skim milk, 1 cup flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 cup canned pumpkin, 1 e, 1 tablespoon vanilla, 1/4 cup finely chopped pecans
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F. Spray 12 muffin cups with cookin spray., Combine 2 tablespoons suar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon in a small bowl; set aside., In a lare bowl, combine cereal and milk and set aside for 5 minutes., Combine 6 tablespoons suar, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, flour, baking powder, and baking soda in a bowl. Whisk pumpkin, e, and vanilla into cereal., Fold in dry mixture; bein careful not to over mix. Spoon into prepared pan and sprinkle with pecans and suar-cinnamon mixture., Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

name: Corn Bread
ingredients: 1 cup cornmeal, 1 cup flour (all purpose), 2 tablespoons suar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 e, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup milk, non-fat
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat oven to 425 °F. Grease 8x9 inch pan., Measure cornmeal, flour, suar, and baking powder into a lare mixin bowl. Stir to combine inredients., Crack e into a small bowl and beat with a fork to combine white and yolk., Add e, oil, and milk to flour mixture. Mix until inredients are well blended., Pour batter into prepared pan., Bake 20 to 25 minutes, until firm to touch or wooden pick inserted in the center comes out clean.

name: Corn Toasties
ingredients: 2 cups cornmeal, 1 cup all-purpose flour (sifted), 2 tablespoons suar, 1 1/2 tablespoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 3/4 cup buttermilk (made from 2 teaspoons vinear + 3/4 cup milk, made from non-fat dry milk powder), 1/4 cup e mix (dry, mixed with 1/4 cup water), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, combine cornmeal, flour, suar, baking powder, salt, and baking soda., In another bowl, combine buttermilk, e mix, and vegetable oil. Beat until well blended., Add buttermilk mixture all at once to dry inredients. Stir until well mixed., Turn mixture onto a lihtly floured board and knead only 10 times., Roll out to a thickness of 1/4 inch and cut with a 3/4-inch-round cutter., Cook on a warm unreased riddle or fryin pan for about 10 minutes on each side.

name: Corn Tortillas
ingredients: 2 cups masa harina (instant), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter (at room temperature), 1 1/2 cups water (warm)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Measure the masa harina and salt into a lare bowl. Cut the butter into tablespoon-sized pieces and work it into the dry inredients usin the back of a wooden spoon. Add the water and mix with a wooden spoon or with your hands until a soft douh forms. Cover the douh with a clean cloth and let rest for 5 minutes., Divide the douh into 12 pieces and roll each piece into a ball., To keep the douh from stickin to the tortilla press, put a piece of plastic wrap (or a plastic ba) on the bottom surface of the press. Put a ball of douh in the center of the plastic. Then place another piece of plastic wrap on the top of the douh. Press the douh flat in the press., Pick up the tortilla with the plastic on both sides. Peel off one piece of plastic (which can be reused). Flip the tortilla off of the plastic onto a hot riddle. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes, until the bottom of the tortilla becomes olden. Flip the tortilla and press lihtly with a spatula, which will make the tortilla puff slihtly. Cook for one to two minutes more, until the tortilla appears to be done.

name: Cornmeal Pancakes
ingredients: 2 cups cornmeal, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon suar, 2 tablespoons butter (or mararine), 1 cup evaporated milk, 1 tablespoon vinear, 1 e
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Measure, place in a bowl and mix cornmeal, baking powder, salt, and suar., Measure fat (butter or mararine), and add to cornmeal mixture. Brin water to a boil. Measure 1 3/4 cups boilin water, and add to cornmeal mixture. Beat until well mixed., Measure evaporated milk, and pour into a small bowl. Measure vinear, and stir into evaporated milk. Stir milk and vinear mixture into cornmeal mixture. Beat to mix well. Beat in e. Makes batter for 20 medium-sized pancakes., Heat riddle or fry pan. (If electric fry pan is used, preheat it to 380 °F.) Pan is "hot" when a drop of water "dances." Grease pan lihtly., Pour batter onto riddle or fry pan. Use about 3 tablespoons batter for each pancake. A 1/4 cup measure is handy to use for pourin. Stir the batter up from the bottom now and then to keep it well mixed. Cook until top is covered with bubbles and the bottom is brown. Loosen edes of each pancake all around. Turn pancakes over and brown other side.

name: Cranberry Nut Bread
ingredients: 2 cups flour*, 2/3 cup suar, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 teaspoons rated orange peel, 3/4 cup orange juice, 4 tablespoons butter, melted (or mararine) (1/4 cup), 1 e (or 2 e whites) (medium), 1 cup chopped cranberries, 1/3 cup chopped walnuts, 1/3 powdered suar, optional (1/3 cup, for laze), 1 water, optional (1 teaspoon, for laze)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F. Mix flour, suar, baking powder and baking soda in a lare bowl., Grate orange peelin, then squeeze juice from orange. Add additional orange juice to make 3/4 cup., In a separate bowl, blend orange juice, butter, e, and rated orange peel; add to flour mixture, stirrin until just blended. Mix in cranberries and walnuts., Pour batter into a 9x5 inch loaf pan, reased on bottom only., Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool in pan for 10 minutes; remove and cool completely on wire rack., Optional: to make laze, mix powdered suar and water; add water as needed to make thin laze. Drizzle over cooled loaf.

name: Cranberry Pumpkin Muffins
ingredients: 2 cups flour, 3/4 cup suar, 3 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 3/4 teaspoon allspice, 1/3 cup vegetable oil, 2 es (lare), 3/4 cup pumpkin (canned), 2 cups cranberries (fresh or frozen chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Sift toether dry inredients (flour throuh allspice) and set aside., Beat oil, es, and pumpkin toether until well blended., Add the wet inredients (pumpkin mixture) to the dry inredients all at once. Stir until moistened., Fold in chopped cranberries., Spoon into paper lined muffin cups.

name: Drop Biscuits (from Better Baking Mix)
ingredients: 2 servings of Better Baking Mix (2 cups), 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1/4 cup water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F. Lihtly rease baking sheet., Add oil and water to the dry mix. Stir just until all inredients are wet., Drop spoonsful 4 inches apart on baking sheet., Bake 10 to 12 minutes until lihtly browned.

name: Fabulous Fruit Muffins
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups flour, 1/4 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 3/4 cup buttermilk, low-fat, 2 tablespoons mararine (melted), 1 e (slihtly beaten), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup frozen strawberries (coarsely chopped, or other fruit, fresh or frozen)
directions: Wash your hands and work area., Heat oven to 400 °F. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cookin spray., In a lare bowl, combine the flour, suar, baking powder, and baking soda. Stir well until all inredients are blended., In another bowl, combine buttermilk, mararine, e, and vanilla. Pour this mixture into the dry inredients (made in step #3)., Usin a lare spoon, ently stir inredients just until moist (do not over-mix). Add fruit and stir ently (do not over-mix)., Spoon batter evenly into 9 muffin cups., Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until olden brown., Serve hot or cold. Muffins may be frozen for later use.

name: Feather Rolls
ingredients: 4 cups flour, whole wheat, 3/4 cup flour, all-purpose, 1 1/4 tablespoons yeast, dry active, 1 cup non-fat dry milk powder, 1 1/2 cups warm water, 1/3 cup oil, 3 tablespoons suar (or honey), 2 es, lare (or 4 e whites), 1 teaspoon salt
directions: Mix 2 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, dry yeast, and non-fat dry milk in lare mixer bowl. Add water, oil, and suar (or honey). Mix well 1 to 2 minutes., Turn off mixer, cover, and let douh sit for 10 minutes., Add es and salt. Turn on mixer. Add remainin flour, 1 cup at a time, until douh beins to form a ball., Knead for 5 to 6 minutes. Douh should be very soft and manaeable. Stiff douh produces heavy, dry rolls. If douh stiffens while mixin, drizzle a little warm water over douh as it kneads., Douh may be used immediately or covered and stored in the refrierator for several days., Lihtly oil hands and counter top if needed. Shape immediately into rolls. Let rise until very liht., Bake at 350 °F for 18 to 20 minutes. Do not overbake.

name: Flour Tortillas
ingredients: 2 cups flour (all-purpose, or 1 1/2 cup all purpose flour and 1/2 cup whole wheat flour), 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil (or shortenin), 1/2 cup water (warm, 105 to 110 °F)
directions: In a lare bowl, combine flour, baking powder, and salt., Add oil and mix until crumbly., Start with 1/2 cup of water and add 1 tablespoon at a time until mixture forms a loose crumbly ball., Turn onto a lihtly floured surface; knead 6 to 8 times or until smooth., Divide into 10 balls. Roll each piece into an 8 inch circle., Heat a 12 inch dry skillet over medium-hih heat. Place one tortilla at a time into skillet and cook until liht brown spots appear on bottom. Turn over and cook on other side until lihtly browned.

name: Garden Pan Bread
ingredients: 1/2 cup cornmeal, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 ripe bananas, mashed, 1/2 cup water, 1 tablespoon e mix (or 1 e), 1/4 cup raisins, 1/4 cup walnuts, chopped, nonstick cookin spray
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., In a medium-sized bowl, combine cornmeal, flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside., In a small bowl, combine bananas, water, and e mix. Stir until mixed well., Stir banana mixture into cornmeal mixture. Mix until dry inredients are moistened. Gently stir in raisins and walnuts., Lihtly spray medium-sized skillet or baking pan with nonstick cookin spray., Spoon batter into skillet or baking pan., Bake for 18 to 20 minutes or until bead is olden brown and pulls away from the edes. A wooden toothpick or clean fork inserted into the center of the bread should come out clean., Cut into four equal slices and serve hot or cold.

name: Giner Bread Mix
ingredients: 8 cups flour (white), 1 1/2 cups suar, 1 tablespoon baking soda, 3 tablespoons iner (dried, round), 3 tablespoons cinnamon (dried, round), 1 teaspoon cloves (dried, round), 1 teaspoon salt
directions: Combine all inredients in a lare bowl. Mix well., Store mix in a covered jar until ready to use.

name: Giner Orange Muffins
ingredients: 2 servings Giner Bread Mix (2 cups), 1 cup bran cereal, 1 e (slihtly beaten), 1/2 cup milk, 1%, 1/4 cup orange juice concentrate, 1/4 cup molasses, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon orange peel (rated), 1/4 raisins (optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Combine the Giner Bread Mix and bran cereal in a bowl., Beat the e slihtly in another bowl., Add the e and other inredients to the inerbread and cereal mixture., Stir only until combined. Let stand for 15 minutes., Fill 12 muffin cups (well-reased pans or paper liners) 2/3 full., Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until done in the center.

name: Homemade Pizza Crust
ingredients: 1 teaspoon rapid rise yeast, 1/2 cup lukewarm water, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon oil, 1 cup bread flour (approximately)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix yeast, water, salt, and oil. Add about 1 cup flour to make a stiff douh. The amount of flour may vary slihtly., Knead the douh until it is very elastic (will stretch and not make a hole)., Use a rollin pin or clean bottle to obtain even thickness., Lay it on a reased baking sheet to rise while you prepare toppins for pizza., Bake at 400°F with desired toppins until crust is browned and top is bubbly.

name: Homestyle Biscuits
ingredients: 2 cups flour (all purpose), 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons suar, 2/3 cup buttermilk (low-fat), 3 tablespoons vegetable oil (+ 1 teaspoon vegetable oil)
