directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 450 °F., In medium bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and suar., In small bowl, stir toether buttermilk and oil. Pour over flour mixture and stir until well mixed., On lihtly floured surface, knead douh ently for 10-12 strokes. Roll or pat douh to ¾-inch thickness. Cut with a 2-inch round biscuit or cookie cutter, dippin cookie cutter in flour between cuts. Transfer biscuits to an unreased baking sheet., Bake for 12 minutes or until olden brown. Serve warm.

name: Lemon Corn Cake
ingredients: 1 cup yellow corn meal, 1 cup flour, 1/2 cup suar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 3/4 cup yoghurt, low-fat lemon (about 6 oz), 2 teaspoons lemon peel (finely rated), 1 tablespoon oil, 1 e yolk, 2/3 cup non-fat milk, 3 e whites, non-stick cookin spray, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/2 cup powdered suar
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400 derees.
2. Mix first five inredients toether in mixin bowl.
3. Combine yoghurt, lemon peel, oil, e yolk and milk toether and stir into dry inredients just until blended.
4. Whip e whites with mixer until stiff. Fold into corn meal mixture.
5. Pour into round 9-inch cake pan coated with nonstick cookin spray.
6. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until corn cake tests done.
7. For optional lemon laze: Over low heat blend lemon juice toether with powdered suar. Pierce cake top repeatedly with fork. Slowly pour laze evenly over the top.

name: Los Blueberry Coffee Cake
ingredients: 1 e, 1/2 cup non-fat milk, 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 3 tablespoons canola oil, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 teaspoons lemon peel (rated, yellow only), 2 cups flour, all purpose, 1/2 cup suar, 4 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups fresh (or frozen unsweetened) blueberries
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 derees. Position rack in the center of the oven., In a lare bowl whisk toether the e, milk, yoghurt, oil and lemon peel., Sift the flour, suar, baking powder and salt onto the liquid inredients. Usin a fork, stir very lihtly, just until inredients are combined., Gently fold in the blueberries. Pour the batter into an 8- or 9-inch baking pan coated with nonstick spray., In a small bowl combine the toppin inredients. Sprinkle evenly over the cake batter., Bake a 400 derees for 30 to 35 minutes or until the top is lihtly browned and a wooden toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean., Allow the cake to cool in the baking pan on a wire rack for at least 10 minutes., Serve warm or at room temperature.

name: Mixed Grain Bread
ingredients: 1/4 cup cornmeal (yellow), 1/4 cup brown suar (packed), 1 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 cup water (boilin), 1 packet dry yeast (active), 1/4 cup water (warm 105 - 115 derees), 1/3 cup whole wheat flour, 1/4 cup rye flour, 2 1/4 cups flour (all purpose)
directions: 1. Mix cornmeal, brown suar, salt and oil with boilin water, cool to lukewarm (105 - 115 derees)., 2. Dissolve yeast in 1/4 cup warm water; stir into cornmeal mixture. Add whole wheat and rye flours and mix well. Stir in enouh all purpose flour to make douh stiff enouh to knead., 3. Turn douh onto lihtly floured surface. Knead until smooth and elastic, about 5 to 10 minutes., 4. Place douh in lihtly oiled bowl, turnin oil top. Cover with clean towel; let rise in warm place until double, about 1 hour., 5. Punch douh down; turn onto clean surface. Cover with clean towel; let rest 10 minutes. Shape douh and place in reased 9 x 5 inch pan. Cover with clean towel; let rise until almost double, about 1 hour., 6. Preheat oven to 375 derees. Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until bread sounds hollow when tapped. Cover with aluminum foil durin baking if bread is brownin too quickly. Remove bread from pan and cool on wire rack.

name: Muffins (from Better Baking Mix)
ingredients: 2 servings of Better Baking Mix (2 cups), 1/2 cup suar, 1 e, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 2/3 cup water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400°F., Grease 12-cup muffin pan., Mix the Better Baking Mix and suar in a bowl., Beat the e with a fork., Add e, oil, and water to dry inredients. Stir just until all inredients are wet., Spoon into the prepared muffin pan.

name: Naan
ingredients: 1 packet of yeast, active dry (1/4 ounce), 1 cup warm water, 1/4 cup suar, 3 tablespoons milk, 1%, 1 e, beaten, 2 teaspoons salt, 4 1/2 cups bread flour, arlic (2 teaspoons, minced, optional), 4 tablespoons butter, melted (1/4 cup)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water and let stand about 10 minutes or until frothy., Stir in suar, milk, e, salt and enouh flour to make a soft douh., Knead for six to eiht minutes on a lihtly floured surface or until smooth. 5. Let it rise one hour until the douh has doubled in volume., Punch down douh and knead in arlic., Pinch off small handfuls of douh about the size of a olf ball., Roll into balls and place on a tray. Cover with a towel and allow to rise until doubled in size, about 30 minutes., Durin the second risin, preheat rill to hih heat., At rill side, roll one ball of douh out into a thin circle. Lihtly oil rill. Place douh on rill and cook for two to three minutes or until puffy and lihtly browned, Brush uncooked side with butter and turn over., Brush cooked side with butter and cook until browned, another two to four minutes., Remove from rill and continue the process until all the naan has been prepared.

name: New Enland Johnny Cake
ingredients: 2 e (beaten), 3/4 cup suar, 2 cups flour, 1 cup yellow cornmeal, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 3/4 teaspoon salt, cup vegetable oil, 1 1/2 cups skim or reconstituted non-fat dry milk, 1 teaspoon vegetable oil (or spray)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 derees., 2. Mix suar with beaten es in small mixin bowl., 3. In the other bowl, mix flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt toether., 4. Add oil, e mixture and milk to the flour mixture. Mix. Pour into a lihtly oiled baking dish., 5. Bake at 375 derees for 30 minutes.

name: Oat Bran Muffins
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups oat bran, 1/4 cup brown suar (firmly packed), 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 banana (mashed), 3/4 cup applesauce (unsweetened), 2 tablespoons raisins, dates, or other dried fruit, 1 lare e, 1/2 cup orange juice, 3/4 cup non-fat milk, 2 tablespoons canola oil
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 425 derees., 2. Mix the first four dry inredients. Set aside. Mix the e with orange juice, milk and oil. Mix fruit and blend with dry inredients., 3. Add the liquid inredients to the dry until it is moist., 4. Spray muffin tin with a non-stick coatin. Pour batter into muffin tins., 5. Bake for 15-17 minutes. Remove muffins from pan after 10 minutes. Cool on a rack. Freeze muffins for later use.

name: Oat Snack Cakes
ingredients: 6 cups oatmeal (raw), 2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 cup flour (all purpose), 1 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 3/4 cup mararine (softened), 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 2 teaspoons vanilla flavorin, 2 e whites (beaten), 1 tablespoon water, 1 cup raisins
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 derees. Mix toether oatmeal, flour, suar, baking soda, salt and cinnamon in a lare bowl., 2. Cut in mararine until mixture resembles coarse meal., 3. Combine oil, vanilla, e whites, and water. Stir into dry inredients and rasins, mixin only until it holds toether., 4. Wash hands thorouhly, then dip in cornmeal or flour. Pinch off pieces of douh and form into balls about 1 inch in diameter., 5. Place balls on baking pan (sprayed with non-stick cookin spray) and press out slihtly to about 1/4 inch in thickness., 6. Bake 15-20 minutes or until lihtly browned. Cool, then store in an airtiht container.

name: Oatmeal Bread
ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups boilin water, 1 packet dry yeast (active), 1/4 cup warm water (105 - 115 derees), 1/4 cup molasses, 1 1/2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 cups whole wheat flour, 2 cups flour (all purpose)
directions: 1. Combine rolled oats and salt in a lare mixin bowl. Stir in boilin water; cool to lukewarm (105 - 115 derees)., 2. Dissolve yeast in 1/4 cup warm water in small bowl., 3. Add yeast water, molasses, and oil to cooled oatmeal mixture. Stir in whole wheat flour and 1 cup all purpose flour. Add additional all purpose flour to make a douh stiff enouh to knead., 4. Knead douh on lihtly floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 5 minutes., 5. Place douh in lihtly oiled bowl, turnin to oil top. Cover with clean towel; let rise in warm place until double, about 1 hour., 5. Punch douh down; turn onto clean surface. Shape douh and place in reased 9 x 5 inch pan. Cover with clean towel; let rise in a warm place until almost double, about 1 hour., 6. Preheat oven to 375 derees. Bake 50 minutes or until bread sounds hollow when tapped. Cover with aluminum foil durin baking if bread is brownin too quickly. Remove bread from pan and cool on wire rack.

name: Oatmeal Raisin Muffins
ingredients: 1 e, 1 cup milk, fat-free, 1/3 cup oil, 1 1/4 cups flour, 1 cup oatmeal, 1/3 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup raisins, teaspoon mararine or butter (to rease the muffin cups)
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 400 derees., 2. Put the e, milk, and oil in a small mixin bowl. Slowly stir them toether., 3. In a lare mixin bowl, mix the flour, oatmeal, suar, baking powder, salt and raisins. Stir until they are mixed., 4. Pour the e-milk-oil mix into the lare bowl with the dry inredients., 5. Stir until the dry inredients are barely moistened. Do not over-mix (the batter should be lumpy)., 6. Grease each cup in the muffin pans with some mararine or butter., 7. Spoon the batter into the cups in each muffin pan, until each cup is half-full with batter., 8. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the muffins are olden brown.

name: Parmesan Chive Biscuits
ingredients: 2 cups biscuit mix, 2/3 cup milk (2% or fat-free), 1/4 butter stick (1/4 cup, melted), 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese (freshly rated), 1/2 tablespoon chives (finely chopped, fresh)
directions: 1. Combine all inredients in a lare bowl., 2. Stir toether to mix well. Do not over mix., 3. Turn out onto a floured board. Roll to a 1-inch thick square., 4. Cut into 12 squares. Bake on a cookie sheet, spaced slihtly apart, in a 400° F oven for 12 to 15 minutes.

name: Peanut Butter Bread
ingredients: 2 es, 1 1/2 cups 1 % milk, 1/3 cup suar (ranulated), 1 cup peanut butter, 1 3/4 cups flour (all purpose), 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt
directions: Preheat oven to 350 derees. Lihtly rease or spray with non-stick spray, a loaf pan., In lare bowl, beat es. Add milk, suar and peanut butter. Mix well., In a separate bowl combine flour, baking powder, and salt. Mix thorouhly., Add dry inredients to wet inredients. Mix only enouh to moisten all inredients., Pour into prepared pan. (Pan will be half full). Bake for 1 hour.

name: Peanut Butter Muffins
ingredients: 3/4 cup peanut butter (chunky), tablespoon honey, 2 e, 1 cup milk, skim, 1 1/2 cups flour, 1/2 cup cornmeal, 3 tablespoons suar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 375 derees., 2. Line 12 muffin cups with paper baking cups (or rease the bottom of each cup with butter or mararine)., 3. Put the peanut butter and honey in a mixin bowl. Beat until well blended., 4. Add the es 1 at a time, beatin well after each e., 5. Add the milk, and mix well., 6. Add the flour, cornmeal, suar, baking powder, and salt. Stir just until they are moistened. Don’t stir them too much., 7. Fill each muffin cup 2/3 full., 8. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes until olden brown., 9. Put on a wire rack., 10. Cool for at least 10 minutes before servin.

name: Perfect Pumpkin Pancakes
ingredients: 2 cups flour, 6 teaspoons brown suar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 1/4 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 e, 1/2 cup pumpkin (canned), 1 3/4 cups milk, low-fat, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: 1. Combine flour, brown suar, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice and salt in a lare mixin bowl., 2. In a medium bowl, combine e, canned pumpkin, milk and vegetable oil, mixin well., 3. Add wet inredients to flour mixture, stirrin just until moist. Batter may be lumpy. (For thinner batter, add more milk)., 4. Lihtly coat a riddle or skillet with cookin spray and heat on medium., 5. Usin a 1/4 cup measure, pour batter onto hot riddle. Cook until bubbles bein to burst, then flip pancakes and cook until olden brown, 1 1/2 to 2 1/2 minutes. Repeat with remainin batter. Makes about 1 dozen 3 1/2 inch pancakes.

name: Pumpkin Bread
ingredients: 1 can pumpkin (15 ounce), 1 cup suar, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 1 1/2 cups flour (all purpose), 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup raisins
directions: Preheat oven to 350 derees., 1. In a lare mixin bowl, beat toether pumpkin, suar, oil, and yoghurt., 2. In a medium bowl, combine the flours, baking powder, soda, cinnamon, and salt; add to pumpkin mixture, stirrin until just moistened., 3. Stir in raisins., 4. Pour into 2 reased 9x5x3 inch loaf pans and bake for about 1 hour., 5. Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes; remove from pan and cool completely.

name: Pumpkin Chocolate Muffins
ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 3/4 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, 1 can pumpkin, 1 cup water, 1/2 cup chocolate chips
directions: Whisk all the dry inredients toether. Add pumpkin and water., Fold the wet inredients into the dry inredients until just combined. Fold in chocolate chips., Place batter into 24 prepared muffin tins and bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

name: Soft Pretzels
ingredients: 1 tablespoon yeast, cup warm water (100-110 derees F), 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 e, 1 tablespoon suar, 2 sesame seeds (2 Tablespoons, optional)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. Lihtly rease 2 baking sheets., 2. In lare bowl, sprinkle yeast over warm water (if water is too hot, it will kill the yeast). Stir until well blended., 3. Combine white and wheat flour in a separate bowl., 4. Stir in suar, ½ teaspoon salt and 2½ to 3 cups flour to make a soft, sticky douh. Turn douh onto well-floured surface., 5. To knead, fold douh in half and push douh flat with heels of hands. Turn douh 1/4 turn. Repeat for 5 to 7 minutes. If needed, add more flour until douh is smooth and elastic. Douh should not stick to hands or counter., 6. Cut douh into 12 even pieces (about olf-ball size)., To Form Pretzels:\n1. Roll one piece of douh into 15 inch lon rope., 2. Cross left side over middle, creatin loop., 3. Fold riht side of rope up and over first loop to form pretzel shape., To Bake:\n1. Place pretzels 3 inch apart on baking sheet. Enlare holes in pretzels by insertin finer into holes. This will prevent them from closin durin baking., 2. In small bowl, mix e and 1 Tablespoon water toether. Brush on pretzels. Sprinkle with sesame seeds., 3. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until olden brown. Best if eaten warm.

name: Soul-Healthy Cornbread
ingredients: 1 cup cornmeal, 1 cup flour (all purpose), 1/2 cup suar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup low-fat buttermilk, 1/2 cup applesauce, unsweetened, 4 e whites (1/2 cup), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 400 derees. Lihtly spray and 8 inch square pan with vegetable oil cookin spray., 2. Mix dry inredients in an medium-sized mixin bowl., 3. Add the rest of the inredients and mix well by hand., 4. Pour the batter into the sprayed pan and shake to make it level., 5. Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 25 minutes., 6. Allow to cool, then cut into 12 squares.

name: Three-Grain Peanut Bread
ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1/2 cup oatmeal (quick cookin), 1/2 cup cornmeal, 1/2 cup non-fat dry milk powder, 1/2 cup suar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 3/4 teaspoon salt, 2/3 cup peanut butter, 1 e, 1 1/2 cups milk, non-fat
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 325 derees., 2. Combine dry inredients in a lare bowl., 3. Usin two knives, cut peanut butter into dry inredients until it appears coarse and crumbly., 4. In a small bowl, beat toether e white and milk. Add to dry inredients and mix well., 5. Spread mixture into a reased loaf pan. Bake at 325 derees for 1 hour and 10 minutes., 6. Cool for 10 minutes and remove from pan.

name: Whole Wheat Garlic Bread Sticks
ingredients: 6 slices bread (100% whole wheat), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 teaspoon Italian seasonin (or as needed, to sprinkle on)
directions: Spread each slice of bread with one teaspoon oil., Sprinkle with arlic powder and Italian seasonin., Stack bread and cut each slice into 3 equal parts., Bake at 300 derees for about 25 minutes or until crisp and lihtly browned.

name: Whole Wheat Muffins
ingredients: 1 cup flour (all purpose), 1 cup whole wheat flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 cup brown suar (firmly packed, or white suar), 1 cup milk, low-fat (1%), 2 e, 1 vanilla (1 teaspoon, optional), 1/4 cup mararine or butter (melted, or 1/4 cup vegetable oil), 1 tablespoon suar, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon (round)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 400 derees. Lihtly oil or coat with non-stick spray the cups of a 12 cup muffin pan, or use paper muffin cups., 2. Mix toether suar and cinnamon for toppin and set aside. , 3. In a lare bowl, stir toether flour, salt, baking powder and suar. In a lass or plastic liquid measurin cup, measure milk, then add es, vanilla (if usin), and melted shortenin or oil. Mix with a fork until e is well combined with other inredients., 4. Pour milk mixture over flour mixture and stir with a spoon, about 20 strokes, until flour is just moistened. Batter will be lumpy and thick., 5. Fill prepared muffin cups about 2/3 full with batter. Sprinkle about 1/4 teaspoon of cinnamon/suar toppin over each muffin., 6. Bake in oven for 20 to 25 minutes until olden brown. Serve warm. Leftovers may be frozen.

name: Wild Rice Muffins
ingredients: Cookin spray, 1 1/2 cups bakery mix, 1/4 cup suar, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 2 bananas, mashed, 3/4 cup milk, 1/4 cup applesauce, 1 cup wild rice, cooked, walnuts, chopped (optional)
directions:
Wash hands with soap water., 1. Preheat the oven to 400 °F. Spray a 12-cup muffin pan with cookin spray.
2. In a medium bowl, mix bakery mix, suar, and cinnamon.
3. In a separate bowl, mix bananas, milk, and applesauce.
4. Add banana mixture to dry mixture and stir.
5. Fold in wild rice and nuts.
6. Spoon ¼ cup of the batter into each muffin cup. Bake for 20–25 minutes.

name: Yummy Baels
ingredients: 2 tablespoons suar, 1 tablespoon yeast, 1 1/2 cups warm water, 2 cups flour, whole wheat, 1 1/4 cups flour, all purpose, 1 teaspoon canola oil, cinnamon (optional), suar (optional), salt (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix suar, yeast, water, and flours toether., Rub inside of bowl with oil. Place douh in bowl and flip to coat with oil. Let rise 30 minutes., Punch down douh and divide into 16 portions. Shape into a ball and poke a hole throuh the middle with your finers., Place on a well-reased baking sheet and cover with a towel to rise aain for 15-20 minutes. Put 2 inches of water in a pot and heat to boilin., Usin a slotted spoon, ently place each bael into a rapidly boilin water for 1 minute on each side. Remove and dry on a towel. Place back on baking sheet. If desired, sprinkle baels with cinnamon/suar or salt., Bake at 475°F for 8-12 minutes.

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients: 3 e, 1 cup suar, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 2 cups zucchini (rated), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 1 1/2 cups flour (all purpose), 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 cup raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 325 derees and lihtly rease and flour a 9 x 5 loaf pan., In a lare mixin bowl, beat es lihtly. Add suar, oil, zucchini, and vanilla and beat., In a separate bowl, measure dry inredients and stir to combine. Add raisins., Add dry inredients to the e mixture. Stir just until all inredients are moistened., Spoon into loaf pan., Bake at 325 derees for 50 minutes. Test for doneness by insertin a toothpick in the center. It should come out dry., Allow loaf to cool 5 to 10 minutes before turnin out onto a coolin rack., Serve warm or allow to cool before slicin.

name: Apple Oatmeal Muffins
ingredients: 1/2 cup milk, non-fat, 1/3 cup applesauce, 1/2 cup flour, all-purpose, 1/2 cup quick-cookin oats (uncooked), 1 cup suar, 1/2 tablespoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon round cinnamon, 1 apple (tart, cored & chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Place 6 cupcake holders in baking tin., In a mixin bowl, add milk and applesauce. Stir until blended., Stir in flour, oats, suar, baking powder, and cinnamon. Mix until moistened (do not over mix)., Gently stir in the chopped apples., Spoon into cupcake holders., Bake for 15-20 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean., Cool in pan 5 minutes before servin. Store unused portions in an airtiht container.

name: Apple Sandwiches
ingredients: 1 medium apple, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1 tablespoon raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cut apple in half from the stem down and lay each half cut-side down on a cuttin board. Slice each half into 6 half-round slices and cut out the core., Spread 1/2 teaspoon peanut butter on one side of each apple slice., Put 4 to 6 raisins on top of the peanut butter on one apple slice. Top with another apple slice, peanut-butter side down. Squeeze ently., Continue with remainin apple slices.

name: Apple Slice Pancakes
ingredients: 1 apple (Granny Smith), 1 1/4 cups pancake mix (any type), 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 lare e, 2 teaspoons canola oil, 1 cup milk, low-fat
directions: Lihtly coat a riddle or skillet with cookin spray and heat over medium heat., Peel, core and thinly slice apple into rins., In a lare mixin bowl, combine inredients for pancake batter. Stir until inredients are evenly moist. (Small lumps are ok! Over-mixin makes pancakes touh.), For each pancake, place apple rin on riddle and pour about 1/4 cup batter over apple rin, startin in the center and coverin the apple., Cook until bubbles appear. Turn and cook other side until lihtly brown.

name: Apple Wedges with Pumpkin Almond Butter
ingredients: For the Dip:,1/2 cup pumpkin puree (canned or from scratch),1/3 cup almond butter (or crunchy peanut butter),2 tablespoons maple syrup,1/8 teaspoon cinnamon,Apple Slices:,24 slices golden delicious apple slices,24 slices granny smith apple slices
directions: Mix toether dip inredients., Serve with apple slices.

name: Applesauce Pancakes
ingredients: 1 cup applesauce, 1/4 cup dry milk powder, non-fat instant, 1 cup water, 2 es, 1 tablespoon canola oil, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons suar, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 teaspoons baking powder
directions: Wash hands and clean food preparation area., In a medium mixin bowl, combine applesauce, dry milk powder, water, es, and oil., Add flour, suar, cinnamon, and baking powder., Stir until mixture has only small lumps., Place lare skillet on medium-hih heat., Spray skillet with non-stick cookin spray., Pour 1/2 cup batter onto skillet., Turn pancake when bubbles form on top of batter., Cook the other side for about 1 minute or until olden brown.

name: Avocado Breakfast Bruschetta
ingredients: 1 ripe avocado, 2 medium tomatoes, 1 reen onion, 1/2 cup chopped fresh basil (plus 2 tablespoons for arnish), 4 es (hard-boiled), 12 slices whole-wheat bauette bread, 1/4 cup ricotta cheese (reduced-fat), cracked black pepper to taste
directions: Dice avocado, tomatoes, and reen onions., Peel and chop hard-boiled es., Reserving 2 tbsp. basil for arnish, ently toss first five inredients in a small bowl. Add pepper to taste., Toast bauette slices and smear with ricotta cheese., Top with avocado mix and arnish with chopped basil.

name: Avocado Melon Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: 1 lare, ripe avocado, 1 cup honeydew melon chunks (about 1 slice), lime, juiced (1 1/2 tsp lime juice), 1 cup 8 ounce milk (fat free), 1 cup fat-free yoghurt (plain), 1/2 cup 100% apple juice or white rape juice, 1 tablespoon honey
directions: Cut avocado in half, remove pit., Scoop out flesh, place in blender., Add remainin inredients; blend well., Serve cold. (Keeps well in refrierator up to 24 hours. If made ahead, stir ently before pourin into lasses.)

name: Awesome Granola
ingredients: 3 cups oatmeal (uncooked), 1/2 cup coconut (shredded or flaked), 1 cup pecans (chopped, walnuts or peanuts), 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup mararine (liquid), 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, 2/3 cup raisins
directions: Heat oven to 350 ºF. Combine all inredients in a lare bowl, except raisins, mix well., Bake in 13x9 inch baking pan at 350 ºF for 25 to 30 minutes or until olden brown. Stir every 5 minutes., Stir in raisins. Cool thorouhly. Store in tihtly covered container.

name: Banana Berry Muffins
ingredients: nonstick cookin spray, 1/4 cup applesauce, 1/4 cup suar, 2 tablespoons dried e mix (or 1 e), 2 ripe bananas, mashed, 2 tablespoons water, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup whole wheat flour, 1/4 cup quick cookin oats, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup blueberries or strawberries (fresh or frozen)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Spray a 12-cup muffin pan with non-stick cookin spray., In a medium-size bowl, combine applesauce, suar, dried e mix, banana, and water. Mix well., In a lare bowl mix flours, oats, baking powder, baking soda, and salt., Add the applesauce mixture to the bowl with the dry inredients; mix just until the batter is moist., Gently add berries into the mixture., Fill each muffin cup about 3/4 full of batter., Bake for 25-30 minutes until lihtly brown., Cool for 10 minutes and remove from pan.

name: Banana Oatmeal Pancakes with Lentils
ingredients: 1/4 cup dried red lentils, 1 cup old fashioned (lare flake) oats, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup brown suar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 3/4 cup plain yoghurt, low-fat, 3/4 cup milk, 1%, 1/4 cup canola oil (or melted butter), 2 es, lare, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 2 bananas (over-ripe, mashed), maple syrup (optional, to serve with pancakes)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a small saucepan of boilin water, cook the lentils for 15-20 minutes, until soft. Drain well and set aside., In a lare bowl, stir toether the oats, flour, brown suar, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. In a smaller bowl, whisk toether the yoghurt, milk, oil, es, and vanilla. Add to the dry inredients alon with the banana and lentils, and stir until just combined., Set a heavy skillet over medium-hih heat, add a drizzle of oil and wipe it around with a paper towel to coat the bottom of the pan., Cook about 1/2 a cup of batter at a time, spreadin it out with the back of a spoon if needed (it will be thick). Cook for a couple of minutes, until bubbles bein to break throuh the surface and the bottom is olden. Keep the heat to medium, as these will take loner to cook throuh that most pancakes, and you do not want to burn the bottoms., Flip with a thin spatula and cook until they are olden on the other side, and spriny to the touch. Keep the pancakes warm on a rack set on a baking sheet in a 250 °F oven while you finish cookin the rest., Serve drizzled with maple syrup (optional).

name: Banana Pancakes with Apple Toppin
ingredients: 2 es, 1 1/2 cups milk (1%), 1 tablespoon honey, 3 tablespoons oil, 3/4 cup whole wheat flour, 3/4 cup flour (all purpose), 2 teaspoons baking powder, 2 bananas, 3 apples, 3 tablespoons suar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 cup water
directions: Beat es. Beat in milk, honey, and oil., Add flours and baking powder., Slice bananas and add to mixture., Coat a lare, non-stick fryin pan or riddle with non-stick cookin spray. Warm the pan over medium heat for 2 minutes., Spoon 1/4 cup of the batter onto the heated riddle for each pancake (adjust more or less dependin on pancake size)., Cook until the tops are bubbly and the pancakes are dry around the edes. Flip and cook for 2-3 minutes or until olden on both sides. Place pancakes on a platter and keep warm., Repeat steps 5 and 6 until batter has been used, usin more nonstick cookin spray as needed.

name: Banana Split Oatmeal
ingredients: 1/3 cup oatmeal (dry, quick-cookin), 1/8 teaspoon salt, 3/4 cup water (very hot), 1/2 banana (sliced), 1/2 cup frozen yoghurt (non-fat or low-fat)
directions: In a microwave safe cereal bowl, mix toether the oatmeal and salt. Stir in water., Microwave on hih power for 1 minute. Stir. Microwave on hih power for another minute. Stir aain., Microwave an additional 30-60 seconds on hih power until the cereal reaches the desired thickness. Stir aain., Top with banana slices and frozen yoghurt.

name: Banana Waldorf
ingredients: 3 bananas (peeled and sliced), 1 apple (cored and sliced, with peel), 4 cups yoghurt (nonfat vanilla), 1 pinch cinnamon, 1/8 cup walnuts
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix all inredients toether in lare mixin bowl., Place in individual serving dishes and chill until ready to serve, up to 1 hour., This dessert looks reat when topped with a sprinkle of round cinnamon.

name: Banana Walnut Oatmeal
ingredients: 2/3 cup milk (non-fat, dry), 1 dash salt, 2 3/4 cups water, 2 cups oats (quick cookin), 2 bananas (very ripe, mashed), 2 tablespoons maple syrup, 2 tablespoons walnuts (chopped)
directions: In a small saucepan, combine reconstituted non-fat dry milk, salt, and additional water. Heat over medium heat until steamin hot, but not boilin., Add oats and cook, stirrin until creamy, 1 to 2 minutes., Remove the pan from heat and stir in mashed banana and maple syrup. Divide between 4 bowls, arnish with walnuts, and serve.

name: Basic Quiche
ingredients: 1 pie crust (baked, 9-inch), 1 cup vegetables (chopped, broccoli, zucchini, or mushrooms), 1/2 cup cheese (shredded), 3 es (beaten), 1 cup milk (non-fat), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 °F., Shred the cheese with a rater. Put it in a small bowl for now., Chop the vegetables until you have 1 cup of chopped vegetables., Cook the vegetables until they are cooked, but still crisp., Put the cooked vegetables and shredded cheese into a pie shell., Mix the es, milk, salt, pepper, and arlic powder in a bowl., Pour the e mix over the cheese and vegetables, Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean., Let the quiche cool for 5 minutes before servin.

name: Batido (Smoothie)
ingredients: 2 cups papaya chunks (fresh or frozen), 2 bananas (overripe, sliced), 1 cup plain low-fat yoghurt, 1 cup ice cubes
directions: Put all the inredients in the blender., Put the lid on tihtly. Turn the blender to a medium settin and blend until the ice is chopped and the mixture is smooth, about 1 minute., Serve riht away or cover and refrierate up to 4 hours.

name: Bell Pepper and Vidalia Onion Strata with Fresh Salsa
ingredients: 1 Vidalia onion (divided), 1/2 red bell pepper (sliced vertically), 1/2 reen bell pepper (sliced vertically), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 4 lare es, 4 e whites, 1/2 cup fat-free (skim) milk, 1/8 teaspoon round black pepper, cookin spray, 4 slices whole-rain bread (4-6 slices, dry or toasted, cubed), 1/2 cup reduced-fat Italian blend cheese, 10 cherry tomatoes (or 2 tomatoes), 1 arlic clove
directions: Pack rack in center of oven and preheat oven to 350 ºF., Cut Vidalia onion into slices vertically; reserve about 1/4 of onion. Heat oil in a 10-inch non-stick skillet. Sauté onion and pepper slices for 5-8 minutes, until tender and just startin to brown. Remove from heat., Beat es, e whites, milk, and pepper in lare bowl, set aside., Spray 8- or 9-inch baking pan (square or round) with cookin spray., Arrane bread cubes in bottom of pan. Sprinkle with shredded cheese., Add sautéed vegetables and pour in e mix., Bake uncovered for 45 minutes, until set. E dishes should be cooked to 160 ºF., While strata is baking, prepare salsa, by dicin and mixin cherry tomatoes, arlic, and remainin Vidalia onion.

name: Black Bean Burrito
ingredients: 1 1/3 cups black beans (cooked, mashed with 1 teaspoon canola oil, or use canned vegetarian refried beans), 4 tortillas, corn, 2 tablespoons onion (chopped), 1/2 cup tomatoes (chopped), 1/2 cup salsa, low-sodium, 4 tablespoons yoghurt, non-fat plain, 2 tablespoons cilantro (chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix beans with onion and tomatoes., Microwave tortillas between the two sheets of slihtly damp white paper towels on hih for 15 seconds., Divide bean mixture between the tortillas., Fold each tortilla to enclose fillin., Place on microwave-safe dish and spoon salsa over each burrito., Microwave on hih for 15 seconds., Serve topped with yoghurt and cilantro.

name: Blue Cornmeal Pancakes
ingredients: 3/4 cup blue cornmeal, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup water, boilin, 1/2 cup milk, 2 tablespoons mararine, melted, 1 e (or 2 tablespoons e mix + 1/4 cup water), 3/4 cup flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, Cookin spray, Liht syrup or honey (optional)
directions: In a lare bowl, mix the cornmeal and salt. Stir in the boilin water until the inredients are wet. Cover and let stand for 3 minutes., In a separate bowl, mix the milk, melted mararine, and e or e mix and water mixture. Add to the cornmeal mixture., Add flour and baking powder to the bowl and mix until combined., Heat a lare skillet over medium heat and spray with cookin spray., Spoon ¼ cup of the batter on the skillet. When bubbles appear, flip, and cook the other side until olden brown. Serve with syrup, honey, yoghurt, or fresh fruit if desired.

name: Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup suar, 2 es, 1/2 cup milk, low-fat, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 2 cups flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups blueberries (fresh or frozen)
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 °F., Grease the muffin pans., In a lare mixin bowl, stir the oil and suar until creamy., Add es, milk and vanilla. Mix until blended., In a medium mixin bowl, stir toether the flour, baking powder, and salt., Add the flour mix to the oil and suar in the lare bowl. Stir toether., Stir the blueberries into the batter., Fill each muffin cup 2/3 full with batter., Bake for 25 to 30 minutes.

name: Bran Flake Raisin Muffins
ingredients: 1/2 cup flour, all-purpose, 3/4 cup flour, whole wheat, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 cup suar, 1 3/4 cups bran flake cereal with raisins, 1 e, 1 cup buttermilk, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 425 °F. Spray or rease the bottoms of a muffin tin., Put flour in a lare bowl. Add salt, baking soda, and suar. Mix well., Stir in the bran flake cereal. Mix well., Make a well in the center of mixture and set aside., In another bowl, beat the e, buttermilk, and oil toether., Pour the e mixture into the well of the cereal mixture and stir until all inredients are moist. Do not over mix., Fill the tins 2/3 full., Bake for 15-20 minutes or until olden brown., If not eaten riht away, wrap the baked muffins in foil or a plastic ba and store in the freezer. Thaw for 15 seconds in the microwave or overnight in the refrierator.

name: Bran Muffins
ingredients: 5 cups flour, 2 teaspoons salt, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 3 cups suar, 8 cups raisin bran (about 15 oz), 4 es (beaten), 4 cups buttermilk, 1 cup oil, vegetable oil spray (or oil)
directions: Measure flour into 1-allon container., Add salt, soda, suar and raisin bran to the flour and mix well with spoon., With a spoon make a "well" in the center of the dry inredients., In the medium size bowl, beat the es with a fork until whites and yolk are evenly blended., Add milk and oil to es. Beat with fork., Add liquid to dry inredients. Stir until dry inredients are moistened (mixture will be lumpy)., Lihtly oil the bottoms of the paper cups in the muffin pan (or use muffin cups). Fill the muffin cups to 3/4 full., Bake at 425 °F for 15-20 minutes., Baked muffins can be frozen for future use.

name: Breakfast Parfait
ingredients: 2 cups pineapple, canned and chopped, 1 cup berries, frozen (thawed), 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 1 banana (peeled and sliced), 1/3 cup raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In lasses or bowls, layer pineapple, berries, yoghurt, banana, and raisins.

name: Broccoli Omelet
ingredients: 3 cups broccoli florets, 1 lare red bell pepper (cut into strips), 16 button mushrooms (sliced), cookin spray, 4 es, 8 e whites (from 8 es), 1/4 cup milk (fat-free), 1/2 cup ricotta cheese, 2 tablespoons rated Parmesan cheese, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper
directions: Cut vegetables as directed., Whisk es and milk in a medium mixin bowl., Spray 10-inch non-stick skillet with cookin spray; heat., Add broccoli, peppers, and mushrooms; sauté about 3-5 minutes, then remove from pan.

name: Broccoli-Cheddar Frittata
ingredients: 1 packae (10-oz) frozen chopped broccoli, 1/4 cup water, 8 es, 1/4 cup nonfat or low-fat milk, 2 teaspoons prepared mustard, 1 teaspoon seasoned salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 3/4 cup shredded reduced-fat cheddar cheese (3 ounces), 1 tablespoon chopped reen onion, 1 small carrot, diced, nonstick cookin spray
directions: Combine broccoli, carrot (if desired), and water in 10-inch nonstick skillet., Cook over medium heat until tender, stirrin occasionally to break up broccoli, about 10 minutes; drain well., Beat es, milk, mustard, salt, and pepper in lare bowl until blended., Add broccoli mixture, cheese, and reen onion; mix well., Coat same skillet with cookin spray; heat over medium heat until es are almost set, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat., Cover and let stand until es are completely set and no visible liquid e remains, 8 to 10 minutes. Cut into wedes.

name: Buttermilk Scones
ingredients: 1 cup whole-wheat flour, 3/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/3 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup raisins, 4 tablespoons butter, melted (1/4 cup), 2/3 cup buttermilk
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Combine the flours, suar, baking powder, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Mix well., Add raisins and mix lihtly., In a small bowl, combine melted butter and buttermilk. Add liquid inredients to flour mixture; mix ently., Spoon douh into 9 equal mounds on a reased baking sheet. Bake until well browned, 18 to 20 minutes., Serve hot or at room temperature. Best eaten the same day you bake them.

name: Cherry Puff Pancake
ingredients: 3 es, 1/2 cup fat free (skim) milk (or 1% milk), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon suar, 1/8 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 tablespoons mararine (or butter), 2 cups halved, pitted sweet cherries, fresh or frozen, thawed and drained, ¼ cup sliced almonds (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 450 °F., In a medium bowl or blender, beat the es, milk, and vanilla toether until well blended., Mix the flour, suar, and cinnamon toether. Add to the liquid inredients and mix until there are no lumps., Put mararine or butter in a 10- or 11-inch oven proof skillet or a 2 1/2- to 3-quart baking dish. Place the skillet or dish in the hot oven until the mararine or butter is melted and bubbly. Remove from the oven. Quickly spread the cherries across the bottom of the hot skillet or dish., Pour the batter over the cherries and sprinkle with almond slices, if usin., Return to the oven and bake for 15 to 20 minutes until the edes are browned and the puffs in the middle are olden. Cool slihtly before cuttin into 4 pieces. The center puffs will flatten durin coolin.

name: Cinnamon Suared Pumpkin Pecan Muffins
ingredients: 8 tablespoons suar (divided), 2 teaspoons cinnamon (divided), 1 cup bran flakes, 1 cup skim milk, 1 cup flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 cup canned pumpkin, 1 e, 1 tablespoon vanilla, 1/4 cup finely chopped pecans
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F. Spray 12 muffin cups with cookin spray., Combine 2 tablespoons suar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon in a small bowl; set aside., In a lare bowl, combine cereal and milk and set aside for 5 minutes., Combine 6 tablespoons suar, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, flour, baking powder, and baking soda in a bowl. Whisk pumpkin, e, and vanilla into cereal., Fold in dry mixture; bein careful not to over mix. Spoon into prepared pan and sprinkle with pecans and suar-cinnamon mixture., Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

name: Cinnamon-Raisin Breakfast Mix
ingredients: 1/4 cup suar, 1 teaspoon round cinnamon, 1/4 cup mararine, tub-style, 1 1/2 cups square, whole-rain corn cereal, 1 1/2 cups square, whole-rain rice cereal, 1 1/2 cups square, whole-rain wheat cereal, 1/2 cup raisins or dried cranberries
directions: In small bowl, mix suar and cinnamon; set aside. , In lare microwavable bowl, microwave butter uncovered on HIGH about 40 seconds, or until melted., Stir in cereals until evenly coated. Microwave uncovered 2 minutes, stirrin after 1 minute. , Sprinkle half of the suar mixture evenly over cereals; stir. Sprinkle with remainin suar mixture; stir., Microwave uncovered 1 minute., Stir in raisins or dried cranberries. Spread on paper towels to cool.

name: Coffee Cooler
ingredients: 1/2 cup milk (1%), 1/2 cup low-fat vanilla frozen yoghurt, 1/2 cup of coffee (1/2 cup or 4 fluid ounces - cooled to room temperature), 3 ice cubes, 1 1/2 teaspoons suar
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a blender, combine all inredients; purée until smooth., Pour into a chilled lass and sprinkle with cinnamon, cocoa, or nutme if you like.

name: Corn Casserole
ingredients: 1/2 cup onion, chopped, 1 1/2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 can low-sodium cream style corn (about 15 ounces), 3/4 cup yellow cornmeal, 1/2 cup 1% low-fat milk, 4 tablespoons dried e mix (or 2 es), 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, Nonstick cookin spray
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., In a saucepan, cook onions over medium heat in vegetable oil until tender (about 4 to 5 minutes)., Open canned corn and drain liquid into a measurin cup. If needed, add water to make 1 cup of liquid., Add liquid and cornmeal to the cooked onions in the saucepan. Stir until the mixture boils., Remove saucepan from heat. Mix in milk, corn, and dried e mix., In a mixin bowl, mix flour and baking powder. Add cornmeal mixture. Mix well., Spray a 9-inch baking pan with nonstick cookin spray. Pour mixture into baking pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Cut into 6 servings.

name: Cornmeal Pancakes
ingredients: 2 cups cornmeal, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon suar, 2 tablespoons butter (or mararine), 1 cup evaporated milk, 1 tablespoon vinear, 1 e
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Measure, place in a bowl and mix cornmeal, baking powder, salt, and suar., Measure fat (butter or mararine), and add to cornmeal mixture. Brin water to a boil. Measure 1 3/4 cups boilin water, and add to cornmeal mixture. Beat until well mixed., Measure evaporated milk, and pour into a small bowl. Measure vinear, and stir into evaporated milk. Stir milk and vinear mixture into cornmeal mixture. Beat to mix well. Beat in e. Makes batter for 20 medium-sized pancakes., Heat riddle or fry pan. (If electric fry pan is used, preheat it to 380 °F.) Pan is "hot" when a drop of water "dances." Grease pan lihtly., Pour batter onto riddle or fry pan. Use about 3 tablespoons batter for each pancake. A 1/4 cup measure is handy to use for pourin. Stir the batter up from the bottom now and then to keep it well mixed. Cook until top is covered with bubbles and the bottom is brown. Loosen edes of each pancake all around. Turn pancakes over and brown other side.

name: Cranberry Pumpkin Muffins
ingredients: 2 cups flour, 3/4 cup suar, 3 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 3/4 teaspoon allspice, 1/3 cup vegetable oil, 2 es (lare), 3/4 cup pumpkin (canned), 2 cups cranberries (fresh or frozen chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Sift toether dry inredients (flour throuh allspice) and set aside., Beat oil, es, and pumpkin toether until well blended., Add the wet inredients (pumpkin mixture) to the dry inredients all at once. Stir until moistened., Fold in chopped cranberries., Spoon into paper lined muffin cups.

name: Crunchy Berry Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 1 cup blueberries or strawberries (fresh or frozen thawed), 1/2 cup low-fat ranola (or crunchy cereal)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Spoon yoghurt into lass., Top with fruit and ranola.

name: Eggs over Kale and Sweet Potato Grits
ingredients: 1 lare sweet potato (orange flesh), 2 cups fresh kale (chopped), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil (divided), 1 1/2 cups water, 1 cup non-fat milk, 3/4 cup rits (quick cookin), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 es
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Coat 4 individual soufflé dishes with 1 tsp vegetable oil., Make 3 to 4 slits in sweet potatoes; cook in microwave until just soft., When sweet potatoes are cool enouh to handle, peel, cut into chunks, and puree in food processor., Heat remainin vegetable oil in sauce pan, and sauté kale about 5 minutes., In a medium sauce pan, boil water and milk, add rits and sweet potatoes; cook for 5 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in sautéed kale., Divide rits mixture evenly amon 4 soufflé dishes (or place all in casserole dish)., Make 4 depressions in the rits mixture with the back of a lare spoon. Carefully break one e into each hollow., Bake uncovered for 30 minutes until es are cooked. Let cool 10 minutes before servin.

name: Fabulous Fruit Muffins
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups flour, 1/4 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 3/4 cup buttermilk, low-fat, 2 tablespoons mararine (melted), 1 e (slihtly beaten), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup frozen strawberries (coarsely chopped, or other fruit, fresh or frozen)
directions: Wash your hands and work area., Heat oven to 400 °F. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cookin spray., In a lare bowl, combine the flour, suar, baking powder, and baking soda. Stir well until all inredients are blended., In another bowl, combine buttermilk, mararine, e, and vanilla. Pour this mixture into the dry inredients (made in step #3)., Usin a lare spoon, ently stir inredients just until moist (do not over-mix). Add fruit and stir ently (do not over-mix)., Spoon batter evenly into 9 muffin cups., Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until olden brown., Serve hot or cold. Muffins may be frozen for later use.

name: Fantastic French Toast
ingredients: 2 lare es, 1/2 cup non-fat milk, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 6 slices whole wheat bread, syrup or other toppins (optional)
directions: Preheat the riddle over medium heat, or set an electric fryin pan at 375 °F., Put es, milk, and vanilla in a pie pan or shallow bowl and beat with a fork until well mixed., Grease the riddle or pan with a thin layer of oil or use nonstick spray., Dip both sides of bread, one slice at a time, in the e mixture and cook on the hot riddle or fryin pan., Cook on one side until olden brown. Turn the bread over to cook the other side. It will take about 4 minutes on each side., Optional: serve with syrup, applesauce, fruit slices, or jam.

name: Fruit and Yoghurt Breakfast Shake
ingredients: 1 banana (medium, very ripe, peeled), 3/4 cup pineapple juice, 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 1/2 cup strawberries (remove stems and rinse)
directions: Blend banana with pineapple juice, yoghurt and strawberries in a blender., Blend until smooth., Divide shake between 2 lasses and serve immediately.

name: Fruit Pizza To Go
ingredients: 1 Enlish muffin (whole wheat), 2 tablespoons whipped fat-free strawberry cream cheese, 2 strawberries, sliced, 2 rapes, sliced, 2 slices mandarin oranges
directions: Toast the Enlish muffin until olden brown. Spread cream cheese on toasted muffin., Arrane sliced strawberries, rapes, and orange slices on top of the cream cheese.

name: Fruit Smoothie
ingredients: 1 banana (lare), 1 cup fresh peaches or strawberries, 1 8-ounce container vanilla yoghurt, low-fat, 1/2 cup fruit juice
directions: Put all inredients in a blender., Blend on hih until smooth., Pour into 2 lasses. Serve riht away.

name: Fruit Smoothie II
ingredients: 3 cups strawberries, frozen (or other frozen fruit), 2 cups milk, low-fat, 1 banana, lare, 1 cup yoghurt (plain or vanilla)
directions: Defrost the frozen fruit just enouh so that it will blend easily., Pour the milk into the blender., Add the pieces of frozen fruit to the milk in the blender., Add the banana and yoghurt., Blend until smooth, about 30 to 45 seconds.

name: Fruit Snake
ingredients: 2 bananas (medium), 4 raisins
directions: Wash hands; et out inredients and utensils., Peel banana and use butter knife to cut banana in half lenthwise., Place 2 banana halves on small plate end to end, in an "s" shape., Add raisins to the top of banana as eyes., Enjoy your Fruit Snake.

name: Fruit Yoghurt Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, fruit-flavored (low-fat), 1/2 banana (medium), 1/2 cup rape, 1/4 cup dry crunchy cereal (Grape Nuts or ranola cereals are ood)
directions: Peel and slice the banana., Spoon the rapes into a tall plastic cup., Put 3 spoonsful of yoghurt on top of the rapes., Spoon sliced bananas on top of the yoghurt., Add the rest of the yoghurt., Sprinkle the cereal on top.

name: Fruity Homemade Oatmeal
ingredients: 3/4 cup old-fashioned rolled oats, 2 tablespoons raisins or currants, 1 apple (cored and chopped), 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 1/2 cups water
directions: Use a vegetable peeler to remove the skin from the apple., Cut the core out of the apple. Chop the apple into small pieces., Put the water in the saucepan., Brin the water to a boil on medium heat., Stir in oatmeal, raisins, chopped apple, and cinnamon., Turn heat to low., Cook 5 minutes, stirrin often.

name: Garden Frittata
ingredients: 4 lare es, 1/4 teaspoon round black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 medium unpeeled red potatoes, 1/2 tablespoon olive oil, 4 cups Italian kale, or other kale variety, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1/2 red bell pepper (chopped)
directions: Beat es, pepper, and salt in lare bowl; set aside., Microwave potatoes until slihtly soft, but not completely cooked; then cube. (Alternate method without microwave: Cube potatoes and boil 5 minutes until slihtly soft; then drain.), Chop remainin vegetables while potatoes cool. Mix vegetables toether., Heat oil in a 10-inch non-stick skillet. Sauté vegetables for 5 to 8 minutes; add to es and mix well., Pour e-vegetable mixture into the same skillet. Cook over low to medium heat until es are almost set, about 8 to 10 minutes., Cover and let sit until es are completely set, about 5 minutes. E dishes should be cooked to 160 ºF.

name: Giner Orange Muffins
ingredients: 2 servings Giner Bread Mix (2 cups), 1 cup bran cereal, 1 e (slihtly beaten), 1/2 cup milk, 1%, 1/4 cup orange juice concentrate, 1/4 cup molasses, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon orange peel (rated), 1/4 raisins (optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Combine the Giner Bread Mix and bran cereal in a bowl., Beat the e slihtly in another bowl., Add the e and other inredients to the inerbread and cereal mixture., Stir only until combined. Let stand for 15 minutes., Fill 12 muffin cups (well-reased pans or paper liners) 2/3 full., Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until done in the center.

name: Granola Bars
ingredients: 1 cup honey, 1 cup peanut butter, 3 1/2 cups rolled oats, 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 cup carrot (rated), 1/2 cup coconut
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Peel and rate the carrots., Put the honey and peanut butter in a lare saucepan. Cook on low heat until they melt., Remove the pan from the heat. Turn off the burner., Add oatmeal, raisins, carrots, and coconut to the saucepan. Stir well, and let it cool until you can safely touch it with your hands., Put the mix into a 9x13 inch baking pan., Press the mix firmly into the bottom of the pan., Bake for 25 minutes., Cut into 24 bars.

name: Green Onion Omelet
ingredients: 1 can low-sodium sliced potatoes, drained (about 15 ounces), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 whole e, 3 e whites, 3 tablespoons 1% low-fat milk, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup ham, diced, 1/2 can low-sodium tomatoes, drained (about 8 ounces), 1 tablespoon reen onion (or wild onion), chopped
directions: Open and drain can of sliced potatoes. Cut sliced potatoes into strips., In a lare skillet over medium heat, lihtly brown potatoes in the vegetable oil for  5 to 10 minutes., In a mixin bowl, add e, e whites, milk, and salt. Mix well, Stir in ham, tomatoes, and reen (or wild) onions., Pour e mixture over potatoes in the skillet., Cover skillet and continue to cook es over medium heat until firm, not runny (about 8 minutes)., Cut the omelet into four pieces and serve.

name: Ham and Swiss Breakfast Casserole
ingredients: 6 ounces ham, thinly sliced, low sodium, extra lean (NOT honey-baked ham), 6 ounces Swiss cheese, shredded, 3 slices enriched white bread, 3 slices whole wheat bread, 1 cup skim milk, 2 lare es, 1 tablespoon yellow mustard, 1/2 teaspoon "beau monde" seasonin (or alternate), 1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 teaspoon onion powder
directions: Lihtly spray an 8x8 inch baking pan with non-stick spray., Lay 3 slices of bread in the bottom. Layer 1/2 the ham and 1/2 the cheese., Repeat layer of bread, ham and, cheese., Beat toether remainin inredients and pour over the casserole., Cover and refrierate overnight., Bake, uncovered, for 1 hour at 325 °F; serve hot.

name: Herbed Spinach Quiche Portabella Caps
ingredients: 4 portabella mushrooms (3-inch diameter), cookin spray, 3 lare es, 6 e whites from 6 es, 1/2 cup bread crumbs (whole-wheat if available), 1/4 cup nonfat milk, 1 teaspoon low-sodium arlic & herb blend, 1 cup cooked and drained, chopped, frozen spinach, 1/4 cup reduced-fat Parmesan cheese, divided
directions: Place oven rack in center of oven; preheat oven to 375 °F., Remove portabella stems; wipe clean with damp paper towel., Spray baking sheet with cookin spray, and place mushroom caps on baking sheet., In a mixin bowl, whisk toether all remainin inredients, except 1 tbsp Parmesan cheese., Coat 10-inch non-stick pan with cookin spray and heat over medium flame., Cook and scramble e mixture until it just starts to thicken. Remove from heat., Usin a lare spoon, scoop partially cooked, hot e mixture into portabella caps., Sprinkle tops with remainin Parmesan cheese. Bake about 20 minutes., Serve immediately.

name: Hot Cornmeal Cereal
ingredients: 1 cup cornmeal, 1 teaspoon salt, 3 cups cold water, 3 cups boilin water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix the cornmeal, salt and cold water., Pour into the boilin water, stirrin occasionally., Cook until thickened, stirrin often., Cover and cook over low heat about 15 minutes., Serve hot with milk and suar.

name: Huevos Motulenos
ingredients: 1 cup pinto beans, dry, 6 cups water, 8 small corn tortillas, 1 can low-sodium peas, drained (about 15 ounces), 4 ounces ham, cooked and diced (about 1/2 cup), 4 e whites, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 cup fresh tomato salsa
directions: Soak the pinto beans in 3 cups of water overnight in the refrierator. Drain. Boil the beans in 3 cups fresh water until they are soft. Drain the water and mash the beans into a paste., Preheat oven to 350 derees F., Place tortillas on a cookie sheet and bake for 1 to 2 minutes. Remove cookie sheet from oven and let tortillas cool., Spoon 1/4 cup of mashed beans on each tortilla. Drain peas and put 1/4 cup of peas on top of beans. Add 2 tablespoons of diced ham on top of peas., Bake the tortillas for about 8 minutes., In a mixin bowl, mix e whites with vegetable oil., Cook the e whites in a nonstick pan over medium heat until firm. Cut the e into 8 pieces., Place baked tortillas on a plate. Cover ham and mashed beans with a piece of e., Add 2 tablespoons of salsa on each tortilla, and serve two tortillas per person.

name: Jean's Banana pudding Parfait
ingredients: 8 iner snap cookies (crushed), 7 medium ripe bananas (sliced thin), 1 cup nonfat milk, 1 1-oz box instant suar-free, fat-free vanilla pudding, 1 1/4 cups low-fat vanilla yoghurt, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup fat-free frozen whipped toppin (thawed), 10 8-oz parfait cups or drinkin lasses, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon for arnish (optional)
directions: In a lare bowl, whisk toether the milk and pudding mix; blend well (about 2 minutes)., Add yoghurt and vanilla extract; blend until smooth., Stir the thawed whipped toppin into the mixture., Line the bottom of the parfait cups with a teaspoon of crumbled iner snaps., Layer 6 banana slices on top of the cookies; then 2 tbsp of the yoghurt mixture on top. Repeat with another layer of the iner snaps, bananas, and yoghurt mixture., Top with cinnamon or crushed cookie for arnish., Cover and chill in refrierator.

name: Jiffy Oatmeal Crunch
ingredients: 1/2 cup mararine or butter, 3/4 cup brown suar (firmly packed), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 2 cups quick oats (uncooked), 1 cup raisins
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees and rease a 9 x 13 inch baking pan., 2. In lare skillet, melt butter and brown suar., 3. Remove from heat and stir in remainin inredients., 4. Spread into pan and bake for 15 - 20 minutes. Cool; cut into squares.

name: Liht as a Feather Whole Wheat Pancakes
ingredients: 1 1/3 cups whole wheat flour, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon baking soda, 1 e, lare, 3 teaspoons brown suar (1 Tablespoon, packed), 1 1/3 cups buttermilk, 1%, 1 tablespoon oil
directions:
1. Preheat riddle. In medium bowl, stir or sift dry inredients toether.
2. In a separate bowl, beat e, buttermilk, brown suar and oil toether. Stir into dry inredients just until moistened; batter should be slihtly lumpy.
3. Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake onto sprayed or seasoned hot riddle.
4. Flip the pancake when bubbles appear on surface; turn only once.

name: Los Blueberry Coffee Cake
ingredients: 1 e, 1/2 cup non-fat milk, 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 3 tablespoons canola oil, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 teaspoons lemon peel (rated, yellow only), 2 cups flour, all purpose, 1/2 cup suar, 4 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups fresh (or frozen unsweetened) blueberries
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 derees. Position rack in the center of the oven., In a lare bowl whisk toether the e, milk, yoghurt, oil and lemon peel., Sift the flour, suar, baking powder and salt onto the liquid inredients. Usin a fork, stir very lihtly, just until inredients are combined., Gently fold in the blueberries. Pour the batter into an 8- or 9-inch baking pan coated with nonstick spray., In a small bowl combine the toppin inredients. Sprinkle evenly over the cake batter., Bake a 400 derees for 30 to 35 minutes or until the top is lihtly browned and a wooden toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean., Allow the cake to cool in the baking pan on a wire rack for at least 10 minutes., Serve warm or at room temperature.

name: Melon and Mint
ingredients: 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1/4 cup fresh mint leaves, 6 teaspoons packed brown suar (2 Tablespoons), 3 cups watermelon cubes, 3 cups honeydew cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Blend lime juice, mint leaves and brown suar toether in a small food processor., Place melon cubes in a bowl. Drizzle dressin over melon and toss ently.

name: Microwave Denver Scramble Slider
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped red or reen bell peppers, 1 tablespoon chopped onion, 1 e, 1 thin slice deli ham (chopped), 1 tablespoon water, 1 slider-size bun or whole wheat Enlish muffin (split and toasted)
directions: Place peppers and onions in 8-oz. ramekin or custard cup, or in a small bowl. Microwave on hih 30 seconds; stir. Add e, ham and water, beat until e is blended., Microwave on hih 30 seconds; stir. Microwave until e is almost set, 30 to 45 seconds loner. Season with salt and pepper, if desired., Serve in bun.

name: Muffins (from Better Baking Mix)
ingredients: 2 servings of Better Baking Mix (2 cups), 1/2 cup suar, 1 e, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 2/3 cup water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400°F., Grease 12-cup muffin pan., Mix the Better Baking Mix and suar in a bowl., Beat the e with a fork., Add e, oil, and water to dry inredients. Stir just until all inredients are wet., Spoon into the prepared muffin pan.

name: No Bake Breakfast Cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup honey (or liht corn syrup), 1/2 cup non-fat dry milk (instant), 1/2 cup raisins (or chopped dates), 1/2 cup creamy peanut butter, 2 1/2 cups crushed flaked cereal
directions: 1. Heat honey and peanut butter in a medium saucepan over low heat. Stir until blended., 2. Remove from heat. Stir in dry milk., 3. Fold in cereal and raisins. Drop by heapin Tablespoons onto waxed paper to form mounds., 4. Cool to room temperature. Store in refrierator.

name: Oat Bran Muffins
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups oat bran, 1/4 cup brown suar (firmly packed), 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 banana (mashed), 3/4 cup applesauce (unsweetened), 2 tablespoons raisins, dates, or other dried fruit, 1 lare e, 1/2 cup orange juice, 3/4 cup non-fat milk, 2 tablespoons canola oil
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 425 derees., 2. Mix the first four dry inredients. Set aside. Mix the e with orange juice, milk and oil. Mix fruit and blend with dry inredients., 3. Add the liquid inredients to the dry until it is moist., 4. Spray muffin tin with a non-stick coatin. Pour batter into muffin tins., 5. Bake for 15-17 minutes. Remove muffins from pan after 10 minutes. Cool on a rack. Freeze muffins for later use.

name: Oat Snack Cakes
ingredients: 6 cups oatmeal (raw), 2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 cup flour (all purpose), 1 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 3/4 cup mararine (softened), 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 2 teaspoons vanilla flavorin, 2 e whites (beaten), 1 tablespoon water, 1 cup raisins
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 derees. Mix toether oatmeal, flour, suar, baking soda, salt and cinnamon in a lare bowl., 2. Cut in mararine until mixture resembles coarse meal., 3. Combine oil, vanilla, e whites, and water. Stir into dry inredients and rasins, mixin only until it holds toether., 4. Wash hands thorouhly, then dip in cornmeal or flour. Pinch off pieces of douh and form into balls about 1 inch in diameter., 5. Place balls on baking pan (sprayed with non-stick cookin spray) and press out slihtly to about 1/4 inch in thickness., 6. Bake 15-20 minutes or until lihtly browned. Cool, then store in an airtiht container.

name: Oatmeal Bread
ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups boilin water, 1 packet dry yeast (active), 1/4 cup warm water (105 - 115 derees), 1/4 cup molasses, 1 1/2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 cups whole wheat flour, 2 cups flour (all purpose)
directions: 1. Combine rolled oats and salt in a lare mixin bowl. Stir in boilin water; cool to lukewarm (105 - 115 derees)., 2. Dissolve yeast in 1/4 cup warm water in small bowl., 3. Add yeast water, molasses, and oil to cooled oatmeal mixture. Stir in whole wheat flour and 1 cup all purpose flour. Add additional all purpose flour to make a douh stiff enouh to knead., 4. Knead douh on lihtly floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 5 minutes., 5. Place douh in lihtly oiled bowl, turnin to oil top. Cover with clean towel; let rise in warm place until double, about 1 hour., 5. Punch douh down; turn onto clean surface. Shape douh and place in reased 9 x 5 inch pan. Cover with clean towel; let rise in a warm place until almost double, about 1 hour., 6. Preheat oven to 375 derees. Bake 50 minutes or until bread sounds hollow when tapped. Cover with aluminum foil durin baking if bread is brownin too quickly. Remove bread from pan and cool on wire rack.

name: Oatmeal Raisin Muffins
ingredients: 1 e, 1 cup milk, fat-free, 1/3 cup oil, 1 1/4 cups flour, 1 cup oatmeal, 1/3 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup raisins, teaspoon mararine or butter (to rease the muffin cups)
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 400 derees., 2. Put the e, milk, and oil in a small mixin bowl. Slowly stir them toether., 3. In a lare mixin bowl, mix the flour, oatmeal, suar, baking powder, salt and raisins. Stir until they are mixed., 4. Pour the e-milk-oil mix into the lare bowl with the dry inredients., 5. Stir until the dry inredients are barely moistened. Do not over-mix (the batter should be lumpy)., 6. Grease each cup in the muffin pans with some mararine or butter., 7. Spoon the batter into the cups in each muffin pan, until each cup is half-full with batter., 8. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the muffins are olden brown.

name: Overnight Oatmeal
ingredients: 1 cup dry oatmeal, 2 1/2 cups water, 1/2 cup dried fruit (raisins, cranberries or apricots), 1/4 cup walnuts, lihtly chopped (or pecans)
directions: 1. Put all inredients in a cookin pot and cover. Let sit overnight in refrierator., 2. In the mornin, put on a stove burner and cook on medium heat until simmerin, then turn on low and heat for 10-15 minutes more or less dependin on type of oats, quick (5 mins), reular, or steel cut., 3. Serve warm with a little milk (or milk alternative), a drizzle of maple syrup, and a side of fresh fruit, if desired.

name: Overnight Oatmeal with Berries
ingredients: 1/2 cup low-fat milk (or less for thicker oatmeal), 1/4 cup Greek yoghurt, fat-free, 2 teaspoons honey, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 cup uncooked rolled oats, 1/4 cup raspberries, frozen
directions: Combine milk, Greek yoghurt, suar, cinnamon and vanilla extract in a container or jar with a lid., Add oats and mix well., Gently fold in raspberries., Cover and refrierate 8 hours to overnight., Enjoy cold or heat as desired.

name: Pancakes (from Better Baking Mix)
ingredients: 2 servings of Better Baking Mix (2 cups), 1 cup water, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 es (beaten)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put all the inredients in a bowl., Stir just enouh to moisten dry inredients., Preheat skillet on medium-hih heat. The skillet is ready when drops of water "dance" on the dry surface. Add a teaspoon of vegetable oil or use cookin oil spray. For each pancake, pour 3-4 tablespoons of batter onto hot skillet., Cook slowly until the surface is covered with bubbles. Turn and cook until second side is lihtly browned.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Breakfast Shake
ingredients: 1 cup milk (fat free or 1%), 1/2 cup banana (frozen, slices), 1 tablespoon peanut butter, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, cocoa powder (as needed, sweet, optional)
directions: 1. Combine all inredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy., 2. Pour into a tall lass and arnish with a sprinkle of cocoa powder, if desired.

name: Peanut Butter Cereal Bars
ingredients: 1/2 cup honey (see Notes), 1 cup peanut butter, 2 cups rice cereal, 2 cups quick oats, 1 cup raisins or other dried fruit
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a saucepan, brin honey to a boil., Reduce heat to low and stir in peanut butter., Add cereal, oats and raisins; mix well. Remove from heat, Lihtly rease an 8x8-inch baking pan. Press mixture into pan. When cool, cut into 16 bars., Store in an airtiht container for up to a week.

name: Peanut Butter Muffins
ingredients: 3/4 cup peanut butter (chunky), tablespoon honey, 2 e, 1 cup milk, skim, 1 1/2 cups flour, 1/2 cup cornmeal, 3 tablespoons suar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 375 derees., 2. Line 12 muffin cups with paper baking cups (or rease the bottom of each cup with butter or mararine)., 3. Put the peanut butter and honey in a mixin bowl. Beat until well blended., 4. Add the es 1 at a time, beatin well after each e., 5. Add the milk, and mix well., 6. Add the flour, cornmeal, suar, baking powder, and salt. Stir just until they are moistened. Don’t stir them too much., 7. Fill each muffin cup 2/3 full., 8. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes until olden brown., 9. Put on a wire rack., 10. Cool for at least 10 minutes before servin.

name: Perfect Pumpkin Pancakes
ingredients: 2 cups flour, 6 teaspoons brown suar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 1/4 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 e, 1/2 cup pumpkin (canned), 1 3/4 cups milk, low-fat, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: 1. Combine flour, brown suar, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice and salt in a lare mixin bowl., 2. In a medium bowl, combine e, canned pumpkin, milk and vegetable oil, mixin well., 3. Add wet inredients to flour mixture, stirrin just until moist. Batter may be lumpy. (For thinner batter, add more milk)., 4. Lihtly coat a riddle or skillet with cookin spray and heat on medium., 5. Usin a 1/4 cup measure, pour batter onto hot riddle. Cook until bubbles bein to burst, then flip pancakes and cook until olden brown, 1 1/2 to 2 1/2 minutes. Repeat with remainin batter. Makes about 1 dozen 3 1/2 inch pancakes.

name: Pumpkin Chocolate Muffins
ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 3/4 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, 1 can pumpkin, 1 cup water, 1/2 cup chocolate chips
directions: Whisk all the dry inredients toether. Add pumpkin and water., Fold the wet inredients into the dry inredients until just combined. Fold in chocolate chips., Place batter into 24 prepared muffin tins and bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

name: Pumpkin Cookies
ingredients: 1 3/4 cups pumpkin (pureed, cooked), 1 1/2 cups brown suar, 2 es, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 1/4 cups whole wheat flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1 teaspoon nutme, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon round iner, 1 cup raisins, 1 cup walnuts (chopped)
directions: Preheat oven to 400 °F., Mix pumpkin, brown suar, es, and oil thorouhly., Blend dry inredients and add to pumpkin mixture., Add raisins and nuts., Drop by teaspoonfuls on reased cookie sheet., Bake 10 to 12 minutes until olden brown.

name: Quesadilla con Huevos
ingredients: 1/2 cup cheddar or colby jack cheese (rated - cojack), 2 e (scrambled), 4 flour tortillas (6 - 8 inch), 4 salsa (4 Tablespoons, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put 2 Tablespoons cheese and 1/4 of the scrambled es on each tortilla., Heat 2 quesadillas at a time in microwave on hih for 30 to 45 seconds or until cheese melts., Top with salsa and fold tortilla in half to serve., Add parsley if desired.

name: Rice Bowl Breakfast with Fruit and Nuts
ingredients: 1 cup cooked brown rice, 1/2 cup nonfat (skim) milk (or 1% milk), 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 cup chopped fruit (try a mixture - apples, bananas, raisins, berries, peaches), 2 tablespoons chopped nuts (try walnuts or almonds)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine cooked rice, milk and cinnamon in a microwave-safe bowl.  Microwave on HIGH for 45 seconds. Stir and heat for another 45 to 60 seconds, or until rice mixture is heated throuh., Divide rice mixture between two bowls. Top with fruit and nuts. Serve warm., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Rise and Shine Cobbler
ingredients: 1 cup peaches (canned, drained and sliced), 1 cup pear halves (canned, drained and sliced), 6 prunes (pitted, each cut in half), 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 orange, 1 cup ranola, low-fat
directions: In a lare microwave-safe bowl, mix peaches, pears, prunes, and vanilla extract., Rub an orange aainst a rater to remove 1 teaspoon of the orange peel. Then, cut the orange in half and squeeze 1/4 cup orange juice. Add orange peel and juice to fruit mixture. Stir., Top with ranola., Microwave on hih for 5 minutes. Let stand for 2 minutes., Spoon into 4 bowls and serve warm.

name: Spanish Omelet
ingredients: 5 potatoes (small, peeled and sliced), 1 tablespoon olive oil (or vegetable cookin spray), 1/2 onion (medium, minced), 1 zucchini (medium, sliced), 1 1/2 cups reen/red peppers (sliced thin), 5 mushrooms (medium, sliced), 3 es (whole, beaten), 5 e whites (beaten), Pepper and arlic salt with herbs (to taste), 3 ounces part skim mozzarella cheese (shredded), 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.
2. Cook potatoes in boilin water until tender.
3. In a nonstick pan, add oil or vegetable spray and warm at medium heat.
4. Add the onion and sauté until brown. Add vegetables and sauté until tender but not brown.
5. In a medium mixin bowl, slihtly beat the es and e whites, pepper, arlic salt, and mozzarella cheese. Stir e cheese mixture into the cooked vegetables.
6. Oil or spray a 10-inch pie pan or ovenproof skillet. Transfer potatoes and es mixture to pan. Spread with parmesan cheese and bake omelet until firm and brown on top, about 20-30 minutes.

name: Springtime Cereal
ingredients: 3/4 cup wheat and barley nuet cereal, 1/4 cup bran cereal (100%), 2 tablespoons sunflower seeds (2 teaspoons, toasted), 2/3 tablespoon almonds (2 teaspoons, toasted, sliced), 1 tablespoon raisins, 1/2 cup banana (sliced), 1 cup strawberries (sliced), 1 cup yoghurt (raspberry or strawberry, low-fat)
directions: 1. Mix the wheat and barley nuet cereal, bran cereal, sunflower seeds, and almonds in a medium bowl., 2. Add the raisins, the bananas, and half of the strawberries., 3. Gently stir in the yoghurt and divide between two bowls., 4. Scatter the remainin strawberries over the top and enjoy!

name: Strawberry Banana Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 medium ripe banana, mashed, 1/8 teaspoon vanilla, 1/3 cup plain non-fat yoghurt, 1/2 cup sliced fresh strawberries, 1/2 cup bran and wheat flakes ready-to-eat cereal
directions: Stir banana and vanilla into yoghurt and combine well., In a 10-12 ounce lass, alternately layer the yoghurt-banana mixture, strawberries and cereal., Serve immediately and enjoy.

name: Strawberry Mano Feta Toast Points
ingredients: 1 ripe mano (divided), 2 cups strawberries (divided), 1/2 cup fat free feta cheese crumbles, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinear, 1 cup basil leaves (plus 2 tbsp for toppin), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 4 slices whole-wheat bread
directions: Peel and pit mano. Dice 3/4 of mano and 3/4 of strawberries; place in lare bowl with feta cheese. Put remainin fruit, 1/4 cup basil, vinear and oil in a blender and blend., Pour blended vinairette over fruit-feta mix and toss ently., Chop remainin basil leaves., Toast bread slices and cut each slice diaonally., Top toast points with dressed fruit-feta mix and chopped basil.

name: Summer Breeze Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup plain yoghurt (non-fat), 6 strawberries (medium), 1 cup pineapple (crushed, canned in juice), 1 banana (medium), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 4 ice cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place all inredients in blender and puree until smooth., Serve in frosted lass.

name: Sure to Please Baked Eggs & Cheese
ingredients: 1 tablespoon oil, 6 es, 1/2 cup non-fat milk, 1/2 cup low-fat cheese (rated), 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons oreano
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees., 2. Put oil in a medium baking dish or small cake pan and heat in the oven for a few minutes., 3. In a bowl, beat es. Mix in remainin inredients. Pour into hot pan., 4. Bake 20 minutes or until es are firm. Serve immediately., * 4 es and 4 e whites may be used instead of 6 es to reduce fat and cholesterol (nutrient analysis reflects this modification).

name: Sweet Potato Hash with E
ingredients: 2 lare sweet potatoes (cut into cubes, about 4 cups), 1 cup water, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, 2 chicken sausaes, 1 small yellow onion (peeled and diced), 1 bell pepper (cored and diced), 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 4 lare es
directions: Put sweet potatoes and water in a skillet and brin to a boil over hih heat., Reduce heat to low and cook about 20 minutes, stirrin occasionally, until the water has been absorbed by the sweet potatoes., Add oil, sausae, onion, bell pepper and arlic to the skillet with the sweet potatoes.  Cook about 20 minutes, stirrin occasionally, until the onion is lihtly browned and the sweet potatoes are tender., Divide the hash between 4 plates and return the skillet to the stove., Reheat the skillet over medium hih heat and when it is hot, add the remainin 1 teaspoon oil., Add the es, one at a time, and cook about 3-5 minutes until the whites are solid and the yolks bein to thicken but are not hard. Flip the e and cook for one more minute., Top sweet potato hash with an e and serve riht away.

name: Sweet Potato Pancakes with Balsamic Maple Mushrooms
ingredients: For Sweet Potato Pancakes,3 medium sweet potatoes or yams (orange flesh),1 cup non-fat milk,1 egg, beaten,2 tablespoons vegetable oil,1 cup whole-wheat flour,2 teaspoons baking powder,1/4 teaspoon salt,Cooking spray, as needed,For Balsamic Maple Mushrooms,1 pound cremini and/or white button\tmushrooms, quartered,1 tablespoon vegetable oil,1/3 cup maple syrup,1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar
directions: Microwave sweet potatoes until soft; let cool. Peel and mash potatoes, usin an electric mixer., Add milk, e, and vegetable oil to potatoes; mix. Sift toether dry inredients and add to potato mixture. Mix on low until just blended., Heat non-stick skillet or riddle over medium heat; coat skillet with cookin spray., Use 1/4 cup of batter per pancake, ladlin into hot skillet.Wait until pancake bubbles and looks slihtly dry on top before flippin over., While pancakes are cookin, heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil in another skillet (do not use non-stick) over medium flame., Add quartered mushrooms and toss coat with oil. Let simmer, stirrin occasionally, until juices run., Add maple syrup and balsamic vinear to pan. Let simmer until sauce reduces and thickens., To serve, stack 2-3 pancakes, alternatin with balsamic maple mushrooms.

name: Tomato and Garlic Omelet
ingredients: 1/2 slice bread (whole wheat), 1/2 teaspoon olive oil, 1 arlic clove (finely chopped), cookin spray (as needed, nonstick), 3/4 cup e substitute, 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese (part skim, rated), 1 tomato (lare, chopped), 1 teaspoon basil (dried)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 300°F., 2. Cut the bread into cubes; toss with oil and arlic in a small bowl. Spread the cubes in a sinle layer on a baking sheet and toast in the oven for 15 to 25 minutes, or until olden brown, tossin once or twice. Transfer to a plate to cool., 3. Spray a medium pan with nonstick cookin spray and heat over medium-hih heat. Pour in e substitute., 4. When the e beins to set, spread evenly across the bottom of the pan and reduce the heat to low., 5. Once the top layer of e is almost cooked, sprinkle the cheese and basil on top and scatter the tomatoes and bread over half of the omelet; fold the unfilled omelet half over the fillin. Slide the omelet on a plate and serve.

name: Tropical Mornin Treat
ingredients: 1/4 cup orange juice, 1 apple, 1 orange, 1 banana
directions: Place orange juice in bowl., Wash apple and dry. Remove the seeds and dice. Coat apple surfaces with orange juice to prevent brownin., Peel orange and break into sections.
