Cut sections into small pieces., Peel and slice banana into 1/4 inch circles., Combine all fruit and orange juice lihtly in a bowl and mix toether. Chill or serve immediately.

name: Tropical Overnight Oatmeal
ingredients: 2/3 cup old fashion oats (uncooked), 2/3 cup non-fat milk, 2/3 cup non-fat Greek yoghurt, 1/8 teaspoon round allspice, 1 cup fresh pineapple chunks, 1 medium banana, sliced, 2 tablespoons sliced almonds
directions: Mix oats, milk, yoghurt and allspice in two bowls or lass jars., Cover and refrierate overnight., Just before servin, add pineapple, banana, and almonds.

name: Veggie Omelet in a Mu
ingredients: 2 es, 2 tablespoons 1% low-fat milk (or nonfat/skim milk), 1 pinch salt, 1 pinch pepper, 1/4 cup finely chopped mushrooms (or your favorite vegetables), 2 tablespoons shredded cheddar cheese (or your favorite cheese)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Lihtly rease the inside of a 12-ounce microwave-safe mu., Use a fork to combine the es, milk, salt and pepper in the mu and stir well.  Mix in the vegetables and cheese., Microwave on HIGH for 45 seconds. Stir. Return to the microwave and cook on HIGH until the mixture has puffed and set, 60 to 90 seconds. The omelet may look wet on the top but it will dry as it cools., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Very Berry Muesli
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat fruit yoghurt, 1 cup old fashioned rolled oats (raw), 1/2 cup fat free milk (or 1% milk), 1/2 cup dried fruit (try raisins, apricots, dates), 1/2 cup apple, chopped (about 1/3 of a medium apple), 1/2 cup frozen blueberries, 1/4 cup toasted walnuts (chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In medium bowl, mix oats, yoghurt and milk., Cover and refrierate for 6 to 12 hours., Add dried and fresh fruit, and mix ently., Serve scoops of muesli in small dishes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped nuts.

name: Very Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup frozen strawberries, 1 cup frozen raspberries, 1 cup pineapple chunks, 1 banana, 1 cup skim milk (or almond milk), 1 1/2 cups ice
directions: Peel and slice the banana., Gather all inredients and combine in a blender., Cover and blend until smooth., Serve riht away or pour into ice cube trays and freeze. Durin the week, pop out the cubes for a quick on-the-o breakfast.

name: Whole Grain Strawberry Pancakes
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 3 tablespoons suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 3 es, 1 container vanilla low-fat yoghurt (6 oz), 3/4 cup water, 3 tablespoons canola oil, 1 3/4 cups sliced fresh strawberries, 1 container strawberry low-fat yoghurt (6 oz)
directions: 1. Heat griddle to 375�F or heat 12-inch skillet over medium heat. Grease with canola oil if necessary (or spray with cooking spray before heating). , ,2. In large bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt; set aside., ,3. In medium bowl, beat eggs, vanilla yogurt, water and oil with egg beater or wire whisk until well blended., ,4. Pour egg mixture all at once into flour mixture; stir until moistened. , ,5. For each pancake, pour slightly less than 1/4 cup batter from cup or pitcher onto hot griddle. Cook pancakes 1 to 2 minutes or until bubbly on top, puffed and dry around edges. Turn; cook other sides 1 to 2 minutes or until golden brown. , ,6. Top each serving (2 pancakes) with 1/4 cup sliced strawberries and 1 to 2 tablespoons strawberry yogurt.

name: Whole Wheat Muffins
ingredients: 1 cup flour (all purpose), 1 cup whole wheat flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 cup brown suar (firmly packed, or white suar), 1 cup milk, low-fat (1%), 2 e, 1 vanilla (1 teaspoon, optional), 1/4 cup mararine or butter (melted, or 1/4 cup vegetable oil), 1 tablespoon suar, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon (round)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 400 derees. Lihtly oil or coat with non-stick spray the cups of a 12 cup muffin pan, or use paper muffin cups., 2. Mix toether suar and cinnamon for toppin and set aside. , 3. In a lare bowl, stir toether flour, salt, baking powder and suar. In a lass or plastic liquid measurin cup, measure milk, then add es, vanilla (if usin), and melted shortenin or oil. Mix with a fork until e is well combined with other inredients., 4. Pour milk mixture over flour mixture and stir with a spoon, about 20 strokes, until flour is just moistened. Batter will be lumpy and thick., 5. Fill prepared muffin cups about 2/3 full with batter. Sprinkle about 1/4 teaspoon of cinnamon/suar toppin over each muffin., 6. Bake in oven for 20 to 25 minutes until olden brown. Serve warm. Leftovers may be frozen.

name: Wild Rice Muffins
ingredients: Cookin spray, 1 1/2 cups bakery mix, 1/4 cup suar, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 2 bananas, mashed, 3/4 cup milk, 1/4 cup applesauce, 1 cup wild rice, cooked, walnuts, chopped (optional)
directions:
Wash hands with soap water., 1. Preheat the oven to 400 °F. Spray a 12-cup muffin pan with cookin spray.
2. In a medium bowl, mix bakery mix, suar, and cinnamon.
3. In a separate bowl, mix bananas, milk, and applesauce.
4. Add banana mixture to dry mixture and stir.
5. Fold in wild rice and nuts.
6. Spoon ¼ cup of the batter into each muffin cup. Bake for 20–25 minutes.

name: Yoghurt Berry Parfait
ingredients: 2 cups yoghurt, low fat (or fat-free, any flavor*), 1 cup banana (sliced), 1/2 cup blueberries (fresh), 1/2 cup strawberries (fresh, sliced), other optional fruit (raspberries, peaches, pineapple and/or manos), 1 cup ranola
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Line up 4 parfait or other tall lasses., Spoon 1/2 cup of yoghurt into each lass., Sprinkle with ranola., Top with about 1/4 cup of fruit.

name: Yummy Baels
ingredients: 2 tablespoons suar, 1 tablespoon yeast, 1 1/2 cups warm water, 2 cups flour, whole wheat, 1 1/4 cups flour, all purpose, 1 teaspoon canola oil, cinnamon (optional), suar (optional), salt (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix suar, yeast, water, and flours toether., Rub inside of bowl with oil. Place douh in bowl and flip to coat with oil. Let rise 30 minutes., Punch down douh and divide into 16 portions. Shape into a ball and poke a hole throuh the middle with your finers., Place on a well-reased baking sheet and cover with a towel to rise aain for 15-20 minutes. Put 2 inches of water in a pot and heat to boilin., Usin a slotted spoon, ently place each bael into a rapidly boilin water for 1 minute on each side. Remove and dry on a towel. Place back on baking sheet. If desired, sprinkle baels with cinnamon/suar or salt., Bake at 475°F for 8-12 minutes.

name: Ambrosia
ingredients: 1 can pineapple chunks (in juice, 20 oz., drained), 1 1/3 cups mandarin orange (drained), 1 banana (peeled and sliced), 1 1/2 cups rape (seedless), 3/4 cup marshmallows (miniature), 1/3 cup coconut (flaked), 1 cup vanilla yoghurt, low-fat (8 ounces)
directions: Drain pineapple and oranges. Use juice as beverae., Combine fruit with marshmallows and coconut., Fold in yoghurt., Chill., Serve.

name: Anel Food Cake
ingredients: 12 e whites (1 1/2 cups), 1 teaspoon cream of tartar, 1 1/2 cups suar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup flour (sifted)
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 °F. In a lare mixin bowl, beat the e whites until they are foamy., Add the cream of tartar and beat until stiff, but not dry. Gradually beat in the suar, Add the vanilla and salt and then ently fold in the flour., Pour the mix into an anel food tubular pan and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until the top is nicely browned.

name: Anel Food Pastry with Fresh Berries and Whipped Cream
ingredients: 1 ounce anel food cake mix (3 tablespoons), 1/8 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla (2 tablespoons), 3 cups raspberries (about 3 ), 2 strawberries, sliced, 1 1/2 tablespoons lite whipped toppin (can use 1-2 tablespoons)
directions: Scoop 3 tablespoons of anel food cake mix into a microwave-safe cup or mu., Add 2 tablespoons of vanilla yoghurt and stir., Place in the center of the microwave oven and microwave for 1 minute., Take out of microwave and let cool for 1 minute., Usin a knife, cut around the sides of the cup to loosen the cake and "dump" it on a plate., Dole 1 tablespoon of whipped toppin on top of the cake., Sprinkle raspberries around the anel cake and add sliced strawberries to top., Enjoy.

name: Apple Cake
ingredients: 10 tablespoons butter, 3/4 cup suar, 3 es, 1 3/4 cups flour (sifted), 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 tablespoon lemon rind (rated), 2 apples (medium, pared, cored, sliced), 2 teaspoons suar, 8 tablespoons apricot jam (1/2 cup)
directions: Beat butter with suar until creamy., Add es one at a time, beatin until well blended., Add flour, baking powder, and lemon rind, beat 4 minutes., Pour into reased 9-inch sprin-form pan., Arrane the apples on the batter, sprinkle with 2 teaspoons suar., Bake 1 hour at 350 °F., Remove from pan, brush apples with jam, cool.

name: Apple Chunk Cake
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups suar, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 2 es, 2 cups flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 cups apple (diced, chunks), 1/4 cup applesauce (unsweetened), 2 cups apple (sliced, to place on cake)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, mix suar, oil and es toether. Beat well., In a separate bowl, combine flour, salt, cinnamon, and baking soda. Add to e batter and mix well., Add apple chunks and applesauce to the batter. Stir to combine., Coat an 8x8 inch baking pan with vegetable oil spray, and pour in batter., Bake until done, about 1 hour., Place apple slices on top of apple cake and serve.

name: Apple Cinnamon Bars
ingredients: 4 apples (medium), 1 cup flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 cup brown suar, 1 cup oats (uncooked), 1 cup shortenin
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 °F., Put the flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, brown suar, and oats in the mixin bowl. Stir toether., Add the shortenin to the bowl. Use the 2 table knives to mix the inredients and cut them into crumbs., Lihtly rease the bottom and sides of the baking dish with a little bit of shortenin., Spread half of the crumb mixture in the reased baking dish., Remove the core from the apples and slice them. Put the apple slices into the baking dish., Top the apples with the rest of the crumb mixture., Bake in the oven for 40-45 minutes., Cut into squares. It will fall apart easily.

name: Apple Coffee Cake
ingredients: 5 cups apple (tart, cored, peeled, and chopped), 1 cup suar, 1 cup raisins (dark), 1/2 cup pecans (chopped), 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 2 teaspoons vanilla, 1 e (beaten), 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour (sifted), 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 teaspoons cinnamon (round)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Lihtly oil a 13x9x2 inch pan., In a lare mixin bowl, combine apples with suar, raisins, and pecans; mix well. Let stand 30 minutes., Stir in oil, vanilla, and e. Sift toether flour, soda, and cinnamon; stir into apple mixture about 1/3 at a time, just enouh to moisten dry inredients., Turn batter into pan. Bake 35-40 minutes. Cool cake slihtly before servin.

name: Apple Crisp
ingredients: 4 apples (medium), 1/4 cup oatmeal (quick cookin), 1/4 cup flour, 1/2 cup brown suar, 1 tablespoon cinnamon, 1/4 cup mararine
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 °F., Grease the bottom and sides of the square pan., Remove the cores from the apples. Slice the apples. Spread the sliced apples on the bottom of the pan., Cut the mararine into small pieces and put in a medium-sized bowl., Add the oatmeal, flour, brown suar and cinnamon., Usin two knives, cut the mararine into the mixture until it looks like small crumbs., Sprinkle the mixture over the top of the apples., Bake in the oven for about 20 minutes.

name: Apple Pistachio Crisp
ingredients: 3 apples (such as Honeycrisp, cored and cut into 1” chunks and unpeeled), 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 lemon (juiced), 1/2 cup old fashion oats, 1/4 cup whole wheat flour, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 3 tablespoons brown suar, 1/4 cup pistachios (unsalted, chopped), 2 tablespoons mararine or butter (melted)
directions: Place rack in center of oven and preheat to 350 ºF., Place sliced apples, raisins, and lemon juice in 8x8 inch pan or baking dish; toss., In a bowl, mix remainin inredients except melted mararine., Add melted mararine and mix until texture is consistent. Sprinkle over apple-raisin mixture., Bake uncovered 45-50 minutes or until apples are tender.

name: Apple Sandwiches
ingredients: 1 medium apple, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1 tablespoon raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cut apple in half from the stem down and lay each half cut-side down on a cuttin board. Slice each half into 6 half-round slices and cut out the core., Spread 1/2 teaspoon peanut butter on one side of each apple slice., Put 4 to 6 raisins on top of the peanut butter on one apple slice. Top with another apple slice, peanut-butter side down. Squeeze ently., Continue with remainin apple slices.

name: Apple Wedges with Pumpkin Almond Butter
ingredients: 1/2 cup pumpkin puree (canned or from scratch), 1/3 cup almond butter (or crunchy peanut butter), 2 tablespoons maple syrup, 1/8 teaspoon cinnamon, 24 slices golden delicious apple slices, 24 slices granny smith apple slices
directions: Mix toether dip inredients., Serve with apple slices.

name: Applesauce
ingredients: 7 apples (cut in quarters), 1/2 cup water, 1/4 cup suar
directions: Wash and then cut apples in quarters. Apples can be peeled, but fiber will be decreased., Combine apples and water in saucepan. Heat to boilin. Turn heat to low as soon as the water is boilin., Simmer over low heat for 15 to 20 minutes or until apples are tender. Stir occasionally to prevent stickin., Stir in suar and heat until suar is dissolved.

name: Applesauce Cookies
ingredients: 1 cup suar, 1/2 cup mararine (or butter or shortenin), 1 e, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 1/2 cups flour (all purpose), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 1/2 cups applesauce, unsweetened, 1 cup raisins, 1 nuts (1 cup, optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Prepare pan or cookie sheet (see below)., Cream toether suar, shortenin, and e., In a separate bowl, combine baking soda, flour, salt, and cinnamon. Mix well., Stir flour mixture into shortenin mixture just until moist., Add applesauce, raisins, and nuts (if usin).

name: Applesauce Loaf Cake
ingredients: 1/2 cup walnuts (chopped), 1 1/2 cups applesauce, 1 e, 1 cup suar, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 cups flour (all purpose), 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1/2 teaspoon nutme (round), 1 cup raisins
directions: Wash hands well with soap and warm water., Pre-heat the oven to 350 °F. Grease two 8x4x2 inch loaf pans., Toast walnuts in an unreased skillet pan. Stir while heatin on medium-low heat for 5-7 minutes. They are done when they are brown and smell nutty. Set aside to cool., Mix applesauce, e, suar, oil and vanilla in a lare bowl., Mix flour, baking soda, cinnamon, and nutme toether in a smaller bowl., Pour flour mixture into applesauce mixture., Stir in raisins and cooled toasted nuts., Pour half of the batter into each reased pan. Bake for 45-55 minutes., Remove cakes from the oven. Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pans to finish coolin. For best taste, let cakes cool a few hours before servin.

name: Aunt Barbaras Chocolate Squash Cake
ingredients: 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1 packae cake mix, dark chocolate, 1 teaspoon round cinnamon, 3 es, 1 1/4 cups water, 1 cup squash (shredded or finely chopped), 1/4 chopped walnuts (1/4 cup, optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Grease and flour a 10-inch tube or bundt pan., In a lare bowl, combine cake mix and cinnamon., Add es, water, and oil. Blend until combined, then beat with an electric mixer for 2 minutes on medium speed., Fold in squash. Add nuts if you like., Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 50 minutes to 1 hour, until cake sprins back when lihtly touched.

name: Baked Bananas
ingredients: 6 bananas, sliced lenthwise, 18 teaspoons packed brown suar (6 Tablespoons), 4 tablespoons mararine or butter, 1/2 cup raisins, or other dried chopped fruit, 1/3 cup chopped pecans
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F., Lihtly rease a 9x13 inch pan., Arrane the split bananas in the pan., Top evenly with brown suar, small pieces of mararine, raisins, and pecans., Bake for 30 minutes.

name: Baked Pumpkin
ingredients: 2 cups pumpkin (about 1 small pumpkin, peeled and cut into cubes), 1 cup suar, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Preheat oven to 325 °F., Place pumpkin cubes in a baking dish and sprinkle with suar and salt., Cover pan with foil and bake until soft., Sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Banana Bread
ingredients: 3 bananas (lare, well-ripened), 1 e, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/3 cup milk, fat-free, 1/3 cup suar, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1 1/2 cups flour
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat the oven to 350 °F., Peel the bananas. Put them in a mixin bowl. Mash the bananas with a fork., Add the e, oil, milk, suar, salt, baking soda, and baking powder. Mix well with the fork., Slowly stir the flour into the banana mixture. Stir for 20 seconds until the flour is moistened., Lihtly rease the bread pan with a little oil or cookin spray. Or, line the pan with wax paper., Pour the batter into the bread pan., Bake for 45 minutes until a toothpick inserted near the middle comes out clean., Let the bread cool for 5 minutes before removin it from the pan.

name: Banana Cocoa Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat vanilla yoghurt, 1 medium banana, 2 teaspoons cocoa powder, 1 ice cube tray (or paper cups)
directions: Mash banana with a fork., Mix banana and yoghurt well., Stir in cocoa powder., Divide into 4 small paper cups (or 8 mini muffin cups) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws)., Freeze., Enjoy as a frozen treat!

name: Banana Cupcakes
ingredients: 1/2 cup shortenin (solid vegetable), 3/4 cup suar, 2 es (lare), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup banana (mashed)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., In a lare mixin bowl, cream shortenin and suar usin an electric mixer. Add es and vanilla, mixin well., In a medium mixin bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt., Add dry inredients (flour mixture) and bananas to creamed mixture (the e mixture). Mix well until combined., Place paper baking cups in muffin tin or lihtly coat muffin tin with cookin spray. Fill muffin cups 2/3 full of batter., Bake 20-22 minutes, until olden brown. Remove cupcakes from muffin tin and place on a rack to cool.

name: Banana Oat Cookies
ingredients: 1 cup banana, mashed (use overripe banana), 1 cup quick oats, 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 1/4 cup water, raisins (1/2 cup, optional), sunflower seeds (1/2 cup, optional), spices, optional
directions: Wash hands with soap and water. Make sure utensils and counter top are clean., Mash bananas, mix with yoghurt and water., Add quick (not instant) oats. Mix well., Add optional add-ins if you wish. Keep them minimal., Add spices, to taste (optional)., The batter should be thick and easily spoonable., Grease a baking sheet. Place a tablespoon of douh on the sheet, thin out to a flat disk. Repeat with remainin douh. Refrierate if any is remainin in bowl., Bake at 350-375 °F for 20 minutes. Flip and bake on other side 15 minutes to make crisper crust.

name: Banana Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
ingredients: 3 bananas (ripe), 1/3 cup mararine (or butter), 2 cups quick-cookin oats (uncooked), 1/4 cup skim milk, 1/2 cup raisins, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Put the mararine in a small saucepan. Melt it on low heat., Put all the inredients in a mixin bowl. Mix really well., Let the mix stand for about 5 minutes, until the oats are wet., Lihtly rease the cookie sheet., For each cookie, spoon out about 1 tablespoon of douh and drop it onto the reased cookie sheet., Bake the cookies for 15 to 20 minutes., Let the cookies cool on the cookie sheet for about 1 minute., Move the cookies to wire racks or a towel. Let them cool completely.

name: Banana Waldorf
ingredients: 3 bananas (peeled and sliced), 1 apple (cored and sliced, with peel), 4 cups yoghurt (nonfat vanilla), 1 pinch cinnamon, 1/8 cup walnuts
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix all inredients toether in lare mixin bowl., Place in individual serving dishes and chill until ready to serve, up to 1 hour., This dessert looks reat when topped with a sprinkle of round cinnamon.

name: Basic Custard
ingredients: 1 e, 2 tablespoons suar, 1 cup skim milk (or reconstituted non-fat dry milk), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla (optional)
directions: Beat e and suar toether in a saucepan., Add milk., Place saucepan with e/milk mixture in another pan containin 1-2 inches boilin water., Stir custard constantly while cookin. Cook until foam disappears and custard coats the spoon. Remove from heat., Add flavorin and stir. Pour into individual dishes and cool in the refrierator. Custard will be soft.

name: Berries with Banana Cream
ingredients: 1/3 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 1/2 banana (ripe), 1/2 ounce fruit juice (orange works well), 2 cups sliced strawberries, 1 teaspoon honey, 1 dash cinnamon
directions: Combine yoghurt, banana, and juice and mash with a fork until most chunks are one., Wash and slice strawberries., Top the berries with the yoghurt banana mixture., Top with honey and cinnamon.

name: Berry Bread pudding
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups berries (frozen blueberries, sliced strawberries, or raspberries, thawed), 5 slices whole wheat bread (crusts removed), 1/2 teaspoon suar (optional), vanilla yoghurt, low-fat (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine the thawed berries and suar (if you choose to use the suar)., Layer a spoonful of berries on the bottom of a small 2 cup deep dish. Cover the berries and the bottom of the dish with a layer of bread. Continue layerin berries and bread until the dish is full, finishin with a layer of bread., Cover the dish with plastic wrap and place a plate or bowl over the top of the berry dish that fits just inside of it. Place a heavy object on top to press down on the fruit and bread layers., Refrierate overnight. Check the dish to be sure juice does not run over the top. You may need to replace the heavy object with a lihter one to prevent spills., Serve with a dollop of vanilla yoghurt or a sprinkle of powdered suar.

name: Berry Good Dessert
ingredients: 1 envelope unflavored elatin, 2 cups sliced strawberries, 1 cup rape juice
directions: Wash and slice the berries and then place in a shallow dish (9x9 inch brownie pan works well)., Combine elatin and rape juice in a small pan and warm over low heat until the elatin dissolves (about 5 minutes)., Pour elatin and rape juice over berries and refrierate until firm (about 1 hour).

name: Bread pudding with Vanilla Sauce
ingredients: 1 tablespoon mararine, 5 slices whole wheat bread, 3 es, 1/3 cup suar, 1 dash salt, 2 cups milk, non-fat, 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1/4 cup raisins, 1 teaspoon cinnamon (and/or nutme)
directions: Melt mararine in a medium sized skillet., Tear bread in pieces and spread on bottom of skillet., Beat es and stir in suar, salt, warmed milk and vanilla. Sprinkle raisins over bread and pour e mixture over all., Cover and cook over very low heat for 20 minutes., pudding is done when custard is set in the middle., Allow to cool in the skillet., Prepare vanilla sauce while pudding cools., Combine cornstarch and suar in a small saucepan. Gradually add water, stirrin well., Cook until thick and clear, stirrin constantly., Add mararine and vanilla, stirrin until mararine melts., Spoon over individual servings of bread pudding., Refrierate leftover bread pudding and vanilla sauce within two hours.

name: Buttermilk Scones
ingredients: 1 cup whole-wheat flour, 3/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/3 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup raisins, 4 tablespoons butter, melted (1/4 cup), 2/3 cup buttermilk
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Combine the flours, suar, baking powder, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Mix well., Add raisins and mix lihtly., In a small bowl, combine melted butter and buttermilk. Add liquid inredients to flour mixture; mix ently., Spoon douh into 9 equal mounds on a reased baking sheet. Bake until well browned, 18 to 20 minutes., Serve hot or at room temperature. Best eaten the same day you bake them.

name: Caramel Sauce
ingredients: 8 1/3 tablespoons milk (non-fat, dry, 1/2 cup + 1 teaspoon), 1 1/4 cups water, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 2 tablespoons butter, 1/2 cup brown suar (packed), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Reconstitute non-fat dried milk with water. Combine reconstituted milk and cornstarch in a small saucepan and mix until cornstarch in thorouhly dissolved., Add the butter and brown suar and cook over medium heat, stirrin constantly with a wire whisk until mixture thickens and comes to a boil. Continue to boil 1 minute., Remove pan from heat and stir in vanilla. Serve warm over baked French toast, ice cream, or fruit.

name: Carrot Cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup mararine (soft), 1 cup honey, 1 cup carrots (rated), 2 e whites (well beaten), 2 cups flour (all purpose), 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 cups oatmeal, quick cookin (raw), 1 cup raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, cream toether mararine and honey. Stir in carrots and e whites., Stir toether flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, oatmeal and raisins. Gradually stir flour-oatmeal mixture into creamed mixture, just until all flour is mixed. Do not over mix., Drop from teaspoon on reased baking sheet. Flatten slihtly and bake at 350 °F for 10 minutes, or until lihtly browned.

name: Cherry Pineapple Delight
ingredients: 2 cups water (boilin), 1 packae elatin (8 serving size, cherry, suar-free), 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 can (20 oz) pineapple chunks (in juice, not drained), 2 cans (11 oz) mandarin oranges (in liht syrup, drained), 16 ice cubes (lare)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Pour boilin water into a lare bowl. Add the elatin and cinnamon to boilin water. Stir for at least 2 minutes until elatin is completely dissolved., Drain pineapple, reserving the juice. Add enouh ice (or cold water) to the juice to measure 1 1/2 cups. Add the elatin mixture and stir until the ice is completely melted., Refrierate for about 45 minutes or until the elatin is slihtly thickened (consistency of unbeaten e white)., Reserve 1/4 cup each of the pineapple and orange. Add remainin pineapple and oranges to the elatin. Pour into 1 1/2 quart serving bowl., Refrierate for 4 hours or until firm. Garnish with reserved pineapple and oranges.

name: Cherry Puff Pancake
ingredients: 3 es, 1/2 cup fat free (skim) milk (or 1% milk), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon suar, 1/8 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 tablespoons mararine (or butter), 2 cups halved, pitted sweet cherries, fresh or frozen, thawed and drained, ¼ cup sliced almonds (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 450 °F., In a medium bowl or blender, beat the es, milk, and vanilla toether until well blended., Mix the flour, suar, and cinnamon toether. Add to the liquid inredients and mix until there are no lumps., Put mararine or butter in a 10- or 11-inch oven proof skillet or a 2 1/2- to 3-quart baking dish. Place the skillet or dish in the hot oven until the mararine or butter is melted and bubbly. Remove from the oven. Quickly spread the cherries across the bottom of the hot skillet or dish., Pour the batter over the cherries and sprinkle with almond slices, if usin., Return to the oven and bake for 15 to 20 minutes until the edes are browned and the puffs in the middle are olden. Cool slihtly before cuttin into 4 pieces. The center puffs will flatten durin coolin.

name: Cherry Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup pitted and halved sweet cherries, 1 cup cubed cantaloupe, 1 cup halved reen rapes, 1 medium banana, peeled and sliced, 1/4 cup orange juice (juice from 1/2 orange), 1/4 cup flaked coconut (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, mix toether the cut fruit., Pour orange juice over fruit and stir in coconut, if desired.

name: Chocolate Chip Yoghurt Cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup suar, 1/2 cup brown suar (firmly packed), 1/2 cup mararine, 1/2 cup yoghurt (non-fat, plain), 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla, 3/4 cup flour (all-purpose), 1 cup flour (whole wheat), 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 cup chocolate chips (miniature, or carob chips)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat oven to 375 °F., In a lare bowl combine suar, brown suar and mararine; beat until liht and fluffy., Add yoghurt and vanilla; blend well. Stir in flour and baking soda; mix well. Stir in chocolate chips., Drop douh by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto un-reased cookie sheets. Bake at 375 °F for 8 to 12 minutes or until liht and olden brown., Cool 1 minute, remove from cookie sheets.

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Frozen Bars
ingredients: 2 packaes suar-free chocolate pudding (1.3 ounces each, instant or cook and serve type), 3 1/2 cups skim milk, 1/4 cup peanut butter, 15 raham cracker rectanles (break crackers apart)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix pudding accordin to packae directions, except use 3 1/2 cups milk. Beat in peanut butter., Line a 9x13 inch pan with half the raham crackers. , Spread pudding mixture over raham crackers. Top with remainin crackers., Freeze for four hours., Cut into squares and remove from pan., Store in a plastic ba in the freezer.

name: Classic Honey Flan
ingredients: 1 e (lare, whole), 1/2 cup e substitute, vegetable oil spray (non-stick), 1 1/2 cups milk (fat-free), 1/4 tablespoon honey, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1/2 teaspoon lemon zest (rated), 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon (round)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 325 °F., Place saucepan with water on stove over medium-hih heat and allow to come to a boil., Spray four ovenproof custard cups with vegetable oil spray., Combine the whole e, e substitute, milk, 1/4 cup plus 1 tablespoon of honey, rated lemon zest, and vanilla. Beat until mixed but not foamy., In a separate bowl, combine 2 tablespoons of honey and cinnamon, and mix to blend., Place the custard cups in a baking dish lare enouh to accommodate them, plus the water bath. Spoon 1/2 tablespoon of honey and cinnamon into each custard cup. Divide the e mixture equally into each custard cup., Place the baking dish on the rack in the middle of the oven and pour the boilin water into the baking dish to a depth of 1 inch, takin care not to let the water splash the flan. Bake for 45 minutes or until the knife blade comes out clean when inserted., Serve warm or cold. Before servin, loosen the edes with a knife or spatula and invert onto individual dessert plates.

name: Cran-Apple Crisp
ingredients: 4 apple (cored and thinly sliced), 1 can cranberry sauce (14 ounce, whole), 2 tablespoons mararine (soft, melted), 1 cup oatmeal (uncooked), 1/3 cup brown suar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Wash apples, remove cores and slice thinly, keepin peel on., In a bowl, combine the cranberries and apples. Pour into an 8x8 inch pan., Combine melted mararine with oatmeal, brown suar, and cinnamon until well blended. Sprinkle over apple/cranberry mixture., Cover and bake for 15 minutes., Uncover and bake 10 more minutes until the toppin is crisp and brown., Serve warm or cold.

name: Cranberry Nut Bread
ingredients: 2 cups flour*, 2/3 cup suar, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 teaspoons rated orange peel, 3/4 cup orange juice, 4 tablespoons butter, melted (or mararine) (1/4 cup), 1 e (or 2 e whites) (medium), 1 cup chopped cranberries, 1/3 cup chopped walnuts, 1/3 powdered suar, optional (1/3 cup, for laze), 1 water, optional (1 teaspoon, for laze)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F. Mix flour, suar, baking powder and baking soda in a lare bowl., Grate orange peelin, then squeeze juice from orange. Add additional orange juice to make 3/4 cup., In a separate bowl, blend orange juice, butter, e, and rated orange peel; add to flour mixture, stirrin until just blended. Mix in cranberries and walnuts., Pour batter into a 9x5 inch loaf pan, reased on bottom only., Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool in pan for 10 minutes; remove and cool completely on wire rack., Optional: to make laze, mix powdered suar and water; add water as needed to make thin laze. Drizzle over cooled loaf.

name: Cranberry Wojapi
ingredients: 1 cup dried cranberries, 2 cups water, 4 tablespoons suar, 2 tablespoons cornstarch (mixed with 3/4 cup water)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare saucepan, combine inredients and brin to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until mixture is thickened and cranberries are plumped.

name: Crunchy Berry Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 1 cup blueberries or strawberries (fresh or frozen thawed), 1/2 cup low-fat ranola (or crunchy cereal)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Spoon yoghurt into lass., Top with fruit and ranola.

name: Crustless Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: 3/4 cup suar, 1/2 cup Master Mix, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 can evaporated milk, nonfat (about 13 oz), 2 e, 1 can pumpkin (16 ounces), 3 1/2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat the oven to 350 °F and lihtly rease a 9 or 10 inch pie plate., Combine all inredients in a medium mixin bowl or a blender., Beat 2 minutes with a mixer until smooth, or blend in the blender on hih for one minute., Pour into the pie plate., Bake until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean, about 50 to 55 minutes., Cool slihtly and keep refrierated., Serve with whipped toppin or ice cream.

name: Deep Dish Apple Cranberry Pie
ingredients: 4 apples (lare, peeled, cored, and sliced), 2 1/2 cups cranberries (fresh or frozen), 3/4 cup suar, 1/4 cup flour (all purpose), 1 teaspoon apple pie spice, 1 pie crust (prepared)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Stir all inredients (except for the pie crust) toether in a medium sized mixin bowl and place in a 10-inch deep dish pie pan., Place one pie crust on top of the fruits. Cut 3 or 4 slits to allow the steam to escape., Bake at 375 °F for about an hour. Serve warm. Refrierate any leftovers.

name: Dutch Apple Yoghurt Dessert
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 1/2 cup applesauce, unsweetened, 1 tablespoon raisins (seedless), 1/8 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1 teaspoon brown suar, 1 tablespoon nuts (as toppin or crunchy cereal)
directions: Wash hands thorouhly with warm water and soap., Combine all inredients in a small bowl., Cover and refrierate until chilled., Eat and enjoy as a snack or as a dessert.

name: Easiest Banana Ice Cream
ingredients: 2 1/2 bananas (can use 2-3 bananas), 3 tablespoons 1% milk, chocolate syrup (optional)
directions: When bananas have become very ripe, peel and slice them into medium size round pieces. Place on a plastic wrap covered baking sheet and put in freezer overnight., Place frozen bananas in a food processor or blender with a small splash of milk (not over 1/4 cup total)., Pulse food processor or blender until bananas bein to break up. They will be tiny balls of bananas at this point., Usin a spoon or rubber spatula, scrape down the banana mixture. Continue runnin the food processor until the mixture is smooth and creamy. This may take a few minutes. The ice cream will look and tasted like soft serve ice cream when finished., Serve in an ice cream cone or in a small bowl with a small ribbon of chocolate syrup on top (optional).

name: Easy Rice pudding
ingredients: 2/3 cup white rice, uncooked, 2 cups water (warm), 1 teaspoon butter or mararine (optional - used in analysis), 1/2 cup dry milk, non-fat, 2 tablespoons suar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 cup water, 1/2 cup raisins (or other dried fruit)
directions: Combine rice, water, and butter or mararine in lare microwave safe dish. Cover loosely, so steam will escape., Cook in microwave on hih for 5 minutes or until mixture comes to a boil. Reduce settin to defrost (50% power), and cook an additional 10 minutes., Mix other inredients toether while rice is cookin., Without allowin rice to cool, remove cover and quickly stir milk-water-raisin mixture into hot rice. Cover loosely aain and continue cookin on defrost (50% power) for 10 minutes. After cookin time is finished, let pudding sit, covered, for 10 minutes., Stir ently and put in individual serving dishes., Eat warm or cover and refrierate immediately. Enjoy the refrierated pudding within 2 days.

name: Fabulous Fi Bars
ingredients: 3 cups dried fis (chopped, 16 ounces), 1/2 cup walnuts (chopped), 1/3 cup suar, 1/4 cup orange juice (juice from 1/2 orange), 2 tablespoons hot water, 1/2 cup mararine (softened, or butter), 1 cup packed brown suar, 1 lare e, 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 1/4 cups old fashioned rolled oats
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F. Lihtly rease a 9x13 inch baking pan., Combine fis, walnuts, suar, orange juice, and hot water in a mixin bowl and set aside., Mix toether mararine or butter and brown suar until creamy. Add e and mix until smooth., Mix flour and baking soda. Stir into e mixture. Blend in oats to make soft douh., Reserve 1 cup of douh for toppin. With floured finertips, press the remainin douh into a thin layer on the bottom of the baking pan., Spread fi mixture evenly over the douh. Crumble reserved douh over top, allowin fi mixture to show., Bake 30 minutes or until olden brown. Cool completely in baking pan. Cut into 24 bars (about 2 1/2 x 2 inches).

name: Fat-Free Apple Crumb Dessert
ingredients: 4 apples (medium, baking), 1/2 cup oatmeal, quick cookin (uncooked), 1/4 cup brown suar (liht or dark), 2 teaspoons cinnamon (round), 1/3 cup apple juice, non-stick cookin spray
directions: Move the oven rack to the center of the oven. Then preheat the oven to 350 °F., Spray the bottom and sides of a 9 inch square baking dish with nonstick cookin spray., Wash and peel the apples. Cut them into thin slices., Spread the apple slices evenly over the bottom of the baking dish., In a small bowl, use a fork to mix the oatmeal, brown suar and cinnamon., Spread the oatmeal mix evenly over the apples in the baking dish., Lihtly pour the apple juice over the oatmeal mixture., Cover the dish and bake for 20 to 30 minutes until apples are just startin to soften., Uncover and bake for another 15 to 20 minutes until apples are soft.

name: Festive Microwave Baked Apples
ingredients: 1 apple (medium, skinned and cored (not cut into pieces)), 1 teaspoon brown suar, 1/2 tablespoon nutme, 1 tablespoon cinnamon, 2 tablespoons raisins, 1 tablespoon butter alternative spread (0 trans-fat, or butter)
directions: Place apple on plate with openin facin up (cored apples should have bottom intact)., Stir suar, nutme, and cinnamon in a separate cup, and sprinkle into and onto apple., Sprinkle raisins on and around apple., Drop butter alternative spread onto apple and cover with plastic wrap or wax paper., Microwave on HIGH for 2 1/2 to 3 minutes., Let sit outside of microwave for at least 30 seconds before eatin. It will be HOT.

name: Fresh Fruit with Cinnamon Yoghurt Dip
ingredients: 1 apple, 1 banana, 1 orange, 1/4 cup orange juice, 1 cup vanilla yoghurt (low-fat), 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Core and slice the apple., Slice banana into thin circles., Peel the orange and break it into sections., Pour the orange juice into a small bowl., Dip the fruit pieces into the orange juice to prevent brownin., Arrane on a plate., Mix the yoghurt and cinnamon in a small bowl., Put the bowl of yoghurt and cinnamon next to the fruit. Use it as a dip for the fruit.

name: Frosted Cake
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups cake flour, 2 1/4 teaspoons baking powder, 4 tablespoons mararine (soft tub), 1 1/4 cups suar, 4 es, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 tablespoon orange (peel), 3/4 cup skim milk (fat free), cookin spray (for cake pan)
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 °F., Grease with small amount of cookin oil or use non-stick cookin oil spray on a 10-inch round pan (at least 2 1/2 inches hih). Powder pan with flour. Tap out excess flour., Sift toether flour and baking powder., In a separate bowl, beat toether mararine and suar until soft and creamy., Beat in es, vanilla, and orange peel., Gradually add the flour mixture alternatin with milk, beinnin and endin with flour., Pour the mixture into the pan. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until done. Let cake cool for 5-10 minutes before removin from the pan. Let cool completely before icin.

name: Frozen Banana Pops
ingredients: 2 bananas, ripe, 1/8 cup orange juice or lemon juice (2 Tablespoons)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel each banana and cut in half (width-wise)., Insert craft stick into bottom of each banana half. Dip each banana half into juice., Wrap in foil and freeze for two or more hours.

name: Frozen Fruit Cups
ingredients: 3 bananas, 3 cartons yoghurt, non-fat strawberry (8 ounces each), 10 ounces strawberries, frozen (thawed and undrained), 8 ounces crushed pineapple (undrained, canned)
directions: Line 18 muffin-tin cups with paper baking cups., Dice or mash bananas and place in a lare mixin bowl., Stir in remainin inredients., Spoon into muffin-tin cups and freeze at least 3 hours or until firm. Remove frozen cups and store in a plastic ba in freezer., Before servin, remove paper cups and let stand 10 minutes.

name: Frozen Fruit Pops
ingredients: 1 cup crushed pineapple, 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat fruit (8 ounces), 6 us fluid ounces orange juice, frozen concentrate (thawed)
directions: Mix the inredients in a medium-size bowl. Divide into 4 paper cups., Freeze until slushy - about 60 minutes. Insert a wooden stick half way throuh the center of each fruit pop., Freeze until hard or at least 4 hours. Peel away the paper cup before you eat the fruit pop.

name: Fruit Compote
ingredients: 1 cup pineapple chunks (8 ounce can), 1 1/2 cups orange juice, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1 banana (medium, peeled and sliced), 1 pear (sliced in cubes), 2 peaches (sliced in cubes)
directions: Drain the juice from the canned pineapple into a small saucepan., Stir in orange juice and cornstarch. Blend until smooth., Brin to a boil over medium heat, stirrin constantly., Let the juice mix cool to room temperature., While the juice mix is coolin, peel and slice the banana. Wash the pear and peaches and cut them into cubes., Pour the cooled juice mix into a lare bowl. Add the pieces of pineapple, banana, pear, and peaches. Stir toether.

name: Fruit Crisp
ingredients: 3/4 cup white whole wheat flour, 3/4 cup rolled oats, 3 tablespoons white suar, 1/4 cup brown suar, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/3 cup canola oil (or unsalted butter, melted), 6 cups apples (peeled and diced), 1 tablespoon white whole wheat flour, 3 tablespoons white suar
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Lihtly rease a baking dish with butter or oil., To make the toppin: Place the flour, oats, suars and salt in the mixin bowl and toss toether. Add the oil (or butter) and toss aain., For the fillin, fill the baking pan with the fruit and the remainin 1 tablespoon flour and 3 tablespoons suar. Mix well and then cover with the toppin., Transfer to the oven and bake until the fruit is tender and the toppin is olden, about 45 minutes. Serve riht away or cover and refrierate up to 2 days.

name: Fruit Dip
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla (8 oz), 1 us fluid ounce orange juice, 100% juice, frozen concentrate (thawed), 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 1/2 teaspoons brown suar (1/2 tablespoon), 2 apples (red, cored and sliced), 1 pear (cored and sliced), 1 peach (pitted and sliced)
directions: In a small bowl, combine yoghurt, orange juice concentrate, lime juice, and brown suar., Mix well., Place bowl containin dip on a lare plate and surround with fruit.

name: Fruit Dippers
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 2 cups peanuts (chopped), 2 cups fruit (rapes, banana slices, apple wedes, strawberries)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine yoghurt and peanuts. Mix with a spoon., Place a toothpick in the center of each fruit., Dip fruit into the yoghurt peanut mixture.

name: Fruit Juice Slush
ingredients: 12 ounces fruit juice concentrate (100%), 12 us fluid ounces water, 3 cups ice
directions: In a blender, place juice concentrate, water, and half of ice., To prevent spillae, do not pass the top line of the blender., Blend while radually addin remainin ice. Serve.

name: Fruit Kabob
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups ripe banana slices (about 16 slices), 1 1/2 cups watermelon cubes (about 16 cubes), 1 cup clementine sections (about 16 sections)
directions: Thread the fruit onto the skewers, alternatin and arranin the pieces however you like., Serve riht away.

name: Fruit Milk Shakes
ingredients: 1 cup milk (or water), 1/2 cup non-fat dry milk, 2 bananas (ripe, or 1/3 cup orange juice concentrate), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 10 lare ice cubes
directions: Place everythin toether into a blender., Blend for 30 seconds to 1 minute.

name: Fruit Pizza
ingredients: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup strawberries, sliced (or kiwifruit, bananas, pears, peaches, or blueberries), 1/2 cup mararine, 1/2 cup suar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 e (lare), 2 cups flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 8 ounces cream cheese, non-fat or liht, 1/2 cup suar
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 375 °F., For crust, cream mararine, suar vanilla, and e until liht and fluffy. Add flour and baking powder, mixin well., Spread mixture about 1/8 inch thick on a pizza pan, baking sheet, or 9x13 inch pan., Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until lihtly browned. Cool., For spread, mix toether cream cheese, suar, and vanilla. Spread on cooled cookie crust., Arrane fruit on top of pizza. Refrierate until serving time.

name: Fruit Salad with Yoghurt
ingredients: 2 cups strawberries (sliced), 1 cup blueberries (rinsed), 1 cup pineapple chunks (canned, or fresh), 3 tablespoons pineapple juice, 2 cups plain low-fat yoghurt, 1/8 cup almonds (sliced or slivered )
directions: Place fruit in a lare bowl and mix with pineapple juice. Let stand for 15 minutes at room temperature., Place 1 cup of fruit salad in a small bowl and top with 1/2 cup of yoghurt., Sprinkle almonds on top of each fruit salad. Serve immediately.

name: Fruit Salsa
ingredients: 1 cup strawberries (diced), 1 banana (diced), 1 kiwifruit (peeled and diced), 1 apple (cored and diced), 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/4 cup suar, 1/4 teaspoon nutme, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine fruits in a medium mixin bowl and add lemon juice., Stir in suar, nutme, and cinnamon. Mix well., Refrierate until serving time.

name: Fruit Slush
ingredients: 2 2/3 cups cantaloupe or watermelon (coarsely chopped, seeded, peeled), kiwifruit (1 2/3 cup coarsely chopped, optional), suar (2 tablespoons, optional), 2 tablespoons lime juice, 2 cups water, ice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a blender, puree fruit with suar and lime juice until smooth., Combine fruit mixture and water in a lare pitcher., If desired, pour throuh a strainer to eliminate pulp., Cover and refrierate for up to a week., To serve, stir well and pour into tall lasses over ice.

name: Fruit Sorbet
ingredients: 2 cans sliced peaches in 100% juice (15-ounce cans), banana, peeled (optional)
directions: Collect all inredients and freeze cans before startin to prepare the recipe., Place cans of fruit in freezer for at least 3 hours. Take out when fully frozen.*, Run frozen cans briefly under hot water, or let them sit on counter for 30 minutes to loosen contents. Remove fruit from the cans, and use a sharp knife to cut it into small pieces., If usin a banana, peel, and cut into slices. Banana does not need to be frozen., Place frozen, chopped fruit (and banana, if usin) in the blender, and blend until creamy., Serve immediately., Freeze any leftovers in a freezer-safe container or sealable plastic freezer bas.

name: Fruit Yoghurt Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, fruit-flavored (low-fat), 1/2 banana (medium), 1/2 cup rape, 1/4 cup dry crunchy cereal (Grape Nuts or ranola cereals are ood)
directions: Peel and slice the banana., Spoon the rapes into a tall plastic cup., Put 3 spoonsful of yoghurt on top of the rapes., Spoon sliced bananas on top of the yoghurt., Add the rest of the yoghurt., Sprinkle the cereal on top.

name: Fruit Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 low fat yoghurt, pina colada (8 ounces), 2 1/2 cups strawberries (sliced frozen, thawed)
directions: Combine inredients. Pour into 3 ounce paper cups., Freeze about 30 minutes; then stick a wooden popsicle/ craft stick in the center of each cup., Freeze overnight until firm. To eat pops, peel off paper cups., For variety, try other fruit flavored yoghurts and frozen fruit or fruit juice concentrates.

name: Fudy Fruit
ingredients: 1/8 cup chocolate chips (or 2 tablespoons semi-sweet chips), 2 bananas (lare, peeled and cut into quarters), 8 strawberries (lare), 1/4 cup peanuts (chopped, unsalted)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place chocolate chips in a small microwave safe bowl. Heat on hih for 10 seconds and stir. Repeat until chocolate is melted, about 30 seconds., Place fruit on a small tray covered with a piece of waxed paper. Use a spoon to drizzle the melted chocolate on top of the fruit., Sprinkle the fruit with chopped nuts., Cover the fruit and place in the refrierator for 10 minutes or until the chocolate hardens. Serve chilled.

name: Grilled Fruit
ingredients: 1 cup pineapple chunks, 1 peach (cubed), 1 banana (sliced)
directions: Place fruit chunks on a skewer to make kabobs., Grill or broil on low heat until the fruit is hot and slihtly olden.

name: Honey Milk Balls
ingredients: 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup peanut butter, 1/2 cup dry milk, non-fat, 1/2 cup cereal (crushed)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix honey and peanut butter., Gradually add dry milk and mix well., Chill for easier handlin., With reased hands, form into small balls., Roll in crushed cereal flakes., Chill until firm., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Honey of a Pumpkin Bar
ingredients: 1/3 cup dry milk, non-fat, 2 cups flour (all purpose), 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon cloves, 1/2 teaspoon allspice, 1/2 teaspoon nutme, 1/3 cup vegetable oil, 2/3 cup honey, 1/2 cup orange juice, 2 tablespoons orange peel (rated), 2 e, 1 cup pumpkin (mashed)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees. Lihtly rease or spray with non-stick spray a 12 x 15 inch baking pan with sides., 2. In a small bowl, combine dry milk, flour, baking soda, and spices. Set aside., 3. In a lare bowl, thorouhly mix oil, honey, juice, peel, es and pumpkin., 4. Gradually add flour mixture to pumpkin mixture, stirrin until smooth., 5. Spread batter onto prepared baking pan. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until olden brown and cake sprins back when lihtly touched with your finer. Cool. Cut into squares.

name: Honeydew Summer Salad Wedes
ingredients: 1 honeydew melon, 1 packae elatin, lemon flavored (3 ounce), 1/2 cup water (boilin), 1/2 cup water (iced), ice cubes, 1 cup whole strawberries (hulled)
directions: Cut melon in half; scoop out seeds., Pat the inside of the melon dry usin paper towels., Dissolve elatin in boilin water., Combine ice water and ice cubes to make one cup., Add to elatin and stir until slihtly thickened., Remove any un-melted ice., Place each melon half in a small bowl to hold straiht and firm., Place half of strawberries in each melon half., Pour elatin mixture over berries., Cover with plastic wrap and chill until firm, about 3 hours., To serve, cut into wedes.

name: Instant Chocolate Mousse
ingredients: 1 box of instant chocolate pudding mix (3.9 ounce), 1 1/4 cups soy milk (cold), 1 packae silken tofu (14 ounce)
directions: 1. Blend the chocolate pudding mix and the soy milk on medium speed for about 15 seconds until the mixture is very smooth., 2. Add the silken tofu and blend aain. Scrape the mixture down off the sides to be sure it’s all mixed in. Blend and scrape until well mixed and very smooth., 3. Pour mixture into 4 small serving dishes., 4. Place in the fride. Chill for at least 2 hours before servin.

name: Ivory Coast Bananas with Caramel Sauce
ingredients: 6 bananas (lare), 6 tablespoons butter, 1 cup suar, 1/2 cup evaporated milk, skim, 2 teaspoons cornstarch, dissolved in 2 teaspoons water
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400 derees. Place unpeeled banana on a baking sheet. Prick the skin of each banana several times with the prons of a fork. Cook the bananas for about 8 minutes. The skin will turn black.
2. Over moderate heat, cook the butter, water and suar to a medium brown color (it will look like caramel). Remove from heat.
3. Combine the milk, cornstarch slurry to the caramel mixture. Stir to dissolve.
4. Return to the heat and brin to a boil, stirrin constantly.
5. Remove from heat and cool slihtly.
6. Serve on top of the bananas that have been peeled and sliced lenthwise.

name: Jean's Banana pudding Parfait
ingredients: 8 iner snap cookies (crushed), 7 medium ripe bananas (sliced thin), 1 cup nonfat milk, 1 1-oz box instant suar-free, fat-free vanilla pudding, 1 1/4 cups low-fat vanilla yoghurt, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup fat-free frozen whipped toppin (thawed), 10 8-oz parfait cups or drinkin lasses, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon for arnish (optional)
directions: In a lare bowl, whisk toether the milk and pudding mix; blend well (about 2 minutes)., Add yoghurt and vanilla extract; blend until smooth., Stir the thawed whipped toppin into the mixture., Line the bottom of the parfait cups with a teaspoon of crumbled iner snaps., Layer 6 banana slices on top of the cookies; then 2 tbsp of the yoghurt mixture on top. Repeat with another layer of the iner snaps, bananas, and yoghurt mixture., Top with cinnamon or crushed cookie for arnish., Cover and chill in refrierator.

name: Jiffy Oatmeal Crunch
ingredients: 1/2 cup mararine or butter, 3/4 cup brown suar (firmly packed), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 2 cups quick oats (uncooked), 1 cup raisins
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees and rease a 9 x 13 inch baking pan., 2. In lare skillet, melt butter and brown suar., 3. Remove from heat and stir in remainin inredients., 4. Spread into pan and bake for 15 - 20 minutes. Cool; cut into squares.

name: Lemon Corn Cake
ingredients: 1 cup yellow corn meal, 1 cup flour, 1/2 cup suar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 3/4 cup yoghurt, low-fat lemon (about 6 oz), 2 teaspoons lemon peel (finely rated), 1 tablespoon oil, 1 e yolk, 2/3 cup non-fat milk, 3 e whites, non-stick cookin spray, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/2 cup powdered suar
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400 derees.
2. Mix first five inredients toether in mixin bowl.
3. Combine yoghurt, lemon peel, oil, e yolk and milk toether and stir into dry inredients just until blended.
4. Whip e whites with mixer until stiff. Fold into corn meal mixture.
5. Pour into round 9-inch cake pan coated with nonstick cookin spray.
6. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until corn cake tests done.
7. For optional lemon laze: Over low heat blend lemon juice toether with powdered suar. Pierce cake top repeatedly with fork. Slowly pour laze evenly over the top.

name: Lemon Velvet Supreme
ingredients: 2 cups yoghurt (vanilla, fat-free), 1 ounce pudding mix (instant, lemon, 3 Tablespoons), 8 raham crackers (rectanles, crushed), 1 cup mandarin orange (4 ounce, slices, drained or your favorite fruit)
directions: 1. Combine vanilla yoghurt and pudding mix; ently stir toether., 2. Layer bottom of serving dish with crushed raham crackers., 3. Immediately pour pudding mixture over cracker crumbs., 4. Top with mandarin orange slices or your favorite fruit.

name: Lisas Famous Dessert
ingredients: 1 instant pudding mix, banana or vanilla (3.5 ounce), 2 cups milk, non-fat or low-fat, 1 yoghurt, fat-free (8 ounce, or non-dairy whipped toppin), 2 banana (sliced, or other sliced fruit)
directions: 1. In a medium bowl, combine milk and pudding. Beat with wooden spoon, wire whisk, or electric mixer on lowest speed for 2 minutes, 2. Gently mix yoghurt (or whipped toppin) with pudding mixture. Refrierate for 30 minutes., 3. Layer fruit slices in the bottom of 8 dessert cups., 4. Pour the pudding mixture over sliced fruit., "5. Refrierate until ready to serve, at least 5 minutes, thouh its better if its refrierated loner."

name: Maical Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 can pineapple chunks (20 ounce), 1/2 pound rapes, seedless, red or reen, 2 bananas, 1 3/4 cups milk, non-fat or low-fat, 1 packae pudding mix, instant, lemon or vanilla (3 1/2 ounce)
directions: 1. Drain off the juice. Put chunks in a lare bowl., 2. Rinse the rapes and drain. Add the rapes to the bowl., 3. Peel the bananas and cut into bite-sized pieces. Add to the bowl., 4. Pour the milk over the fruit. While slowly stirrin the fruit mixture, sprinkle in the pudding mix., 5. Let the mixture stand for 5 minutes and serve., 6. Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Mano Shake
ingredients: 2 cups milk (low-fat 1%), 1 fresh pitted mano (or 4 Tablespoons of frozen mano juice), 1 banana (medium), 2 ice cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put all inredients into a blender., Blend until foamy., Serve immediately.

name: Matzo Meal Kuel (puddingg)
ingredients: 4 es, 1 cup suar, 4 cups milk, 1%, 5 tablespoons butter, melted, 2 cups matzo meal, 1 teaspoon salt
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine es and suar; beat well., Add milk and melted butter; mix well., Stir in matzo meal and salt., Pour into buttered 11x13" pan., "Bake at 350°F for 1 hour (dont over bake).", Cut into slices. Can be served hot or cold.

name: Melon and Mint
ingredients: 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1/4 cup fresh mint leaves, 6 teaspoons packed brown suar (2 Tablespoons), 3 cups watermelon cubes, 3 cups honeydew cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Blend lime juice, mint leaves and brown suar toether in a small food processor., Place melon cubes in a bowl. Drizzle dressin over melon and toss ently.

name: Microwave Baked Apple
ingredients: 4 apple (lare, baking), 1/2 cup brown suar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: 1. Wash apples and remove core., 2. Cut a thin slice off bottom of each apple to form a flat surface. Place apples in a microwave safe baking dish., 3. Mix brown suar and cinnamon in a small dish. Spoon mixture into center of apples., 4. Cover wax paper and microwave on hih power 6 to 10 minutes or until apples are soft.

name: Mock Southern Sweet Potato Pie
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups flour (all purpose), 1/4 teaspoon sugar, 1/3 cup milk, non-fat, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 cup sugar (white), 1/4 cup brown sugar, packed, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg, 3 egg (large, beaten), 1/4 cup evaporated milk, non-fat (canned), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 3 cups sweet potatoes, cooked, skin removed and mashed
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 derees.

name: Mousse a la Banana
ingredients: 2 tablespoons milk (low-fat, 1%), 4 teaspoons suar, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 banana (medium, cut into quarters), 1 cup yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 8 slices banana slices (1/4 inch)
directions: 1. Place milk, suar, vanilla, and banana in blender. Process 15 seconds at hih speed until smooth., 2. Pour mixture into a small bowl; fold in yoghurt. Chill. Spoon into four dessert dishes; arnish each with two banana slices just before servin.

name: No Bake Breakfast Cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup honey (or liht corn syrup), 1/2 cup non-fat dry milk (instant), 1/2 cup raisins (or chopped dates), 1/2 cup creamy peanut butter, 2 1/2 cups crushed flaked cereal
directions: 1. Heat honey and peanut butter in a medium saucepan over low heat. Stir until blended., 2. Remove from heat. Stir in dry milk., 3. Fold in cereal and raisins. Drop by heapin Tablespoons onto waxed paper to form mounds., 4. Cool to room temperature. Store in refrierator.

name: No-Bake Cookies
ingredients: 2 cups suar, 3 tablespoons cocoa powder (unsweetened), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup mararine, 1 cup peanut butter, 1/2 cup water, 4 cups rolled oats, 1 cup non-fat dry milk, 1 cup raisins, 1 teaspoon vanilla
directions: 1. In lare sauce pan, brin the first six inredients to a full, rollin boil for 1 minute, stirrin as needed., 2. Remove from heat. Add oats, dry milk, and raisins and vanilla to boiled mixture., 3. Mix well., 4. Drop by Tablespoons onto waxed paper and let stand until cool, about 15-20 minutes.

name: Old Fashioned Bread pudding
ingredients: 5 slices bread, white or wheat, 2 tablespoons mararine or butter, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/3 cup suar, white or brown, 1/2 cup raisins, 3 e (or 1 e + 2 e whites), 1 1/2 cups non-fat milk, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
directions: 1. Spread one side of bread with mararine or butter. Sprinkle with cinnamon., 2. Cut into 1-inch cubes., 3. In lihtly sprayed casserole dish, combine bread, suar, and raisins. Then follow microwave or oven method below., Microwave method:\n1. In bowl, blend es, milk, salt and vanilla. Pour liquid over bread mixture; lihtly blend., 2. Cover, microwave on HIGH for 5 minutes. Turn dish 1/4 turn. Microwave on HIGH for 3-5 minutes loner (pudding is done when edes are firm and center is almost set)., 3. Let sit covered for 10 minutes before servin. Serve warm or cold. Refrierate leftovers., Oven method:\n1. Preheat oven to 350 derees. In bowl, blend es, 2 cups (instead of 1 1/4 cups for microwavin) milk, salt, and vanilla. Pour liquid over bread mixture; lihtly blend., 2. Bake uncovered for 1 hour (pudding is done when a table knife inserted in the pudding comes out clean)., 3. Serve warm or cold. Refrierate leftovers.

name: Orange Delight Juice
ingredients: 1 cup orange juice, 1/2 banana, 1 cup apple juice, 1 teaspoon honey, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 cup ice (crushed)
directions: 1. Wash hands with soap and water, 2. Blend at hih speed in blender until frothy.

name: Passover Rhubarb Cobbler
ingredients: 1 3/4 cups suar, divided, 1/4 cup tapioca, quick-cookin, 4 cups rhubarb pieces, 1/2-inch, 1 cup raspberries, unsweetened, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 cup matzo meal, 1 stick of butter (or mararine), unsalted (1/2 cup), 1/8 teaspoon round nutme, lemon sorbet or whipped cream (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a shallow 2-quart baking dish, combine 1 1/4 cups suar and tapioca. Add rhubarb, raspberries, and lemon juice - mixin ently but thorouhly. Let stand from 15 minutes to one hour to soften tapioca, mixin several times., Meanwhile, in a food processor or a bowl, whirl or rub toether with your finers the matzo meal, the remainin 1/2 cup suar, mararine, and nutme to create fine crumbs., Squeeze matzo mixture to compact into lumps, then crumble over rhubarb mixture., Baked in a 375°F oven until cobbler is bubblin in center and top is olden brown, about 1 hour. Let cool 15 minutes., Spoon cobbler into bowls and top with sorbet or whipped cream (optional).

name: Peach Apple Crisp
ingredients: 1 1/3 cans peaches, in liht syrup (15 oz. can), drained, sliced, 2 medium apples, tart, peeled, sliced, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 1/4 teaspoon round cinnamon, 3/4 cup flour, 1/4 cup brown suar, packed, 3 tablespoons mararine, chilled
directions: Preheat oven to 350˚ F. Lihtly rease 9- by 9- by 2-inch casserole dish., Combine peaches, apples, vanilla, and cinnamon in a bowl. Toss well and spread evenly in reased casserole dish., Combine flour and suar in small bowl. Cut in mararine with two knives until the mixture resembles coarse meal., Sprinkle flour mixture evenly over fruit., Bake until lihtly browned and bubbly, about 20 minutes.

name: Peach Cooler
ingredients: 2 cups milk, low-fat, 1 cup canned peaches (drained, or 1 cup of sliced fresh peaches), 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice, 1 nutme (dash, if desired)
directions: 1. Put the inredients in a blender. Blend well., 2. Sprinkle with nutme if you like., 3. Serve cold.

name: Peach Crisp
ingredients: 4 peaches (4 cups sliced), 2 tablespoons mararine, 3/4 cup quick-cookin oats, 1/2 cup suar, 1/4 cup flour, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1 teaspoon lemon juice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water.

name: Peachy Peanut Butter Pita Pockets
ingredients: 2 pita pockets (medium, whole wheat), 1/4 cup peanut butter (reduced fat, chunky), 1/2 apple (cored and thinly sliced), 1/2 banana (thinly sliced), 1/2 peach (fresh, thinly sliced)
directions: Cut pitas in half to make 4 pockets and warm in the microwave for about 10 seconds to make them more flexible., Carefully open each pocket and spread a thin layer of peanut butter on the inside walls., Fill with a combination of apple, banana, and peach slices. Serve at room temperature.

name: Peachy Pops
ingredients: 2 peaches, 2/3 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 2 cups orange juice, 6 paper cups, 6 spoons
directions: 1. Use a knife to remove the skin from the peaches, and to chop the peaches., 2. Spoon the peaches into each of the 6 paper cups., 3. Place the yoghurt in a medium mixin bowl., 4. Slowly pour and stir the orange juice into the yoghurt. Mix well., 5. Pour some of the juice and yoghurt mix into each cup to cover the peaches., 6. Place a spoon in the center of each cup., 7. Cut 6 squares of aluminum foil bi enouh to cover the tops of cups. Stab each spoon handle throuh each piece of foil. The foil will hold the spoon in the center of the cup., 8. Place cups in the freezer for at least 4 hours., 9. Just before servin, peel the paper cups away from the pops to eat.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 2 bananas (ripe, frozen), 1 cup skim milk, 1 1/2 tablespoons creamy peanut butter, 1/2 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder, 1/2 cup low fat vanilla yoghurt, 1 1/2 cups ice
directions: Peel bananas, chop into small pieces and place in freezer until hard., Gather all inredients and put all inredients in a blender., Blend on hih until smooth., Pour into 2 lasses. Serve riht away.

name: Peanut Butter Cereal Bars
ingredients: 1/2 cup honey (see Notes), 1 cup peanut butter, 2 cups rice cereal, 2 cups quick oats, 1 cup raisins or other dried fruit
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a saucepan, brin honey to a boil., Reduce heat to low and stir in peanut butter., Add cereal, oats and raisins; mix well. Remove from heat, Lihtly rease an 8x8-inch baking pan. Press mixture into pan. When cool, cut into 16 bars., Store in an airtiht container for up to a week.

name: Pear in Orange Sauce
ingredients: 4 pears (medium), 3/4 cup orange juice (100%), 4 teaspoons suar
directions: 1. Peel the pears and cook in a double boiler for 15 minutes., 2. Mix suar and orange juice and cook over low flame for 5 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes., 3. Place steamed pears on individual plates. Pour ¼ juice mixture over each and serve.

name: Pear Kabobs with Strawberry Dippin Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 4 tablespoons strawberry preserves, 2 pears (cored and cut into 1-inch cubes), 2 cups strawberries (stems removed), 2 bananas (cut into 1-inch slices), 1 can pineapple chunks, drained (20 ounces)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a small bowl, combine the vanilla yoghurt and strawberry preserves. Set aside., Thread the fruits by alternatin the pears, strawberries, bananas, and pineapple onto the skewers., Serve the fruit skewers with a dollop of the strawberry sauce on the side.

name: Pear Party Salsa
ingredients: 1 pear (cored and finely chopped), 1 apple (cored and finely chopped), 2 kiwi (cored and finely chopped), 1 orange ( peeled and finely chopped), 2 tablespoons honey, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, cinnamon raham crackers (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine pear, apple, kiwi, and orange in a medium-size bowl., Pour honey and lemon juice over fruit and ently toss., Scoop up bites of fruit salsa usin bites of cinnamon raham crackers (optional).

name: Peter Pumpkin Squares
ingredients: 1 can pumpkin (15 ounces), 1 1/2 cups brown suar, packed, 4 es, 3/4 cup oil (cookin), 1 1/2 cups flour (all-purpose), 1 1/2 cups rolled oats, 1 tablespoon round cinnamon, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, mararine or butter (to rease the pan)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees., 2. In a medium bowl, stir toether the pumpkin, brown suar, es, and oil. Mix well., 3. In a lare bowl, mix the flour, oats, cinnamon, baking powder, and baking soda., 4. Add the pumpkin mix to the flour mix. Stir well., 5. Grease a 9" x 13" baking pan with butter or mararine., 6. Pour the batter into the reased baking pan., 7. Bake for 30 minutes.

name: Pineapple Anel Food Cake
ingredients: 1 packae anel food cake mix (1-step mix), 1 cup crushed pineapple in 100% juice (do not drain), whipped toppin (optional)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix the cake mix and pineapple toether in a lare bowl., 2. Pour into an unreased 13x9-inch pan., 3. Bake for 25-35 minutes, until olden brown or an inserted toothpick comes out clean., 4. Let cool and serve with whipped toppin (optional).

name: Pineapple Orange Frozen Yoghurt
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 1/2 cup orange juice, 1 cup pineapple chunks, fresh or canned
directions: 1. Place yoghurt and fruit in lare plastic ba, flatten, and freeze overnight., 2. Combine fruit, yoghurt, and juice in food processor or blender and blend until smooth., 3. Serve immediately or place back in the freezer to harden until ready to serve, up to 1 hour, stirrin occasionally. Stir before servin.

name: Pineapple Rice Bake
ingredients: 4 es, 1 cup milk, 1%, 1/2 cup suar, 1 cup pineapple, crushed, undrained (8 ounce can), 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon (optional), 1/2 teaspoon nutme (optional), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 3 cups rice (cooked)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees. Lihtly coat an oven safe 2 quart casserole dish with nonstick spray or oil., 2. In a lare mixin bowl, beat toether es, milk and suar., 3. Add undrained crushed pineapple, cinnamon, nutme and vanilla., 4. Stir in cooked rice. Pour into prepared casserole dish., 5. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until a knife inserted in center of puddin comes out clean.

name: Pineapple Zucchini Cake
ingredients: 3 es, 2 cups suar, 2 teaspoons vanilla, 1 cup vegetable oil, 2 cups zucchini (peeled, rated), 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 3 cups flour (all purpose), 1 cup pineapple, crushed, drained, 1/2 cup raisins (optional), 1 cup chopped pecans (optional)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees. Grease or lihtly spray with non-stick cookin spray, a 9" x 13" inch pan., 2. In a lare bowl, beat es, suar, vanilla, and oil. Add zucchini., 3. In a separate bowl, combine baking powder salt, baking soda and flour. Add dry inredients to creamed mixture., 4. Stir in fruit and nuts., 5. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, or until cake sprins back when lihtly pressed with your finer.

name: Pocket Fruit Pies
ingredients: 4 flour tortillas (8 inch), 2 peaches, pears, or apples (medium), 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 6 teaspoons brown suar, packed, 1/8 teaspoon nutme (round), 2 tablespoons milk (fat-free), suar (optional)
directions: 1. Warm tortillas in microwave or oven to make them easier to handle., 2. Peel and chop fruit into pieces., 3. Place 1/4 of the fruit on half of each tortilla., 4. In a small bowl, stir toether brown suar, cinnamon and nutme. Sprinkle over fruit., 5. Roll up the tortillas, startin at the end with the fruit., 6. Place on an reased baking sheet and make small slashes to allow steam to escape. Brush with milk and sprinkle with additional suar, if desired., 7. Back at 350 deree in oven for 8-12 minutes or until lihtly brown., 8. Serve warm or cool.

name: Popcorn Treats
ingredients: 2 tablespoons mararine (melted, or butter), 5 cups popcorn (popped), 3/4 cup raisins, 1 cup shredded wheat (bite-size), 1 tablespoon suar (brown or white), 1 1/4 teaspoons cinnamon
directions: Pop popcorn., Mix popped corn, raisins, and cereal in a lare bowl., Mix suar and cinnamon in small dish., Drizzle melted mararine or butter over mixture., Add suar and cinnamon mixture., Shake or stir until all inredients are evenly distributed.

name: Pumpkin Anel Food Cake
ingredients: 1 packae anel food cake mix, 1 tablespoon flour, 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 3/4 cup canned pumpkin, 1 cup cold water
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F., 2. In a lare bowl, beat all inredients with an electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds. Beat on medium speed for 1 minute., 3. Pour into an unreased 10-inch anel food cake pan., 4. Bake 37-47 minutes or until olden brown and cracks are dry., 5. Remove from oven and immediately turn pan upside down until cooled.

name: Pumpkin Bread
ingredients: 1 can pumpkin (15 ounce), 1 cup suar, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 1 1/2 cups flour (all purpose), 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup raisins
directions: Preheat oven to 350 derees., 1. In a lare mixin bowl, beat toether pumpkin, suar, oil, and yoghurt., 2. In a medium bowl, combine the flours, baking powder, soda, cinnamon, and salt; add to pumpkin mixture, stirrin until just moistened., 3. Stir in raisins., 4. Pour into 2 reased 9x5x3 inch loaf pans and bake for about 1 hour., 5. Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes; remove from pan and cool completely.

name: Pumpkin Cheese Pie
ingredients: 8 ounces cream cheese, reduced fat, 8 ounces cream cheese, non-fat, 2 e, 4 e whites, 1 1/4 cups suar, 2 cans pumpkin (29 ounces), 1 teaspoon iner, 1 tablespoon cinnamon, 2 raham cracker pie crusts (9 inch)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees., 2. Place the cream cheese, es, and suar in a lare mixin bowl. Mix at medium speed until creamed. Add the remainin inredients and mix at medium speed until inredients are well mixed., 3. Spoon the mixture evenly in each pie crust and place both in the oven for approximately 50 minutes until pies look firm in the middle.

name: Pumpkin Chocolate Muffins
ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 3/4 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, 1 can pumpkin, 1 cup water, 1/2 cup chocolate chips
directions: Whisk all the dry inredients toether. Add pumpkin and water., Fold the wet inredients into the dry inredients until just combined. Fold in chocolate chips., Place batter into 24 prepared muffin tins and bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

name: Pumpkin Cookies
ingredients: 1 3/4 cups pumpkin (pureed, cooked), 1 1/2 cups brown suar, 2 es, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 1/4 cups whole wheat flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1 teaspoon nutme, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon round iner, 1 cup raisins, 1 cup walnuts (chopped)
directions: Preheat oven to 400 °F., Mix pumpkin, brown suar, es, and oil thorouhly., Blend dry inredients and add to pumpkin mixture., Add raisins and nuts., Drop by teaspoonfuls on reased cookie sheet., Bake 10 to 12 minutes until olden brown.

name: Pumpkin Puddin
ingredients: 1 can pumpkin (15 ounces, or 2 cups cooked mashed squash such as Hubbard), 2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice (or 1 teaspoon cinnmamon, 1/2 teaspoon iner, 1/4 teaspoon nutme and 1/4 teaspoon cloves), 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups milk (1% low-fat), 1 vanilla puddin (instant, 3.5 oz (small box))
directions: 1. Remember to start by washin your hands. In a lare bowl mix pumpkin, salt and pumpkin spice toether., 2. Slowly stir in milk and mix well. Add instant puddin mix and stir for 2 minutes until it thickens. Refrierate until serving time.

name: Quick Peach Cobbler
ingredients: 1 can sliced peaches, packed in juice (16 ounce), 1 e, 1/3 cup suar, 1/2 cup flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon mararine (softened)
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 375 derees F., 2. Open the can of peaches. Pour the peaches and their juice into the casserole dish. Heat them on the stove-top until they bubble., 3. Slihtly beat 1 e., 4. In a mixin bowl, mix the e, suar, flour, baking powder, salt, and mararine., 5. Drop spoonfuls of this mixture on top of the hot, bubblin peaches., 6. Use pot holders to carefully remove the casserole dish from the stove., 7. Put the casserole dish in the oven. Bake for about 30-40 minutes.

name: Rhubarb Blueberry Crisp
ingredients: 1 cup cooked brown rice (chilled), 1 cup low-fat yoghurt (plain or vanilla), 1 cup applesauce, 1/4 cup raisins, 1 cup crushed pineapple in juice (8 ounce can)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 derees F., In a medium bowl, stir toether brown suar, flour and oats. Mix in the mararine or butter and set aside., Spread the rhubarb and blueberries in an 8x8-inch baking dish and set aside., In a medium saucepan, mix cornstarch and suar and stir in the juice. Cook over medium heat, stirrin all the time, until the mixture has thickened. Turn off the heat., Stir in vanilla and pour the mixture over the rhubarb and blueberries., Crumble oat mixture on top of the fruit., Bake for 45 minutes or until toppin is browned and fruit is bubblin at edes. Serve warm or cold.

name: Rice Dessert
ingredients: 1 cup cooked brown rice (chilled), 1 cup low-fat yogurt (plain or vanilla), 1 cup applesauce, 1/4 cup raisins, 1 cup crushed pineapple in juice (8 ounce can)
directions:
1. Put aside 1/4 cup of drained pineapple.
2. Mix all other inredients toether in a medium sized bowl.
3. Serve in small dishes.
4. Top with the remainin crushed pineapple.

name: Rice Puddin
ingredients: 1 cup whole milk, 1 cup water, 1 cup rice, uncooked, 2 es, 1 cup evaporated milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1/4 cup suar, 1/8 teaspoon round cinnamon
directions: In sauce pan, heat milk and water., Add rice, brin to boil, lower heat to simmer; stir mixture every 10 minutes. Cook uncovered until rice is tender, about 30 minutes., In lare bowl, mix es, 3/4 cup evaporated milk, vanilla, and suar. Set aside., Add remainin 1/4 cup evaporated milk to rice mixture., Spoon 1 cup of rice mixture into e mixture and stir. Pour e-rice mixture into remainin rice., Heat puddin until it boils, stirrin continuously. Remove from heat, and sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Shake-A-Puddin
ingredients: 2 cups milk (skim or low-fat 1%), 1 carton puddin mix (3 1/2 ounce box, instant vanilla), 2 banana (peeled, sliced or other sliced fruit)
directions:
1. Place 2 cups of milk in a quart jar with tiht-fittin lid.
2. Add one small packae of instant vanilla puddin mix to the jar; screw lid on jar.
3. Shake until mixture is smooth.
4. Place pieces of fruit in a serving bowl or paper cups.
5. Pour puddin over fruit and chill.

name: Southern Banana Puddin
ingredients: 3 3/4 cups milk (fat-free), 2 instant vanilla puddin and pie-fillin mix (small packaes 4 serving size, fat-free, suar free), 32 vanilla wafers, 2 bananas (medium, sliced), 2 cups frozen whipped toppin (liht)
