directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix 3½ cups of the milk with the puddin mixes. Beat the puddin mixture with a wire whisk for 2 minutes until it is well blended. Let stand for 5 minutes., Fold 1 cup of the whipped toppin into the puddin mix., Arrane a layer of wafers on the bottom and sides of a 2-quart serving bowl. Drizzle 2 tablespoons of the remainin milk over the wafers. Add a layer of banana slices and top with one-third of the puddin., Repeat layers, drizzlin each wafer layer with remainin milk and endin with puddin. Spread the remainin whipped toppin over the puddin., Refrierate for at least 3 hours before servin.

name: Spicy Fruit Cup
ingredients: 2 cups strawberries (fresh), 1 can mandarin orange sections (16 ounce), 1 can pears (16 ounce), 1 cup pineapple chunks, in its own juice (16 ounce can), 1 cup juice, orange, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1/4 teaspoon nutme (round)
directions: 1. Cut the strawberries in half., 2. Open the can of mandarin oranges. Drain off the syrup., 3. Open the can of pears. Drain off the juice. Slice the pears., 4. Open the can of pineapple, but don’t drain off the juice., 5. Put the undrained pineapple, orange juice, cinnamon, and nutme in a mixin bowl. Stir toether., 6. Carefully stir in the mandarin oranges, pears, and strawberries., 7. Refrierate for 1 to 4 hours before servin.

name: Squash-Apple Casserole
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups winter squash (such as acorn, butternut or hubbard), 1 1/2 cups apples (cookin, such as Macintosh, Granny Smith or Rome), 1/2 teaspoon nutme, 1 teaspoon cinnamon
directions:
1. Wash and prepare squash and apples (for extra fiber, keep peel on apples).
2. Alternate layers of squash and apples in 8x8 inch pan; end with apples.
3. Sprinkle spices over top layer.
4. Cover with aluminum foil.
5. Bake at 350 derees for 45-60 minutes, until squash is tender.

name: Strawberry Banana Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 medium ripe banana, mashed, 1/8 teaspoon vanilla, 1/3 cup plain non-fat yoghurt, 1/2 cup sliced fresh strawberries, 1/2 cup bran and wheat flakes ready-to-eat cereal
directions: Stir banana and vanilla into yoghurt and combine well., In a 10-12 ounce lass, alternately layer the yoghurt-banana mixture, strawberries and cereal., Serve immediately and enjoy.

name: Strawberry Kiwi Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat vanilla yoghurt, 1 kiwi (chopped), 4 lare strawberries (about a 1/2 cup, chopped), 1 ice cube tray (or paper cups)
directions: Cut fruit into small pieces., Mix fruit and yoghurt., Divide into 4 small paper cups (or 8 ice cubes) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws)., Freeze., Enjoy as a frozen treat!

name: Strawberry SMores
ingredients: 2 strawberries, 1 raham cracker (broken in half), 1/8 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla (2 tablespoons)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Rinse the strawberries in water., Slice the strawberries., Add the yoghurt and strawberries to 1/2 of raham cracker., Top with the other 1/2 of raham cracker., Enjoy immediately.

name: Strawberry Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat strawberry yoghurt, 6 lare strawberries, fresh or frozen, 1 ice cube tray (or paper cups)
directions:
Cut strawberries into small pieces.
 , Mix fruit and yoghurt.
 , Divide into 4 small paper cups (or 8 ice cubes) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws).
 , Freeze.
 , Enjoy as a frozen treat!

name: Suar and Spice Cookies (from Better Baking Mix)
ingredients: 1 serving of Better Baking Mix (1 cup), 1/2 cup brown suar, packed (or white suar), 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/3 cup raisins (optional), 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 e, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350°F. Lihtly rease baking sheet., In a mixin bowl, combine baking mix, suar, cinnamon, and raisins (optional). Stir to mix., Put oil, e, and vanilla in a small bowl. Beat with a fork to mix., Add oil and e mix to the dry inredients., Stir to combine. Douh will be thick., Measure level tablespoons of douh. Drop on cookie sheet about 2 inches apart. Douh with spread into cookies 2 1/2 to 3 inches wide as it bakes., Bake 10-12 minutes or until edes start to turn brown. Be careful not to overbake., Remove cookies from baking sheet while still warm.

name: Summer Breeze Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup plain yoghurt (non-fat), 6 strawberries (medium), 1 cup pineapple (crushed, canned in juice), 1 banana (medium), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 4 ice cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place all inredients in blender and puree until smooth., Serve in frosted lass.

name: Summer Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 cup strawberries (diced, fresh or frozen), 1 cup watermelon (cubed), 1 cup pineapple chunks, fresh or canned packed in natural juice (and do not drain)
directions: Stir fruit toether in a medium sized bowl., Cover and chill. Serve as soon as possible.

name: Sweet Cornmeal Puddin with Giner and Cinnamon
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups non-fat milk, 1/2 cup cornmeal, 1/2 cup non-fat milk (cold), 1 tablespoon mararine, 1/2 cup molasses, 1/2 teaspoon iner, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 325 derees. Lihtly rease 1-quart baking pan., In a saucepan, heat 2 1/2 cups of milk to a simmer., In a bowl, mix toether the other 1/2 cup cold milk with cornmeal., Add cornmeal mixture to warm milk, stir well., Cook 20 minutes over low-medium heat. Stir often to prevent scorchin. Cook until thickened., Remove puddin from heat. Stir in mararine, molasses, iner and cinnamon., Pour into the reased baking pan., Bake for 55 to 60 minutes. When a knife is inserted and comes out clean, the puddin is done., Cut into 8 squares before servin. Serve warm.

name: Sweet Potato and Apple Bake
ingredients: 3 1/2 cups sweet potatoes, drained (save 2 Tablespoons of the liquid), 2 cups apples (peeled, cored and cut into bite-sized pieces ), 6 teaspoons brown suar (2 Tablespoons, packed), 1/3 cup chopped nuts (pecans, walnuts or any other type), 2 tablespoons flour, 2 tablespoons butter, melted (unsalted)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350°F., Put sweet potatoes in baking dish., Add apples., Pour 2 Tablespoons of the sweet potato liquid over the mixture., Mix brown suar, nuts, flour, and melted butter toether in a small bowl., Sprinkle over the top of the sweet potato/apple mix., Bake for 20-30 minutes, until the top is olden brown and bubbly.

name: Sweet Potato Casserole
ingredients: 4 sweet potatoes (about 1 lb), 3 e whites, 1/2 cup suar, 1 can evaporated milk, nonfat (12 ounce), 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon nutme, 1/2 teaspoon iner
directions: 1. Rinse sweet potatoes in cold runnin water and pierce with a fork., 2. Microwave sweet potatoes on full power until tender, about 15 minutes. Turn them half way durin baking., 3. Preheat oven to 400 derees. Remove skin from sweet potatoes and mash with hand beaters or food processor. Add the rest of the inredients and mix until smooth., 4. Pour mixture in an 8 inch baking dish. Bake until casserole is firm in the center, about 40 minutes., 5. Remove pan from oven. Allow to stand for 5 minutes then cut into 10 squares., 6. Serve hot. Refrierate leftovers.

name: Sweet Potato Cheesecake
ingredients: 1 cup inersnaps (finely crumbed, or raham crackers), 3 tablespoons butter (unsalted, melted), 8 ounces cream cheese (liht, softened), 1 cup sweet potatoes (mashed, peeled and cooked), 1/3 cup suar, 1 1/2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, 1 teaspoon orange peel (finely shredded), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 5 e whites, 1 cup milk (evaporated, reduced fat 2%)
directions:
Crust:
1. Combine crumbs and butter. Press mixture into bottom and 1 inch up sides of an 8 inch sprin form pan. Set aside, Fillin:
1. In a lare mixin bowl, beat cream cheese, sweet potatoes, e white, suar, pumpkin pie spice, orange peel and the vanilla until combined. DO NOT OVER BEAT.
2. Stir in milk. Carefully pour into prepared pan.
3. Bake at 350 derees for 60-70 minutes until center appears set.
4. Cool on wire rack for 45 minutes. Cover and chill thorouhly.
5. Remove sides of pan.
6. Garnish with dessert toppin and orange peel.

name: Sweet Potato Custard
ingredients: 1 cup sweet potato (cooked, mashed), 1/2 cup banana (mashed), 1 cup evaporated milk (fat-free), 1/8 cup brown suar (2 Tablespoons, packed), 2 e yolk (beaten, or 1/3 cup e substitute), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cookin spray (as needed, non-stick), 1/4 cup raisins, 1 tablespoon suar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon (round)
directions: 1. In a medium bowl, stir toether sweet potato and banana., 2. Add milk, blendin well., 3. Add brown suar, e yolks, and salt, mixin thorouhly., 4. Spray casserole dish with non-stick cookin spray. Transfer sweet potato mixture to casserole dish., 5. Bake in pre-heated 325° oven for 35 minutes, Remove from oven., 6. Combine raisins, suar, and cinnamon; sprinkle over top of sweet potato mixture., 7. Return to oven and bake 10 more minutes.

name: Sweet Potato Pie
ingredients: 4 e whites, 1/4 cup orange juice (fresh), 1 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1/4 teaspoon nutme (round), 3/4 cup brown suar, 1/2 teaspoon orange rind, 1/4 teaspoon allspice (round), 1/2 cup skim milk, 2 tablespoons unsalted mararine (melted), pinch salt, 2 cups sweet potatoes (mashed), 1 pie crust (9 inch, unbaked)
directions:
1. Beat e whites well.
2. Add suar, orange juice, orange rind, spices, mararine and salt.
3. Add mashed sweet potatoes and mix thorouhly.
4. Pour into pie shell and bake in preheated 350° oven for 1 hour or until firm.

name: Sweet Potato Pone
ingredients: 3 cups rated sweet potatoes, 1 cup molasses (or dark cane syrup), 2 teaspoons round iner, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/3 cup vegetable oil
directions:
1. In a 3-quart saucepan, combine sweet potatoes, molasses, iner, baking powder, salt, and vegetable oil.
2. Simmer slowly, stirrin constantly, for 10 minutes.
3. Pour into well-reased 9-inch baking pan.
4. Bake at 325°F for 30 minutes, stirrin every five minutes for the first 20 minutes.
5. Smooth down the top and allow to brown.
6. Cut into squares and serve hot or cold.

name: Tropical Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat vanilla yoghurt, 1/2 cup mano pieces (fresh or frozen), 1/2 cup pineapple pieces (fresh, canned, or frozen), 1/4 cup cup coconut water, 1 ice cube tray (or paper cups)
directions: Place all inredients into blender., Blend on hih until smooth., Pour into 4 small paper cups (or 8 ice cubes) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws)., Freeze., Enjoy as a frozen treat!

name: Very Berry Muesli
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat fruit yoghurt, 1 cup old fashioned rolled oats (raw), 1/2 cup fat free milk (or 1% milk), 1/2 cup dried fruit (try raisins, apricots, dates), 1/2 cup apple, chopped (about 1/3 of a medium apple), 1/2 cup frozen blueberries, 1/4 cup toasted walnuts (chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In medium bowl, mix oats, yoghurt and milk., Cover and refrierate for 6 to 12 hours., Add dried and fresh fruit, and mix ently., Serve scoops of muesli in small dishes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped nuts.

name: Very Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup frozen strawberries, 1 cup frozen raspberries, 1 cup pineapple chunks, 1 banana, 1 cup skim milk (or almond milk), 1 1/2 cups ice
directions: Peel and slice the banana., Gather all inredients and combine in a blender., Cover and blend until smooth., Serve riht away or pour into ice cube trays and freeze. Durin the week, pop out the cubes for a quick on-the-o breakfast.

name: Winter Crisp
ingredients: 2 tablespoons cinnamon, 3 tablespoons mararine, 1/2 cup suar, 3 tablespoons flour (all purpose), 1 teaspoon lemon peel (rated), 5 cups apple (unpeeled, sliced), 1 cup cranberries (fresh), 2/3 cup rolled oats, 1/3 cup brown suar (packed), 1/4 cup whole wheat flour
directions:
Fillin:
1. Combine suar, flour, and lemon peel in a medium bowl and mix well.
2. Stir in apples and cranberries.
3. Spoon into a 6-cup baking dish., Toppin:
1. Combine oats, brown suar, flour, and cinnamon in a small bowl.
2. Stir in melted mararine.
3. Sprinkle toppin over fillin.
4. Bake at 375 derees for 40 minutes or until fillin is bubbly and top is brown.
5. Serve warm or at room temperature.

name: Wobbly Wonders
ingredients: 3 tablespoons elatin (flavored - choose your favorite), 2 cups water (boilin), 1 1/2 cups milk, low-fat, 1 packae vanilla instant puddin (3.5 ounce packae)
directions: 1. In a medium bowl, dissolve elatin in boilin water. Cool at least 30 minutes., 2. Pour milk into lare mixin bowl and add puddin mix. Usin an electric mixer, beat 1 minute., 3. Gradually add and beat in elatin mixture. Pour into a 9x13 inch baking pan. Chill in fride for several hours., 4. Cut fun shapes with cookie cutters or knife. Store in refrierator.

name: Yoghurt Berry Parfait
ingredients: 2 cups yoghurt, low fat (or fat-free, any flavor*), 1 cup banana (sliced), 1/2 cup blueberries (fresh), 1/2 cup strawberries (fresh, sliced), other optional fruit (raspberries, peaches, pineapple and/or manos), 1 cup ranola
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Line up 4 parfait or other tall lasses., Spoon 1/2 cup of yoghurt into each lass., Sprinkle with ranola., Top with about 1/4 cup of fruit.

name: Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 3/4 cup yoghurt, fat-free (flavored or plain), 3/4 cup fruit juice
directions:
1. Put the yoghurt and juice in a bowl.
2. Stir toether well.
3. Pour the mix into paper cups.
4. Stick a popsicle stick in the center of the mix in the cup.
5. Place the yoghurt pops in the freezer until they turn solid.

name: Yoghurt Popsicles
ingredients: 6 us fluid ounces frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed, 2 cups yoghurt, low-fat vanilla
directions:
1. Pour yoghurt into melted juice concentrated and stir until smooth.
2. Place cups toether on a baking sheet.
3. Pour yoghurt/juice mixture into paper cups.
4. Cover the cups with a sheet of aluminum foil.
5. Insert stick for each popsicle by makin a slit in foil over the center of each cup.
6. Freeze popsicles until firm.
7. Run warm water on the outside of each cup to loosen each popsicle from the cup.

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients: 3 e, 1 cup suar, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 2 cups zucchini (rated), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 1 1/2 cups flour (all purpose), 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 cup raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 325 derees and lihtly rease and flour a 9 x 5 loaf pan., In a lare mixin bowl, beat es lihtly. Add suar, oil, zucchini, and vanilla and beat., In a separate bowl, measure dry inredients and stir to combine. Add raisins., Add dry inredients to the e mixture. Stir just until all inredients are moistened., Spoon into loaf pan., Bake at 325 derees for 50 minutes. Test for doneness by insertin a toothpick in the center. It should come out dry., Allow loaf to cool 5 to 10 minutes before turnin out onto a coolin rack., Serve warm or allow to cool before slicin.

name: Arentinian Chimichurri Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup flat-leaf parsely (lihtly packed and chopped without the stalks), 4 arlic cloves (minced), 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon peppercorn (freshly round), 1/2 teaspoon chili pepper flakes, 1 tablespoon oreano (dried), 2 tablespoons reen onion (minced), 1/2 cup olive oil, 3/4 cup vinear, 3 tablespoons lemon juice (fresh), 1/4 cup water
directions: Place all the inredients in a blender or food processor and pulse until well chopped, but not pureed., Spoon the sauce over rilled meats, poultry, seafood, or vegetables. This sauce can also be used as a marinade.

name: Avocado and Corn Salsa
ingredients: 1 avocado (diced), 3/4 cup frozen corn kernels, thawed, 1/2 cup rape tomatoes, quartered, 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, chopped, 2 teaspoons lime juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Toss avocado, corn, tomatoes, cilantro, lime juice, and salt in a medium bowl., Chill one hour and then serve.

name: Basic Soup and Sauce Mix
ingredients: 2 cups milk (non-fat powdered), 3/4 cup cornstarch, 12 teaspoons chicken bouillon (instant), 2 tablespoons onion flakes (dried), 2 teaspoons Italian seasonin
directions: Combine all inredients in a plastic ba., Mix well.

name: Bean Dip
ingredients: 2 cups kidney beans (canned, low-sodium), 1 tablespoon vinear, 3/4 teaspoon chili powder, 1/8 teaspoon cumin (round), 2 tablespoons onion (2 teaspoon, finely chopped), 1 cup cheddar cheese (rated)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain the kidney beans, but save the liquid in a small bowl, Place the beans, vinear, chili powder, and cumin in a blender. Blend until smooth. Add enouh saved bean liquid to make the dip easy to spread., Stir in the chopped onion and rated cheese., Store in a tihtly covered container and place in the fride, Serve with raw vegetable sticks or crackers.

name: Brussels Sprouts with Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: 2 cups Brussels sprouts (or broccoli, cabbae, kale, collards, or turnips), 1/2 cup chicken broth, low-sodium, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon brown mustard (spicy), 1/2 teaspoon thyme (dried), 1/2 cup mushroom (sliced)
directions: Trim brussels sprouts and cut in half. Steam until tender -- about 6 to 10 minutes. Or, microwave on hih for 3 to 4 minutes., In a non-stick pot brin the broth to a boil., Mix in the lemon juice, mustard, and thyme. Add the mushrooms., Boil until the broth is reduced by half, about 5 to 8 minutes., Add the brussels sprouts (or other cooked vegetable)., Toss well to coat with the sauce.

name: Caramel Sauce
ingredients: 8 1/3 tablespoons milk (non-fat, dry, 1/2 cup + 1 teaspoon), 1 1/4 cups water, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 2 tablespoons butter, 1/2 cup brown suar (packed), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Reconstitute non-fat dried milk with water. Combine reconstituted milk and cornstarch in a small saucepan and mix until cornstarch in thorouhly dissolved., Add the butter and brown suar and cook over medium heat, stirrin constantly with a wire whisk until mixture thickens and comes to a boil. Continue to boil 1 minute., Remove pan from heat and stir in vanilla. Serve warm over baked French toast, ice cream, or fruit.

name: Chickpea Dip
ingredients: 3 arlic cloves, 1/4 cup yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 1 tablespoon lemon juice (fresh), 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 1 can (19 oz) chickpeas (drained arbanzo beans)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put all inredients into a food processor and blend until smooth., Serve at room temperature with pita chips, crackers, carrots, or other dippin vegetables.

name: Chili and Spice Seasonin
ingredients: 1/4 tablespoon paprika, 2 tablespoons oreano (dried, crushed), 2 teaspoons chili powder, 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 teaspoon pepper (black), 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/2 teaspoon dry mustard
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix toether all inredients., Store in airtiht container.

name: Chili Bean Dip
ingredients: 1 can (16 oz) pinto beans (or 2 cups cooked dried beans), 2 tablespoons onion (chopped), 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 cup cheese (shredded)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mash beans in a bowl., Add onion and chili powder and shredded cheese., Serve warm or cold with raw vegetables or tortilla chips.

name: Confetti Bean Salsa
ingredients: 1 can black or red beans (15.5 ounce), 1 can corn (12 ounce), 1 cup salsa
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain and rinse the beans. Drain the corn., Combine beans, corn, and salsa in a medium-sized bowl. Mix.

name: Creamy Dill Dip
ingredients: 1 cup sour cream, non-fat, 1 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 2 tablespoons dill (dried)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put the sour cream, yoghurt, and dill in a medium bowl. Stir toether., Store the dip in a covered container if you don’t plan to eat it riht away., Keep the dip in the fride until you serve it.

name: Creamy Italian Herb Dressin
ingredients: 1/4 cup yoghurt (plain), 1/4 cup mayonnaise (non-fat), 1/4 cup milk (skim), 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasonin (dried), 1/2 clove arlic (fresh, minced)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a small bowl, combine all the above inredients., Refrierate in a covered container for at least an hour. Serve chilled.

name: Creamy Peanut Dip
ingredients: 1/4 cup peanut butter (creamy), 1/8 cup orange juice (2 tablespoons), 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a small bowl, mix the peanut butter and orange juice until smooth., Stir in the vanilla yoghurt., Cover and put in the fride until chilled.

name: Cucumber Yoghurt and Cream Cheese Dip
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 4 ounces cream cheese, low-fat (softened), 1 cup cucumber (seeded and diced), 1 clove arlic (chopped small), salt and lemon pepper, to taste (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Stir yoghurt and cream cheese until smooth., Rinse the cucumber under runnin water., Slice the cucumber in half the lon way and run a spoon down the middle to remove the seeds., Chop the cucumber into small pieces., Stir the cucumber, chopped arlic, and seasonins into the yoghurt mixture.

name: Cucumber, Yoghurt and Herb Dip
ingredients: 2 cups yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 2 cucumbers (medium, peeled, seeded, and rated), 1/2 cup sour cream (non-fat), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon dill (fresh), 1 arlic clove (chopped), 1 cup cherry tomatoes, 1 cup broccoli florets, 1 cup carrots (baby)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel, seed, and rate one cucumber. Slice other cucumber and set aside., Mix yoghurt, rated cucumber, sour cream, lemon juice, dill, and arlic in a serving bowl. Chill for 1 hour., Arrane tomatoes, cucumbers, broccoli, and carrots on a colorful platter. Serve with cucumber dip.

name: Curry Dip
ingredients: 1 cup sour cream, non-fat, 1 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 1 tablespoon curry powder
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix the sour cream, yoghurt, and curry powder., Store the dip in a covered container if you don’t plan to eat it riht away., Keep the dip in the fride until you serve it.

name: Curry Vegetable Dip
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 1/4 cup carrots (shredded), 2 tablespoons reen onions (minced), 1 tablespoon salad dressin (mayonnaise-type), 1 teaspoon suar, 1/4 teaspoon curry powder, 1 dash pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix inredients in a bowl., Chill., Serve with crisp raw vegetables pieces, such as celery, carrot, or summer squash sticks.

name: Easy Marinara Sauce
ingredients: 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 2 onions, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 carrots, 3/4 cup celery, diced, 4 cans crushed tomatoes, low sodium (14.5 oz cans), 1 tablespoon Italian seasonin, salt and pepper to taste, 2 cups raw spinach, rouhly chopped
directions: Wash the vegetables., Collect, dice, and measure all inredients before startin to prepare the recipe., Heat the oil in a lare pot over medium heat.  , Add the onion and arlic powder. Cook for about 10 minutes or until the onion is clear., Add the carrots and celery, and cook for 5 minutes until slihtly soft., Add the tomatoes and Italian seasonin. Stir until all inredients are mixed toether. Taste, and add a little bit of salt and pepper if desired., Turn the heat to medium-hih, and brin sauce to a boil. , Once boilin, reduce the heat to low. Simmer uncovered for at least 30 minutes., Stir in the spinach, and cook for 2 minutes until spinach wilts.*, Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

name: Eatin Smart Seasonin Mix
ingredients: 1 1/4 teaspoons black pepper, 1 tablespoon arlic powder, 2 tablespoons dried parsley flakes, 3/4 cup dried, minced onion, 2 cups dried milk, non-fat
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients., Store in airtiht container., Use in recipes as indicated.

name: Eplant and Pepper Dip
ingredients: 1 eplant, 2 red pepper, 1 onion (small), 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon oreano, 1 teaspoon basil, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Use a vegetable peeler to remove the peel from the eplant., Chop the eplant into 1 inch cubes., Chop the red peppers., Peel and chop the onion., Put all the inredients in a lare bowl. Stir toether., Spread the inredients on a baking tray., Bake at 400 °F for 45 minutes. While the dip is baking, stir it a few times., When the eplant is lihtly browned and soft, take the dip out of the oven., Let the dip cool for at least 10 minutes., Put the dip the blender. Blend until smooth., Serve the dip cold or at room temperature.

name: Farmers Market Salsa
ingredients: 1/2 cup corn (fresh cooked or frozen), 1 can black beans (15 ounce, drained and rinsed), 1 cup tomatoes (fresh diced), 1/2 cup onion (yellow or red) (diced), 1/2 cup reen pepper (diced), 2 tablespoons lime juice, 2 arlic clove (finely chopped), 1/2 cup picante sauce
directions: Combine all inredients in a lare bowl. Chill until serving time., Drain before servin., Serve with low-fat baked tortilla chips or fresh vegetables.

name: Fiesta Hummus
ingredients: 1 can arbanzo beans, 1/2 teaspoon cumin, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 dash cayenne pepper, 2 arlic cloves (minced), 1/2 cup yoghurt (plain, non-fat), 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1 jalapeno pepper (finely chopped), 2 tablespoons cilantro (chopped)
directions: Drain and mash arbanzo beans in blender, food processor, or with fork. Add remainin inredients., Blend until smooth., Chill one hour or overnight., Serve on crackers or tortilla chips. Promptly refrierate leftovers.

name: French Salad Dressin
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 cup ketchup, 1 teaspoon suar, 1 tablespoon vinear, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1 tablespoon onion (rated), 1 tablespoon lemon juice
directions: Put all the inredients in a jar or bottle with a lid., Put on the lid. Shake well., Chill in the fride for at least 1 hour before servin.

name: Fresh Salsa
ingredients: 2 tomatoes (chopped), 1/2 onion (chopped), 3 jalapeno chiles (finely chopped, seeded if desired), 1/4 cup cilantro (chopped), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 lime (juiced)
directions: In a medium bowl, mix all inredients., Serve or store salsa in refrierator for up to three days in a covered plastic or lass container.

name: Fresh Tomato Salsa
ingredients: 1 cup tomatoes, finely chopped (or 1/2 can, about 8 ounces, low-sodium diced tomatoes), 1/2 cup apple, peeled and finely chopped, 1/4 cup onion, finely chopped, 2 tablespoons lime or lemon juice, 1 teaspoon arlic, finely chopped, 1/2 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon fresh parsley or cilantro, chopped (optional), 1 tablespoon cayenne pepper or jalapeño chilies, chopped (optional)
directions: In a medium-sized bowl, combine tomato, apple, onion, and lime juice (or lemon juice). Mix well., Add arlic, vegetable oil, and salt to bowl. If usin parsley, cilantro, cayenne pepper, or jalapeño chilies, add them too. Mix well., Cover bowl and refrierate for 15 minutes. Serve cold.

name: Fresh Tomato Sauce
ingredients: 8 tomatoes (ripe), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 1/2 cup reen pepper (chopped), 1/4 cup carrot (thinly sliced, or shredded), 1/2 teaspoon oreano (dried), 1 teaspoon dried basil (dried), 2 teaspoons arlic (minced or 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder), pepper (to taste), 6 cups pasta (cooked), 6 tablespoons Parmesan cheese (rated)
directions: Wash the ripe tomatoes. Cut out stem ends. Chop into small pieces and set aside in a lare bowl., In a lare pan, heat the oil over medium hih heat. Add onion, reen pepper, carrots and arlic. Stir-fry until tender, about three minutes., Add seasonins and tomatoes. Brin to a entle boil., Lower heat and simmer ently, uncovered, until tomatoes turn to a sauce, about 40 minutes. Serve over freshly cooked pasta.

name: Fruit Dip
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla (8 oz), 1 us fluid ounce orange juice, 100% juice, frozen concentrate (thawed), 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 1/2 teaspoons brown suar (1/2 tablespoon), 2 apples (red, cored and sliced), 1 pear (cored and sliced), 1 peach (pitted and sliced)
directions: In a small bowl, combine yoghurt, orange juice concentrate, lime juice, and brown suar., Mix well., Place bowl containin dip on a lare plate and surround with fruit.

name: Grape Salsa
ingredients: 2 cups cut rapes, 1/2 cup sliced reen onions, 1/2 cup diced Anaheim chili, fresh or canned, 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, 2 tablespoons vinear, 1 clove arlic, minced or 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon hot sauce
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients in a medium bowl and mix well. Let stand at least 1 hour. Drain off excess liquid before servin.

name: Herbed Dip
ingredients: 1 cup cottae cheese, low-fat, 4 tablespoons yoghurt, low-fat plain (1/4 cup), 1 tablespoon onion (chopped, or chives), 1 teaspoon parsley (dried), 1/4 teaspoon dill (dried)
directions:
1. Place all the inredients in a blender.
2. Blend all the inredients thorouhly.
3. Pour the mixture into a clean container.
4. Cover and chill.

name: Homemade Cranberry Sauce
ingredients: 3 cups fresh cranberries (12 ounces, can also use frozen), 1 orange, 1 cup suar
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel orange and remove seeds., Place all inredients in a blender and blend until mixed well., Heat up and serve over turkey., For thicker sauce to do not blend just heat and serve.

name: Homemade Ranch Dressin
ingredients: 2 teaspoons dried, minced onions, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 tablespoon dried parsley, 1 cup Greek yoghurt, plain, fat-free, 1 cup buttermilk
directions: Collect and measure all inredients before startin to prepare the recipe., Add the dried onion, salt, arlic powder, and dried parsley to a bowl, and stir ently to combine., Add the Greek yoghurt and buttermilk, and stir until spices are evenly distributed., Chill before servin., Keep leftovers refrierated, and eat within 1 week.

name: Honey Mustard Dressin
ingredients: 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1/4 cup vinear, 2 tablespoons honey, 2 teaspoons mustard (2 Tablespoons), 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions: 1. Put all the inredients in a jar or bottle with a lid., 2. Put on the lid. Shake well., 3. Chill in the fride for at least 1 hour before servin.

name: Hot N Spicy Seasonin
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons white pepper (round), 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1 1/4 teaspoons arlic powder, 1 tablespoon basil (dried), 1 1/2 tablespoons thyme (dried)
directions: 1. Mix all inredients toether. Store in airtiht container.

name: Hummus
ingredients: 2 cups arbanzo beans, cooked (chickpeas), 2 cloves arlic (minced), 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 tablespoon sesame tahini (sesame paste or substitute peanut butter for a sweet taste), 2 tablespoons olive oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mash the arbanzo beans until smooth (if you have a blender, put the beans and lemon juice into it and blend)., Add the arlic, lemon juice, tahini and oil. Mix well.\n

name: Julie’s Cranberry Chutney
ingredients: 3 cups whole, fresh cranberries, 1 cup water, 1 Juice of one orange, 1/2 cup suar, 1 Granny Smith apple (chopped), 1 small onion (chopped), 1/4 cup apple cider vinear, 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1/4 teaspoon aram masala, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts
directions: Combine all inredients in a pot and brin to a boil., Cover with a lid and reduce heat to low., Simmer for about 30 minutes, stirrin occasionally., Remove from heat and let chutney cool slihtly., Place in the refrierator to cool completely.

name: Lite Italian Dressin
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder (or 1 fresh clove, minced), 1 teaspoon Italian herb mix, 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper (round), 1/2 teaspoon celery salt, 1/2 cup vinear, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1/2 cup water
directions: 1. Combine all inredients in a pint sized jar with tiht fittin lid., 2. Shake viorously to blend inredients., 3. Store refrierated.

name: Low Calorie Dressin
ingredients: 1/2 cup tomato juice, 2 tablespoons lemon juice (or vinear), 1/3 tablespoon onion, rated (1 teaspoon), 1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon prepared mustard
directions: 1. Combine all inredients., 2. Store in refrierator.

name: Low Fat Creamy Dressin
ingredients: 1/2 cup mayonaise, reduced fat, 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 1/4 teaspoon dill weed, 1/2 teaspoon celery salt, cucumber, chopped (2 Tablespoons, optional)
directions: 1. Combine all inredients in small container., 2. Store covered in refrierator and use within 1 week.

name: Low Fat Ranch Dip
ingredients: 1 can reat northern beans (15 ounce, rinsed and drained, low sodium), 1/4 cup water, 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1 tablespoon chives (fresh, chopped), 1 tablespoon parsley (fresh, chopped), 1/4 teaspoon tarraon (dried), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon lemon juice
directions: 1. Blend the beans and arlic in a blender, addin enouh water for the desired consistency., 2. Blend for 2 minutes to make it silky smooth., 3. Use a spatula to scrape the mixture into a medium bowl., 4. Stir in the yoghurt, cayenne, chives, parsley, and tarraon, salt and lemon juice. Serve in a bowl.

name: Low-Fat Tartar Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 cup low-fat plain yoghurt (or low-fat sour cream), 1/16 cup (1 tablespoon) pickle relish, 1 tablespoon onion, minced (or 2 teaspoons dried minced onion), 1 teaspoon dried parsley (or 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley), 1 teaspoon mustard, 2 drops hot pepper sauce (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a small bowl, combine all the inredients., Serve immediately or cover and refrierate until used.

name: Mano Salsa
ingredients: 1 mano (peeled, pitted and diced (or 1 cup thawed frozen chunks)), 1 tablespoon onion, red (diced), cilantro (1 Tablespoon, optional, fresh or dried), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons lime juice (bottled or fresh)
directions: 1. Combine all inredients in a bowl., 2. Serve with baked tortilla chips.

name: Melon Salsa
ingredients: 2 cups melon, honeydew, cantaloupe or watermelon (seeded and chopped fresh, use one kind or a combination), 1 cup cucumber (peeled, seeded and chopped), 1/4 cup onion, red or white (chopped), 2 cilantro or mint, fresh (2 Tablespoon, chopped, optional), 1/2 jalapeño (seeded and finely chopped, or hot sauce to taste), 1/4 cup lime juice or lemon juice, 1 tablespoon suar, white or brown
directions: 1. In a medium size bowl, stir toether all inredients., 2. Taste and season with more lemon or lime juice, suar if needed., 3. Cover and chill for at least 30 minutes. Serve with rilled or broiled fish or chicken.

name: Mock Sour Cream
ingredients: 1 cup cottae cheese, low-fat or non-fat, 2 tablespoons skim milk, 1 tablespoon lemon juice
directions: 1. Combine all in the blender and blend until smooth.

name: Parsley, Almond, and Lemon Pesto
ingredients: 6 tablespoons Almonds, sliced, 6 tablespoons Parmesan cheese, 1 cup Parsley, fresh, 1/2 Lemon, juiced, 1/4 cup Olive oil
directions: 1. In a food processor, combine the almonds, cheese, parsley and lemon juice., 2. Slowly pour in oil and mix it into the rest of the inredients., 3. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Pea Guacamole
ingredients: 2 cups frozen peas, thawed, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1/2 cup rape tomatoes, halved, 1/4 cup red onion, chopped, 1 can reen chilies, drained, diced (4 oz), 3 tablespoons cilantro (chopped), 1 clove Fresh arlic, minced, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, salt (to taste, optional)
directions: 1. Mash peas until smooth. , 2. Add the lime juice, tomato, onion, reen chilies, cilantro, arlic, salt (if usin), and black pepper. Mix well. , 3. Serve with an assortment of raw vegetables and whole-rain tortilla chips.

name: Pea Pesto
ingredients: 1 cup frozen peas (can also use fresh or canned), 1/2 cup rated Parmesan cheese, 1 cup basil leaves, 1 cup spinach (fresh, frozen, or canned), 1/2 cup walnuts, 2 cloves arlic, 1/4 cup extra virin olive oil, 1/4 cup water, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions: 1. For the pesto, add peas, Parmesan cheese, basil, spinach, walnuts and arlic into a food processor or blender., 2. Add in water, oil, salt and pepper. Blend until the inredients are combined to form a thick sauce., 3. Place pesto in an airtiht container. Refrierate until needed.

name: Peach Sauce
ingredients: 2 15-oz cans of peaches, drained, 1 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Drain peaches and pour into a medium saucepan with cinnamon., Cook on low to medium heat for 20 minutes, stirrin every few minutes., Mash to desired consistency with either a potato masher or wooden spoon.

name: Pico de Gallo
ingredients: 2 cups tomatoes (chopped ripe), 1 1/2 cups onion (chopped), 1/3 cup cilantro (chopped, fresh), 3 jalapeno pepper (seeded and chopped), 2 tablespoons lime juice, 2 cloves arlic (minced), 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: 1. Combine all inredients in a medium bowl., 2. Serve immediately or cover and refrierate for up to 3 days.

name: Salsa Fresca
ingredients: 5 tomatoes (medium), 2 jalapeños, 2 cloves arlic, 1/4 red onion (medium), 3 tablespoons lime juice (fresh), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1 tablespoon cilantro (fresh, leaves)
directions:
1. Wash the vegetables. Cut the tomatoes into 1/2-inch pieces and put into a medium bowl. Because they can burn the skin, an adult should seed and mince the jalapenos and add them to the tomatoes.
2. Peel the arlic and mince. Peel the onion and cut into 1/4-inch pieces. Add the onion and arlic to the tomato mixture.
3. Stir in the lime juice, salt and pepper. Chop the cilantro and stir only until combined.

name: Salt-free All Purpose Blend
ingredients: 2 tablespoons onion (dried), 2 tablespoons arlic powder, 1 tablespoon paprika, 1 1/2 teaspoons thyme, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions: 1. Mix all inredients in a small bowl, usin a spoon.\n2. Place mix into a container that allows you to shake to dispense.

name: South of the Border Dip
ingredients: 1 cup sour cream, non-fat, 1 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 1 cup salsa
directions:
1. Mix the sour cream, yoghurt, and salsa.
2. Store the dip in a covered container if you don’t plan to eat it riht away.
3. Keep the dip in the fride until you serve it.

name: Squash Salsa
ingredients: 1 can black beans (rinsed), 6 tomatoes, seeded and diced (medium), 1/2 reen pepper, seeded and diced, 1 medium red onion (minced), 1 summer squash,medium (peeled, seeds removed, diced), 2 tablespoons red wine vinear, 1 teaspoon Adobo seasonin (combination or arlic, coriander, salt, and cumin), lemon or lime juice (2 Tablespoons, optional), 4 tablespoons mozzarella cheese, part skim, fresh cilantro or dried parsely (optional)
directions:
1. Combine all inredients except cheese. Let sit for 30 minutes.
2. Spoon over tortilla chips, cooked rice, or noodles.
3. Top with rated, part-skim mozzarella cheese. Serve hot or cold!

name: Sweet and Savory Peanut Butter Dip
ingredients: 3 tablespoons peanut butter (creamy), 2 tablespoons apple butter, 2 tablespoons milk (skim), 1 tablespoon soy sauce (reduced sodium), 1 1/2 teaspoons lime juice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine peanut butter, apple butter, milk and soy sauce in a small bowl., Whisk toether until very smooth., Store tihtly, sealed in refrierator., Serve with celery or other crunchy fruits and vegetables.

name: Sweet and Sour Dressin
ingredients: 1/2 cup suar, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1/2 cup vinear
directions: In a small saucepan, combine suar and cornstarch., Stir in vinear., Cook over medium heat until slihtly thickened and clear., Chill before servin. Store refrierated.

name: Sweet and Sour Salad Dressin
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 3 tablespoons red vinear, 2 teaspoons soy sauce, low-sodium, 6 teaspoons brown suar (2 Tablespoons), 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix all inredients and stir or shake well., Chill in the fride for at least 1 hour before servin. Store in the fride in a bottle or container.

name: Sweetened Condensed Milk
ingredients: 1 cup hot water (8 fluid ounces), 2 cups suar, 2 tablespoons mararine, 4 cups dry milk powder, nonfat
directions: 1. In order listed, put inredients into a blender and blend until smooth., 2. Store in the refrierator for up to one week.

name: Tany Dressin
ingredients: 1/2 cup milk (evaporated skim), 6 us fluid ounces juice concentrate (frozen orange/pineapple, thawed), 1 teaspoon round nutme (pinch)
directions: Mix milk, concentrate and nutme. Shake well before usin.

name: Thousand Island Dressin
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, reduced-fat, 1/4 cup chili sauce, 3 sweet pickle relish packets (2/3 tablespoon packets each), 1 tablespoon onion (finely chopped), 1/16 cup celery (finely chopped), 1 teaspoon lemon (or lime) juice, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper
directions: 1. Wash hands well with soap and warm water., 2. Mix inredients toether., 3. Chill and serve over vegetables or on a salad.

name: Turkey Gravy
ingredients: 2 tablespoons mararine (or butter or turkey drippins), 3 tablespoons flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups chicken or turkey broth, 2 1/2 ounces iblets (cooked and chopped, approximately 1/2 cup)
directions: 1. Melt mararine in skillet over low heat. Mix in flour and salt. Stir and heat until bubbly., 2. Add broth slowly, stirrin constantly. Cook over low heat for 5- 10 minutes., 3. Add the cooked iblets. Heat a few minutes to blend flavors., 4. Store leftovers in refrierator within 2 hours.

name: Uncooked Tomato Sauce
ingredients: 6 tomatoes (lare, cut into chunks), 1 tablespoon arlic (minced), 1/2 onion, medium (finely chopped), 1/2 reen pepper (finely chopped), 3 tablespoons fresh basil (chopped), 1/2 teaspoon dried oreano, 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt and pepper (optional, to taste), 6 cups pasta (cooked), 6 tablespoons Parmesan cheese (rated)
directions: Chop tomatoes and mix with all the remainin inredients in a lare bowl., Let the mixture stand at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Toss with hot cooked pasta or rice and top with rated Romano or Parmesan cheese.

name: Vegetable Dippin Sauce
ingredients: 1/4 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 1/4 cup sour cream, liht, 2 teaspoons honey, 2 teaspoons brown mustard (spicy)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix toether all inredients.

name: Vegetable Medley with Salsa Dip
ingredients: 2 carrots (cut into 3-inch sticks), 2 celery stalks (cut into 3-inch sticks), 1 cup bell pepper (reen or other color), 1 cup sour cream, fat free, 1 cup fresh salsa (see recipe below)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Arrane vegetables on a platter., In a small bowl, mix sour cream and salsa. Serve.

name: Vegetarian Spahetti Sauce
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 onion (medium, chopped), 3 cloves arlic clove (chopped), 1 1/4 cups zucchini (sliced), 1 tablespoon oreano (dried), 1 tablespoon basil (dried), 1 can tomato sauce (8 oz), 1 can tomato paste (no salt added, 6 oz), 2 tomatoes (medium, chopped), 1 cup water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a medium skillet, heat oil. cook onions, arlic and zucchini in oil for 5 minutes on medium heat., Add remainin inredients and simmer covered for 45 minutes. Serve over pasta.

name: Veggie Dip
ingredients: 1 cup cottae cheese, 1 tablespoon onion (chopped very fine), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 teaspoons parsley flakes
directions: 1. Measure cottae cheese and put in bowl or blender., 2. Beat with a fork or mixer, or in a blender, until cottae cheese is smooth., 3. Add the other inredients. Stir toether., 4. Store the dip in the fride for 1 to 2 hours to let the flavors blend.

name: White Sauce - Thin
ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, 1 tablespoon flour, salt and pepper (optional, to taste), 1 cup milk, non-fat (or 1/3 cup powdered milk and water to equal 1 cup)
directions: 1. In a small pot, melt butter over low heat., 2. Add flour, salt, and pepper to mixture., 3. Add milk radually., 4. Heat to boilin, stir constantly until mixture is smooth and bubbly. (The consistency should be like thin cream.), 5. Remove from heat.

name: Zesty Herb Salad Dressin
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons vinear, 1/3 cup orange juice (or tomato juice), 1/2 teaspoon oreano, 1/2 teaspoon basil, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Put all the inredients in a jar or bottle with a lid., Put on the lid. Shake well., Chill in the fride for at least 1 hour before servin.

name: 2-Step Chicken
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 boneless chicken breasts, 1 can (10 oz) cream of chicken soup, reduced sodium, 1/2 cup water
directions: Heat oil in a skillet at a medium-hih settin., Add chicken and cook for ten minutes., Remove chicken from pan and set aside., Stir the soup and water toether in the skillet and heat it to a boil., Return the chicken to the skillet. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for an additional 10 minutes, or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165 °F.

name: 20-Minute Chicken Creole
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 chicken breasts (whole, skinless, boneless), 1 can diced tomatoes (14 1/2 oz., with juice), 1 cup chili sauce, 1 reen pepper (chopped, lare), 2 celery stalks (chopped), 1 onion (chopped), 2 arlic cloves (minced), 1 teaspoon dried basil, 1 teaspoon parsley (dried), 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Heat pan over medium-hih heat (350 °F in an electric skillet). Add vegetable oil and chicken and cook until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165 °F (3-5 minutes)., Reduce heat to medium (300 °F in electric skillet)., Add tomatoes with juice, chili sauce, reen pepper, celery, onion, arlic, basil, parsley, cayenne pepper, and salt., Brin to a boil; reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 10-15 minutes., Serve over hot, cooked rice or whole wheat pasta., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: 5 A Day Bulur Wheat
ingredients: 1 onion (medium, chopped), 1 cup broccoli (chopped), 1 cup carrots (shredded), 1 reen pepper (small, chopped, - may use red or yellow pepper), 1/3 cup fresh parsley (chopped, or 2 tablespoons dried), 1 teaspoon canola oil, 1 1/2 cups bulur (dry), 2 cups chicken broth (low-sodium), 8 ounces chickpeas or arbanzo beans (canned, drained)
directions: Wash and chop fresh onion, broccoli, carrots, pepper and parsley (if usin fresh parsley)., Heat canola oil in a lare skillet. Add onions and cook until soft., Add bulur and stir to coat. Add 2 cups chicken broth to the skillet, brin to a boil., Lower the heat, add remainin vegetables and chickpeas. Cook for 10 minutes or until the liquid is absorbed., Add parsley and stir. Serve warm or cold.

name: Any Days a Picnic Chicken Salad
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups chicken breast (cooked, diced), 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 3 packaes pickle relish (2/3 tablespoon), 1/2 cup mayonnaise (liht)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients., Refrierate until ready to serve., Use within 1-2 days. Chicken salad does not freeze well.

name: Anytime Pizza
ingredients: 1/4 mini bauette or Italian bread (split lenthwise, or 2 split Enlish muffins), 1/2 cup pizza sauce, 1/2 cup mozzarella or cheddar cheese (part-skim, shredded), 1/4 cup reen pepper (chopped), 1/4 cup mushrooms (fresh or canned, sliced), vegetable toppins (others, as desired, optional), Italian seasonin (optional)
directions: Toast the bread or Enlish muffin until slihtly brown., Top bread or muffin with pizza sauce, vegetables and low-fat cheese., Sprinkle with Italian seasonins as desired., Return bread to toaster oven (or reular oven preheated to 350 °F)., Heat until cheese melts.

name: Apple Carrot Soup
ingredients: 1 pound pork (lean, cut into chunks), 4 apples (with skin, cored and quarterd), 4 carrots (lare, peeled and cut into chunks), 1 orange peel (dried, 1 teaspoon, optional), 4 slices iner, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 20 cups water
directions: In a lare pot over hih heat, combine all inredients, brin to a boil., Reduce heat to medium and simmer until soup reduces to about 8 cups of liquid, about 3 to 4 hours., Skim fat from surface and serve., Store leftover soup covered in refrierator for up to 3 days.

name: Apple, Fennel & Chicken Salad with Couscous
ingredients: 12 ounces boneless chicken breast (2-3 breasts), 3 tablespoons olive oil (divided), 1 cup whole wheat couscous, 2 medium red apples, 1 tablespoon lemon juice (divided), 1 fennel bulb, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinear, 1 tablespoon suar, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon round black pepper, 3 1/2 cups fresh baby spinach (about 3.5 cups), 1/8 cup walnuts (chopped, may use pecans or almonds)
directions: Slice chicken breasts crosswise into 1/2 inch strips., Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in lare skillet over medium heat., Add chicken, cook 8-10 minutes until done, stirrin occasionally, remove from heat., While chicken is sautéin, cook couscous accordin to packae directions, let cool., Core and chop apples, place in lare bowl; toss with 1 tablespoon lemon juice., Chop fennel bulb (discardin stem and fronds) and add to bowl. , In a small bowl, whisk remainin oil and lemon juice with balsamic vinear, suar, salt, and pepper., Add chicken, couscous, spinach, and nuts to bowl with apples and fennel., Drizzle with dressin, toss to coat, and serve., Can be made several hours ahead and refrierated.

name: Apricot & Lemon Chicken
ingredients: 4 chicken breasts, boneless & skinless (medium), 1 teaspoon cumin, 5 tablespoons apricot spread (about 1/3 cup), 1 fresh lemon, juiced, 2 tablespoons water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Rub cumin over chicken and place in skillet., Cook on medium-hih for 6 minutes on each side, or until cooked throuh. Remove from pan and keep warm., Add apricot spread, lemon juice, and water to skillet. On medium heat, stir until smooth., Spoon sauce over chicken and serve warm.

name: Argentinean Grilled Steak with Salsa Criolla
ingredients: For the sauce:,1 large, ripe tomato (cored, seeded, and finely chopped, about 1/2 cup),1/4 small red onion (finely chopped, about 1/4 cup),2 tablespoons fresh parsley (finely chopped),2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil,2 teaspoons red wine vinegar,1/2 teaspoon minced garlic,1/4 teaspoon oregano leaf,1/8 teaspoon low-sodium adobo seasoning,1/8 teaspoon crushed red pepper,For the steak:,1 pound skirt steak,1/8 teaspoon low-sodium adobo seasoning
directions: In a small bowl, mix toether tomato, onions, parsley, olive oil, vinear, arlic, oreano, low-sodium adobo seasonin and crushed red pepper., Cover and refrierate for at least 1 hour or up until 48 hours.

name: Arroz Con Pollo
ingredients: 4 6-ounce chicken thihs (bone-in, skin removed), 1/2 teaspoon Kosher salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 yellow onion (peeled and chopped), 1 bell pepper (cored, seeded, and chopped), 3 arlic cloves (peeled and minced), 1 teaspoon round cumin, 1 teaspoon dried oreano, 1 cup lon-rain white rice (uncooked), 1 can (14.5 oz) low-sodium diced tomatoes (includin liquid), 2 cups water, 1 cube low sodium chicken bouillon
directions: To trim, lay chicken thihs on the cuttin board, skin side up. Push the chicken down so the excess fat is on the cuttin board (the excess is the part that isn’t riht on top of the chicken). Usin kitchen scissors or a sharp knife, cut off excess fat and discard. Pat chicken dry with paper towels, and discard towels., Place the skillet over medium hih heat and when it is hot, add the chicken thihs, skin side down and cook until browned, then flip, about 5 minutes on each side., Turn the heat off, carefully remove the chicken from the skillet and transfer to the plate. Pour off all but 1 tablespoon fat., Reheat the skillet over low heat and add the onion, pepper, arlic, cumin, and oreano and cook until the onion is softened, about 10 minutes., Add the uncooked rice and tomatoes and stir well., Add the water and bouillon cube and brin to a boil over hih heat. Return chicken to pan, skin side down, turn the heat down to low and cover., Cook chicken for 20 minutes and then carefully flip so that the skin side is up., Cover and cook for an additional 20 minutes. Serve riht away.

name: Arroz Con Pollo (Chicken and Rice)
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 chicken (whole, cut up, skin removed), 1 reen pepper (chopped), 1 onion (chopped), 3 arlic cloves (minced), 2 tomatoes (chopped), 2 1/4 cups chicken broth (low-sodium), 1 bay leaf, 1 cup rice (uncooked), 1 cup peas, salt (to taste, optional), pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare skillet heat oil and brown chicken on both sides., Add reen pepper, onion, and arlic and cook for about 5 minutes., Add tomato, chicken broth, bay leaf, salt pepper to taste., Cover and cook for 20 minutes., Add rice, stir well, cover and simmer for 20-30 minutes loner, or until all liquid has been absorbed and chicken is tender., Add peas, cook until hot.

name: Asian Mano Chicken Wraps
ingredients: 2 ripe manos (peeled, pitted, and diced), 1 1/2 cups chopped roasted chicken breast, 2 reen onions (sliced), 2 tablespoons fresh basil (chopped), 1/2 red bell pepper (chopped), 1 1/2 cups shredded Savoy or Napa cabbae, 2 medium carrots (rated), 1/3 cup fat-free cream cheese, 3 tablespoons natural creamy peanut butter (unsalted), 2 teaspoons low-sodium soy sauce, 4 whole-wheat tortillas (8")
directions: Cut manos, vegetables, and chicken. Place in a mixin bowl and toss until well mixed., In a small mixin bowl, whisk toether cream cheese, peanut butter, and soy sauce., To assemble: lay out tortillas on a flat surface. On each tortilla, spread 1/4 of cream cheese mixture and top with mano, vegetable, and chicken mix. Roll up tihtly, tuckin in ends of tortilla. Secure with toothpicks., To serve, cut each wrap in half., If not serving immediately, refrierate; keeps well overnight.

name: Avocado, Potato, and Grilled Chicken Salad
ingredients: 3 medium red potatoes, 1 fresh, ripe avocado, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 4 reen onions (chopped), 1/2 medium red bell pepper (chopped), 8 ounces frozen pre-cooked rilled chicken strips (about 8 strips) (thawed, cut into bite-size pieces), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon cider vinear, 1/2 cup lemon non-fat yoghurt, 1 teaspoon round black pepper
directions: In a medium sauce pan, boil potatoes about 20 minutes, until just tender; run under cold water to cool, and cut into chunks., Peel avocado and cut into chunks; coat with lemon juice., Whisk olive oil, vinear, yoghurt, and pepper in a small bowl., Place all inredients in lare bowl. Gently toss.

name: Baked Chicken
ingredients: 1 pound chicken, boneless, skinless, 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 teaspoon pepper, salt (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat the oven to 350 °F., Put the chicken in a baking pan or casserole dish., Sprinkle with arlic powder and pepper to taste., Bake for 1 hour.

name: Baked Chicken Nuets
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds chicken thihs, boneless, skinless, 1 cup ready-to-eat cereal, cornflakes, crumb, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon Italian herb seasonin, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder
directions: Remove skin and bone; cut thihs into bite-sized pieces., Place cornflakes in plastic ba and crush by usin a rollin pin., Add remainin inredients to crushed cornflakes. Close ba tihtly and shake until blended., Add a few chicken pieces at a time to crumb mixture. Shake to coat evenly.

name: Baked Chicken with vegetables
ingredients: 4 potatoes (sliced), 6 carrots (sliced), 1 onion (lare, quartered), 1 chicken (raw, - cut into pieces, skin removed), 1/2 cup water, 1 teaspoon thyme, 1/4 teaspoon pepper
directions: Preheat oven to 400 °F., Place potatoes, carrots, and onions in a lare roastin pan., Put chicken pieces on top of the vegetables., Mix water, thyme, and pepper. Pour over chicken and vegetables., Spoon juices over chicken once or twice durin cookin., Bake at 400 °F for one hour or more until browned and tender.

name: Baked Fish
ingredients: nonstick cookin spray, 1 pound fish fillets (whitefish, trout, or tilapia), 1 onion, sliced, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1/4 teaspoon lemon pepper seasonin (optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Place about a 12-inch piece of foil on the counter. Coat the foil with nonstick cookin spray., Place the fillets in the middle of the foil. If the fillets have skin, place the skin side down., Spread the onions, salt, pepper, and oil on top of the fillets. If usin lemon pepper seasonin, add that too., Fold the foil over the fish to wrap it. Place foil pouch on a baking sheet, and place it in the oven., Bake the fish for 15 to 20 minutes until the fish is flaky when tested with a fork., Divide into four portions and serve.

name: Baked Fish and vegetables
ingredients: 4 4-ounce white fish fillets (frozen, or cod or perch), 2 cups mixed vegetables (frozen), 1 onion (small, diced), 1 teaspoon lemon juice (or fresh lemon, sliced thin), 1 tablespoon parsley flakes (dried or fresh chopped), aluminum foil (10x12 inches square)
directions: Preheat oven to 450 °F., Separate and place fish fillets in center of each tin foil square., Combine frozen vegetables and diced onion in bowl and mix. Spoon vegetables around fillets., Sprinkle with lemon juice (or top with lemon slice) and add parsley on top. Fold ends of tin foil toether to form leak-proof seal., Bake for 10 minutes. Serve., Refrierate leftovers.

name: Baked Fish with Creole Sauce
ingredients: 1 pound fish fillets (fresh or frozen, unbreaded), 1/2 onion (thinly sliced), 1/2 reen pepper (thinly sliced), 1 can tomato sauce (8 ounce), 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, salt (1/4 teaspoon, optional)
directions: Thaw fish in refrierator overnight., Preheat oven to 375 °F., Arrane fish in a sinle layer in baking dish., Top fish with onion and pepper slices., In a separate bowl, mix tomato sauce, chili powder, salt, and pepper., Pour tomato sauce mixture over fish and vegetables., Cover dish and bake until fish flakes easily with a fork (20-30 minutes)., Refrierate leftovers.

name: Baked Lemon Chicken
ingredients: 3 1/2 pounds chicken (skinned and cut into 10 pieces), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 1/2 cloves of arlic (thinly sliced, or 1 tsp arlic powder), 4 teaspoons thyme spris (4 fresh spris, or 1 tsp dried thyme), 3 cups onion (thinly sliced), 1 1/2 cups chicken stock (or water), 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 lemon (sliced into 10 slices, seeds removed)
directions: Combine salt, pepper, arlic, and thyme., Lay chicken pieces into a 11x13 inch baking pan. Sprinkle seasonins over chicken., Combine onions, stock, and lemon juice in a sauce pan. Heat to a boil., Pour hot lemon mixture around chicken. Top each chicken piece with a lemon slice., Bake for 30 minutes at 400 °F until olden brown and juices are clear colored.

name: Baked Lentils Casserole
ingredients: 1 cup lentils (rinsed), 3/4 cup water, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 round black pepper (1/4 teaspoon, optional), 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 1/4 arlic powder (1/4 teaspoon, optional), 1 can tomatoes, 2 carrots (thinly sliced), 1/2 cup cheddar cheese (shredded)
directions: Combine lentils, water, seasonins, onion, and tomatoes., Place in 2 quart casserole dish., Cover tihtly with lid or foil., Bake at 350 °F for 30 minutes., Remove from oven and add carrots. Stir., Cover and bake 30 minutes loner., Remove cover and sprinkle cheese on top., Bake, uncovered 5 minutes, until cheese melts.

name: Baked Meatballs
ingredients: 1 pound round beef, 90% lean (or round turkey), 1 e, 1/2 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/2 cup bread crumbs, 1/2 cup milk, 1% (or non-fat), 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon onion powder
directions: Mix all inredients, shape into balls (about 24 meatballs)., Arrane on baking sheets that have been sprayed with non-stick cookin spray., Bake at 425 °F for 12-15 minutes. It is best to use a food safety thermometer to check for doneness. It should read 160 °F for round beef and 165 °F for round turkey., If meatballs are bein saved for future use, chill rapidly; packae in amounts needed per meal and freeze immediately.

name: Baked Parmesan Fish
ingredients: 1/3 cup parmesan cheese, non-fat (rated), 1/3 tablespoon flour, all-purpose (1 teaspoon), 1 teaspoon thyme spris (leaves removed and crushed), 4 fish fillets (white fish, 6 ounces each), 1 medium onion (chopped), 1 cup halved mushroom caps, 1/2 cup reen onions (finely sliced), 1 clove arlic (crushed)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F. Place cheese, flour, and thyme in paper ba., Individually coat fish by ently shakin in ba; discard coatin inredients., Place fillets in baking pan on rack. Bake for 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with fork., Heat skillet over medium-hih heat. Add onion, mushrooms, reen onions, and arlic. Cook, stirrin frequently, until onions are tender. Season with round black pepper., Serve baked fish topped with mushroom mixture.

name: Baked Pork Chops
ingredients: 6 pork chops (lean center-cut, 1/2-inch thick), 1 onion (medium, thinly sliced), 1/2 cup reen pepper (chopped), 1/2 cup red pepper (chopped), 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Trim fat from pork chops. Place chops in a 13x9 inch baking pan., Spread onion and peppers on top of chops. Sprinkle with pepper and salt. Refrierate for 1 hour., Preheat oven to 375 °F., Cover pan and cook 30 minutes., Uncover, turn chops and re-cover with onions and peppers, and continue cookin for an additional 15 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 145 °F., Garnish with fresh parsley.

name: Baked Tofu
ingredients: 2 tablespoons soy sauce, reduced sodium, 1 clove arlic (minced, or 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder), 1 teaspoon fresh iner (minced, optional), 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1 packae tofu (firm or extra firm, water packed, 14 ounces, drained)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F. Line a rimmed baking sheet with foil., Drain water from tofu. Wrap tofu in paper towels. Let set for about 5 minutes., While tofu is drainin, combine soy sauce, arlic, iner, and vegetable oil in a small bowl., Slice tofu into 1/2 inch thick slices. Place tofu slices on foil lined baking sheet., Pour soy sauce mixture over tofu. Usin a spatula or pancake turner, ently turn slices over to coat both sides with sauce., Bake tofu for 15 minutes. Turn slices over and bake for another 15 minutes. Tofu should be liht olden brown and firm., Serve hot in place of meat or cut into slices or cubes and add to a stir-fry, fried rice, soup, or salad.

name: Baked Trout
ingredients: 2 pounds trout fillets (or other fish, cut into six pieces), 3 tablespoons lime juice (or about 2 limes), 1 tomato (medium, chopped), 1/2 onion (medium, chopped), 3 tablespoons cilantro (chopped), 1/2 teaspoon olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon red pepper (optional* - used in analysis)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Rinse fish and pat dry. Place in baking dish., In a separate dish, mix remainin inredients toether and pour over fish., Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until fork-tender.

name: Barley Jambalaya
ingredients: 1 cup instant pearl barley, 4 cups water, 2 whole bay leaves, 3 medium onions, 2 small celery stalks, 1 cup diced reen, red, yellow, or orange bell pepper, 2 medium cloves arlic, 1 tablespoon canola oil, 4 ounces round turkey, 2 (14.5-oz) cans diced tomato (no salt added), 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon round cayenne pepper, 1 1/2 teaspoons dried oreano, 1 teaspoon round black pepper
directions: In a colander, rinse barley under cold water., In a medium pot over hih heat, brin barley, water, and bay leaves to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cover. Cook barley until tender and water is absorbed, about 20-30 minutes., In a colander, drain barley. Set aside.

name: Basic Quiche
ingredients: 1 pie crust (baked, 9-inch), 1 cup vegetables (chopped, broccoli, zucchini, or mushrooms), 1/2 cup cheese (shredded), 3 es (beaten), 1 cup milk (non-fat), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 °F., Shred the cheese with a rater. Put it in a small bowl for now., Chop the vegetables until you have 1 cup of chopped vegetables., Cook the vegetables until they are cooked, but still crisp., Put the cooked vegetables and shredded cheese into a pie shell., Mix the es, milk, salt, pepper, and arlic powder in a bowl., Pour the e mix over the cheese and vegetables, Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean., Let the quiche cool for 5 minutes before servin.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
ingredients: 6 Enlish muffins, 3/4 cup barbecue sauce, 1 1/2 cups chicken (cooked, cut-up), 3/4 cup cheddar cheese (shredded, smoked or reular), 1 bell pepper (chopped)
directions: Wash hands and any cookin surface., Heat oven to 450 °F., Slice Enlish muffins in half and place on unreased, lare cookie sheet., Cut up bell pepper., Spread barbecue sauce on Enlish muffins to within ¼ inch of edes. Top with chicken, cheese and bell pepper., Bake 7 to 12 minutes or until cheese is melted.

name: Bean and Rice Burritos
ingredients: 2 cups rice (cooked), 1 onion (small, chopped), 2 cups kidney beans (cooked, or one 15 ounce can, drained), 8 flour tortillas (10 inch), 1/2 cup salsa, 1/2 cup cheese (shredded)
directions: Preheat the oven to 300 °F., Peel the onion, and chop it into small pieces., Drain the liquid from the cooked (or canned) kidney beans., Mix the rice, chopped onion, and beans in a bowl., Put each tortilla on a flat surface., Put 1/2 cup of the rice and bean mix in the middle of each tortilla., Fold the sides of the tortilla to hold the rice and beans., Put each filled tortilla (burrito) in the baking pan., Bake for 15 minutes., While the burritos are baking, rate 1/2 cup cheese., Pour the salsa over the baked burritos. Add cheese., Serve the burritos warm.

name: Bean Enchiladas
ingredients: 4 cups pinto beans (cooked, or 2-15 ounce low sodium cans), 1/2 cup Monterey Jack cheese (reduced-fat), 1 tablespoon chili powder, 8 flour tortillas (6 inch), salsa (optional)
directions: Place beans in a lare bowl and mash coarsely with a fork or potato masher; stir in chili powder., Wrap tortillas in a damp paper towel. Microwave on hih for 45 seconds, or until tortillas are soft and warm., Divide bean mixture amon tortillas and spread down center of tortilla. Sprinkle cheese on bean mixture., Roll tortillas to enclose mixture., Spray a 9x13 inch baking dish with nonstick cookin spray, Place enchiladas, seam side down, into baking dish., Cover with foil and bake at 350 °F for 20 minutes or until heated throuh., Serve warm with salsa.

name: Beef & Noodles
ingredients: 3/4 pound round beef (85% lean), 1 1/2 cups water (can take up to 2 cups water), 2 cups e noodles, uncooked (or any shaped pasta), 2 servings of Eatin Smart Seasonin Mix (1/2 cup), salt (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Brown 3/4 pound round beef in a lare skillet, drain the fat., Add water, e noodles or pasta, and seasonin mix. Stir., Brin to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer covered for 15-20 minutes or until noodles are tender., Taste; then add a small amount of salt, if needed., Refrierate leftovers.

name: Beef & Potatoes
ingredients: 1 pound round beef (90% lean), 1 1/3 cups water, 7 medium potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced, 3 servings Eatin Smart Seasonin Mix (3/4 cup), salt (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Wash and peel the potatoes., Collect, slice, and measure all inredients before startin to prepare the recipe.  , Brown round beef in a lare skillet. Drain the fat., Add water, potatoes, and seasonin mix. Stir to combine with the beef. , Brin to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-30 minutes or until potatoes are tender., Uncover and cook until excess water is evaporated., Taste; then add a small amount of salt, if needed., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

name: Beef and Bean Chile Verde
ingredients: 2/3 pound round beef (90% lean), 1 bell pepper, lare (chopped), 1 onion, lare (chopped), 6 arlic cloves (chopped), 1 tablespoon chili powder, 2 teaspoons round cumin, 1 can diced tomatoes, low-sodium (14.5 ounces), 1 3/4 cups reen salsa (or enchilada sauce, 1-16 ounce jar), 1 can pinto or kidney beans (rinsed and drained, 15 ounces)
directions: Place meat, bell pepper, tomatoes, and onion in lare sauce pan. Heat on medium 8-10 minutes, stirrin frequently until the meat is browned; drain fat., Add arlic, chili powder and cumin; cook until frarant (15 seconds)., Stir in salsa and brin to a boil., Reduce heat and simmer; cover and cook 10-15 minutes, stirrin occasionally., Add beans and cook until heated.

name: Beef and Cabbae for Dinner Toniht
ingredients: 1 reen cabbae head (washed and cut into bite-sized pieces), 1 onion, medium (chopped), 1 pound round beef, lean (90% lean), 2 sprays of non-stick cookin spray, 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, salt (to taste, optional), red pepper flakes (to taste, optional)
directions: Chop cabbae and onions, set aside., In a lare skillet, cook the round beef on medium heat until browned. Drain the fat. Set beef aside., Spray skillet with non-stick cookin spray. Cook onions on medium heat until soft., Add cabbae to the onions and cook until cabbae starts to brown., Stir the beef into the cabbae and onion mixture., Season with arlic powder, salt (optional), and pepper. Add red pepper flakes (optional) to the cabbae if you like it spicy.

name: Beef and vegetables
ingredients: 4 cups water, 2 cups rice, uncooked, 1 pound round beef (or 1 can, about 24 ounces, canned beef), 2 cups steamed reen beans (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium reen beans), 1 1/2 cups fresh cooked corn kernels (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium corn), 1 can low-sodium tomato sauce (about 15 ounces), 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder
directions: In a lare pot, add water to rice and brin to a boil. Cover and cook on low heat for 15 minutes (do not remove the lid) until water is one., While the rice is cookin, put round beef in a lare pan and cook over medium heat on the stove for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain fat., Let rice stand for about 3 minutes. Arrane rice on a platter like a douhnut rin. Set aside., Add reen beans, corn, tomato sauce, arlic powder, and onion powder to pan with meat., Cook until steamin hot. Pour into center of rice rin and serve.

name: Beef Pot Roast
ingredients: 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 2 tablespoons water, 2 1/2 pounds beef chuck roast (boneless), 2 cups water (hot), 1 beef bouillon (cube), 1/16 cup orange juice (1 tablespoon), 1/4 teaspoon allspice, 1/8 teaspoon pepper
directions: In a small bowl, put the bouillon cube in 2 cups hot water. Stir it until the bouillon cube dissolves. This will make 2 cups of beef broth., In a medium bowl, stir toether the broth, orange juice, allspice, and pepper., Peel and chop the onion, to make 1/2 cup chopped onion., Put 2 tablespoons water in the skillet. Heat on medium., Put the onion in the skillet. Simmer it until tender., Add the roast to the skillet. Brown it on all sides., Pour the broth mix over the meat in the skillet., Cover and simmer for 2 hours.

name: Beef Pozole Soup
ingredients: 32 ounces lean beef (2 pounds, cubed), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 onion (lare), 1 arlic clove (finely chopped), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 1/4 cup cilantro, 1 can stewed tomatoes (15 ounces, low sodium), 2 ounces tomato paste, 1 can hominy (1 lb. 13 ounce can)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare pot, heat oil. Brown beef cubes., Add onion, arlic, salt, pepper, cilantro, and enouh water to cover the meat., Cover pot and cook over low heat until meat is tender., Add tomatoes and tomato paste. Continue cookin for about 20 minutes., Add hominy and continue cookin another 15 minutes, stirrin occasionally, over low heat. If too thick, add water for desired consistency.

name: Beef Stroanoff
ingredients: 1 pound beef (lean, top round), 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 3/4 tablespoon onion (finely chopped), 1 pound mushrooms (sliced), 1/4 teaspoon salt, black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon nutme, 1/2 teaspoon basil (dried), 1/4 cup white wine, 1 cup yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 6 cups macaroni (cooked in unsalted water)
directions: Cut beef into 1-inch cubes. Heat 1 teaspoon oil in non-stick skillet. Sauté onion for 2 minutes., Add beef and sauté for additional 5 minutes. Turn to brown evenly. Remove from pan and keep hot., Add remainin oil to pan; sauté mushrooms., Add beef and onions to pan with seasonins., Add wine and yoghurt; ently stir in. Heat, but do not boil., Serve with macaroni.

name: Beefy Macaroni and Cheese
ingredients: 3/4 pound round beef (90% lean), 1 1/2 cups water, 1 cup macaroni, uncooked, 1 can diced tomatoes, canned, undrained (14.5 ounces), 2 servings Eatin Smart Seasonin Mix (1/2 cup), 1/2 cup shredded cheese, salt (optional, to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Brown round beef in a lare skillet; drain the fat., Add water, macaroni, tomatoes, and seasonin mix; stir., Brin to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 15-20 minutes or until macaroni is tender., Remove from heat and add 1/2 cup rated cheese., Taste; then add a small amount of salt if needed., Refrierate leftovers.

name: Bell Pepper Nachos
ingredients: 4 bell peppers, 1 cup salsa, 2 teaspoons seasonin (try a mixture-chili powder, arlic powder, round cumin, pepper), 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded or chopped (or beans or tofu -- or try a combination), 3/4 cup cheddar cheese, shredded
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F., Wash bell peppers, remove seeds and cut into bite-sized pieces. Arrane pieces close toether in a sinle layer on a lare foil-lined baking sheet., In a medium bowl, combine salsa, seasonins and meat, beans or tofu. Spoon the mixture evenly over pepper pieces. Top with cheese., Bake for 15 minutes, or until peppers are heated throuh and cheese is melted. Serve warm.

name: Black Bean and Rice Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 1/2 cup bell pepper (reen or red, chopped), 1 cup brown rice (or white rice, cooked and cooled), 1 can black beans (15 ounce, drained and rinsed), 1/4 cup rice vinear (or white wine vinear or lemon juice), 1/2 teaspoon mustard powder (optional), 1 clove arlic (chopped, or 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a mixin bowl, stir toether onion, red or reen pepper, rice, and beans., In a jar with a tiht fittin lid, add vinear, dry mustard, arlic, salt, pepper and vegetable oil. Shake until dressin is evenly mixed., Pour dressin over bean mixture and stir to mix evenly. Chill for at least one hour. Serve cold as a side dish or main dish.

name: Black Bean and Sweet Potato Quesadillas
ingredients: nonstick cookin spray, 1 medium sweet potato (cooked and cut into pieces), 1 cup black beans, canned (low-sodium), 1 small onion, 1 clove arlic, 1 1/2 teaspoons round cumin, 1 1/2 teaspoons paprika, 1/2 lare chili pepper, 2 tablespoons sour cream, low-fat OR reduced fat plain yoghurt, 8 whole wheat tortillas, 1/4 cup cheddar cheese, reduced-fat, 1/2 cup baby spinach
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Sauté onion and arlic (usin nonstick cookin spray) in a medium size pan until soft., Add sweet potatoes, black beans, spices, and jalapeno., Heat until just warm., Spread potato mixture over tortilla, then top with baby spinach, cheese, and onion., Top with second tortilla., Heat a pan on hih heat and spray with nonstick cookin spray., Brown quesadilla about one minute on each side until the inside is warm and the cheese is melted.

name: Black Bean Burers
ingredients: 1 can (15.5 oz) low-sodium black beans (drained and rinsed with cold water), 1 lare e, 1/2 cup cooked brown rice, 2 scallions (reen and white minced about 1/4 cup), 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro (or basil leaves or a combination), 1 clove arlic (peeled and minced), 1/4 teaspoon dried oreano or basil, 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 4 whole-wheat buns
directions: Add beans to a bowl and mash with a fork until chunky. Add the e and mix well., Add precooked rice, scallions, arlic and oreano, salt and pepper and mix until well combined., Divide the mixture into 4 portions and form each portion into a patty about 3/4 to 1 inch thick., Place a lare skillet on the stove on hih heat. When the skillet is hot, add oil. Add burers and cook 4 to 5 minutes per side until browned on both sides and heated throuhout. Place on a whole wheat bun.

name: Black Bean Quesadillas
ingredients: 3/4 cup chunky salsa (or pico de allo), 1 can (15.5 oz) low-sodium black beans (drained and rinsed), 2 cups shredded reduced-fat Colby & Monterey Jack cheese, 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro (finely chopped), 4 8 inch flour tortillas, 1/2 teaspoon extra virin olive oil
directions: Usin a small-hole strainer, drain liquid from salsa; discard liquid., Transfer leftover tomato mixture to a medium bowl., Mix in black beans, cheese, and cilantro until combined., Divide black bean mixture evenly over half of each tortilla (about 1/2 cup each)., Fold tortillas in half., Heat lare riddle or skillet over medium-hih heat., Brush with oil., Place filled tortillas on a riddle., Cook, carefully flippin once, until tortillas are old brown and crisp and cheese fillin melts, about 5 minutes., Cut quesadillas into wedes.

name: Black Bean Soup
ingredients: 1 cup onion (chopped), 3/4 cup celery (chopped), 2 teaspoons arlic (chopped), 1 1/2 cups beef broth (fat removed, reduced sodium), 2 cans black beans, low-sodium (15 ounce each, drained and rinsed), 1/2 cup salsa (thick and chunky), 1 1/2 teaspoons cumin, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon oreano (dried)
directions: Combine all inredients in a saucepan., Cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

name: Black Beans
ingredients: 2 cans (15.5 oz) black beans (drained), 1/2 onion (medium), 2 arlic cloves, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 teaspoon cumin (round), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon oreano (fresh or dried)
directions: Carefully drain the juice from one can of black beans. Pour the drained black beans into a bowl. Use a potato masher to mash the beans until they are no loner whole. Set the mashed beans aside., Chop the onion in to 1/4-inch pieces. Set it aside. Peel the arlic cloves and mince them finely. Set the arlic aside., In a medium saucepan, heat the oil over medium hih heat. Add the onions and sauté for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the arlic and cumin and cook for 30 seconds more. Stir in the mashed black beans and the second can of black beans, includin the juice. When the beans bein to boil, reduce the heat to low, stir in the salt and oreano and simmer for 10 minutes, uncovered.

name: Black Skillet Beef with Greens and Red Potatoes
