ingredients: 1 pound beef (top round), 1 tablespoon paprika, 1 1/2 teaspoons oreano, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/8 teaspoon crushed red pepper, 1/8 teaspoon mustard (dry), 8 potatoes (red-skinned, halved), 3 cups onions (finey chopped), 2 cups beef broth (reduced sodium), 2 arlic cloves (lare, minced), 2 carrots (lare, peeled, cut into very thin 2 1/2 inch strips), 4 cups kale (1 bunch), non-stick cookin spray
directions: Partially freeze beef. Thinly slice across the rain into lon strips 1/8 inch thick and 3 inches wide., Combine paprika, oreano, chili powder, arlic powder, black pepper, red pepper, and dry mustard. Coat strips of meat with the spice mixture., Spray a lare heavy skillet nonstick cookin spray. Preheat pan over hih heat., Add meat; cook, stirrin for 5 minutes., Add potatoes, onion, broth, and arlic. Cook covered, over medium heat for 20 minutes., Stir in carrots, lay reens over top and cook, covered, until carrots are tender, about 15 minutes., Serve in lare serving bowl, with crusty bread for dunkin.

name: Bra About It Bread Bake
ingredients: 6 slices bread (cubed, approximately 6 cups), 1 1/2 cups broccoli (frozen, chopped and cooked), 1 cup cheddar cheese, low-fat shredded, 1 tablespoon onion minced, optional (used in analysis), 1 cup chicken, skinless (diced, cooked), 3 es, 4 e whites, 2 cups milk, non-fat
directions: Place half the bread in a well reased 9x9 inch pan., Top with broccoli, cheese, onion, and meat., Place remainin bread on top., In a bowl, mix es and milk., Pour e mixture over bread in pan., Cover. Refrierate overnight or at least 1 hour., Bake uncovered at 325 °F for 1 to 1 1/4 hours, or until center is firm and lihtly browned.

name: Braised Chicken Thihs with Spinach
ingredients: 4 6-ounce bone in chicken thihs (skin removed), 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 small yellow onion (peeled and chopped), 3 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary, 1 cup water, 1 packae 10-ounce frozen spinach (or 1 bunch fresh spinach)
directions: Heat skillet over medium-hih heat. Add 1 teaspoon oil. Add chicken, top side down. Cook about 8 minutes on each side, or until deeply browned. Remove the chicken to a dinner plate and set aside., Reheat skillet over medium heat. Add the onion, arlic, thyme, and rosemary. Cook about 5 minutes, until the onion is soft and olden. Return the chicken to the pan., Add the water, and cover. Continue cookin for about 30 minutes., Add frozen spinach and cook for about 10 minutes. Or, add the fresh spinach and cook about 2 minutes, until it wilts. Serve riht away.

name: Brazilian Rice
ingredients: nonstick vegetable spray, 1 3/16 packaes spinach (10 ounce, frozen, thawed), 1 cup brown rice (cooked), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 cup e-white substitute (liquid), 3/4 cup mozzarella cheese, fat-free (shredded), 1 cup milk (fat-free), 1/2 onion (medium, chopped), 1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 teaspoon marjoram (dried), 1/4 teaspoon thyme (dried), 1/4 teaspoon rosemary (dried)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Spray a 2-quart baking dish with vegetable oil spray., Place thawed spinach in a colander and press to remove excess water., Place the spinach in a lare mixin bowl and add remainin inredients. Mix until combined., Transfer the mixture to the baking dish and place in the preheated oven. Bake for 30 minutes., Cut the casserole into eiht squares and serve.

name: Breakfast Burrito with Salsa
ingredients: 4 es (lare), 1/8 cup corn (frozen), 1 tablespoon milk (1%), 2 cups reen pepper (2 Tablespoons, diced), 1/4 cup onion (minced), 1/16 cup tomatoes, fresh (1 Tablespoon, diced), 1 teaspoon mustard, 1/4 teaspoon arlic (ranulated), hot pepper sauce (optional), 4 flour tortillas (8 inch), 1/4 cup salsa (canned)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., In a lare mixin bowl, blend the es, corn, milk, reen peppers, onions, tomatoes, mustard, arlic, hot pepper sauce, and salt for 1 minute until es are smooth., Pour e mixture into a lihtly oiled 9x9x2 inch baking dish and cover with foil., Bake for 20-25 minutes until es are set and thorouhly cooked., Wrap tortillas in plastic and microwave for 20 seconds until warm. Be careful when unwrappin the tortillas -- the steam can be hot., Cut baked e mixture into 4 equal pieces and roll 1 piece of cooked e in each tortilla., Serve each burrito topped with 2 tablespoons of salsa.

name: Broccoli Alfredo
ingredients: 4 cups broccoli, cooked, 4 cups whole wheat pasta, cooked, 2 cups milk, 1% (or non-fat), 1 cup Parmesan cheese (reduced fat), 1 teaspoon basil, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Heat milk over medium heat and then add basil and arlic powder. When hot, add Parmesan cheese., Mix cornstarch with 2 or 3 tablespoons of milk and add to hot mixture. Heat until thickened., Pour mixture over pasta and broccoli. Serve.

name: Broccoli Omelet
ingredients: 3 cups broccoli florets, 1 lare red bell pepper (cut into strips), 16 button mushrooms (sliced), cookin spray, 4 es, 8 e whites (from 8 es), 1/4 cup milk (fat-free), 1/2 cup ricotta cheese, 2 tablespoons rated Parmesan cheese, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper
directions: Cut vegetables as directed., Whisk es and milk in a medium mixin bowl., Spray 10-inch non-stick skillet with cookin spray; heat., Add broccoli, peppers, and mushrooms; sauté about 3-5 minutes, then remove from pan.

name: Broccoli Rice Casserole
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups rice, 3 1/2 cups water, 1 onion (medium, chopped), 1 can cream of mushroom, or chicken, or celery or cheese soup (10.75 ounce, condensed, reduced sodium), 1 1/2 cups milk (1%), 7 1/2 cups broccoli or cauliflower or mixed vegetables (frozen, chopped), 1/2 pound cheese (rated or sliced), 3 tablespoons mararine (or butter)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F and rease a 12x9x2 inch baking pan., In a saucepan, mix rice, salt, and 3 cups of water and brin to a boil., Cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat and set aside for additional 15 minutes., Sauté onions in mararine (or butter) until tender., Mix soup, milk, 1/2 cup of water, onions, and rice. Spoon mixture into baking pan., Thaw and drain the vegetables and then spread over the rice mixture., Spread the cheese evenly over the top and bake at 350 °F for 25 to 30 minutes until cheese is melted and rice is bubbly.

name: Bronco Beans
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 yellow onions (peeled and chopped), 1 bell pepper (cored, seeded, and chopped), 2 jalapeno peppers (chopped), 4 cloves arlic (peeled and chopped), 1 tablespoon dried oreano, 1 tablespoon dried thyme, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 4 cans (15.5 ounce) assorted low-sodium beans, includin black, kidney, white, and chickpeas (drained and rinsed with cold water), 2 cans (14.5 ounce) low-sodium diced tomatoes (includin the liquid), 1 1/2 cups water
directions: Put the pot over medium heat and when it is hot, add the oil., Add the onions, arlic, bell pepper, jalapenos, oreano, thyme and chili powder and cook until tender, about 15 minutes., Add the drained beans, tomatoes and 1 1/2 cups water and raise the heat to hih and brin to a boil. Lower the heat to low and let cook, partially covered, for 1 1/2 hours. If the mixture ets too thick, add the remainin 1/2 cup water., Serve immediately or transfer to a container once cooled. Cover and refrierate up to 2 days., Garnish with cilantro and/or low-fat plain yoghurt.

name: Brown Rice Pilaf with Sae, Walnuts, and Dried Fruit
ingredients: canola cookin spray (as needed), 1 onion (medium, chopped), 1 celery stalks (small, ends trimmed and chopped), 2 cups rice (brown, uncooked), 2 1/2 cups water, 2 cups vegetable broth (fat-free, reduced sodium), 1/4 cup raisins (dark), 1/4 cup apricots (dried, chopped), 4 walnuts (1/4 cup, chopped, optional), 1 teaspoon sae (dried), 2 teaspoons sae (fresh, chopped), salt (to taste, optional), pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Spray the lare skillet with canola cookin spray. Heat skillet over medium heat., Sauté onion and celery until tender, about 5 minutes. Add brown rice and sauté for 5 minutes., Add water, broth, raisins, and apricots; heat to boilin. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 50 minutes., Stir in walnuts if desired, sae, salt and pepper., Transfer to serving dish. Garnish with fresh sae and serve immediately.

name: Brown Rice with Sizzlin Chicken and vegetables
ingredients: 3 cups hot cooked brown rice, 3 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce, 1/4 cup water, 1 tablespoon honey, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1 1/2 tablespoons canola or corn oil, 16 ounces boneless chicken breast (cut into 1-inch cubes), 2 cloves arlic (minced), 1 small white onion, cut into small wedes (about 1/8 inch thick), 3 medium carrots, peeled and thinly sliced (1 cup total), 1 1/2 cups small broccoli florets, 1 medium red bell pepper (cut into 1 -inch pieces)
directions: Mix soy sauce, water, honey, and cornstarch in a small bowl; set aside., Heat oil in a wok or lare skillet. Add minced arlic; sauté about 1 minutes until arlic is olden., Add chicken; cook about 5-6 minutes, then push chicken to the side., Add onions to center of skillet; cook until slihtly tender and push to the side., Continue with carrots, broccoli, and peppers separately, placin each in center of pan, cookin until slihtly tender and pushin to the side., Pour soy sauce mixture into center of skillet. Leavin other inredients and at the sides of the pan, stir sauce until it thickens., Mix in with vegetables and chicken. Serve immediately over cooked brown rice.

name: Butternut Squash with Black Beans
ingredients: 2 3/4 cups butternut squash, cubed (1 small squash, about 1 pound), 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1 onion (small, chopped), 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/4 cup red wine vinear, 1/4 cup water, 2 cans black beans (16 ounces each, rinsed and drained), 1/2 teaspoon oreano
directions: Heat the squash in the microwave on hih heat for 1 to 2 minutes. This will soften the skin., Carefully peel the squash with a vegetable peeler or small knife., Cut the squash into 1/2 inch cubes., Peel and chop the onion., In a lare pan, heat the oil. Add the onion, arlic powder, and squash., Cook for 5 minutes on medium heat., Add vinear and water. Cook on low heat until the squash is tender, about 10 minutes., Add the beans and oreano. Cook until the beans are heated throuh.

name: Cabbae Roll Casserole
ingredients: 1/2 pound round beef (90% lean), 1 onion (chopped), 1 arlic clove (minced), 1 can (16 ounces) diced tomatoes, low-sodium, 1 1/2 cups tomato sauce (or tomato juice), 1 1/2 cups water, 1/4 cup minute rice (brown), 1 cabbae head (small to medium, chopped in bite-sized pieces)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Brown round beef in a skillet with onion and arlic. Drain off any fat., Place meat in a lare pot and add water, tomatoes, tomato sauce (or juice), and cabbae. Cook until cabbae is almost tender., Add minute rice and cook five minutes loner. Serve.

name: Cajun Catfish
ingredients: Cookin spray, 1/4 cup cornmeal (about 4 tablespoons), 1/2 tablespoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon oreano, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 3/4 teaspoon lemon pepper seasonin, no salt added, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1 pound catfish fillets, frozen, thawed, drained
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Spray a baking sheet with cookin spray., Combine cornmeal and spices in a shallow dish., Dip each fillet in the cornmeal mixture. Coat evenly., Place fillets on a baking sheet., Bake 20–25 minutes flippin catfish halfway throuh. Catfish should reach a final internal cook temperature of 145 F as measured with a food thermometer before servin.

name: Caribbean Casserole
ingredients: 1 onion (medium, chopped), 1/2 reen pepper (diced), 1 tablespoon canola oil, 1 can (14.5 ounces) stewed tomatoes, low-sodium, 1 can black beans or beans of your choice (16 ounces), 1 teaspoon oreano leaves, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 1/2 cups brown rice (instant, uncooked)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Sauté onion and reen pepper in canola oil, in a lare pan, until tender. Do not brown., Add tomatoes, beans (include liquid from both), oreano, and arlic powder. Brin to a boil., Stir in rice and cover., Reduce heat to simmer for 5 minutes., Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes.

name: Caribbean Pink Beans
ingredients: 1 pound pinto beans (dry), 10 cups water, 2 plantains (medium, finely chopped), 1 tomato (lare, finely chopped), 1 red pepper (small, finely chopped), 1 white onion (medium, finely chopped), 3 arlic clove (finely chopped), 1 1/2 teaspoons salt
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Rinse and pick throuh the beans. Put the beans in a lare pot and add 10 cups of water. Place the pot in the refrierator and allow the beans to soak overnight., Cook the beans until they are soft. Add more water as needed while the beans are cookin., Add the plantains, tomato, pepper, onion, arlic, and salt. Continue cookin at low heat until the plantains are soft.

name: Carrots with Tomatoes and Macaroni
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 onion (small, chopped), 4 plum tomatoes (chopped, from a can), 1/2 cup tomato juice (from a can), 6 carrots (lare, peeled and sliced), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon suar, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley (chopped, or 1 teaspoon dried), 1 teaspoon butter, 1 cup elbow macaroni, cooked
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a saucepan, cook the onion in the oil until soft but not brown. Add the tomatoes, carrots, salt, pepper, and suar., Cover and cook over low heat for 5 minutes. Remove the cover and cook over low heat, stirrin often, for another 5 minutes, or until the carrots are tender and the tomatoes are cooked down to a sauce., Stir in the parsley. Mix the butter with the cooked elbows. Stir in the carrot mixture and serve.

name: Catfish Stew and Rice
ingredients: 2 potatoes (medium), 1 can (14.5 oz) tomatoes*, cut up, 1 cup onion (chopped), 1 cup clam juice (8 oz bottle, or water), 1 cup water, 2 arlic cloves (minced), 1/2 head of cabbae (coarsely chopped), 1 pound catfish fillets, reen onion (sliced, as needed), 1 1/2 tablespoons Chili and Spice Seasonin, 2 cups rice, white (or brown, cooked)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel potatoes and cut into quarters., In lare pot, combine potatoes, tomatoes and their juice, onion, clam juice, water, and arlic. Brin to boil and reduce heat. Cook covered over medium-low heat for 10 minutes., Add cabbae and return to boil. Reduce heat. Cook covered over medium-low heat for 5 minutes, stirrin occasionally., Meanwhile, cut fillets into 2-inch lenths. Coat with Chili and Spice Seasonin., Add fish to vegetables. Reduce heat and simmer covered for 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork., Serve in soup plates. Garnish with sliced reen onion, if desired. Serve with scoop of hot cooked rice.

name: Cauliflower Shells with Cheese
ingredients: 1 pound whole wheat pasta shells, 8 cups water, 2 cups cauliflower (chopped), 1 1/2 cups milk, non-fat, 1 teaspoon arlic salt, 1/4 cup flour, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup cheese, low-fat
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Fill 1 pot with 6 cups of water and brin to a boil. Once the water is boilin, add pasta and cook for 8 minutes., Drain pasta and fill the same pot with 2 cups of water, brin to a boil., Place the chopped cauliflower in the boilin water and cook until the florets are soft (about 4 minutes). Drain cauliflower., Placed the cooked cauliflower, 1/2 cup milk, and arlic salt in a blender and blend until smooth., In a separate pot, heat oil. Add the flour and whisk until the mixture is smooth. Add 1 cup of milk and cook the mixture until it bubbles and thickens. Add the cheese and cauliflower and mix., Once the mixture is complete, remove from heat. Add the pasta back into the sauce and serve.

name: Cheese-A-Roni Bake
ingredients: 1 jar (24 oz) spahetti sauce, meatless, low-sodium, 1/3 cup water, 6 ounces cottae cheese, fat-free, 1 e, slihtly beaten, 1/2 teaspoon oreano, 1 cup macaroni, dry, 4 ounces mozzarella cheese (part skim, shredded)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a bowl combine sauce and water., In another bowl combine cottae cheese, e and oreano., Grease 1 quart casserole., Spoon in 1/3 sauce., Top with 1 cup macaroni, 1/2 cottae cheese, 1/2 mozzarella cheese and 1/3 of the spahetti sauce., Repeat layers., Cover with aluminum foil., Bake in a 350 °F oven for 45 minutes., Uncover and bake 15 minutes loner.

name: Cheesy Chicken, Broccoli, and Rice Bake
ingredients: 5 cups water, 2 1/2 cups rice, 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 1 arlic clove (chopped), 1 cup milk (skim), 1 can (10.75 oz) cream of mushroom soup (condensed, 98% fat-free), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 3/4 cup cheddar cheese, low-fat (rated), 2 cups chicken (shredded, cooked), 2 cups broccoli (pieces)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F. In lare saucepan, brin water to boil. Add rice, onion, and arlic. Cook for about 20 minutes or until rice is soft., While rice is cookin combine milk, soup, salt, and pepper, mix well. When rice is done combine with milk mixture, chicken, and broccoli. Mix well., Grease 9x13 pan and pour mixture into pan. Bake in preheated oven for 18 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for another 6 minutes or until cheese is melted., Serve immediately.

name: Cheesy Swiss Steak
ingredients: 2 pounds beef round roast (1-inch thick), 1/4 cup flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 carrots (chopped), 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 can (8 oz) tomato sauce, 1/2 cup American cheese, shredded
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cut the beef roast into 4 pieces., In a small bowl, mix the flour and salt., Dip each piece of meat into the mix of flour and salt. Coat it on all sides with the mix., Put the meat in the crock pot., Add the chopped carrots and onion., Add the Worcestershire sauce and tomato sauce., Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours, OR on hih for 4-5 hours., Just before servin, sprinkle the cheese on top.

name: Chicken and Beans
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) kidney beans, 1 clove arlic, 1 onion (medium), 5 chicken thihs (5-6 medium thihs), 1 can (8 oz) tomato sauce, 1/4 cup vinear, 1 teaspoon suar, salt and pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain and rinse beans., Crush arlic., Dice onion., Dice chicken thihs., In lare, pot, cook chicken until half done., Add tomato sauce, vinear, onion, arlic, suar, salt, and pepper., Simmer for about 30 to 40 minutes or until chicken is tender., Add kidney beans and simmer for 5-10 more minutes.

name: Chicken and Broccoli Bake
ingredients: 1 cup rice, uncooked, 1 packae (10 oz) broccoli, frozen, 3 cups chicken, cooked, 2 tablespoons mararine (or butter), 1/4 cup flour, 2 cups chicken broth, Parmesan cheese (1/4 cup, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook rice in 2 cups of water., Let broccoli thaw., Chicken should be off the bone., Melt mararine in lare sauce pan. Add flour to melted mararine and stir. This will be lumpy., Use broth from chicken you cooked or use canned chicken broth. Slowly add broth to mararine/flour. Stir to remove lumps and thicken., Add cheese and stir., Add rice, broccoli, and chicken. Stir., Put in a casserole pan and bake at 350 °F for 30 minutes or until thorouhly heated.

name: Chicken and Cranberry Salad
ingredients: 12 ounces chicken, cooked and diced (1 1/2 cups), 1/2 cup vinairette dressin, 1 cup dried cranberries (or cherries), 1/8 cup almonds (sliced), 1 head of lettuce (chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Toss chicken, cranberries, and almonds with dressin., Serve on a mound of chopped lettuce.

name: Chicken and Dumpling Soup
ingredients: For the Soup:,2 tablespoons vegetable oil,2 cups carrots, chopped,1 cup onion, chopped,1 cup celery, chopped, including some leaves,8 cups chicken broth, fat free, reduced sodium,2 cups cooked chicken breast, shredded,1/2 teaspoon black peppercorns,1 teaspoon dried thyme,2 bay leaves,2 cups fresh spinach leaves, coarsely chopped,For the Dumplings:,1 cup whole wheat flour,1 cup all-purpose flour,3/4 cup skim milk,1 egg, large
directions: Heat oil in Dutch oven or soup kettle over medium-hih heat., Sauté carrot, onion and celery for 5 minutes; stir in broth, chicken, peppercorns, thyme, and bay leaves., Reduce heat to low; simmer, partially covered for 20 minutes., Meanwhile, in small bowl, mix dumplin inredients until well blended., Drop small spoonsful of dumplin douh into simmerin soup., Cover soup and allow dumplins to cook for about 20 minutes (they will rise to the top of the soup as they cook)., Stir in spinach., Remove bay leaves before serving soup.

name: Chicken and Spanish Rice
ingredients: 1 cup onion (chopped), 1/4 cup reen pepper, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 can (8 oz) tomato sauce (low-sodium), 1/3 tablespoon parsley (1 teaspoon, chopped), 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 1/4 teaspoons arlic (minced), 5 cups brown rice (cooked in unsalted water), 3 1/2 cups chicken breast (cooked, skin and bone removed, diced)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare skillet, sauté onions and reen peppers in oil for 5 minutes on medium heat., Add tomato sauce and spices. Heat throuh., Add cooked rice and chicken. Heat throuh.

name: Chicken Broccoli Alfredo
ingredients: 8 ounces fettuccine noodles, 1 cup broccoli, fresh or frozen, 16 ounces chicken breast, boneless, 2 tablespoons butter, 1/8 Basic Soup and Sauce Mix (1/3 cup dry recipe), 1 1/4 cups water, 1/2 cup milk, non-fat, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese (rated), pepper (1/4 teaspoon, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook fettuccine accordin to packae directions. Add broccoli for the last 4 minutes of cookin time. Drain., Heat butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned, stirrin often., Combine sauce mix and water in saucepan. Brin to a boil and cook until thick. Add milk, cheese, pepper, and fettuccine mixture and heat throuh., Serve with additional Parmesan cheese.

name: Chicken Cacciatore
ingredients: 1 onion (chopped), 1 cup canned tomatoes, 1/2 cup tomato sauce, 1/8 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 teaspoon oreano, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 4 chicken pieces, skin removed (thihs, breasts, or les)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel and chop the onion., Put the chopped onion in a saucepan., Add the tomatoes, tomato sauce, arlic powder, oreano, and pepper., Simmer on low heat for 3 minutes., If needed, remove the chicken skin., Add the chicken to the sauce pan and cover., Cook over low heat for about 1 hour until the chicken is tender.

name: Chicken Casserole
ingredients: 1 pound rotini or macaroni pasta (1 packae), 1 can chicken (about 12 ounces), 1 can low-sodium tomato sauce (about 15 ounces), 1/2 can low-sodium reen peas, drained (about 8 ounces), 3 slices pasteurized processed American cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Cook rotini or macaroni accordin to packae directions. Drain well., In a lare oven-safe dish, mix the chicken, tomato sauce, peas, and macaroni., Add the 3 slices of cheese on top of the casserole., Bake for 30 to 40 minutes., Serve hot.

name: Chicken Club Salad
ingredients: 1 cup pasta (uncooked whole wheat, small, such as macaroni or rotelle), 6 cups Romaine lettuce (well washed and torn, or spinach), 2 cups reen peppers, fresh, chopped (or choose a combination of bell peppers, celery, cauliflower florets, cucumber, carrots*), 2 cups tomatoes (chopped), 1 1/2 cups cubed cooked skinless chicken (1/2 pound skinless, boneless chicken), 1/2 cup Italian dressin (lowfat), 1 e (hard cooked, optional), 1/4 cup cheese (shredded, or cheese crumbles)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook pasta accordin to packae directions; drain and cool., Place 1 1/2 cups of the Romaine lettuce in each of 4 lare bowls or plates., Combine chopped vegetables, chicken, and pasta., Add dressin; toss lihtly to coat. Divide evenly amon the 4 bowls., Top each serving with a few e slices, if desired, and 1 tablespoon of the shredded cheese.

name: Chicken Mole
ingredients: 1 chicken (fryer, cut into pieces, skin and fat removed), 5 cups water, 4 tablespoons chili powder, 1 teaspoon oreano, 1 teaspoon cocoa, 10 tablespoons flour, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 cup water, 1 tablespoon peanut butter (creamy), 1/4 cup water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place chicken in a lare pot with the 1/4 cup of water. Cover and simmer until tender, about 45 minutes., In a medium bowl, mix chili powder, oreano, cocoa, flour (1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons), pepper, and arlic powder alon with 1 cup of water., Add mixture from step 2 to chicken in pot; mix well., Add peanut butter and 5 cups of water to chicken in pot; mix well., Brin to a boil., Reduce heat to medium. Cook for 10 to 15 minutes., Stir and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Pasta Salad
ingredients: 2 cups cooked small pasta, 1 1/2 cups canned chicken (drained), 1 cup diced bell pepper, 1/2 cup sliced reen onion, 1 cup shredded yellow squash, 1/2 cup canned corn kernels (drained), 1/2 cup frozen peas, 1 can (15 oz) black beans, low sodium (rinsed and drained), 1/2 cup fat-free Italian dressin
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook pasta accordin to packae directions, drain; rinse., Combine first eiht inredients (pasta throuh black beans) in a lare bowl., Toss ently with salad dressin., Chill for several hours to blend flavors.

name: Chicken Ratatouille
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 chicken breast (medium, halved, skinned, fat removed, boned, and cut into 1-inch pieces), 2 zucchini (7 inches lon, unpeeled and sliced), 1 eplant (small, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes), 1 onion (medium, sliced), 1 bell pepper (red or reen, cut into pieces), 1/2 pound mushroom (fresh, sliced), 1 can tomatoes (14.5 oz, diced), 1 arlic clove (minced), 1 tablespoon basil (fresh, chopped), 1 tablespoon parsley (fresh, minced), black pepper (to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat oil in lare non-stick skillet. Add chicken and sauté about 3 minutes, or until lihtly browned., Add zucchini, eplant, onion, reen pepper, and mushrooms. Cook about 15 minutes, stirrin occasionally., Add tomatoes, arlic, basil, parsley, and pepper; stir and continue cookin about 5 minutes, or until chicken is tender.

name: Chicken Soup with Chiles
ingredients: 3 pounds chicken pieces, skin removed, 2 cups tomatoes (chopped), 1 arlic clove (minced), 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 1/4 cup mild chiles (canned and diced), 2 cups pinto or arbanzo beans, canned, drained or cooked and drained, salt and pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place chicken pieces in a lare saucepan and add enouh water to cover., Cook until tender, about 25 minutes., Remove chicken pieces from the broth., Add tomatoes, arlic, onion, and chiles., Remove chicken meat from the bones and return meat to broth., Add beans and salt and pepper to taste. Simmer for about 15 minutes.

name: Chicken Spahetti
ingredients: vegetable oil spray, 4 ounces spahetti, whole wheat uncooked, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1 red bell pepper, medium (thinly sliced), 1 reen bell pepper, medium (thinly sliced), 1 onion, medium (chopped), 2 cups cooked chicken breast, skinless and diced (cooked without salt, about 8 ounces), 1 can tomatoes, diced undrained (14.5 ounces) (low sodium ), 1 can cream of chicken soup (reduced sodium (10.75 ounces)), 1/2 cup cheddar cheese, reduced fat shredded, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese (shredded or rated), 1/4 teaspoon pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Lihtly spray an 8-inch square baking dish with vegetable oil spray., Prepare the spahetti usin the packae directions, omittin the salt and oil. Drain well in a colander., Meanwhile, in a lare skillet, heat the oil over medium heat, swirlin to coat the bottom. Cook the bell peppers and onion for 4 to 5 minutes, or until tender, stirrin occasionally., Pour into a lare bowl. Stir in the remainin inredients, includin the spahetti. Pour into a baking dish., Bake, covered, for 20 minutes. Bake, uncovered for 10 minutes, or until the mixture is warmed throuh and liht olden brown on top.

name: Chicken Spanish Rice
ingredients: 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 1/2 cup reen pepper (chopped), 1/3 cup celery (sliced), 1/2 cup rice (uncooked), 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1 can tomatoes (14.5 oz), 1 1/2 cups chicken (canned), 3/4 cup water, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/4 teaspoon pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook onion, reen pepper, celery, and rice in vegetable oil at medium heat in a lare saucepan until soft, about 5 minutes., Drain tomatoes and save the liquid., Chop tomatoes into small pieces., Add tomatoes, liquid, chicken, water, chili powder, and pepper to rice mixture., Brin to a boil and stir. Cover and cook on low heat. Cook until rice is tender (about 25 minutes).

name: Chicken Stew
ingredients: 8 chicken pieces (breasts or les), 1 cup water, 2 arlic cloves (small, minced), 1 onion (medium, chopped), 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 3 tomatoes (medium, chopped), 1/3 tablespoon parsley (1 teaspoon, chopped), 1/4 cup celery (finely chopped), 2 potatoes (medium, peeled and chopped), 2 carrots (medium, chopped), 2 bay leaves
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Remove the skin from the chicken and any extra fat. In a lare skillet combine chicken, water, arlic, onion, salt, pepper, tomatoes, and parsley. Tihtly cover and cook over low heat for 25 minutes., Add celery, potatoes, carrots, and bay leaves and continue to cook for 15 minutes or until chicken and vegetables are tender. Remove bay leaves before servin.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 cup carrots, peeled, sliced thinly (or 1/2 can low-sodium carrots, about 8 ounces, drained), 1/2 cup celery, sliced thin, 1/4 cup onion, cut into strips, 1 reen pepper, cut into strips, 1 tablespoon arlic, finely chopped, 1 tablespoon iner, finely chopped (optional), 1 pound chicken, cooked, skin removed, sliced into strips, 1/2 teaspoon suar, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, reduced sodium (optional), 3 cups white rice, cooked (or brown rice)
directions: Heat a lare pan with vegetable oil over hih heat., Add vegetables and arlic to the hot pan. Stir until arlic is slihtly brown. If usin iner, add that too., Add the chicken and suar to the pan. If usin soy sauce, add that too., Stir the food for about 1 minute in the pan., Serve with cooked rice.

name: Chicken Tortilla Casserole
ingredients: 1 can (10.5 oz) cream of mushroom soup, 1 cup milk, 1%, 1 1/2 cups chicken, boneless (cut in pieces), 1 ounce chopped reen chiles, canned (1 can), 1 corn tortillas (cut into strips), 6 cups cheddar cheese, low-fat, shredded
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix mushroom soup, milk, chicken, and reen chile peppers., Pour 1/3 of the soup mixture into the bottom of a 2-quart baking dish that has been coated with oil or cookin spray, Layer half the tortilla strips., Spread 1/3 of the soup mixture on top of the tortillas., Sprinkle on half the cheese., Repeat layers of tortilla strips and soup mix and end with cheese., Baked at 350 °F for 1 hour.

name: Chicken Waldorf Salad
ingredients: 1/3 cup low-fat mayonnaise, 1/3 cup nonfat or low-fat plain yoghurt, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 3 cups cooked chicken breast, chopped, 1 medium red apple, diced, 1 cup red or reen rapes, halved, 1 cup celery, sliced, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts, divided (toasted if desired)
directions: Whisk mayonnaise, yoghurt, lemon juice and salt in a lare bowl., Add chicken, apple, rapes, celery, and half of the walnuts. Stir to coat well., Serve topped with the remainin walnuts.

name: Chicken, Rice, and Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 cup brown or white rice, cooked, 2 teaspoons parsley, dried (or 2 Tablespoons fresh, finely chopped), 1/2 teaspoon black pepper (round), 1/4 clove arlic (finely chopped), 1 tablespoon ranch dressin, fat-free, 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, fat-free, 1 cup apple or cantaloupe (cut into chunks), 1/3 cup rape halves (red or purple, cut into chunks), 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 1 1/4 cups chicken, cooked (cut into bite-size pieces), 6 lettuce leaves
directions: Wash your hands with soap and water., If not usin leftover or "planned over" rice, cook rice accordin to packae directions without addin salt. Chill., In a serving bowl, mix parsley, black pepper, arlic, dressin, and mayonnaise toether., Add cooled rice, apple, rapes, celery, and chicken. Stir ently., Serve cold on a bed of clean lettuce leaves, if desired., Cover and refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Chickpeas and Spinach Sauté
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 yellow onion (peeled and chopped), 1 clove arlic (peeled and minced), 1 celery stalk (chopped), 1 carrot (chopped), 1 can (14.5 oz) low-sodium diced tomatoes (includin liquid), 1 can (16 oz) low-sodium chickpeas (drained and rinsed with cold water), 1/4 cup water, 1 packae (10 oz) frozen spinach (kale can be used instead of spinach), 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice (or red vinear), 1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
directions: Put a skillet on the stove on medium hih heat. When the skillet is hot, add oil., Add onion, arlic, celery and carrot and cook about 15 minutes until the mixture is soft and the onions are lihtly browned., Raise the heat to hih and add the tomatoes, beans (white beans instead of chickpeas) and water and cook for 5 minutes. Lower the heat to low and top the mixture with the spinach (don’t worry about stirrin). Cover and cook until the spinach has thawed and heated throuhout, about 10 minutes. Stir well., Add the lemon juice and red pepper flakes and stir thorouhly., Serve with cooked quinoa or brown rice.

name: Chili Cheese Hominy
ingredients: 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1/2 cup chopped onion (about 1/2 medium), 31 ounces can white or yellow hominy, drained and rinsed, or 2 cans (15.5 ounces each), 2 cans (4 oz each) chopped reen chiles, drained, 1 cup nonfat sour cream, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 3/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat oil in a lare skillet over medium hih heat (350 °F in an electric skillet). Add onion and cook until tender, about 2 to 3 minutes., Stir in hominy, reen chiles, sour cream, chili powder and pepper. Add half of the cheese and mix well., Reduce heat to medium (300 °F in an electric skillet). Cover and cook until heated throuh, about 3 to 5 minutes., Sprinkle remainin cheese on top. Cover and cook until cheese melts, about 5 minutes.

name: Chili Tomato Macaroni
ingredients: 3/4 pound round beef, 85% lean, 1 1/2 cups water, 1 cup macaroni, uncooked, 1 can diced tomatoes, drained (14.5 ounces), 2 teaspoons chili powder, mild, 2 servings Eatin Smart Seasonin Mix (1/2 cup), salt (optional, to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Brown round beef in a lare skillet, drain the fat., Add water, macaroni, tomatoes, chili powder, and seasonin mix. Stir., Brin to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer covered on low heat for 20 minutes or until macaroni is tender., Taste; add a small amount of salt if needed., Refrierate leftovers.

name: Citrus Chicken
ingredients: 4 6-ounce chicken thihs (bone-in), 2 teaspoons dried oreano, 1 teaspoon round cumin, 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice (about 1 lime), 1/2 teaspoon Kosher salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1 orange, sliced (optional, for arnish)
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 °F., To trim the chicken, lay the chicken thihs on the cuttin board, skin side up. Press down on the chicken to push out the excess fat. Use a sharp knife to cut excess fat., Put the chicken, oreano, cumin, lime juice, salt, and pepper in the bowl and mix well. Proceed to the next step or cover and refrierate up to overnight., Put the contents of the bowl in the baking pan and transfer to the oven., Bake about 1 hour until cooked throuhout and well browned., Serve riht away.

name: Citrus Salmon Fillets
ingredients: 1 pound salmon (3-4 fillets), pat dry, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 red onion, chopped, 1 cup baby carrots (or sweet potato), 1/4 cup parsley, chopped, 1 cup orange juice (divided), 1 tablespoon honey, Salt and pepper to taste, 1 orange or lemon, cut into wedes (optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 400 derees F., In an oven safe skillet, heat oil on medium hih heat., Add onion, carrots (or sweet potato), parsley, and ½ cup of orange juice. Cook 5-8 minutes., In a small bowl, mix ½ cup orange juice and honey., In center of skillet, add salmon fillets and season with salt and pepper., Pour orange juice and honey mixture over top., Bake entire skillet in oven 16-18 minutes or until fish is flaky., Garnish with orange or lemon wedes, if usin

name: Citrus Tuna Melt
ingredients: 1 can (about 12 ounces) tuna, drained, 2 tablespoons lime (or lemon) juice, 1/2 cup onion, diced, 1/4 cup tomatoes, diced (or 2 tablespoons, about 2 ounces, low-sodium diced tomatoes, drained), 1/2 cup apple, diced, 1/4 cup celery, diced, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 6 slices whole rain bread (or homemade bread), 1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro, chopped (optional), 1 tablespoon cayenne or jalapeño chilies, diced (optional), 3 slices pasteurized process American cheese, cut into halves, 6 slices tomatoes, 6 leaves lettuce
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., In a medium-sized bowl, combine tuna, lime juice, onion, tomatoes, apple, celery, and pepper. Mix well., Toast the bread., Place 6 slices of toasted bread on a cookie sheet. Put an even amount of tuna mixture on top of each slice. If usin parsley and chilies, add these too., Put 1/2 slice cheese on top of the tuna and bake for about 3 minutes., Add an extra slice of tomato and lettuce on top if you like., Serve hot.

name: Cobb Salad with Pears
ingredients: For the Salad:,2 canned pear halves,6 cups mesclun mix baby greens,1/2 tablespoon Parmesan cheese,1 1/3 cups carrots, grated,3 tablespoons walnuts,For the Dressing:,1/4 cup pear juice,1/4 teaspoon cider vinegar,1/4 teaspoon honey,1/4 teaspoon dijon mustard,1 dash salt and black pepper,1/4 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil
directions: For the dressin, mix pear juice, vinear, honey, mustard, and salt and pepper and olive oil in a blender., Put mixed reens in lare mixin bowl, drizzle dressin over reens and mix toether., Add remainin chopped pear, walnuts, and rated carrots and toss lihtly., Portion out 1 cup of salad and top with 1/2 tablespoon rated Parmesan cheese.

name: Collard Green Gumbo with Ham Hock
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 lare onion (peeled and diced), 3 celery stalks (chopped), 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/2 teaspoon chopped red pepper flakes, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon dried oreano, 2 tablespoons whole wheat flour, 4 cups water, 6 cups chopped collard reens, 2 pounds ham hock, 2 cups cooked brown rice
directions: Put a skillet on the stove and turn the heat to medium. When it is hot, add the oil. Add the onion, bell pepper, celery, arlic, thyme, red pepper flakes, salt, and oreano, and cook until olden, about 20 minutes., Add the flour in small amounts, sprinklin a little bit at a time and stirrin well, until it turns slihtly brown, about 10 minutes., Slowly add the water, stirrin constantly. Add the ham hock. Raise the heat to hih and when it comes to a boil reduce heat to low., Add the collard reens and cook until tender, about 45 minutes., Divide the brown rice between 4 shallow bowls and top each with about 1 cup of umbo.

name: Colorful Quesadillas
ingredients: 8 ounces cream cheese, fat-free, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 8 flour tortillas (6" across), 1 cup sweet red pepper (chopped), 1 cup low-fat cheese (shredded), 2 cups spinach leaves (fresh, or 9 oz. frozen, thawed and squeezed dry)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a small bowl, mix the cream cheese and arlic powder., Spread about 2 tablespoons of the cheese mixture on each tortilla., Sprinkle about 2 tablespoons bell pepper and 2 tablespoons cheese on one half of each tortilla., Add spinach: 1/4 cup if usin fresh leaves OR 2 tablespoons if usin frozen. Fold tortillas in half., Heat a lare skillet over medium heat until hot. Put 2 folded tortillas in skillet and heat for 1 to 2 minutes on each side or until olden brown., Remove quesadillas from skillet, place on platter and cover with foil to keep warm while cookin the remainder., Cut each quesadilla into 4 wedes. Serve warm.

name: Creamy Chicken Hash
ingredients: 1 russet potato (scrubbed, medium 6 ounce), 2 tablespoons butter (or canola oil, divided), 1/2 onion (small, finely chopped), 1/4 cup reen bell pepper (finely chopped), 1/4 cup red bell pepper (finely chopped), 1/4 cup celery (finely chopped), 1 arlic clove (small, finely chopped), canola cookin spray, 2 cups skinless cooked chicken breast (diced), 2 tablespoons milk, 2%, 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper (a pinch or to taste), salt (and freshly round black pepper, to taste), 4 tablespoons barbecue sauce (prepared)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Shred the potato and set aside. (It will darken in color, but this will not affect hash.), Heat 1 tablespoons butter or oil in a medium/lare non-stick skillet. Add onion, bell peppers, celery and arlic. Sauté until lihtly browned, 5 minutes. Push vegetables to one side of pan. Add remainin butter or oil. Add potatoes and mix with oil to coat them. Mix and combine well with the vegetables. Cook 3 minutes. If potatoes stick, scrape pan viorously and move contents around pan to spray the bottom with cookin spray., Mix in chicken, milk, cayenne, salt and pepper. Spread and flatten out the mixture into a thick cake. Use the ede of a pancake turner to cut it into 4 sections. (Or, hash can be broken into rouh pieces while cookin.) Cover the pan. Cook until potatoes are tender and hash is lihtly browned, 3 to 5 minutes, turnin so bottom sides can also brown. (Spray pan with oil spray if necessary while turnin hash.), When hash is done, divide equally amon four plates. Serve with barbecue sauce drizzled on top or around each portion. (If desired, sauce can first be thinned, by mixin 4 tablespoons sauce with 4 tablespoons milk.)

name: Crispy Oven-Fried Chicken
ingredients: 1/2 cup milk, non-fat (or buttermilk), 1 teaspoon poultry seasonin, 1 cup cornflakes, crumbled, 1 1/2 tablespoons onion powder, 1 1/2 tablespoons arlic powder, 2 teaspoons black pepper, 2 teaspoons hot pepper (dried crushed), 1 teaspoon iner (round), 4 chicken breasts, skinless, 4 chicken drumsticks, skinless, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon vegetable oil (to rease baking pan)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F., Add 1/2 teaspoon of poultry seasonin to milk., Combine remainin 1/2 teaspoon of poultry seasonin and all other spices (except paprika) with cornflake crumbs and place in a plastic ba., Dip chicken into milk, shake to remove excess, then quickly shake in ba with seasonin and crumbs., Refrierate for 1 hour., Remove from refrierator and sprinkle lihtly with paprika for color., Evenly space chicken on reased baking pan. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 40 minutes., Remove foil and continue baking for an additional 30 to 40 minutes or until the meat can be easily pulled away form the bone with a fork. The drumsticks may require less baking time than the breasts. Crumbs will form a crispy "skin." (Do not turn chicken durin baking.)

name: Crispy Taquitos
ingredients: 3 servings Pico de Gallo, 1/2 cup chicken (cooked, finely chopped), 1/2 cup corn (no salt added, canned or frozen, thawed), 1/4 cup reen onion (chopped), 1/4 cup bell pepper (reen, chopped), 1/2 cup cheddar cheese (shredded, reduced fat, or Monterey jack or queso fresco), 12 corn tortillas, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat oven to 425 °F. In a medium bowl, combine 1 cup Pico de Gallo, chicken, corn, reen onion, bell pepper, and cheese., Soften tortillas on the stovetop or in the microwave oven, and spoon a heapin tablespoon of fillin onto the center of each tortilla. Roll up tihtly and secure each with a toothpick., Place rolled tortillas seam side down on a baking sheet and brush each lihtly with oil. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until crisp and lihtly browned., Place 3 taquitos on each plate and serve with remainin Pico de Gallo.

name: Crispy Walleye Patties
ingredients: 1 pound walleye fillets, minced (fresh or frozen) (2-8 ounce fillets), 1/2 cup onion, minced, 1/2 cup celery, minced, 2 tablespoons low-fat mayonnaise, 1 cup crushed crackers, unsalted, 1 e (or 2 Tbsp dried e mix + 1/4 cup water), 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon dill, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Cookin spray
directions: Preheat oven to 375 derees F. Place minced fish in a colander and press firmly to remove as much moisture as possible., In a medium bowl, mix fish, onion, celery, mayonnaise, crackers, e, arlic powder, dill, paprika, and salt. Let rest for 10 minutes., Shape mixture into 8 patties. Spray baking sheet with cookin spray and place patties at least 1 inch apart on the pan., Bake for 10-15 minutes, flip, and bake for another 10 minutes. Serve warm.

name: Crunchy Chicken Salad
ingredients: 2 cups cooked chicken (chunked), 1/2 cup celery, 1/4 cup reen pepper, 1/4 onion, 1/2 cucumber, 1/2 cup rapes, 1 apple (small, diced, leave the peel on), 1/4 cup yoghurt, plain
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Use leftover cooked chicken, or cook enouh chicken to make 2 cups of chicken pieces., Chop the celery and reen pepper into small pieces., Peel and chop 1/4 of an onion., Peel and chop half of a cucumber., Chop the apple into pieces. It’s okay to leave the peel on the apple., Cut the rapes in half., Put all the inredients in a lare bowl. Stir toether.

name: Crusty Rice with Tofu and Vegetables
ingredients: For the rice:,2 cups water,1 cup brown rice,For the tofu and vegetables:,3 cups prepared rice,1 pound tofu,1 cup frozen corn (unthawed),1 cup frozen peas (unthawed),6 scallions (sliced including white and green parts),1 carrot (shredded),1/4 cup fresh basil leaves,1/4 teaspoon salt,2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: To make the rice, cook rice accordin to the directions on the packae. Set aside to cool and dry out., Put the tofu, corn, scallions, carrot, basil, and salt in the bowl and mix well., When the rice has fully cooled, add it to the bowl with the tofu and mix well., Put the skillet over medium hih heat and when it is hot, add the oil., Add the rice and tofu mixture; reduce heat to low and press down the rice mixture with a spatula. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Press down aain to help form a crust. Flip portions of the rice so that you et chunks of crispy rice. Cook until crispy, up to 20 minutes.

name: Cuban Beans and Rice
ingredients: 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon arlic (minced), 1 cup onion (chopped), 1 cup reen bell pepper (diced), 3 cups black beans (cooked), 2 cups chicken broth (low sodium), 1 tablespoon vinear, 1/2 teaspoon oreano (dried), black pepper (to taste), 3 cups brown rice (cooked)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat the olive oil in a lare nonstick skillet. Sauté the arlic, onion, and reen bell pepper until olden, about 3 minutes., Stir in the beans, broth, vinear, and seasonin; brin to a boil then lower to a simmer. Cook covered for 5 minutes., Spoon over cooked rice and serve.

name: Curried Chicken with Raisins and Mushrooms
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil (extra virin or virin), 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 12 oz, diced into 1 inch cubes), 2 cups sliced fresh white mushrooms, 2 cups sliced cremini mushrooms, 1/2 medium red bell pepper (cut into 3/4" squares), 2 cups low sodium chicken broth, 1 cup raisins, 2 cups instant whole-rain rice, 1 1/2 tablespoons curry powder
directions: Heat olive oil in lare sauté pan., With heat on medium-hih, place chicken in pan and cover with lid., Cook chicken about 5 minutes., Add mushrooms and peppers to pan and sauté 3 to 4 minutes., Add chicken broth., Gently mix in raisins, rice, and curry powder; brin to boil, reduce heat and cover., Simmer until rice is done; fluff with fork and let sit 3 to 5 minutes before servin.

name: Curried Chickpea Salad
ingredients: 2 cans chickpeas, rinsed and drained, 1/2 cup celery, diced, 1/2 cup apple, diced, 1/4 cup red onion, diced, 1/4 cup cranberries, dried, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, low-fat or vean mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon dijon mustard, 2 teaspoons curry powder, 1/4 teaspoon thyme, dried, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, round, salt (1/2 teaspoon, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Add the chickpeas to a lare bowl and mash with a potato masher. You can mash them to be as smooth or coarse as you desire., Add all of the remainin inredients to the bowl and mix until everythin is combined.

name: Curried Potatoes with Red Lentils
ingredients: 1 tablespoon canola oil, 1 tablespoon butter (or more oil), 1 small onion, chopped, 2 cloves arlic, crushed (use 2-3 arlic cloves), 1 sweet potato, medium peeled and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (use a dark-fleshed potatoes), 2 potatoes, yellow, cut into 1/2-inch pieces (use thin-skinned potatoes, such as Yukon Gold), 1 tablespoon iner, fresh rated, 1 tablespoon curry paste (or curry powder), 1/2 cup dried red lentils, 2 cups vegetable stock (or chicken stock), chopped fresh cilantro, divided (1/2 cup, optional), 1 cup coconut milk, liht, 2 teaspoons lime juice, salt (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In lare, heavy skillet, heat the oil and butter over medium-hih heat. When the butter melts and foam subsides, sauté the onion for 3-4 minutes, until soft and startin to turn olden., Add the arlic and potatoes and cook for another 3-4 minutes until the potatoes are startin to turn olden on the edes., Add the iner and curry paste and cook for another minute., Add the lentils, cilantro (optional), vegetable stock, and coconut milk. Stir to combine well and reduce the heat to a simmer., Cover and cook, stirrin occasionally, for 30 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Add a little water, stock, or coconut milk if it ets too thick., Add the lime juice and season with salt (optional). Serve hot.

name: Dilled Fish Fillets
ingredients: 1 pound haddock or cod fillets (frozen), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1/8 teaspoon dill weed (dried), 1/8 teaspoon salt, black pepper (optional)
directions: Thaw frozen fish in refrierator overnight or thaw in microwave oven. Then, separate into 4 fillets or pieces, Place fish in a lass-baking dish. Cover with wax paper., Cook at "medium" power in the microwave for 3 minutes. Remove cover, turn fish over, and sprinkle with lemon juice and seasonins., Cover and continue cookin at "medium" power for 3 minutes or until fish flakes with a fork.

name: Easy Beef Supper
ingredients: 1 pound round beef, 1 small onion, chopped, 1 bell pepper, chopped, 2 cans (about 30 ounces) low-sodium diced tomatoes, drained, 1 cup macaroni, uncooked, 2 1/2 cups low-sodium tomato juice, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon oreano (optional), 1 can (about 15 ounces) low-sodium kidney beans, drained
directions: In a lare pan, cook round beef over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain fat., Add onion, reen pepper, and tomatoes to round beef and cook until onion turns liht brown., Turn down the heat to a simmer. Add macaroni, tomato juice, spices, and beans to the pan. Stir well., Cover the pan and simmer for about 20 minutes., Remove pan from heat, stir, and serve hot.

name: Easy Chicken and Dumplins
ingredients: 1/3 tablespoon flour (all purpose), 2 tablespoons water, 1 cup chicken broth, low-sodium, 1 cup chicken, cooked and diced, salt (optional, 1/4 teaspoon), 1 dash black pepper
directions: Mix 2 tablespoons flour and water in a pan until smooth., Slowly stir in broth., Cook over medium heat until thickened., Add chicken, salt (optional) and pepper.

name: Easy Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: 1 2/3 cups frozen mixed vegetables (thawed), 1 cup cooked chicken (cut-up), 1 can cream of chicken soup, low-fat (10 3/4 ounce, condensed), 1 cup baking mix, reduced-fat (example: Bisquick), 1/2 cup milk (non-fat), 1 e
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Pre-heat oven to 400 °F., Mix vegetables, chicken, and soup in unreased, 9-inch pie plate, Stir remainin inredients in a mixin bowl with fork until blended. Pour over vegetables and chicken in pie plate., Bake 30 minutes or until olden brown., Let cool for 5 minutes and serve.

name: Easy Eplant Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 eplants (peeled and cubed), 1 zucchini (thinly sliced), 1 cup reen bell pepper (cut into strips), 2 onions (sliced), 3 tablespoons Italian salad dressin (low fat), 2 cups cherry tomatoes, 2 cups brown rice (cooked)
directions: Place eplant, zucchini, reen bell pepper, onions and salad dressin into a skillet., Stir lihtly to combine and cook over low heat until tender., Stir in cherry tomatoes and cook for 3-5 minutes. Serve over cooked brown rice.

name: Easy Fried Rice
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 es (beaten), 3 1/2 cups brown rice, cooked (or white rice), 1 cup chicken breast, ham or pork, cooked (and chopped), 1 cup mixed vegetables, cooked (and chopped), 2 reen onions (sliced), soy sauce or hot sauce (optional, to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat pan. Add 1 teaspoon of oil. Add es and scramble., Remove cooked es and set aside., Add the rest of oil (2 teaspoons) to pan. Stir fry rice, breakin up lumps by pressin rice aainst pan., Add cooked meat and/or vegetables. Stir fry until heated., Add reen onions, reserved es and sauce to taste. Serve hot., Cover and refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Easy Oven Fish with Spinach Basil Dipping Sauce & Spiced Apples
ingredients: For the Spinach Basil Dipping Sauce:,1 cup frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained,1/2 cup chopped fresh basil,1 clove garlic,3/4 cup fat-free plain yogurt,2 tablespoons vinegar,2 teaspoons honey,For the Fish Sticks:,cooking spray,1 pound frozen pollock, or other white fish, such as haddock or cod (partially thawed),1/2 cup flour,2 egg whites, beaten,3/4 cup bread crumbs (whole-wheat if available),2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese,1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper,For the Spiced Apples:,3 apples,1/2 cup raisins,1/4 cup chopped pecans,1/2 teaspoon cinnamon,2 teaspoons butter
directions: Place rack in center and heat oven to 450 °F. Spray cookie sheet with cookin spray., To make dippin sauce, place all inredients in a blender or food processor; blend or process until smooth., Cut pollock into strips 1-inch wide (easiest when fish is partially, rather than full, thawed) and place on prepared baking sheet., Mix breadin inredients (bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, and pepper) in a shallow dish or pie pan; place flour and e whites in separate dishes., Dip fish sticks in flour, then in e whites, then breadin mix, coatin evenly., Return coated fish sticks to baking sheet, spacin evenly. Cook fish until it is 145 °F, confirmed with a food thermometer, about 10 to 12 minutes, olden brown, turnin as needed., While fish sticks are baking, cut apples in quarters and core them; slice into smaller wedes (about 12 per apple)., Toss with raisins, pecans, and cinnamon., Heat butter in medium sauce pan. Add fruit mix., Sauté lihtly about 3 to 5 minutes. Apples should still be slihtly crisp.

name: Easy Oven Packet Caribbean Tilapia with Pears and Carnival Roasted Potatoes
ingredients: For the Carnival Roasted Potatoes:,2 small red potatoes,2 small Yukon potatoes,1/2 yellow bell pepper, cut into 1" chunks,1 cup green beans (fresh, frozen, or canned),1 Roma tomato, cut into wedges,2 tablespoons chopped white onion,1 clove garlic, minced,1/2 teaspoon cumin,1/4 teaspoon salt (optional),1 tablespoon olive oil,For the Tilapia Oven Packets:,1 pound tilapia fillets, fresh, or frozen (4-4-oz tilapia fillets),1 tablespoon salt-free Caribbean citrus seasoning blend,2 teaspoons olive oil,3 D'Anjou pears (medium),aluminum foil
directions: Heat oven to 425 °F., Scrub potatoes under runnin water, cut into 1-inch chunks., In a lare bowl, toss potatoes with other vegetables, seasonins, and olive oil. Spread mix in a 2-quart baking dish and place in oven., Roast until potatoes and other vegetables are tender, about 30 to 40 minutes., About 15 minutes after the potato dish was placed in the oven, put in a baking sheet with fish packets, prepared as follows:, Brush fish with olive oil, coat with seasonin blend., Place each filet in the center of a square of aluminum foil (or substitute foil with parchment paper)., Cut pears into quarters and core; slice into thin wedes (about 8 to 12 per pear).Top fish with pear wedes., Brin the foil over the fish and fruit. Fold and pinch the seams., Place foil packets on a baking sheet. Bake about 20 minutes, until tilapia is cooked to an internal temperature of 145 °F, confirmed with a food thermometer, and fruit is tender., To serve, carefully open the packet, slide contents onto individual serving plates, and add roasted vegetables.

name: Easy Red Beans and Rice
ingredients: cookin oil spray, as needed (non-stick), 1 onion (medium, peeled and chopped), 1 reen bell pepper (medium, washed, seeded and chopped), 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 cans diced tomatoes (14.5 ounces each), 1 can kidney beans (15.5 oz, drained and rinsed), 6 cups cooked brown rice
directions: Spray skillet with cookin oil spray., Cook onion and pepper over medium heat for 5 minutes or until tender., Add arlic powder, tomatoes, and kidney beans., Brin mixture to a boil., Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes., Serve over rice.

name: Easy Stuffed Pasta Shells
ingredients: 1 packae frozen chopped spinach, thawed (10 ounces), 12 ounces cottae cheese, low-fat, 1 1/2 cups mozzarella, part skim shredded (save 1/2 cup for toppin), 1 1/2 teaspoons dried oreano, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1 jar liht tomato basil pasta sauce, low-sodium (26 ounces), 1 cup water, 6 ounces pasta shells, uncooked (lare)
directions: Wash hands., Preheat oven to 375 °F. Lihtly coat a 13x9x2 inch baking dish with cookin spray. Set aside., Drain spinach by placin in a sieve or colander over the sink, or in a bowl and pressin with a spool to remove as much liquid as possible, or squeeze out liquid with clean hands. Place spinach in medium bowl., Add the cottae cheese, 1 cup of the mozzarella cheese, oreano, and pepper to the spinach. Stir to mix thorouhly., Pour half of the spahetti sauce into prepared baking dish. Add water and stir into the mix., Spoon about 3 tablespoons cheese mixture into each uncooked pasta shell and arrane in a sinle layer over top., Sprinkle with remainin 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese evenly over sauce., Cover tihtly with foil. Bake for 1 hour or until shells are tender. Let stand 10 minutes before servin.

name: Easy-As-A-Mix Pizza (from Better Baking Mix)
ingredients: 1 serving of Better Baking Mix (1 cup), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/3 cup water, 1/2 cup tomato sauce, 2 tablespoons finely chopped onion, 1/2 teaspoon oreano (or Italian herb mix), 1 cup mozzarella cheese, part-skim rated
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 425 °F. Grease a 12x15 inch or larer baking sheet, or 12-inch pizza pan., Measure mix into a bowl. Add oil and water. Stir to form soft douh., Transfer douh onto baking sheet. Sprinkle with flour. Dip finers in flour and pat douh into a circle about 11-12 inches across., Spread pizza crust with tomato sauce. Leave about 1/2 inch around ede with no sauce., Sprinkle with onion, seasonin and cheese, Bake 10-12 minutes until edes are brown and cheese is melted and startin to brown., Refrierate any leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Eggs Foo Youn
ingredients: 2 es, 1 cup bean sprouts, fresh, 1/2 cup chicken, cooked and diced (or beef), 1/3 tablespoon dried minced onion, 1 cup mushrooms, stems and pieces (drained), 2 teaspoons oil
directions: Beat es with electric mixer (or by hand) until very thick and liht, about 5 minutes., Fold in bean sprouts, chicken or beef, mushrooms, and onion., Heat oil in fryin pan over moderate heat., Pour e mixture by half cupsful into the pan. Brown on one side; turn and brown the other side. Keep warm while preparin the sauce., Mix sauce inredients in small saucepan until smooth., Cook over low heat, stirrin constantly, until thickened., Serve sauce over patties.

name: Eggs over Kale and Sweet Potato Grits
ingredients: 1 lare sweet potato (orange flesh), 2 cups fresh kale (chopped), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil (divided), 1 1/2 cups water, 1 cup non-fat milk, 3/4 cup rits (quick cookin), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 es
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Coat 4 individual soufflé dishes with 1 tsp vegetable oil., Make 3 to 4 slits in sweet potatoes; cook in microwave until just soft., When sweet potatoes are cool enouh to handle, peel, cut into chunks, and puree in food processor., Heat remainin vegetable oil in sauce pan, and sauté kale about 5 minutes., In a medium sauce pan, boil water and milk, add rits and sweet potatoes; cook for 5 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in sautéed kale., Divide rits mixture evenly amon 4 soufflé dishes (or place all in casserole dish)., Make 4 depressions in the rits mixture with the back of a lare spoon. Carefully break one e into each hollow., Bake uncovered for 30 minutes until es are cooked. Let cool 10 minutes before servin.

name: Enchilada Bake
ingredients: 1 tablespoon oil, 1 onion (medium, chopped), 3 arlic (cloves, minced), 2 cups black beans (cooked), 1 cup kernel corn (1/2 of a 15.2 ounce can, drained and rinsed), 1 teaspoon cumin, 2 cups prepared salsa (divided), 8 corn tortillas, 1/2 cup Monterey Jack cheese (shredded)
directions: In a lare skillet heat oil over medium-hih heat; sauté onion and arlic 2 to 3 minutes., Add beans, corn, cumin and 1/2 cup salsa. Cook 3-4 minutes, coarsely mashin beans with back of spoon., Spoon 1/3 cup fillin onto each tortilla; roll up., Spoon 1/2 cup salsa into 11x7x2 inch baking dish. Arrane tortillas seam side down; top with remainin 1 cup sauce., Cover and bake in 350 °F oven for 15 to 20 minutes., Uncover; top with cheese. Bake 2 minutes loner or until cheese is melted.

name: Enchilada Rice
ingredients: 1 pound 90% lean round beef (or other round meat), 1/2 cup onion (chopped, or 1 Tbsp onion powder), 1 can whole corn (14 ounce, or any canned vegetable, drained), 4 tablespoons taco seasonin mix (dry, or dry enchilada sauce), 2 cups rice, cooked (brown), 1/2 cup cheese (rated), 1/2 mushrooms, olives or any favorite vegetable (sliced, optional)
directions: Cook meat and onion until onion juices are clear., Drain juice and fat from cooked meat and onions., Add corn, taco seasonin, and rice., Simmer for 10 minutes., Add rated cheese to top; cover and let set for 5 minutes., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: European Salad
ingredients: 12 ounces chicken breast (pre-sliced), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon round black pepper, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 3 reen onions (sliced), 1 lare yellow bell pepper, cut in strips (about 1 1/2 cups), 16 cherry tomatoes, 1 10-oz packae European blend salad reens, 1 1/2 cups whole rain croutons (about 24 croutons), fresh round pepper, to taste
directions: Place all vinairette inredients in a blender, blend until smooth; set aside. (Note: Vinairette can be made ahead and refrierated.), Season chicken with salt and pepper., Heat olive oil in a lare skillet., Sauté chicken until cooked thorouhly; remove from pan, and let cool., Slice onions., Toss cut vegetables with European blend salad reens., On individual serving plates, top salad with chicken and croutons, drizzle with dressin, and finish with fresh round pepper, if desired.

name: Eve’s Tasty Turkey Tetrazzini
ingredients: 8 ounces whole-wheat fettuccine, spahetti, macaroni, or other noodles, 4 tablespoons liht butter (unsalted), 2 cups mushrooms, sliced (fresh or canned), 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 2 cups reduced-sodium chicken broth, 1 1/2 cups skim milk, 4 cups chopped cooked turkey, 1/2 cup slivered almonds, toasted, 1 cup peas (frozen), 2 tablespoons rated Parmesan cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 400 °F. Lihtly rease a 9x9 inch baking dish., Cook pasta in a lare pot of boilin water until tender. (Check cookin time for pasta; remove pasta approximately 2 minutes early.), While pasta is cookin, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and thyme. Stir and cook until mushrooms are softened, about 5 minutes., Stir in flour until well blended. (Note: Start with 1/3 cup flour and add more, if needed.), While whiskin, slowly add chicken broth and milk. Brin to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until sauce is thickened and smooth, about 5 minutes., Add turkey, toasted almonds, frozen peas, and cooked pasta. Gently mix toether. Pour into the baking dish and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese., Bake until the sauce is bubblin and the cheese is olden brown, 25 to 35 minutes. Let cool 15 minutes before servin.

name: Falafel with Yoghurt Sandwich
ingredients: 1 cup dry arbanzo beans (chick peas, sorted and rinsed), 3 cups water, 1/4 cup oil, 1 arlic (clove, crushed), 1 onion (medium, chopped), 1 teaspoon parsley (1 spri or about 1 teaspoon, chopped), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1/3 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, 1 cup plain yoghurt (low-fat), 1 onion (medium, chopped), 4 whole wheat pita bread (pockets), flour, tomatoes, sliced (optional), lettuce (optional), bread crumbs (optional (see note))
directions: Put beans and water in lare pot and soak by the overnight or quick-soak method., Cook until tender, about 2 hours. Add more water if necessary. Drain., Slowly heat oil and sauté arlic and 1 onion until tender (5 to 7 minutes)., Mash cooked beans, sautéed vegetables, parsley, salt, lemon juice and hot pepper sauce until smooth., With floured hands, form ovals with bean mixture (about 1/4 cup each). Roll in flour., Fry falafel, with the remainin oil in skillet, until olden brown. Drain on paper towel., Combine yoghurt with remainin onion., Serve falafel in pocket bread topped with yoghurt.

name: Fall Veggie Casserole
ingredients: 5 1/2 cups eplant, cubes (1 medium eplant), 4 tomatoes, 1 reen pepper, 1 onion, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 clove arlic, 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese (rated)
directions: Remove the skin from the eplant. Cut the eplant into cubes. Chop the tomatoes into small pieces., Cut the reen pepper in half. Remove the seeds and cut it into small pieces., Chop the onion into small pieces., Cut the arlic into tiny pieces., Cook the first 8 inredients in a lare skillet until tender., Top with the Parmesan cheese and serve.

name: Fantastic French Toast
ingredients: 2 lare es, 1/2 cup non-fat milk, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 6 slices whole wheat bread, syrup or other toppins (optional)
directions: Preheat the riddle over medium heat, or set an electric fryin pan at 375 °F., Put es, milk, and vanilla in a pie pan or shallow bowl and beat with a fork until well mixed., Grease the riddle or pan with a thin layer of oil or use nonstick spray., Dip both sides of bread, one slice at a time, in the e mixture and cook on the hot riddle or fryin pan., Cook on one side until olden brown. Turn the bread over to cook the other side. It will take about 4 minutes on each side., Optional: serve with syrup, applesauce, fruit slices, or jam.

name: Fiesta Lettuce Wraps and Pepper Boats
ingredients: 6 sweet, mini bell peppers, 8 lettuce leaves, 1 cup instant brown rice (dry), 1 pound tilapia filets, fresh or frozen (thawed), 2 teaspoons Southwest chipotle seasonin (no sodium), 2 tablespoons canola oil (divided), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 limes (divided), 1/4 cup reduced-fat sour cream
directions: Slice peppers in half vertically. Arrane lettuce and 8 pepper halves on a serving platter., Cook brown rice accordin to packae directions., To make salsa fresca, dice remainin pepper halves, tomato, and onion; mix with corn, arlic, jalapeño pepper, and 1/4 teaspoon salt., Sprinkle both sides of tilapia filets with Southwest chipotle seasonin., Heat 1 1/2 tablespoons canola oil in a lare nonstick skillet over medium-hih heat. Add fish to pan, and cook for 3 minutes on each side (cook fish until it is opaque, 145 ºF). Flake with a fork and place in a serving dish., When rice is done, stir in remainin 1/2 tablespoon oil, juice from one lime, and ¼ tsp salt. Cut remainin lime into wedes., To serve, set out pepper-lettuce platter, rice, fish, salsa fresca, sour cream, and lime, and let diners build their own boats and wraps

name: Fiesta Rice Salad
ingredients: 1 cup brown rice (cooked), 1 carrot (shredded), 1 cup broccoli (chopped fine), 1 red onion (small, chopped), 1 cup tomato (chopped), 1 bell pepper (sweet, reen, red, yellow), 1 can kidney beans (15oz, drained, rinsed), 2 tablespoons cilantro (or other fresh herbs) (chopped fine), 2 tablespoons red wine vinear (or white or cider), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, salt and pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash and chop vegetables and mix with cooked rice., In a small bowl, add vinear, oil, dill, salt and pepper. (Or use your favorite dressin.) Pour over rice mixture., Add beans and toss well. Serve cold and enjoy!

name: Fish Braised in Green Curry with Potatoes
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds fish fillets (flounder salmon or other mild fish), coarsely round black pepper, to taste, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 can sliced potatoes (drained), 1 can low-sodium chicken broth, 1 teaspoon arlic (chopped), 1 cup canned, liht coconut milk, 2/3 tablespoon Thai reen curry paste, 2 tablespoons chopped parsley (optional)
directions: Season fish fillets with pepper., Heat oil in a lare skillet and brown fish on both sides., Add potatoes, broth and arlic to the skillet., Simmer until the fish flakes with entle pressure and internal temperature reisters 145 °F on a food thermometer, about 5 minutes., Transfer fish and potatoes to a warm platter., Over hih heat, reduce liquid in the pan by about half., Stir in coconut milk and curry paste., Simmer until lihtly thickened., Stir in parsley and pour over fish and potatoes.

name: Fish Tacos
ingredients: 1 red onion, chopped, 1/2 cup cilantro, chopped, 1 cup packaed coleslaw mix, 4 4-ounce tilapia fillets (or any white fish), 8 small corn tortillas, 1 teaspoon chili powder (more or less to taste)
directions: Clean and chop onion, cilantro, and cabbae. Mix in a bowl and set aside., Coat the baking sheet with cookin spray. Lihtly sprinkle fish fillets with chili powder and place on the baking pan., Place in the oven about 6 inches from the broiler and cook for approximately 3 to 4 minutes, or until fish is fully cooked. You will know the fish is done when it "flakes" or pulls apart easily when separated with a fork., Lihtly fry tortillas on an oiled riddle or skillet, or heat tortillas in the microwave oven for just a few seconds until softened and hot., Fill tortilla with fish, cabbae, onion, and cilantro and fold in half. Serve with salsa and citrus slices, if desired.

name: Fish with Spinach
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 pound skinless cod fillets, 1 yellow onion (peeled and chopped into 1/4 inch pieces), 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 2 cups canned low-sodium diced tomatoes (or fresh tomatoes), 1/2 cup water, 2 cups frozen spinach (coarsely chopped), 1/4 cup Kalamata olives (or other Greek olives pitted and coarsely chopped)
directions: Put the skillet on the stove over hih heat. When it is hot, add 1 1/2 teaspoons oil., Add fish. Cook about 5 minutes per side, until deeply browned. Remove the fish to the plate and cover., Reheat the skillet to medium heat. Add the remainin 1 1/2 teaspoons oil, onion, and arlic. Cook about 7 minutes. Add tomatoes and water. Cook about 10 minutes, until the mixture thickens and turns from briht red to an orange color., Return fish to skillet with the tomato mixture. Cover with spinach and sprinkle with olives. Cover skillet. Cook about 2 minutes over low heat until the spinach is steamed. Serve riht away.

name: Five Happiness Fried Noodles
ingredients: 10 cups water, 1 pound e noodles, 1 tablespoon olive oil (or vegetable oil, divided), 3 cups bean sprouts, 1 cup bamboo shoots (julienned sliced thinly in strips), 1/2 cup carrots (shredded), 2 dried shiitake mushrooms (or about 1/2 cup, soaked, stems removed, and julienned), 2 reen onions, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon suar, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, reduced sodium
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare pot on hih heat, brin 10 cups of water to boil. Cook noodles in boilin water until tender or “al dente,” approximately 5 to 7 minutes; drain and set aside., Heat a non-stick wok or pan over hih heat. Add 1/2 tablespoon oil, swirlin to coat the pan, add noodles and pan-fry until noodles are olden, about 7 to 10 minutes. Remove noodles from wok., Add remainin 1/2 tablespoon oil to wok, add vegetables, and stir-fry until just cooked, about 5 to 7 minutes., Return noodles to the wok, add salt, suar and soy sauce., Stir to combine and serve.

name: Flavorful Fried Rice
ingredients: 2 tablespoons cookin oil (or mararine), 1 cup rice, reular, uncooked, 3 tablespoons onion (minced), 1/2 cup carrot (chopped or rated), 2 cups water, 4 es (beaten), 4 e whites (beaten), 1/4 cup milk, non-fat, 1/2 cup peas, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, reduced sodium
directions: In a fryin pan over medium heat, cook rice, minced onion, and carrots in oil, stirrin often until lihtly browned., Slowly add water. Reduce heat, cover and simmer until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender, about 20 minutes., Beat es in bowl. Stir in milk, peas, and soy sauce. Pour over hot rice mixture in fry pan., Cook on medium heat. As mixture beins to thicken, ently draw a spatula across bottom and sides of pan. This allows e mixture to cook. Continue until es are firm.

name: Four Layer Casserole
ingredients: 1 pound round beef, 85% lean, 4 potatoes, 1 packae frozen mixed vegetables (or canned mixed vegetables), 1/4 cup cheese, low-fat shredded (cheddar or colby jack), 1/4 cup milk, 1%, salt and pepper (optional, to taste)
directions: Cook round beef in fryin pan until brown. Rinse in warm water and drain to remove excess fat., Scrub potatoes and cut into slices without peelin., Place potatoes in a lare baking or casserole dish. Top with vegetables, round beef, and cheese., Pour milk over the casserole. Add salt and pepper as desired., Cover with a lid or foil. Bake at 350 °F for 1 hour or microwave in non-metal baking or casserole dish for 19 to 23 minutes on hih.

name: Fried Rice
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 3 cups cooked brown rice, 1 carrot (cut into 1/4-inch slices), 1/2 bell pepper (chopped), 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1/2 cup chopped broccoli, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, low-sodium, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 medium es, beaten, 3/4 cup cooked bite-size pieces of chicken
directions: 1. Heat oil in a lare skillet over medium heat., 2. Add rice and stir for 5 minutes., 3. Stir in carrot, bell pepper, onion, broccoli, soy sauce, black pepper, and arlic powder. Cook until vegetables are tender., 4. Remove mixture from pan., 5. Pour es into pan and scramble., 6. Put vegetable mix and rice back in the pan and mix with scrambled es., 7. Add chicken and cook until hot., 8. Refrierate leftovers.

name: Full of Beans Hot Dish
ingredients: 1 pound round beef, 1 onion (lare, chopped), 1/4 cup brown suar, 1/2 cup ketchup, 2 tablespoons vinear, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 2 cups kidney beans (cooked, or 15 ounce can), 1 can pork and beans (15 ounce), 2 cups reat northern beans (cooked, or a 15 ounce can reat northern beans, lima beans, or butter beans, low sodium)
directions: Cook round beef and onions. Drain fat., Add remainin inredients and mix., Place in casserole dish., Bake in the oven at 350 °F for 1 hour.

name: Garden Cannellini Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 teaspoons white wine vinear, 1/2 cup apple juice, 1 tablespoon tomato basil arlic seasonin blend, no-salt
directions: Whisk toether dressin inredients in a small bowl., In a small sauté pan, toast almond slivers until olden., Remove from pan and let cool., In a medium bowl, toss dressin with all inredients except lettuce., Refrierate until ready to serve., To serve, place lettuce leaves on individual plates; top with salad.

name: Garden Chili
ingredients: 3/4 pound round beef (lean, 10% fat), 1/2 cup reen pepper (chopped), 1/2 onion (lare, chopped), 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 2/3 cup kidney beans (canned, drained and rinsed), 1/2 cup corn (sweet), 1 can tomato sauce (8 oz), 1 cup tomatoes (chopped fresh), 1 dash black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 teaspoons chili powder
directions: Wash your hands and work area., Place round beef in a skillet sprayed with non-stick cookin spray. Brown meat over medium-hih heat, stirrin occasionally to break it into pieces. Drain fat and blot meat with paper towels. Transfer beef into a colander and rinse with very hot water to further remove fat., Add reen pepper, onion, and celery. Cook until softened., Add beans, corn, tomato sauce, chopped tomatoes, pepper, arlic, and chili powder., Cook mixture over low heat for 20 minutes., Serve hot in bowls. Or serve as a dip with baked tortilla chips or on a bun., Cover and refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Garlic Giner Ramen with Beef
ingredients: 1/2 pound lean round beef (15% fat or less), 2 cups water, 2 packaes instant ramen-style noodles, broken into small pieces (3 ounces each), 1 packae frozen stir-fry vegetables, any type (16 ounces), 2 reen onions, thinly sliced, 1 tablespoon fresh iner (or 1/4 teaspoon round iner), 2 cloves arlic, minced (or 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare skillet over medium-hih heat (350 °F in an electric skillet), brown the round beef. Drain fat from the skillet. Drain fat from the skillet. (See Notes.), Add water and ONE seasonin packet to cooked beef and mix well., Add vegetables, reen onion, iner, and arlic. Brin to a boil over hih heat., Add ramen noodles, reduce heat to low, and simmer 3 to 5 minutes until vegetables are tender, stirrin occasionally.

name: Garlic Stuffed Chicken
ingredients: 2 cups water, 8 cloves arlic clove (unpeeled), 6 tablespoons fresh parsley (chopped, divided), 1 teaspoon lemon zest (rated), 1 teaspoon sodium-free seasonin blend, 4 chicken breast (4 ounce, with skin), 1/4 cup chicken broth (reduced sodium), 2 tablespoons lemon juice (fresh)
directions: In a small saucepan, brin water to a boil. Add arlic; cook for 10 minutes. Drain arlic, peel and cut into thin slices. In a small bowl, combine arlic, 1/2 cup of chopped parsley, lemon zest, and seasonin. Mix well., Loosen skin from each chicken breast to form a pocket. Place about 1 teaspoon of arlic mixture under skin of each breast. Heat a lare nonstick skillet over medium-hih heat., Add chicken skin-side down; cook until olden, about 4 minutes. Turn chicken; reduce heat to medium., Cover and cook until no loner pink in center, about 10 to 12 minutes. Transfer chicken to a plate. Wipe any fat away from the skillet., Add remainin chopped parsley, broth, and lemon juice to pan. Brin to a boil; cook for 1 minute. Spoon mixture over chicken.

name: Ginery Quinoa with Green Beans
