ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 1 1/2 cups water or broth, 2 cups reen beans, 2 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice, freshly squeezed, 1 tablespoon olive oil or cookin oil, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, reduced sodium, 1/4 teaspoon iner, round
directions: Toast to quinoa in a dry skillet over medium heat, stirrin constantly for about 3 minutes., Put quinoa in a medium pot and add water or broth., Brin to a boil, then let simmer until all of the water is absorbed and quinoa is tender (10 to 20 minutes)., Set aside and leave uncovered to cool., While quinoa is coolin, microwave the reen beans until just tender., Rinse in cold water to stop the cookin process., In a lare bowl, combine the quinoa, olive oil or cookin oil, sesame oil, reen beans, lemon juice, soy sauce, and fresh or round iner. Stir well., Season with salt and pepper., Serve at room temperature.

name: Glazed Meatloaf
ingredients: 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1 small Spanish onion (peeled and chopped), 1/2 reen bell pepper (cored and diced ), 2 cloves arlic (peeled and diced), 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 1/2 cup water, 1 tablespoon yellow mustard, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1 pound round beef or turkey, 1 lare e, 1/2 cup rolled oats
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 °F. Lihtly rease a baking sheet, Put a skillet over medium heat and when it is hot, add the oil. Add the onion, bell pepper, arlic, and thyme and cook about 10 minutes until olden., Lower the heat and add the water and tomato paste. Cook about 10 minutes until the onion is soft and most of the liquid has been absorbed. Set aside to cool. Add the mustard, salt and pepper., While the onion mixture is cool, put the round beef, 4 tablespoons rolled oats and the e in the bowl and ently mix, by hand., Add the cooled onion mixture and ently mix aain until everythin is thorouhly incorporated. Do not over mix., Form the mixture into a loaf about 8x4 inches and put on the prepared baking sheet., To make the laze: Put the tomato paste and mustard in a small bowl and mix well. Rub on top of the meatloaf and sprinkle with the remainin 2 tablespoons rolled oats., Put in the oven to cook about 1 hour until deep brown and cooked throuhout. Serve riht away or cover and refrierate up to 2 days.

name: Greek Pork Chops
ingredients: 1 pound pork cutlets (or 4 boneless pork chops), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon red wine vinear, 1 tablespoon dried oreano, 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions: Put the pork, oil, vinear, oreano, and arlic in the lass or ceramic bowl, or in a sealed plastic ba and mix well. Cover bowl and refrierate at least 4 hours or overnight., Sprinkle the pork with the salt and pepper., Place a lare skillet on the stove over hih heat. When hot, add the pork to the dry skillet, waitin about 30 seconds between each addition., Cook about 7 minutes on each side until crispy. Serve riht away.

name: Grilled Asparaus and Shrimp Quinoa Salad with Lemon Vinairette
ingredients: 2 cups fresh asparaus, lare spears (cut into 1" pieces), 1/2 yellow or red bell pepper (cut into 1/2" pieces), 1 clove arlic (minced), 1 14 ounce can quartered artichoke hearts (drained), 12 ounces fresh or frozen lare raw shrimp (peeled and deveined), 1 1/2 cups dry quinoa (cooked accordin to packae directions)
directions: Place vinairette inredients in a small bowl and whisk; set aside., Cut vegetables as directed., Heat rill and rillin tray., Place vegetables and shrimp in a lare bowl; add about 1/3 of the vinairette (about 3 tablespoons) and toss., Spread shrimp-vegetable mixture over hot rillin tray., Grill, turnin shrimp and vegetables, until the flesh of the shrimp is an opaque color (about 5 to 6 minutes); remove from rill., Serve rill mixture over cooked quinoa, and drizzle with vinairette.

name: Grilled Cheese with Peaches
ingredients: 8 slices whole rain bread, 1 15-oz can of peaches, drained, 8 slices low-fat cheddar cheese, 7 1/2 cups spinach, 4 teaspoons vegetable oil
directions: Heat the 4 teaspoons of vegetable oil in a lare non-stick pan over medium heat., Place 4 slices of whole rain bread in the pan., Layer (in this order) one slice of cheese, a handful of spinach, 4 to 6 peach slices, another slice of cheese, and a slice of bread on top of each oriinal slice of bread., After 4 to 5 minutes, flip each sandwich and cook another 4 to 5 minutes.

name: Grilled Chicken and Avocado Quinoa Pilaf
ingredients: 2 tablespoons fresh or bottled lemon juice, 1/4 cup fresh basil, 3/4 teaspoon round black pepper (divided), 1 avocado (cut into chunks), 1 tablespoon olive oil (divided), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 small boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 1 lb), 1 lare red bell pepper, 1/2 medium onion (chopped), 1 clove arlic (minced), 3 cups water, 3 teaspoons sodium-free chicken bouillon, 1 1/2 cups red quinoa (uncooked/dry)
directions: Heat rill., Peel and cut avocado into chunks; place in a medium bowl.,  Mix lemon juice, basil, an 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Drizzle over avocado chunks, toss, and set aside., Cut chicken breasts in half crosswise., Mix 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, and remainin black pepper. Brush mixture on chicken and red bell pepper., Grill chicken and pepper until done. Set chicken breasts aside. Cut pepper into thin strips., While chicken and peppers are rillin, heat remainin olive oil in a lare pan, add arlic and onion, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes., Add water, bouillon, and quinoa to pan; brin to boil, cover, reduce heat, and simmer until liquid is absorbed and quinoa is cooked (about 15 to 20 minutes)., Place quinoa pilaf in a lare bowl and add chicken, red peppers, and avocado. Toss ently.

name: Grilled Fish Tacos with Peach Salsa
ingredients: For the salsa:,1 can 15.25 ounces peach halves (drained, rinsed, and chopped, about 1 cup),1/2 red bell pepper (finely chopped, about 1/2 cup),1/4 red onion (finely chopped, about 1/4 cup),1 whole jalapeno pepper (rinsed. seeded, and finely chopped),1 tablespoon fresh cilantro (finely chopped),2 teaspoons lemon juice,For the fish:,4 tilapia fillets (about 1 lb),1 tablespoon chili powder,1/4 teaspoon low-sodium adobo seasoning,1 package low-sodium sazon seasoning,8 6" flour tortillas (warmed)
directions: In a medium bowl, stir toether chopped peaches, bell pepper, onions, jalapenos, cilantro, and lemon juice, Cover and refrierate until ready to use.

name: Grilled Lamb Salad
ingredients: 3 reen onions (sliced), 12 ounces boneless le of lamb, cut into 1-inch cubes (if cubed lamb is not available at your meat market, ask the butcher to prepare it for you), 4 bamboo skewers, 6 cups shredded Savoy, Napa, or reen cabbae, 2 carrots (shredded), 2 tablespoons black or white sesame seeds, 1 small jicama, julienned (optional)
directions: Mix marinade/dressin inredients; divide evenly., Place lamb cubes in a lass dish; pour half of the marinade/dressin over the lamb., Cover and refrierate at least two hours., In a lare bowl, toss cabbae, carrots, jicama (optional), onions, and sesame seeds., Remove lamb and discard marinade., Soak bamboo skewers in water for 30 minutes; divide lamb amon the 4 skewers., On hot rill, cook the lamb skewers 5 to 6 minutes per side (or to desired deree of doneness)., Remove lamb from skewers, add to salad, and toss., To serve, divide salad evenly on four plates. Drizzle with remainin dressin.

name: Grilled Pineapple Ginger Glazed Chicken with Zucchini and Peppers
ingredients: Pineapple Ginger Glaze,1 1/2 cups pineapple juice (12-ounce bottle),1/4 cup apple cider vinegar,3 tablespoons brown sugar,1 1/2 tablespoons light soy sauce,1 tablespoon minced ginger,1 tablespoon Dijon mustard,1 cup whole wheat couscous, dry,1 pound chicken breast, boneless, skinless (cut into 4 portions),1 tablespoon olive oil,1/8 teaspoon salt,1/4 teaspoon pepper,1 sweet yellow onion (cut into wedges),2 large zucchini (cut into chunks),1 red pepper (cut into 8 strips),1 orange pepper (cut into 8 strips),8 pineapple spears (2-1/2 x 1-1/4 inch, about 1 ounce each),1 green onion, sliced
directions: To make the laze, combine pineapple juice, vinear, brown suar, soy sauce, iner and mustard in a medium saucepan set over medium-hih heat., Brin to a boil; boil for about 15 minutes., Preheat rill to medium heat. Cook couscous accordin to packae directions., While couscous is cookin, toss chicken breast with oil, salt and pepper., Grill chicken, for 2 minutes per side or until rill-marked. Continue to rill, bastin and turnin with Pineapple Giner Glaze, for 5 to 6 minutes or until cooked., Grill onion, zucchini, red pepper, orange pepper and pineapple spears, bastin with Pineapple Giner Glaze, for 3 to 5 minutes or until rill-marked and tender., Serve chicken with vegetables and pineapple over couscous., Garnish with reen onions.

name: Grilled Shrimp with Cantaloupe Avocado Salsa
ingredients: For the salsa:,1 lime (divided 1/2 for salsa, 1/2 for garnish),1 avocado, cubed,2 cups diced cantaloupe,1/4 cup chopped red onions,1 cup unsalted canned black beans, drained and rinsed,1/4 teaspoon salt,1/8 teaspoon black pepper,2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro,For the shrimp:,1 pound large or jumbo shrimp, uncooked,1 tablespoon canola oil,1 clove diced garlic,4 bamboo skewers
directions: Preheat rill., Slice lime in half. In a small bowl, squeeze juice from one half of lime; reserve other half for arnish., Add remainin salsa inredients and ently mix., Peel shrimp, leavin the tails on., Skewer shrimp on bamboo skewers., In a small dish mix toether canola oil and arlic. Coat shrimp with oil-arlic mix., Grill 4 to 5 minutes or until cooked., To serve, top shrimp with salsa, arnish with lime wedes.

name: Grilled Steak and Peppers Salad with Pears
ingredients: 2 cups (4 oz) white-wheat rotini pasta (uncooked), 1 yellow bell pepper, 1 red bell pepper, 1/2 teaspoon olive oil, 12 ounces boneless choice beef top sirloin, 2 pears, 3 cups aruula, 1/4 cup crumbled Goronzola cheese
directions: In a small bowl, whisk olive oil, vinear, rape or apple juice, salt, and herb blend., Boil water and cook pasta accordin to packae instructions. Drain pasta, rinse in cool water., Heat rill, rub peppers with 1/2 tsp olive oil. Grill whole peppers, turnin as needed, until skin beins to brown and bubble. At the same time, rill beef sirloin to 145 °F, turnin once. Remove from rill, let cool slihtly., Slice peppers into strips, discardin seeds and stem. Cut sirloin across the rain into thin slices. Slice pears into thin wedes., Toss aruula and pasta in lare bowl., To serve, evenly divide pasta-aruula onto four plates, arrane beef, peppers, and pears on top, drizzle with vinairette, and sprinkle with crumbled Goronzola cheese.

name: Hearty Salmon Skewers over Brown Rice
ingredients: 1 pound salmon, 3 cherry tomatoes (2 ounces), 1 cup pineapple (cubed), 2 cups cooked brown rice, 1 lemon, raw, kosher salt, freshly round pepper, and paprika (to taste), 8 skewers
directions: Cook rice accordin to packae instructions and set aside., Clean fish and pat dry., Cut salmon into 24 1/2-inch cubes and coat all sides with toppin of kosher salt, freshly round pepper, paprika, or any desired spice., Cut fruit into cubes and cut tomatoes in half. Set aside., Slide piece of salmon onto skewer, then tomato, then fruit. Repeat 3 times on each skewer (or until skewer is full)., Heat 1/2 cup of canola oil in lare skillet over medium-hih heat for one minute., Place skewers in pan and turn every 2 minutes per side. Squeeze lemon on skewers as they are cookin., To serve, place 1/2 cup rice on plates and with 2 skewers on top. Squeeze a hint of lemon, if desired.

name: Hearty Vegetable Beef Soup
ingredients: 3/4 can chicken broth (low sodium, 14.5 oz), 1/2 cup water, 2 cups mixed vegetables (frozen, for soup), 1 can tomatoes (14.5 oz, broken up), 4 ounces beef (cooked and diced), 1 teaspoon thyme leaves (crushed), 1 dash pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 bay leaf, 1 1/4 cups noodles (narrow-width, uncooked)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water, Heat broth and water. Add vegetables, meat, and seasonins. Brin to boil. Reduce heat and boil ently, uncovered, for 15 minutes., Add noodles. Cook until noodles are tender, about 10 minutes, Remove bay leaf. Serve.

name: Herb Broiled Beef
ingredients: 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 2 tablespoons parsley, 2 tablespoons white vinear, 3 teaspoons prepared mustard, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon basil, dried (or thyme), 1 pound boneless beef chuck shoulder steak, cut 1-inch thick
directions: 1. Mix onion, parsley, vinear, mustard, arlic powder and basil or thyme., 2. Place meat in plastic ba and pour in marinade., 3. Close ba securely, place in a bowl and marinate in refrierator six to eiht hours or overnight, turnin at least once., 4. Pour off marinade and discard. Place meat on rack in broiler., 5. Broil 15 to 20 minutes or until desired doneness, turnin once., 6. Cut into thin slices to serve.

name: Herbed Garden Pizza
ingredients: 2 tablespoons salt-free Tomato Basil Garlic Seasonin Blend, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 12-inch, whole-wheat pizza crust, thin, pre-baked, cookin spray, 4 Roma tomatoes (thinly sliced), 1 1/2 cups crimini mushrooms (sliced), 2 cups baby spinach, 1/2 cup thinly sliced red onion, 3/4 cup shredded fat-free mozzarella cheese
directions: Place rack in center of oven and preheat oven to 400 °F., In a small bowl, mix Tomato Basil Garlic Seasonin Blend with olive oil., Place pizza crust on pizza pan. Brush pizza douh with olive oil blend, reserve remainder., In a lare mixin bowl, ently toss vegetables and remainin olive oil blend., Spread coated vegetables evenly over pizza douh, leavin about 1/2-inch border around the edes. Top vegetables with shredded cheese., Bake 10 minutes, until cheese is melted.

name: Honey Lemon Chicken
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 pound chicken (cut into 8 pieces), 1/2 cup flour (all purpose), 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 teaspoon rosemary (fresh or dried)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 375 derees. Line a baking pan with foil for easy clean up. Lihtly oil the foil., Combine flour and salt in a plastic ba. Shake chicken pieces in flour mixture, remove from ba and place on prepared pan., Bake for 45 minutes., Combine honey, lemon and rosemary. Spoon mixture over chicken to laze chicken pieces. Bake another 15 minutes.\n

name: Honey Mustard Pork Chops
ingredients: 4 top loin pork chops, 1/3 cup orange juice, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, reduced sodium, 2 tablespoons liht honey mustard
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put the pork chops in the lare non-stick skillet., Cook over medium-hih heat to brown one side of the pork chops., Use the spatula to turn the chops., Add the rest of the inredients and stir., Cover the pan and lower the heat., Simmer for 6 to 8 minutes until chops are done.\n

name: Hooked on Salmon Sticks
ingredients: 1 can pink salmon (16 ounces, drained), 16 saltine crackers (crushed, about 1/2 cup), 1 e, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, non-stick cookin spray
directions:
1. In a lare mixin bowl, combine salmon, cracker crumbs and e.
2. Divide mixture into 8 balls and shaped into sticks about 4 inches lon.
3. Lihtly coat a skillet with cookin spray. Add oil and preheat the skillet on medium for 1 to 2 minutes. Add fish sticks and cook for 3 minutes.
4. Flip over and cook about 3 minutes or until olden brown.

name: Hoppin John (Sausae, Black-Eyed Peas, and Rice)
ingredients: 1/2 cup brown rice, instant uncooked (or white rice), 1 teaspoon canola oil (or corn oil), 3 ounces low-fat smoked turkey sausae rin, quartered lenthwise and cut into 1/4-inch pieces (lowest fat and sodium available), 1/2 red bell pepper (medium, chopped), 1 jalapeño pepper, medium (seeded and finely chopped), 1 can black eyed peas (no salt added, rinsed and drained), 1/2 cup water, 1 teaspoon salt
directions: Prepare the rice usin the packae directions, omittin the salt and butter/mararine., Meanwhile, in a medium non-stick skillet, heat the oil over medium-hih heat, swirlin to coat the bottom. Cook the sausae for 3 minutes or until richly browned, stirrin frequently., Stir in the bell pepper and jalapeño pepper. Cook for 1 minute., Stir in the peas, water, and salt. Cook for 2 minutes, or until the mixture is thickened slihtly but some liquid remains. Remove from the heat., Let stand, covered, for 5 minutes so the flavors bend. Stir in the rice. Transfer to a serving bowl.\n

name: Hot-Win-Flavored Chicken with Ranch Sauce
ingredients: 2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (or to taste), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, fresh, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 4 chicken breast, boneless and skinless, all visible fat discarded (about 4 ounces each) (halved), 1 cup cornflake crumbs (about 2 cups flakes), 1/4 cup sour cream, liht (or fat-free), 1/4 cup buttermilk, 1% low-fat, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon dried dillweed (crumbled)
directions:
1. In a lare shallow bowl, stir toether the hot pepper sauce, lemon juice, and olive oil.
2. Add the chicken and turn to coat. Cover and refrierate for 30 minutes to 8 hours, turnin occasionally if loner than 30 minutes. Discard the marinade.
3. Preheat the oven to 375°F. Lihtly spray an 8-inch square baking pan with vegetable oil spray.
4. Put the cornflake curmbs on a plate. Turn the chicken to coat both sides. Transfer to the baking pan.
5. Lihtly spray the top of the chicken with vetable oil spray. Bake for 30 minutes, or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F and the coatin is crisp. Transfer to a serving plate.
6. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, whisk toether the remainin inredients. Cover and refrierate until ready to serve. Spoon the sauce over the chicken or use as a dippin sauce.

name: Huevos Rancheros with Fresh Salsa
ingredients: 4 corn tortillas (6 inch), 1/2 tablespoon vegetable oil, non-stick cookin spray, 4 e whites (medium), 4 es (medium), 1/8 teaspoon black pepper (round), 4 tablespoons cheese, shredded cheddar or monterey jack, 2 cups fresh salsa
directions: Preheat oven to 450 derees., Wash hands with soap and water., Lihtly brush tortillas with oil on both sides and place on a baking sheet., Bake for 5 to 10 minutes or until tortillas are crisp on the edes and startin to brown., Remove from oven and set aside., Spray a lare skillet with non-stick cookin spray over medium heat., Drop 4 e whites into skillet, then, break whole es over whites to make 4 separate servings., Cook for 2-3 minutes per side until es are cooked., Place one e on each tortilla shell and top each with 1 Tablespoon cheese, Place under the broiler for about 2 minutes until cheese is melted., Spoon 1/2 cup fresh salsa around the ede of each shell.

name: Indian Vegetable and Rice Skillet Meal
ingredients: 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 onion (chopped), 1 teaspoon round iner, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1/2 teaspoon cumin, 2 cups mixed vegetables (chopped cauliflower, peppers, carrots, or peas), 1 baking potato (lare), 1 cup white rice (uncooked), 2 1/2 cups water, 1 can kidney beans (15 ounces, drained, rinsed), 1/2 salt (1/2 teaspoon, optional)
directions:
1. Heat oil in a lare skillet over medium heat.
2. Add onion, iner, turmeric, and cumin, and stir while cookin for 1 minute.
3. Add remainin inredients. Brin to a boil, cover, and reduce heat.
4. Simmer 20-25 minutes. Serve hot.
5. Refrierate leftovers with in 2-3 hours.

name: Italian Bean Patties
ingredients: 2 cups beans, low-sodium (canned or cooked), 1 e (beaten), 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 2 teaspoons Italian seasonin, 1 cup bread crumbs (dry, or cracker crumbs), 1/8 cup cornmeal (or all purpose flour), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions:
1. In a lare bowl, mash beans. Add e and spices and stir to mix evenly.
2. Stir in bread crumbs. If mixture seems too wet add more breadcrumbs, 1 Tablespoon at a time until mixture resembles meatloaf.
3. Shape into little sausaes or patties. Roll in cornmeal or flour.
4. Fry slowly in vegetable oil over medium heat until crusty and olden brown.

name: Italian Broccoli and Pasta
ingredients: 6 ounces fettucini noodles, uncooked, 3 tablespoons reen onion (chopped, also called scallions), 2 cups broccoli florets, 1/2 teaspoon thyme (dried), 1/2 teaspoon oreano (dried), 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 can stewed tomatoes (low-sodium, 14.5 ounce), 2/3 tablespoon Parmesan cheese (rated)
directions:
1. Cook noodles accordin to packae instructions (do not include oil or salt), and drain.
2. Spray a medium skillet with non-stick cookin spray; stir-fry onion and broccoli for 3 minutes over medium heat.
3. Add seasonins (but not the Parmesan cheese) and tomatoes; simmer until heated throuh.
4. Spoon vegetable mixture over noodles and top with Parmesan cheese.

name: Jamaican Jerk Chicken
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1 1/2 teaspoons allspice (round), 1 1/2 teaspoons black pepper (round), 1 tablespoon hot pepper (chopped), 1 teaspoon hot pepper (crushed, dried), 2 teaspoons oreano (crushed), 2 teaspoons thyme, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 6 arlic clove (finely chopped), 1 cup onion (pureed or finely chopped), 1/4 cup vinear, 9 teaspoons brown suar (3 Tablespoons), 8 pieces of chicken, skinless (4 drumsicks, 4 breasts)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients except chicken in lare bowl. Rub seasonins over chicken and marinate in refrierator for 6 hours or loner., Preheat oven to 350 derees Fahrenheit., Space chicken evenly on non-stick or lihtly reased baking pan., Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 40 minutes. Remove foil and continue baking for an additional 30–40 minutes or until the meat can easily be pulled away from the bone with a fork.

name: Jollof Rice
ingredients: 2 pounds cooked meat, cut into 1-inch cubes (use chicken, bacon, shrimp, or smoked pork), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1/2 cup onion, yellow (finely chopped), 1/2 cup reen peppers (finely chopped), round iner (1/2 teaspoon, optional), 1 can whole tomatoes (14.5 ounces), 2 cans tomato paste (6 ounces each) (no salt added), 8 cups water (2 quarts), 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon thyme, 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper, 2 cups white rice, 2 1/2 cups chicken broth, reduced sodium, 2 1/2 cups water
directions:
1. Sauté cooked meat in oil until slihtly brown.
2. In a lare kettle, sauté yellow onion, reen pepper, and iner in vegetable oil until onions are soft.
3. Add whole tomatoes and simmer for five minutes.
4. Add tomato paste, 2 quarts water, salt, black pepper, thyme, and red pepper.
5. Add cooked meat, simmer 20 minutes loner.
6. In a 2-quart saucepan, cook rice in 5 cups of chicken stock and water until tender.
7. Add salt and pepper to taste.
8. Pour the rice in a deep bowl and arrane the meat in the center.

name: Kellys Herbed Lentils and Rice Casserole
ingredients: 2 2/3 cups chicken broth, 3/4 cup lentils (sorted and rinsed), 3/4 cup onion (chopped), 1/2 cup brown rice (raw), 1/4 cup water, 1/2 teaspoon basil, 1/2 teaspoon oreano, 1/2 teaspoon thyme, 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese, part-skim (divided)
directions:
1. In a 2 1/2 quart casserole dish add the chicken broth, lentils, onions, brown rice, water, spices and 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese.
2. Cover and bake at 350º for 2 hours, addin more broth if casserole seems dry.
3. Top with remainin cheese and bake another 2 or 3 minutes until all the cheese is melted.

name: Kibbeh Khamoustah
ingredients: 1 pound round beef, 85% lean (coarsely round, if available), 1 tablespoon salad oil, 1 cup matzo meal, 1 1/2 cups semolina, 1 cup water, 1 teaspoon salt, 6 cloves arlic, chopped (use 6-7 cloves), 10 scallions, chopped, 6 cups Swiss Chard (2 bunches), lemon juice (optional)
directions: Fry round beef in a small amount of oil., Prepare the douh by mixin matzo meal, semolina, water, and salt., Wet hands and shape into walnut-sized pieces., Roll out douh into a small circle and fill with 1 Tablespoon of meat., Seal the douh. Continue until all the douh and meat is used., In a lare pot, heat a small amount of oil and fry arlic until olden., Add the scallions and Swiss chard. Mix well., Cook about 10 minutes., Cover with water and continue to cook until boilin., Add lemon juice, to taste (optional)., Add stuffed douh to soup and cook 15 more minutes.

name: Leafy Tofu
ingredients: 1 packae tofu, 1 tablespoon oil, 4 cups spinach (2 bunches of fresh spinach), 2 tablespoons soy sauce, reduced sodium, 1/3 tablespoon sesame seeds (1 teaspoon, toasted)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain tofu., Dice tofu into 1-inch cubes., Tear spinach into bite-sized pieces., In a lare pan, heat oil and saute tofu cubes for a few minutes. Move tofu to the center of the pan., Add spinach, and soy sauce. Mix., Cover pan and cook until spinach is wilted., Sprinkle toasted sesame seeds.

name: Leftover Turkey Casserole
ingredients: 6 slices bread, whole wheat, 4 ounces cubed turkey, 1/2 cup onion, chopped, 1/2 cup celery, chopped, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 2 es, lihtly beaten, 1 1/2 cups milk, 1%, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, low-sodium (10.75 ounces), 2 slices bread, whole wheat, 2 teaspoons mararine, 1/2 cup cheddar cheese, low-fat shredded (or jack cheese), 1/2 cup mayonnaise, liht
directions:
1. Lihtly coat a 9x9x2-inch baking dish with vegetable spray. Cut 6 slices of bread (fresh or day-old) into 1-inch cubes and place half into the bottom of a baking dish.
2. In a bowl, combine turkey, onion, celery, mayonnaise, and pepper. Spoon mixture over bread crumbs.
3. Place remainin bread cubes over turkey mixture and press down slihtly with spoon.
4. Combine es and milk and pour mixture over cubes. Cover and refrierate overnight.
5. When ready to bake, preheat oven to 325°F
6. Spoon soup over top of casserole.
7. Spread one teaspoon mararine on side of each slice of bread. Cut buttered bread into 1/2-inch cubes and sprinkle on top of casserole.
8. Bake for 60 minutes or until knife inserted in middle comes out clean. Remove from oven and sprinkle cheese over top. Let stand 15 minutes before cuttin and servin.

name: Lemon Pepper Salmon Patties
ingredients: 3/4 cup breadcrumbs, 1/4 cup reduced fat mayonnaise, 1 e, slihtly beaten (can also use dried e mix), 1/2 teaspoon lemon pepper, 7 ounces frozen salmon, thawed, drained, and finely chopped (optional to remove the skin), Cookin spray
directions: Mix breadcrumbs, mayonnaise, e, and lemon pepper in a medium bowl. Add salmon and mix., Measure 1/3 cup of salmon mixture(packed) and form into a round patty. Repeat until you have five salmon patties., Spray a skillet with cookin spray and set stove to medium heat., Place the salmon patties in the skillet and cook until liht brown, 5–7 minutes. Flip the patties and cook on the other side until brown. Salmon should reach a final internal cook temperature of 145°F as measured with a food thermometer before servin.

name: Lentil Spahetti Sauce
ingredients: 1 pound round beef, 90% lean, 1 cup onion (chopped), 1 arlic clove (crushed, or 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder), 1 1/2 cups lentils (cooked, drained), 28 ounces spahetti sauce, low-sodium (1 jar, can use 28-32 ounces)
directions: 1. In a lare sauce pan brown meat. Drain., 2. Add onion and arlic to drained meat. Cook until onions are soft but not brown., 3. Add cooked lentils and spahetti sauce and brin to a boil. Lower heat and cook ently for 15 minutes., 4. Serve sauce over hot cooked spahetti noodles.

name: Lentil Stew
ingredients: 2 teaspoons olive oil (or canola oil), 1 onion (lare, chopped), 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 1/2 10-ounce packaes of frozen sliced carrots, 1 cup dry lentils (rinsed and drained), 3 cans diced tomatoes (14.5 ounces each), 3 cups water, 1 teaspoon chili powder
directions: 1. Heat the oil in a lare pot over medium heat., 2. Add chopped onion., 3. Cook for 3 minutes, or until tender., 4. Stir in arlic powder, carrots, lentils, tomatoes, water and chili powder., 5. Simmer, uncovered, for about 20 minutes or until lentils are tender.

name: Lentil Tacos
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups dry lentils (sorted and rinsed), 4 cups water, 1/2 reen pepper (chopped), 4 cloves arlic (minced), hot pepper flakes (1/2 teaspoon, optional), 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1/2 teaspoon basil, 2/3 cup tomato paste, 1/4 cup raisins (optional)
directions: 1. Cook lentils in 3 cups water for 10 minutes., 2. Add remainin inredients and simmer for 30 minutes\n(Add more water if necessary)., 3. Serve with corn tortillas. Can also be served over rice or noodles.

name: Mac and Beans Medley
ingredients: 4 arlic clove, 1 bell pepper (reen, red, yellow, or orange), 2 tablespoons oil, 1 can tomatoes (14-15 ounces, diced), 1 can beans (15.5 ounces, black, kidney, pinto or other, drained and rinsed), 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes (crushed), 2 cups macaroni (cooked, without salt or fat added or other pasta)
directions: 1. Wash hands with warm water and soap., 2. Peel and finely chop the arlic. Core, seed, and finely chop the bell pepper., 3. Heat oil in lare skillet over medium-hih heat. Add arlic and bell pepper. Cook for one minute. Do not let arlic brown. Add diced tomatoes (do not drain) and red pepper flakes., 4. Cover the skillet and lower heat. Cook for 10 minutes or until sauce is slihtly thickened., 5. Add beans and cooked macaroni to skillet and cook 5 minutes or until heated throuh., 6. Serve hot.

name: Macaroni & Cheese with Broccoli
ingredients: 2 cups uncooked elbow macaroni, 4 tablespoons flour, 2 cups milk (1%, low fat), 2 cups cheddar cheese, low-fat shredded, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 2 cups broccoli (cooked and chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook macaroni, followin the instructions on the packae., Drain the cooked macaroni and return to the pan., While the macaroni is still warm, sprinkle in the flour and stir thorouhly., Over medium heat, slowly stir the milk into the macaroni., Add the cheese and pepper., Stir over medium heat until the milk and cheese thicken into a creamy sauce, approximately 7-10 minutes., Stir in the broccoli; heat thorouhly., Taste; add a small amount of salt, if needed., Refrierate leftovers.

name: Maic Crust Quiche
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 2 cups vegetables, frozen, no salt added (or use fresh or leftovers), 1 cup cheddar cheese, low-fat (shredded), 3 es, 1 1/2 cups milk, 1%, 3/4 cup baking mix (like Bisquick)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook onion in oil (or cook with vegetables)., Cook vegetables (or use leftovers). Drain well., Grease round pie pan or 8 x 8 inch baking dish., Spread cooked vegetables in pan. Spread cheese on top of vegetables., Mix milk, es and baking mix. Pour over vegetables and cheese., Bake at 350 derees F for 35 minutes, until a safe internal temperature has been reached and a knife inserted into the middle comes out clean.

name: Main Dish Salad
ingredients: 1/2 head of red cabbae, 1/2 head of romaine lettuce, 3 carrot (medium), 1 cucumber, 1 reen pepper, 2 broccoli stalks, 3 tomatoes (medium), 3 cans kidney beans or arbanzo beans (16 ounce), 6 ounces cheese, rated low-fat cheddar, 1/4 cup salad dressin, non-fat
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Wash and drain all vegetables well., Thickly slice red cabbae, tear lettuce into pieces, peel and rate (or slice) carrots and cucumber, cut broccoli into florets and tomato into wedes., Combine all salad inredients in a bowl., Add salad dressin and toss toether lihtly just before servin.

name: Manhattan Clam Chowder
ingredients: 3 celery (stalks, medium - washed & sliced), 1 onion (lare, chopped), 1/2 cup tomato puree (low sodium), 1 1/2 cups potatoes (sliced), 1 1/2 cups carrot (washed and sliced), 2 cans clams (6 1/2 ounces each, chopped, drained), 1 1/2 teaspoons thyme (dried), 1 bay leaf, 2 dashes black peppercorns, 1 1/2 cups water, 2 cups tomato juice (low sodium ), 1 tablespoon parsley flakes (dried)
directions: 1. Scrub potatoes well to remove any eyes or blemishes., 2. In a slow cooker, combine all inredients; stir., 3. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until the vegetables are tender., 4. Remove bay leaf and peppercorns before servin.

name: Marinated Beef
ingredients: 12 ounces beef round steak, 1 arlic clove, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 4 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
directions: 1. Usin a cuttin board and sharp knife, cut round steak across the rain into thin strips about 1/2 inch wide and 2 to 3 inches lon., 2. In a medium lass mixin bowl, combine arlic, lemon juice, 2 Tablespoons of vegetable oil, salt and pepper., 3. Add beef strips and stir to coat with the oil mixture (marinade sauce). Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrierate for about 2 hours., 4. In a medium skillet over medium-hih heat, heat 2 Tablespoons of the oil for 1-2 minutes until hot., 5. Drain marinade from beef. Put beef in skillet, stir and cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until meat is thorouhly browned.

name: Meatball Soup
ingredients: 6 cups water, 1/3 cup brown rice, 3 bouillon cubes (low-sodium chicken or beef flavored, or 1 tablespoon low-sodium bouillon powder), 1 tablespoon oreano, 8 ounces round beef (90% lean, or turkey or chicken), 1 tomato (finely chopped), 1/2 onion (peeled and finely chopped), 1 e (lare), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups vegetable mix (chopped, fresh, carrots, celery, and spinach)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare pot, combine water, rice, bouillon cubes, and oreano. Brin to a boil over hih heat., Stir to dissolve bouillon. Reduce heat to low and simmer., Meanwhile, in a lare bowl, mix round meat, tomato, onion, e, and salt. Form into 12 meatballs., Add meatballs to broth mixture and simmer 30 minutes., Add vegetables. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until meatballs are cooked and rice and vegetables are tender., Serve hot.

name: Meatloaf
ingredients: 1 pound round beef, 1 can (about 15 ounces) low-sodium cream style corn, 1/2 cup onion, diced, 1 teaspoon arlic, finely chopped, 1/2 cup water, 1/2 cup yellow cornmeal, 2 tablespoons dried e mix (or 1 e) (or 1 e), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, Nonstick cookin spray
directions: Preheat oven to 375 derees F., In a lare pan, cook round beef over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain fat., Add corn, onions, and arlic to pan, and cook for an additional 10 minutes., Add water, cornmeal, e mix, salt, and pepper to the beef mixture. Stir well and cook for 15 minutes., Use a lare iron skillet or loaf pan. Spray pan with nonstick cookin spray. Form beef and cornmeal mixture into a loaf in a pan., Cover pan with an oven-safe lid or foil and bake for 35 to 40 minutes.

name: Meatloaf in a Mu
ingredients: 1/4 pound round beef, 85% lean (or leaner), 2 tablespoons oatmeal, 1 tablespoon catsup, 2 teaspoons milk, 1%, 1 teaspoon dry onion mix
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients and stir to mix., Spray microwave-safe mu with cookin spray., Pat beef mixture into mu. Make a small hold in center, all the way to the bottom., Microwave on HIGH (100%) for 3 minutes or until done.

name: Meaty Stuffed Potatoes
ingredients: 3 potatoes (medium), 8 ounces turkey, chicken, beef, or pork, diced and cooked, 1 cup broccoli (coarsely chopped), 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 1/2 cup carrot (thinly sliced), 3/4 cup water (hot), 3/4 cup non-fat milk, 1 tablespoon flour, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 cup cheese, shredded low-fat
directions: 1. Wash your hands and work area., 2. Scrub potatoes. Remove any bad spots. Do not peel. Cut each in half., 3. In a covered saucepan, boil potatoes in just enouh water to cover the pieces. When they are fork-tender (about 15 to 20 minutes), remove from heat and drain. Set aside. (Note: you can also pierce whole potatoes with a knife or fork in several places and cook in microwave without water until fork tender, then cut each in half)., 4. Meanwhile, in a skillet sprayed with non-stick cookin spray, combine cooked meat, broccoli, onion, carrots and water., 5. Boil until vegetables are fork tender - about 5 minutes. Reduce heat to low., 6. In a jar with a tiht fittin lid, combine milk, flour and pepper. Shake well., 7. Stir flour mixture into meat mixture until well blended., 8. Stir in cheese. Cook over low heat about 5 minutes loner or until sauce thickens, stirrin frequently., 9. To serve, place 2 potato halves on each plate and mash the middle somewhat. Spoon about one third cup of the meat mixture over each potato half, 10. Cover and refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Mediterranean Roasted Eplant with Tomato Sauce
ingredients: 2 eplant (medium), 1 cup pizza sauce (low-sodium, or low-sodium spahetti sauce), 1/2 cup yoghurt (low-fat plain), 1 arlic clove (finely chopped), vegetable oil spray (as needed)
directions: 1. Wash hands thorouhly with warm water and soap., 2. Preheat the oven to 350° F., 3. Wash and remove the stem end, and slice the eplants into 1/2-inch slices., 4. Spray a baking pan with vegetable oil spray and lay the eplant in the pan in a sinle layer., 5. Spoon low-sodium pizza or spahetti sauce on each slice., 6. Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven., 7. Stir the yoghurt and arlic toether., 8. Drizzle the sauce in thin lines on each of the eplant slices before servin. You can do this easily by puttin the sauce in a plastic squirt bottle or usin a spoon., 9. Serve immediately as an entrée or side dish.

name: Mias "Crumbs"
ingredients: 4 tortillas (lare), 3 tablespoons canola oil, 1/4 cup bell pepper, 1/4 cup onion, 4 e (lihtly beaten), 4 tablespoons cheddar cheese, low-fat (rated)
directions: Wash hands and cookin area., Tear tortillas into small pieces., Heat oil in a medium-sized pan., Add tortillas and stir until pieces bein to brown., Add peppers and onion; sauté until soft., Add es; stir until the es are cooked., Remove from heat and sprinkle on the rated cheese., Cover the pan and let cheese melt., Serve immediately.

name: Mouth-Waterin Oven-Fried Fish
ingredients: 2 pounds fish fillets (see notes), 1 tablespoon lemon juice (fresh), 1/4 cup buttermilk, 1%, 1 teaspoon arlic (fresh, minced), 2 dashes hot sauce, 1/4 teaspoon white pepper (round), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 cup corn flakes (crumbled or reular bread crumbs), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 lemon (fresh, cut )
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 475ºF., Clean and rinse fish. Wipe fillets with lemon juice and pat dry., Combine milk, hot sauce, and arlic., Combine pepper, salt, and onion powder with crumbs and place on plate., Let fillets sit briefly in milk. Remove and coat fillets on both sides with seasoned crumbs. Let stand briefly until coatin sticks to each side of fish., Arrane on lihtly oiled shallow baking dish., Bake for 20 minutes on middle rack without turnin., Cut into 6 pieces. Serve with fresh lemon.

name: Mozzarella Chicken with Garlic Spinach
ingredients: 8 chicken breast halves (small, skin and bone removed), 1/2 cup bread crumbs (Italian seasoned, crushed), 8 ounces mozzarella cheese, part skim (shredded), 1 tablespoon canola oil, 4 cloves arlic (minced), 2 packaes spinach leaves
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 derees F., Place chicken between 2 sheets of plastic wrap; pound chicken to 1/4 inch thick., Coat chicken with bread crumbs and place on foil-covered baking sheet. Discard remainin bread crumbs. Bake 10 minutes., Top chicken with cheese; bake 4-5 minutes until cheese is melted and chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165 derees F., Meanwhile, heat oil in a lare skillet on medium heat. Add arlic and stir 1 minute., Add half the spinach and cook 1 minute., Add remainin spinach. Cook until wilted, turnin occasionally. Serve with chicken.

name: Mushroom Beef Sloppy Joes
ingredients: 1/2 pound white button mushrooms, 1/2 pound cremini mushrooms, 1/4 pound 90% lean round beef, 1 1/2 tablespoons canola oil, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1 clove arlic (minced), 1 can 8oz no-salt-added tomato sauce, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 3 teaspoons brown suar, 1 teaspoon cider vinear, 1/8 teaspoon round black pepper, 4 whole-wheat buns
directions: Chop mushrooms to approximate size and texture of cooked round beef., Heat a sauté pan over medium-hih heat., Add round beef and mushrooms, and cook., Sauté until round beef is done., Remove mushroom-beef mixture from pan., Add onions and arlic to pan; cook until olden., Return mushroom-beef mixture to pan, alon with remainin inredients., Simmer about 10 minutes; remove from heat.

name: Mushroom Steak Fajitas
ingredients: 12 ounces sirloin or other boneless steak (about 3/4-inch thick), 3 cups sliced cremini mushrooms, 1 tablespoon no-salt fiesta lime seasonin (divided), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 cup reen bell pepper slices, 1 medium red bell pepper (sliced into strips), 1 medium yellow bell pepper (sliced into strips), 8 whole-wheat tortillas (6-inch), 1 medium tomato (diced), 2 cups shredded iceber lettuce, 4 tablespoons non-fat sour cream
directions: Slice beef across the rain into 1/4-inch strips. Place in a medium bowl with 1/2 tbsp fiesta lime seasonin; toss to coat., Place mushrooms, peppers, and onion and remainin fiesta lime seasonin in a lare bowl; toss to coat., Heat oil in lare, non-stick skillet. Add beef strips; cook about 3-4 minutes. Remove from skillet., Place coated vegetables in skillet and sauté until vegetables are slihtly tender, about 5-8 minutes., Add beef back to skillet and sauté mixture 1-2 more minutes., Assemble fajitas by dividin beef-vegetable mixture evenly on each tortilla, top with remainin inredients and roll up.

name: Neopolitan Tuna Fettucine
ingredients: 8 ounces whole rain fettuccine pasta, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 small onion, diced, 2 cloves arlic, minced, 1 can no salt added diced tomatoes (14.5 oz. can), 2 teaspoons capers, 5 ounces canned tuna, packed in water, drained, 1/4 cup sliced ripe olives, drained (or 1-2.2 ounce can), Salt and round pepper to taste
directions: Cook fettuccine as label directs. Reserve 1 cup cookin liquid; drain., Meanwhile, in 10-inch skillet over medium heat, in hot oil, cook onion and arlic, about 5 minutes until just softened. Add diced tomatoes and capers; simmer 5 minutes. Add tuna, olives, salt and pepper to taste., Toss fettuccine with tuna mixture to mix well. Serve immediately. If necessary, add reserved cookin liquid.

name: New Orleans Red Beans
ingredients: 1 pound red beans (dry), 8 cups water (2 quarts), 1 1/2 cups onion (chopped), 1 cup celery (chopped), 4 bay leaves, 1 cup reen pepper (chopped), 3 tablespoons arlic (chopped), 3 tablespoons parsley (chopped), 2 teaspoons thyme (dried, crushed), 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon round black pepper
directions: 1. Pick throuh beans to remove bad beans; rinse thorouhly., 2. In a lare pot combine beans, water, onion, celery, and bay leaves. Brin to a boil; reduce heat. Cover and cook over low heat for about 1-1/2 hours until beans are tender. Stir. Mash beans aainst side of pan., 3. Add reen pepper, arlic, parsley, thyme, salt, and black pepper. Cook, uncovered, over low heat until creamy (about 30 minutes). Remove bay leaves., 4. Serve with hot cooked brown rice, if desired.

name: One Pan Potatoes & Chicken
ingredients: 4 potatoes (medium, cut into 3/4 in cubes, microwaved 8-10 minutes until tender, or cooked on the top of the stove about 15 minutes until tender), 16 ounces chicken breasts, boned and skinned (cut into 3/4 inch cubes), 2 tablespoons oil, 1 cup salsa, 1 can whole kernel corn (15 ounce, drained)
directions: 1. Cook potatoes as directed., 2. In a lare skillet, brown chicken in oil on hih for 5 minutes., 3. Add potatotes; cook until potatoes are lihtly browned., 4. Add salsa and corn. Cook until heated throuh.

name: One Pan Spahetti
ingredients: 1 pound round beef (lean), 1 onion (medium, chopped), 3 1/2 cups water, 1 can tomato sauce (15 ounces), 2 teaspoons dried oreano, 1/2 teaspoon suar, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon rosemary, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 16 ounces spahetti noodles (broken), 1 cup Parmesan cheese (shredded)
directions: 1. Brown meat and onions in a lare skillet over medium-hih heat (300 derees in an electric skillet). Drain fat., 2. Stir in water, tomato sauce, and spices; brin to a boil., 3. Add spahetti, cover pan, and simmer 10-15 minutes, stirrin often to prevent stickin., 4. When spahetti is tender, top with rated cheese., 5. Refrierate leftovers with in 2 hours.

name: One Pan Taco Rice
ingredients: 1 pound round turkey, 85% lean (or round beef), 1 cup chopped onion, 1 taco seasonin packet, 2 cans tomatoes and reen chiles (10 ounce cans), 3 cups cooked rice (brown), 1/2 cup shredded cheese, low-fat
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare skillet or pot, brown round turkey and cook onion. When done, use paper towel to soak up any rease., Add remainin inredients except cheese and mix toether., Heat until very hot., Top with cheese before servin.

name: One-Dish Roasted Potatoes and Apples with Chicken Sausae
ingredients: 3 red potatoes or your favorite potato variety (about 1 pound), 1 tablespoon canola oil, 2 red apples (Fuji, Pink Lady, Honeycrisp, Gala, etc.), 1 yellow onion, 4 chicken herb link sausaes (12 ounces), 2 tablespoons cider vinear, 1/2 teaspoon round mustard, 1 tablespoon honey
directions: Preheat oven to 425 °F., Cut potatoes into chunks, place in 2-quart baking dish., Drizzle with canola oil. Toss to coat., Roast potatoes in oven for about 20 minutes., While potatoes are roastin, cut apples and onions into chunks, and sausae into 1/2-inch slices., Remove baking dish from oven and reduce heat to 375 °F. Add all remainin inredients to baking dish and toss., Return baking dish to oven and roast an additional 30 minutes until apples and potatoes are tender.

name: Orange Pork Chops
ingredients: 2 pork chops, 1 sweet potato (peeled, medium), 1/2 orange (sliced), cinnamon (dash, optional), salt (dash, optional), black pepper (dash, optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 derees., 1. In a medium skillet, brown pork chops in a small amount of oil., 2. Cut sweet potato into 1/2-inch slices., 3. Place meat and sweet potato slices in a baking dish and top with orange slices; sprinkle with seasonins if desired., 4. Cover and bake for 1 hour until meat is tender., Cook pork to 145 derees.

name: Oven Fried Fish
ingredients: 1 e (slihtly beaten), salt (optional, 1/2 teaspoon), 1/2 teaspoon round black pepper, 1 pound tilapia fillets, fresh or thawed (4 fillets), 1/2 cup bread crumbs, 1 tablespoon butter, melted, fresh lime or lemon (sliced, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350°F., In a small bowl, add e, salt (if desired), and pepper and beat toether., Place the bread crumbs in a separate bowl. Dip fish fillets in the e mixture, then dip in the bread crumbs to coat., Melt butter in a shallow 9x13 inch baking pan for 1 minute in the oven. Tilt pan to coat with butter. , Arrane fish fillets in the pan., Bake uncovered for 15-20 minutes, until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve topped with lime or lemon slices (optional).

name: Oven Roasted Chicken
ingredients: 1 chicken, broiler/fryer (thawed, if frozen), 2 tablespoons Italian dressin, low-fat (or olive oil), 1 teaspoon arlic salt, 1 lemon, quartered (or orange)
directions: 1. If chicken is frozen, thaw in the refrierator 24 hours before cookin., 2. Place chicken on a pan or plate while thawin in the refrierator., 3. Preheat oven to 375°F., 4. Remove necks and iblets from chicken cavity, if present before cookin. Reserve for another use., 5. Place chicken, breast side up, in a roastin pan., 6. Brush chicken skin with Italian dressin and sprinkle with arlic salt., 7. Stuff lemon or orange into chicken cavity., 8. Roast 1 1/4 - 1 1/2 hours or until meat thermometer inserted into chicken thih reisters 165°F., 9. Let chicken set for 15 minutes after removin from the oven before carvin.

name: Pan Roasted Tilapia with Tomatillo Salsa
ingredients: 1 pound tomatillos, 1/2 cup yellow onion (peeled and finely chopped), 2 serrano or other chiles (finely chopped), 3 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 3 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1/4 teaspoon Kosher salt, 1 tablespoon Fresh lime juice (about 1/2 lime), 1/4 cup fresh cilantro leaves (chopped), 4 tilapia fillets (patted dry with a paper towel, any inexpensive white fish can be used)
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 derees, To make the tomatillo salsa: (Canned tomatillo salsa can be used instead of fresh), To prepare the tomatillos, peel back the husk from the smooth reen tomatillo skin. Rinse the tomatillos with warm water and cut into quarters., Place the husked tomatillos, onion, chilies, arlic, and 1 teaspoon oil in the baking pan, stir well and transfer to the oven. Roast about 20 minutes until the tomatillos are soft and dark reen. Set aside to cool., Transfer the mixture to the blender; add the salt, lime juice, and cilantro and puree.

name: Party-Time Pasta
ingredients: 1/2 pound turkey, 85% lean round, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 can tomatoes, crushed (14 1/2 ounces, low sodium), 2 cups chicken broth, reduced sodium (14.5 ounces), 2 cups pasta, bow-tie, uncooked, 3 cups frozen vegetables such as carrots, broccoli and cauliflower, thawed
directions: 1. Heat a lare nonstick pan over medium heat. Add round turkey and paprika. Cook and stir until meat is brown and no loner pink, about 5 minutes., 2. Stir in tomatoes, chicken broth and pasta. Brin mixture to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Cover and simmer until pasta is almost tender, about 10-15 minutes., 3. Remove lid. Place vegetables on top of pasta. Replace lid. Cook until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes., 4. Prepare the Tasty Toppin. Mix parsley, bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese. Sprinkle over vegetables in skillet. Cover and let sit for 3 minutes before servin.

name: Pasta Bolonese
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 carrot (scrubbed and diced into 1/4-inch pieces), 1 celery stalk (chopped into 1/4-inch pieces), 1 yellow onion (peeled and chopped into 1/4 inch pieces), 3/4 pound lean round beef (80-85% lean), 1 cup water, 2 cans 14.5-ounce low-sodium crushed or diced tomatoes (includin liquid), 1/4 cup low-sodium tomato paste, 1 cup 2% milk, 8 ounces whole wheat pasta, 1/4 cup rated Parmesan cheese
directions: To cook the Bolonese sauce: Put skillet on the stove over medium heat and when it is hot, add oil. Add carrot, celery, and onion and cook about 10 minutes, stirrin occasionally, until the vegetables bein to brown. Raise the heat to hih. Pinch off tablespoon-size pieces of the beef and add a few at a time, stirrin well between additions. Cook, breakin the meat apart until it is no loner raw, starts to ive off liquid, and no loner clumps toether, about 10 minutes., Add the water, tomatoes, and tomato paste, stirrin well.  Cook about 10 minutes until the sauce beins to thicken., Slowly stir in the milk, a little bit at a time. Turn the heat down to low and cook 45 minutes until all the liquid has been absorbed., To cook the pasta: fill a lare pot halfway with water. Brin it to a boil over hih heat. Add the pasta and about 12 minutes cook until just tender. Drain the pasta and divide into 4 bowls. Top each bowl with about ¾ cup Bolonese and sprinkle with 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese. Serve riht away.

name: Pasta Frittata with Peas
ingredients: 4 ounces spahetti (whole rain, reular or thin), 4 es (lihtly beaten), 1 nutme (dash, optional), 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 1/8 salt (1/8 teaspoon, optional, can omit salt and pass at the table), 2/3 cup cheese (shredded), 1 cup peas (frozen, thawed, or 1 cup chopped tomatoes)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 derees F., Cook pasta accordin to packae directions. Drain and place in a 9-inch pie plate that has been sprayed with nonstick cookin spray., Combine es, seasonins, cheese and peas. Spread the e mixture over the top of the spahetti so the mixture covers the frittata and some of it sinks between the spahetti strands., Bake for 20 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Let frittata stand 5 minutes before servin.

name: Pasta Primavera
ingredients: 1 cup noodles, uncooked, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 cups mixed vegetables (chopped), 1 cup tomatoes (chopped), 1 tablespoon mararine, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 3 tablespoons Parmesan cheese
directions: Cook noodles accordin to packae directions., While noodles are cookin, heat oil in a skillet., Add vegetables and saute until tender; stir constantly., Add tomato and saute 2 more minutes., Toss vegetables with noodles and mararine., Add seasonins; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

name: Pasta Primavera II
ingredients: 3 cups uncooked pasta (any shape ), 1 10-ounce packaes frozen mixed vegetables, 1 jar spahetti sauce, low-sodium (26 ounces), 4 tablespoons rated Parmesan cheese
directions:
1. Prepare pasta accordin to packae directions. Add frozen vegetables durin the last 5 minutes of cookin time.
2. Drain pasta and vegetables and set aside.
3. Brin the spahetti sauce to a boil over medium heat.
4. Stir in the pasta and vegetables.
5. Top with rated Parmesan cheese.

name: Pasta with Chickpeas, Tomato, and Spinach
ingredients: 1 small yellow onion (peeled and chopped into 1/4 pieces), 8 ounces medium-size whole-wheat pasta (such as rotini or shells), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 2 carrots (scrubbed and diced into 1/4-inch pieces), 1 celery stalk (diced into 1/4-1/2-inch pieces), 1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary, 1 can 16-ounce low sodium chickpeas (drained and rinsed with cold water), 1 can 14.5-ounce low-sodium diced tomatoes (includin the liquid), 2 cups spinach (washed and chopped), 1/2 teaspoon chopped red pepper flakes (optional), 1/4 cup rated Parmesan cheese
directions: To cook the pasta, fill the pot halfway with water. Brin it to a boil over hih heat. When the water is boilin, add the pasta and cook until just tender, about 12 minutes. Just before drainin, reserve 1 ½ cups of the pasta water. Drain the pasta and set aside., While the pasta is cookin, cook the sauce: Put the skillet on the stove over medium-low heat and when it is hot, add the oil. Add the arlic, onion, carrots, celery, and rosemary and cook until the arlic is olden, about 15 minutes. , Add the chickpeas and usin the fork, lihtly mash half of them. Add the reserved pasta water and tomatoes and cook 10 minutes., Add the pasta and spinach to the skillet mixture and cook until the spinach is tender and most of the liquid has been absorbed by the pasta, about 10 minutes. Add the red pepper flakes, if desired., Mix well and serve immediately, arnished with Parmesan cheese.

name: Pasta with Greens, Beans, and Chicken
ingredients: 16 ounces pasta, whole wheat, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 onion, chopped, 3 cloves arlic, chopped, 2 cups cooked chicken cubes (or 3 chicken sausaes, chopped), 6 cups spinach, chopped (or 1 bunch Swiss chard), 1 can cannellini beans, low sodium (15.5 ounces, rinsed and drained, can also use reat northern or navy beans), 2 cups chicken broth, low-sodium (or vegetable broth), 1 teaspoon Italian seasonin, salt and pepper (optional, to taste), 1/2 parmesan cheese, rated (1/2 cup, optional)
directions:
1. Cook the pasta accordin to directions on box, and drain.
2. On medium heat, add vegetable oil and onion to a lare pan.
3. Cook for 5 minutes, add arlic and cook for 1 minute more.
4. Stir in chopped chicken and cook until heated throuh.
5. Add spinach (or chard), beans, chicken or vegetable stock, and spices.
6. Add in cooked pasta and stir to combine.
7. Cook for 5 minutes, until pasta is heated throuh.
8. Add salt and pepper, to taste (optional), and arnish with Parmesan cheese before serving (optional).

name: Peanutty Stew
ingredients: 1 cup brown rice (instant), 2 cups chicken broth (reduced sodium), 1/3 tablespoon dehydrated onion (minced), 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon iner (round), 1/8 cup red pepper (optional), 1 sweet potato (2 cups, peeled and diced), 1 can tomatoes (diced, 14.5 ounces, with liquid), 1/2 teaspoon salt (optional), 1/2 cup peanut butter (creamy, reduced-fat), 1 1/4 cups milk (non-fat), 3 cups baby spinach (coarsely chopped), 1/4 cup peanuts (roasted, chopped), reen onion (optional, thinly sliced for arnish)
directions: Combine first 9 inredients in a soup pot. Brin to boil, then turn down to medium low, cover and simmer for 10 minutes., Stir in peanut butter and milk. Return to entle simmer and cook uncovered for 5 minutes., Stir in spinach and cook until wilted, 2 to 3 minutes. Remove from heat., Ladle stew into bowls and top with peanuts and reen onion, if desired.

name: Pear Quesadillas
ingredients: 2 wheat tortillas (8" diameter), 1/2 cup shredded pepper jack cheese, 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 tablespoon dried basil, 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 2 canned pear halves (sliced thin), 2 teaspoons olive oil
directions: Sprinkle cheese, onion, and dried basil on half of each tortilla., Place pear slices on top of other inredients in each tortilla., Brush each side of folded tortillas with olive oil., Heat each folded tortilla in a non-stick skillet until cheese melts, about 2 to 3 minutes on each side., Cut quesadilla into four pieces and serve immediately.

name: Picadillo
ingredients: 1 pound turkey, round, 85% lean, 1 onion (chopped), 5 carrot (small, diced), 2 zucchini (medium, or other squash), 2 potatoes (medium, diced), 1 teaspoon salt, black pepper (to taste), 1/2 teaspoon cumin, 1 1/4 cups Mexican style tomato sauce (10 1/2 ounce can), 1 teaspoon cornstarch
directions: 1. Brown round turkey in a non-stick fryin pan., 2. Add onions, carrots, squash, potatoes, salt, pepper, and cumin. Sauté for about 5 minutes., 3. Add tomato sauce and just enouh water to cover. Brin to a boil, then lower heat and simmer, uncovered, until vegetables are tender., 4. Dissolve cornstarch in about 1 Tablespoon of cold water, add to mixture, brin back to a boil until ravy thickens. Serve.

name: Picadillo
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked brown rice, 2 cups water, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 yellow onion (peeled and diced), 1 bell pepper (cored, seeded, and diced), 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 1 1/2 teaspoons dried oreano, 1 teaspoon round cumin, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon Kosher salt, 3/4 pound lean round turkey or beef, 1 can 14.5 ounce low-sodium diced tomatoes (includin liquid), 1 can 15.5 ounce low-sodium black beans (drained and rinsed with cold water), 1/4 cup reen olives (chopped), 1/4 cup raisins
directions: Prepare the rice:, 1.     Cook as instructed on the packae., Prepare the Picadillo:, 2.     Place the skillet on the stove over medium heat and when hot, add oil. Add the onion, pepper, and arlic.  Cook and stir about 10 minutes until the onion is softened and lihtly browned., 3.     Add oreano, cumin, pepper, and salt, and stir well., 4.     Add beef, in small amounts. Stir well and cook about 5 minutes until the beef is cooked throuhout., 5.     Add beans and tomatoes and simmer about 15 minutes until mixture blends toether., 6.     Add olives and raisins. Stir well and cook about 2 minutes until heated throuh., 7.     Serve over rice or refrierate in an airtiht container for up to 3 days. Serve with avocado, if desired.

name: Pineapple Avocado Chicken Salad
ingredients: 1 avocado (divided), 2 tablespoons non-fat plain Greek yoghurt, 1 tablespoon rice vinear, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper
directions: Mash ½ avocado in a small dish; add yoghurt, rice vinear, salt and pepper., Cut remainin avocado into small chunks and mix toether with pineapple, bell pepper, carrots, cabbae, reen onion and chicken., Add dressin; mix ently., Fill pita pockets and serve.

name: Pineapple Chicken
ingredients: 2 1/2 pounds chicken, boneless skinless, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 1 can pineapple (20 oz. can crushed or chunks), 2 us fluid ounces water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Coat fryin pan with nonstick cookin spray and set heat to low., Once pan heats up, add chicken. Sprinkle with salt and pepper., Cook uncovered until chicken beins to brown, then add crushed pineapple and water., Cover chicken until chicken is tender., May serve over rice.

name: Pineapple Pork
ingredients: 1 reen pepper (medium), 4 pork chops (boneless, about 1 pound), 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 cup pineapple chunks (8-ounce, undrained), 1/4 teaspoon iner, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cut the reen pepper into strips., Heat the oil in a lare skillet., Place pork chops on the heated skillet. Sprinkle the salt on top., Cook the pork for 5 minutes on low heat on each side., The pork should lose its pink color when it’s cooked enouh., Remove the cooked pork from the skillet. Place it in a serving dish., Put the reen pepper slices in the skillet., Stir the in pineapple chunks with their juice., Stir in the iner and cinnamon., Simmer for about 3-5 minutes., Spoon the pineapple mixture over cooked pork.

name: Pizza Meat Loaf
ingredients: 1 pound round turkey (85% lean), 3/4 cup spahetti sauce, 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese, part-skim, 1/2 cup reen pepper (chopped), 1/4 cup onion (minced)
directions: 1. Lihtly rease 9 inch pie plate with vegetable oil. Pat turkey into pie plate., 2. Cover turkey with waxed paper. Cook in microwave on hih; rotate plate 1/4 turn after 3 minutes. Cook until turkey reaches an internal temperature of 160 derees, about 5 more minutes. Drain excess liquid.\nOR\nPlace turkey in 350 deree oven; bake until turkey reaches an internal temperature of 160 derees, about 30-35 minutes. Drain any excess liquid., 3. Top cooked turkey with vegetables, spahetti sauce and cheese., 4. Return turkey to either the microwave or oven and heat until cheese is melted, about 1-2 minutes.

name: Polenta with Pepper and Cheese
ingredients: 4 cups water, 1 1/2 cups corn meal (or polenta, uncooked), 1 can whole kernel corn mixed with reen and red peppers (11 ounces, drained), 2 cans reen chiles (7 - 8 ounces), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon mararine or butter, 6 ounces cheese, cheddar, reduced fat, shredded, 1 can black or pinto beans (15 ounces, rinsed)
directions: 1. In a medium sauce pan, brin the water to a boil. Gradually add the cornmeal or polenta. Reduce heat to low., 2. Continue stirrin, add the corn, chiles and the salt. Cook 6-8 minutes or until mixture thickens, stirrin occasionally., 3. Gently stir in the mararine, cheese and beans., 4. Remove from the heat and transfer to a serving dish., 5. Garnish with red bell pepper rins and cilantro.

name: Pork Loin Roast with Veggies
ingredients: 2 cups onions, cut in wedes (about 1/2 pound or 2 medium ), 2 cups potatoes, diced (about 12 ounces or medium), 2 cups baby carrots (or 3/4 pound reular carrots, sliced), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil (divided), 1 1/4 pounds pork loin, 3 teaspoons brown suar (1 Tablespoon), 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400°F., In a bowl mix veggies with 1 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper., Lay veggies around the ede of a 9"x13" pan and put in oven., Use a small bowl to make the rub. Mix the brown suar, arlic, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in the bowl., Sprinkle the rub over the loin. Press ently so the rub sticks to the roast. Wash your hands after handlin the raw meat., Heat the remainin 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a lare skillet over medium hih heat. Add the loin. Brown the sides of meat. Turn after about 2-3 minutes per side., Transfer the pork to the center of the pan with veggies. Bake for about 40 minutes. A meat thermometer should read 145°F. Check the temperature after 30 minutes in the oven., Remove from oven. Let set for 5 minutes. Slice and serve.

name: Pot Roasted Beef
ingredients: 1 pound beef round roast, thawed, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon vegetable oil, 8 red potatoes, peeled and quartered (or 2 cans, about 30 ounces, low-sodium sliced potatoes, drained), 2 turnips, peeled and quartered (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium sweet potatoes, drained), 1/2 cup onion, chopped in 1-inch pieces, 1/2 cup carrots, chopped in 1-inch pieces, 1/2 cup low-sodium tomato juice
directions: Preheat oven to 350 derees F., Season the roast with salt and pepper., In a lare pan, brown the roast in the oil over medium to hih heat for 10 to 12 minutes. Drain fat., Use a lare iron skillet or roastin pan. Put the roast in the middle of the pan. Add the potatoes, turnips, onions, and carrots around the roast., Pour the tomato juice over the roast and vegetables., Cover the pan with a lid or foil and bake for 1 hour or until potatoes are cooked., If desired, cut roast into one inch chunks. Mix and serve.

name: Potato Beef Casserole
ingredients: 1 onion (diced), 1/2 pound round beef (85% lean), 5 potatoes (or 1 packae hash browns), 1 can cream of mushroom soup, reduced sodium (10.75 ounces), 5 ounces water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel onion and dice into 1/4-inch pieces., Cook round beef and onions in a skillet until the meat is browned. Drain of fat., Add mushroom soup and 1/2 can water., Use a brush to scrub potatoes under cold runnin water. Slice potatoes into 1/2-inch thick pieces and places in the bottom of a casserole dish., Spread meat and soup mixture over potatoes., Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes until potatoes are tender and casserole is bubbly and browned.

name: Potato Nachos
ingredients: 6 small red potatoes, skins on (1 pound), 2 teaspoons vegetable oil or cookin spray, 8 ounces lean round turkey (15% fat or less), 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 cup reduced-fat shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded lettuce, 1 tomato, diced, 3/4 cup peeled and diced cucumber, 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro, 3/4 cup salsa
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Slice potatoes into small circles about 1/4 inch thick., Lihtly coat the potato slices with oil (or spray for 3 seconds with cookin spray)., Arrane slices on a baking sheet in a sinle layer. Bake in the oven at 450 derees F for 25 to 30 minutes, dependin on desired darkness., Meanwhile, add round turkey and chili powder to a skillet. Cook, stirrin over medium heat (300 derees F in an electric skillet) for 8 to10 minutes or until turkey browns., Remove potatoes from the oven., Transfer baked potatoes to an oven-safe dish. Top with turkey and sprinkle with cheese. Put back in the oven to melt the cheese, about 2 minutes., Remove from oven and top with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, cilantro and salsa.

name: Potato Skins with Buffalo Chicken
ingredients: 12 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast, 1 cup water, 4 medium russet potatoes (about 6 oz each), 9 teaspoons hot pepper sauce, 1/4 cup non-fat milk, 1/4 cup fat-reduced sour cream, 2 tablespoons mararine, 1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese, 2 reen onions, 2 medium tomatoes, 4 celery stalks
directions: Center oven rack and preheat oven to 425 °F., Place chicken in a sauté pan, add water, and cover. Simmer for 20 minutes and remove from pan; let cool slihtly. When chicken is cool enouh to handle, shred usin two forks, one in each hand., While chicken is simmerin, wash and scrub potatoes with a clean vegetable brush under runnin water and slit each one lenthwise about 1-inch deep., Place potatoes in a microwave-safe dish and microwave on hih, uncovered, for about 10 minutes. Let cool slihtly., Slice each potato in half lenth-wise, scoop out potato, leavin a 1/4 inch shell. Mash potato toether with hot pepper sauce, sour cream, mararine, and milk. Fold in blue cheese and shredded chicken., Spoon mixture into potato skins slihtly dentin center (to hold fresh toppins after baking)., Place filled potato skins on a 9x13" baking sheet and bake about 15-20 minutes until tops are olden brown., Dice tomatoes and reen onions. Cut celery stalks into four inch sticks., To serve, top potatoes with onions and tomatoes. Serve celery sticks on the side for scoopin potato contents.

name: Potato, Black Bean, & Kale Skillet
ingredients: 4 red potatoes, 2 1/2 cups kale (curly Italian or other variety, approx. 6 oz.), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 clove arlic (minced), 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1 can 15 oz. no salt added black beans (drained and and rinsed), 1/2 cup nonfat plain Greek yoghurt
directions: Dice potatoes into 1/4" pieces., Chop kale., Heat oil, in lare skillet over medium heat, Add arlic and onions; cook 2-3 minutes until just startin to brown., Add diced potatoes, chili, salt, and pepper to skillet, cover with lid and cook 8-10 minutes, stirrin occasionally., Add chopped kale and black beans. Cook about 3-5 more minutes, stirrin ently., Serve with Greek yoghurt.

name: Pulled Pork Sandwich with Red Cabbae and Carrot Slaw
ingredients: 1 half pork shoulder (bone-in), 1 1/2 cups cider or white vinear (or a combination of both), 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon Crushed red pepper flakes, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 8 100% whole wheat dinner rolls or slider buns
directions: Pulled Pork:, 1.     Put everythin in the slow cooker and turn the heat to medium. Cook, undisturbed, for 8 hours or until it is fork-tender (about 190 derees with a meat thermometer)., 2.     Remove the pork from the slow cooker but keep the liquid. While still hot, use two forks to shred the meat. Remove any fat found between the shreds., 3.     Skim as much fat as possible from the liquid in the slow cooker. Add about 1 cup of the cookin liquid to the shredded pork., Red Cabbae and Carrot Slaw:, 4.     Put the shredded cabbae and carrots in a bowl., 5.     Mix the canola oil, vinear, salt and pepper in a small bowl and stir or whisk well., 6.     Add the dressin to the cabbae mixture and coat thorouhly., 7.     Add 1/2 cup of pulled pork to each roll or bun and top with 1/2 cup cabbae and carrot slaw. Serve riht away.

name: Pumpkin Chili
ingredients: 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1 small yellow onion (chopped), 1 reen bell pepper (cored, seeded and chopped ), 2 jalapeño peppers (seeded and finely chopped), 2 cloves arlic ( finely chopped or 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder ), 1 pound round turkey, 1 can diced tomatoes with juice, 1 can pumpkin puree, 1 cup water, 1 teaspoon cumin, round, salt and pepper (to taste, optional), 1 can kidney beans (Can choose other beans if desired.)
directions: 1. Heat oil in a lare pot over medium hih heat., 2. Add onion, bell pepper, jalapenos and arlic and cook, stirrin frequently until tender, about 5 minutes., 3. Add turkey and cook until browned., 4. Add tomatoes, pumpkin, water, chili powder, cumin, salt and pepper and brin to a boil., 5. Reduce heat to medium low then add beans., 6. Cover and simmer, stirrin occasionally, for 30 minutes more., 7. Ladle chili into bowls and serve.

name: Pumpkin Mac & Cheese for One
ingredients: 3/4 cup cooked pasta (in any shape), 1 1/2 tablespoons cheddar cheese soup (from can), 1/8 cup pumpkin puree, 1 1/2 tablespoons milk, 1%, 1 tablespoon cheese, low-fat, 1 teaspoon deli mustard
directions: Stir the "wet" inredients (soup, pumpkin puree, milk, and mustard), and heat in microwave for 45-60 seconds; stir aain until creamy., Add cooked pasta to cream and sprinkle cheese on top. Heat another 30-45 seconds or until cheese melts.

name: Pumpkin Ricotta Stuffed Shells
ingredients: 6 ounces jumbo pasta shells (about 12 jumbo pasta shells), 1 1/4 cups ricotta cheese, part skim, 3/4 cup pumpkin, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder (or 2 cloves arlic, minced), 2 tablespoons basil, 1/4 teaspoon sae, dried, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1/2 cup rated parmesan cheese, divided, 1 cup spahetti sauce (low sodium)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 derees F. , Cook pasta shells accordin to packae directions. Drain and place each on a baking sheet to cool., In a medium bowl, stir toether ricotta, pumpkin, spices and all but 1 Tablespoon of the cheese. Reserve the 1 Tablespoon cheese for toppin., Spread pasta sauce in the bottom of a baking dish that holds all the shells in a sinle layer. Fill each shell with about 3 Tablespoons of pumpkin mixture and place shells close toether on top of the sauce., Cover pan with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil, sprinkle with remainin cheese and bake for 15 minutes more.

name: Pupusas Revueltas
ingredients: 16 ounces chicken breast, round, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 pound cheese, part-skim mozzarella, rated, 1/2 onion (small, finely diced), 1 arlic clove (minced), 1 reen pepper (medium, seeded and minced), 1 tomato (small, finely chopped), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 5 cups masa harina (corn flour, instant), 6 cups water
directions: 1. In a non-stick skillet over low heat, sauté chicken in oil until chicken turns white. Constantly stir the chicken to keep it from stickin., 2. Add onion, arlic, reen pepper, and tomato. Cook until chicken mixture is cooked throuh. Remove skillet from stove and let mixture cool in the refrierator., 3. While the chicken mixture is coolin, place the flour in a lare mixin bowl and stir in enouh water to make a stiff tortilla-like douh., 4. When the chicken mixture has cooled, mix in the cheese., 5. Divide the douh into 24 portions. With your hands, roll the douh into balls and flatten each ball into a 1/2 ich thick circle. Put a spoonful of the chicken mixture in the middle of each circle of douh and brin the edes to the center. Flatten the ball of douh aain until it is 1/2 inch thick., 6. In a very hot, iron skillet, cook the pupusas on each side until olden brown., 7. Serve hot.

name: Quesadilla con Huevos
ingredients: 1/2 cup cheddar or colby jack cheese (rated - cojack), 2 e (scrambled), 4 flour tortillas (6 - 8 inch), 4 salsa (4 Tablespoons, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put 2 Tablespoons cheese and 1/4 of the scrambled es on each tortilla., Heat 2 quesadillas at a time in microwave on hih for 30 to 45 seconds or until cheese melts., Top with salsa and fold tortilla in half to serve., Add parsley if desired.

name: Quick N Cool Summer Salad
ingredients: 14 ounces elbow macaroni, 1 can reen beans (16 ounce, drained, or other vegetable), 1 can tuna packed in water (6.5 ounces, drained and flaked), 1 cup cheese (diced), 1/2 cup sweet pickles (diced), 1/2 cup onion (diced), 1 cup yoghurt, plain, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, liht, 1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon seasoned pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Prepare elbow macaroni accordin to packae directions and drain., Add vegetables, tuna, onions, cheese, and pickles., Mix yoghurt, salad dressin, lemon juice, salt and seasoned pepper., Toss with macaroni mixture., Chill before servin., Refrierate leftovers promptly.

name: Quick and Healthy Black-Eyed Peas
ingredients: 4 slices turkey bacon (chopped), 2 cups black-eyed peas, frozen (about 2 pounds), 2 cups water, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1 tablespoon suar
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Over medium hih heat cook bacon for 3-4 minutes., Add the rest of the inredients and brin to a boil., Reduce heat to simmer and allow to cook until the peas are tender, about 30 minutes., Serve hot.

name: Quick Skillet Lasana
ingredients: 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 1/2 pound round beef (90% lean), 1 can tomatoes (14.5 ounce), 1 cup tomato paste (6 ounce can), 1 parsley, fresh (1 Tablespoon, optional), 1 1/2 cups water, 1 arlic powder (1 teaspoon, optional), 2 cups e noodles (cooked), 3/4 cup cottae cheese, low-fat, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Chop onion. Cook beef and onion, in  a lare fryin pan until beef is brown and onion is tender. Drain off excess fat., Add tomatoes, tomato paste, parsley, water, and arlic powder to the beef mixture. Brin to a boil and simmer until sauce is thick, about 25 minutes., Cook noodles in a separate saucepan accordin to packae directions. Drain., Add cooked, drained noodles to the beef mixture. Stir to prevent stickin., Mix cheeses and drop by spoonfuls into the fryin pan., Cover and heat over low heat about 5 minutes., Refrierate leftovers.

name: Quick Tuna Casserole
ingredients: 1 cup water, 5 ounces e noodles (wide), 1 can cream of mushroom soup (10.75 ounce), 1/3 cup skim milk, 1 can tuna (6.5 ounces, packed in water, drained), 1 cup reen peas (frozen), 1 cup bread crumbs (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 derees., Brin 1 quart of water to a boil in a lare pot and cook the e noodles in the water for 2 minutes., Cover the pot, remove from heat and let stand for 10 minutes., In the meantime, mix the water, soup and milk toether in a bowl., Combine tuna and peas with the mixture and pour into a 1-quart casserole dish., Drain the noodles well and combine with the tuna mixture., Sprinkle the top with bread crumbs if desired., Bake for 30 minutes.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup quinoa (dry), 1 1/2 cups water, 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 teaspoons lime juice, 1/4 teaspoon cumin, 1/4 teaspoon coriander (round, dried cilantro seeds), 2 tablespoons cilantro (chopped), 2 scallions (medium, minced), 1 can black beans (15.5 ounce can, rinsed and drained), 2 cups tomato (chopped), 1 red bell pepper (medium, chopped), 1 reen bell pepper (medium, chopped), 2 reen chiles (minced, to taste), black pepper (to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Rinse the quinoa in cold water. Boil water in a saucepan, and then add the quinoa., Return to boil, and then simmer until the water is absorbed, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool for 15 minutes., While quinoa is cookin, mix olive oil, lime juice, cumin, coriander, chopped cilantro, and scallions in a small bowl, and set aside., Combine chopped vegetables with the black beans in a lare bowl, and set aside., Once quinoa has cooled, combine all inredients and mix well., Cover and refrierate until ready to serve.

name: Red Bean Quesadilla
ingredients: 4 8-inch whole wheat tortilla, 1 cup frozen spinach (thawed and squeezed to remove excess liquid), 1/2 cup shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese, 1 avocado (peeled pitted chopped), 1 can 15.5 ounce low-sodium red kidney beans (drained and rinsed with cold water), arlic powder or dry herbs (optional)
directions: Usin a fork, mash beans in a bowl until slihtly chunky. Add no-salt seasonins such as arlic powder and dried or fresh herbs, if desired., Place 1 tortilla on a plate and top with half the mashed beans., Top the beans with ½ cup of the spinach., Top the spinach with half the cheese., Top the cheese with half the avocado, (optional)., Put the other tortilla on top of the avocado, ently pressin it down so the top half sticks., Repeat with the remainin 2 tortillas., Place a nonstick skillet on the stove over medium and heat until warm, then place 1 quesadilla in the dry skillet. Cook until olden brown, about 1–2 minutes on each side. (Or put the plate in the microwave and heat until the cheese melts, about 45 seconds.), Repeat with the remainin quesadilla., Cut each quesadilla into quarters. Serve warm.

name: Red Beans and Rice
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked brown rice, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 1 small yellow onion (chopped), 1 bell pepper (cored, seeded, and chopped), 1 1/2 ounces water, 1 fresh tomato (coarsely chopped), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon round cumin, 2 cans 15.5 ounce low-sodium red kidney beans (drained and rinsed), 1 1/2 cups water, 1 avocado (peeled, pitted and chopped), 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro (chopped, optional)
directions: To prepare the rice:, 1.  Put the rice and water in the pot and brin to a boil over hih heat. , 2.
