Turn the heat down to low and cook, covered, until the rice is tender, about 45 minutes., To prepare the beans:, 3.  Place the lare skillet on the stove over medium-hih heat. When it is hot, add the oil. Add the arlic, onion, bell pepper, and 2 tablespoons water. Cook until the mixture is olden, about 10 minutes., 4.  Add the tomato, salt, cumin, beans, and water and cook until the beans are very soft, about 20–30 minutes., 5.  Divide the cooked rice amon 4 bowls or plates, and top with equal amounts of the bean mixture., 6.  Top with avocado and sprinkle with cilantro, if usin., 7.  Serve riht away, or cover and refrierate up to 3 days.

name: Red Beans and Rice
ingredients: 2 cups red beans, dry, 8 cups water, 1 1/2 cups onion (chopped), 1 cup celery (chopped), 4 bay leaves, 3 tablespoons arlic (chopped), parsley (optional), 2 teaspoons thyme (crushed, dried), 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1 cup red bell pepper (chopped - could also use reen pepper), 2 cups cooked brown rice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Pick throuh beans to remove bad beans. Rinse beans thorouhly., In a 5-quart pot, mix beans, water, onion, celery and bay leaves. Brin to boilin; reduce heat., Cover and cook over low heat for about 1-1/2 hours or until beans are tender. Stir and mash beans aainst side of pan., Add arlic, parsley, thyme, salt, black pepper, and reen pepper., Cook uncovered, over low heat, until creamy, about 30 minutes. Remove bay leaves. Serve over hot cooked rice.

name: Red Hot Fusilli
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 cloves arlic (minced), 1/4 cup parsley (fresh minced), 4 cups ripe tomatoes (chopped), 1 tablespoon fresh basil (chopped or 1 tsp dried basil), 1 tablespoon oreano leaves (crushed or 1 tsp dried oreano), 1/4 teaspoon salt, round red pepper (or cayenne, to taste), 8 ounces fusilli pasta (uncooked, 4 cups cooked), cooked chicken breast (1/2 pound diced into 1/2-inch pieces, optional)
directions: 1. Heat oil in a medium saucepan. Saute arlic and parsley until olden., 2. Add tomatoes and spices. Cook uncovered over low heat 15 minutes or until thickened, stirrin frequently. If desired, add chicken and continue cookin for 15 minutes until chicken is heated throuh and sauce is thick., 3. Cook pasta firm in unsalted water., "4. To serve, spoon sauce over pasta and sprinkle with coarsely chopped parsley. Serve hot as a main dish and cold for the next days lunch.", *Cost estimate and nutritional analysis does not include chicken.

name: Rice-Crusted Pizza
ingredients: 2 cups rice (cooked), 16 ounces mozzarella cheese, part skim, 1 e, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 cups tomato puree
directions:
1. Heat oven to 350 derees. Grease a 12 inch pizza pan or baking sheet., 2. Cook rice followin directions on the packae; set aside., 3. Grate cheese; set aside., 4. Crack e and place in mixin bowl, stirrin to blend. Measure and add 2 cups cooked rice, 1 cup rated cheese, and salt. Mix well to combine inredients., 5. Spread rice mixture in prepared pan, pressin firmly and makin outer ede slihtly raised., 6. Spread tomato puree evenly over rice mixture., 7. Place pan in oven. Bake for 25 minutes., 8. Remove pan from oven sprinkle pizza with remainin cheese. Bake 5 minutes loner or until cheese melts., 9. Remove pizza from oven. Cut into 12 slices., Create-a-Flavor Chanes
- Try different kinds of rice.
- Try different kinds of cheese.
- Use sliced or chopped reen peppers, onions, mushrooms, or other vegetables as toppins.

name: Roast Chicken
ingredients: 1 chicken, whole, 1 tablespoon olive oil (or canola oil), 1 teaspoon Italian seasonin, 1 teaspoon arlic powder, salt and pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 375°F., Combine Italian seasonin, arlic powder, salt and pepper (optional)., Rub chicken with oil, then rub with spice mixture., Place chicken, breast side down, in roastin pan or Dutch oven., Bake, uncovered, until internal temperature reaches at least 165°F., Let chicken rest for 10 minutes before cuttin.

name: Roast Turkey Breast with Rosemary, Sae, and Thyme
ingredients: 3 pounds turkey breast half (with skin and bones), 1 onion, lare quartered, 1 carrot, lare quartered, 1 teaspoon dried sae, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 1 teaspoon rosemary, 3 tablespoons olive oil, salt and pepper (to taste, optional), chicken broth, low sodium (or mararine, for bastin, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400°F., Place turkey breast in roastin pan alon with onion and carrot., Mix spices with olive oil. Rub turkey with olive oil., Roast turkey at 400°F for 15 minutes. Baste with mararine and chicken broth (optional)., Reduce turkey temperature to 350°F and roast turkey, bastin every 20 minutes with pan juices (or mararine and chicken broth), about 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until meat thermometer inserted in thick part of meat reisters 165°F., Remove to carvin board and let rest for 10 minutes.

name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts, Potatoes, and Chicken
ingredients: 3 cups brussels sprouts (fresh or frozen halved vertically, about 3/4 pound), 4 small red potatoes (cut into chunks), 1/2 cup chopped onion, 2 cloves arlic (minced), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 1/2 cup non-fat ricotta cheese (or cottae cheese), 1/4 cup Part-skim mozzarella cheese (shredded), 2 tablespoons non-fat milk, 1 pound boneless chicken breast (4 portions)
directions: Preheat oven to 325 derees Fahrenheit., In a 2 quart baking dish coated with cookin spray, toss Brussels sprouts, potatoes, onion, and arlic with 1 T olive oil, salt, and pepper., In a small bowl, mix cheese with milk., Coat chicken breasts with remainin olive oil., Nest amon vegetables in baking dish., Top with cheese mix., Cover with foil and bake for 40-45 minutes or until chicken is done.

name: Round Steak Casserole
ingredients: 2 pounds round steak (cut 1/2 inch thick), teaspoon arlic salt, salt, pepper, 1 onion (thinly sliced), 3 potatoes (peeled and quartered), 1 can French-style reen beans (drained), 1 can tomato soup (10 ounce), 1 can tomatoes (peeled and whole)
directions: 1. Season round steak lihtly with arlic salt, salt and pepper., 2. Cut into serving pieces and place in crock pot with sliced onion,\nwhich has been separated into rins., 3. Add potatoes and reen beans., 4. Top with tomato soup and tomatoes., 5. Cover and cook on Low for 8 hours., 6. Remove cover durin last half-hour if there is too much liquid., 7. To cook in 2-quart crock pot, reduce inredients slihtly.

name: Salmon Burers
ingredients: 1 2/3 cups cracker crumbs (coarse), 1 small onion, chopped, 1 can canned salmon (15 oz can OR two 5 oz cans of tuna in water, drained), 2/3 cup lowfat milk, 2 es (well beaten), celery (1/2 cup chopped, optional), salt & pepper (to taste)
directions: 1. In a lare bowl, mix all inredients toether. Mixture will be moist.\n2. Spray a lare skillet with non-stick cookin spray. Heat skillet. Drop fish mixture onto the skillet usin a 1/3 or 1/2 cup measurin cup. Brown on both sides.\n

name: Salmon Burgers and Sweet Potato Oven Fries
ingredients: For the Sweet Potato Oven Fries:,4 large low sodium sweet potatoes (yams),1 1/2 tablespoons canola oil,For the Salmon Burgers:,1 can 14.75-ounce pink or red salmon,2 green onions, chopped,1/2 cup chopped red bell pepper,8 crackers, unsalted tops (saltine-like), crushed,2 teaspoons lemon juice,2 Egg whites from 2 eggs, whisked,2 tablespoons plain low-fat yogurt,1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper,cooking spray,4 whole-wheat buns,8 leaves Bibb Lettuce,2 medium tomatoes (sliced),1 tablespoon lemon pepper seasoning blend
directions: Place oven rack in center, heat oven to 425°F., Wash and scrub sweet potatoes, slice into wedes, lenth-wise., In a lare bowl, toss potato wedes with canola oil and seasonin., Spread on cookie sheet. Roast in the oven, turnin occasionally, until tender and olden brown, about 30-40 minutes., While sweet potatoes are roastin, prepare salmon burers. Drain salmon; place in a medium mixin bowl and flake., Fold in reen onions and red pepper, crushed crackers, lemon juice, e whites and yoghurt., Shape into 4 patties., Coat lare nonstick skillet lihtly with cookin spray; heat., Cook salmon burers until olden brown, turn, and continue cookin until other side is olden brown., Serve burers with sliced tomatoes and lettuce, and sweet potato oven fries.

name: Salmon Loaf
ingredients: 1 can salmon (15 1/2 ounce), 2 cups bread crumbs, soft, 1 onion (lare, chopped), 1 tablespoon mararine (melted), 1/4 cup celery (diced), 1 cup milk, 1%, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon parsley (dried), 2 e (lare)
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 325 derees.
2. Drain salmon and remove skin if desired. Mash bones with meat.
3. Add the other inredients.
4. Add enouh milk so that the mixture is moist but not runny.
5. Place in a lihtly oiled 9x5 inch loaf pan.
6. Bake for 45 minutes.
7. Serve.

name: Salmon Patties
ingredients: 1 can salmon, 16 oz (Use canned salmon with bones to et extra calcium.), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, cold water, minced celery (1/4 cup, optional), reen pepper (1 tablespoon, optional), 1/2 medium onion, 2 lare es, 1/3 cup bread crumbs or cracker crumbs, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
directions:
1. Wash fresh vegetables (if usin).
2. Collect, mince, and measure all inredients before startin to prepare the recipe.
3. Open salmon, and drain liquid into a liquid measurin cup. Add lemon juice and cold water to the salmon liquid to make ½ cup liquid total, and set aside.
4. Put the salmon in a separate mixin bowl. Mix in the celery (if usin), reen pepper (if usin), and onion.
5. In another small bowl, beat the es. Then, add them to the salmon mixture. 
6. Add the bread or cracker crumbs, flour, pepper, and the salmon liquid mixture to the salmon mixture, and stir until all inredients are mixed toether.
7. Use ⅓ cup measurin cup to measure salmon mixture. Shape into a ½ inch thick patty, and place on a plate. Repeat to make 6 patties.
8. Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, then add 3 patties.
9. Cook for about 2 to 3 minutes (or until olden brown) on each side.
10. Remove patties from skillet, and place on a clean paper towel-lined plate to drain. Cook remainin 3 patties, then serve immediately. Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

name: Savory and Spicy Ground Beef & Succotash
ingredients: 1 ounce lean round beef, 1 cup lima beans (frozen, cooked and drained), 1 3/4 cups corn (15 1/2 ounce can, drained), 1 can tomatoes (14 1/2 ounce, broken up), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1/8 teaspoon nutme
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Brown round beef in pan. Drain excess liquid., Add remainin inredients except nutme. Cover and simmer 5 minutes or until thorouhly heated., Sprinkle with nutme before servin.

name: Savory Meatloaf Muffins
ingredients: 1 e, 1/2 cup non-fat milk, 3/4 cup oats, 1 pound lean round beef, 3 tablespoons onion (chopped), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup cheese (any variety) (rated)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 derees., Combine all inredients and mix well., Spoon mixture and divide evenly into 12 reased muffin cups., Bake for 1 hour, or until temperature in center of meat loaf is 160 derees., Cool slihtly before removin from muffin cups.

name: Scalloped Potatoes and Chicken with Fennel
ingredients: 4 medium red potatoes (about 1.5 to 2 pounds), 1 fennel bulb with fronds, 2 arlic cloves (minced), 2 lare chicken breasts, cookin spray, 1 1/2 tablespoons mararine or butter (melted), 2 tablespoons flour, 1 1/2 cups fat-free (skim) milk (divided), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 1/2 cup reduced-fat sour cream, 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese
directions: Place rack in center of oven and preheat to 350ºF., Leavin skin on, thinly slice potatoes., Cut stalks and fronds from fennel bulb. Discard stalk. Thinly slice fennel bulb. Chop fennel fronts and set aside., Place potato and fennel slices in 2-quart covered baking dish, and add water to cover vegetables. Cover with lid and microwave on hih for about 5 minutes. Let cool slihtly and drain vegetables into a colander., Wipe baking dish dry and spray with cookin spray. Add vegetables back to dish and sprinkle with minced arlic., Cut chicken breasts in half (total of four pieces). Place atop the potato-fennel mix., In a bowl, mix melted mararine and flour into a smooth paste. Add 1.25 cups skim milk, salt and pepper, stir until smooth. Pour over chicken, potatoes and fennel. Cover baking dish and place in oven. Bake about 30 minutes., Mix remainin milk with sour cream. Increases oven temperature to 425ºF. Remove dish from oven. Spread with sour cream mixture and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and fennel fronds. Return to oven uncovered and bake an additional 10 minutes until top is olden and bubblin. Internal temperature of chicken should be 165ºF.

name: Scrambled Tofu
ingredients: 1 packae tofu (14 ounces), 1 tablespoon butter, 2 cups bean sprouts (10 ounces), 2 es, salt and pepper (optional, to taste)
directions: 1. Drain tofu., 2. In small bowl, dice or mash tofu. For optional inredients, crush arlic and/or slice watercress, mushrooms, cheese, bell peppers, and reen onions., 3. In a pan, melt butter. Add tofu. Add bean sprouts and optional inredients. Saute over medium heat until lihtly browned., 4. Beat es and add to tofu mixture. Cook until firm., 5. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste., 6. Stir and cook until firm.

name: Sensational Six-Layer Dinner
ingredients: 2 potatoes (medium, sliced), 2 cups carrot (sliced), 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 cup onion (sliced), 1 pound round beef, 90% lean (browned and drained), 1 1/2 cups reen beans, 1 can tomato soup
directions: 1. Lihtly oil or spray baking dish with cookin spray., 2. Layer inredients in order iven. Cover., 3. Bake at 350 deree for 45 minutes or until tender and thorouhly heated., 4. Uncover and bake 15 more minutes.

name: Shepherds Pie
ingredients: 2 potatoes, lare with skin, diced, 1/3 cup milk, skim, 1/2 pound round turkey, 85% lean, 2 tablespoons flour, 1 packae frozen mixed vegetables (10 ounces), 1 can vegetable broth, low sodium (14.5 ounces), shredded cheese (optional)
directions: 1. Place diced potatoes in saucepan. Cover with water and brin to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer (about 15 minutes)., 2. Drain potatoes and mash. Stir in milk and set aside., 3. Preheat oven to 375°F., 4. Brown turkey in a lare skillet. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute, stirrin constantly., 5. Add vegetables and broth. Brin to a slow boil., 6. Spoon vegetable/meat mixture into an 8-inch square baking dish. Spread potatoes over mixture. Bake 25 minutes., 7. Serve hot. Garnish with shredded cheese (optional).

name: Short Cut Lasana
ingredients: 1 jar spahetti sauce (low sodium, 24 ounces), 8 ounces dry lasana noodles, 1 container ricotta cheese (part-skim, 15 ounces or cottae cheese), 2 cups mozzarella cheese, part-skim, shredded, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese (rated)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Spready 1/2 the sauce on the bottom of a 2-quart baking dish or pan., Layer half the dry noodles, ricotta and Parmesan., Top with 1 cup sauce and layer rest of the noodles, ricotta and mozzarella., Top with remainin spahetti sauce., Bake 60 minutes at 350°F. Remove and let is set for 20 minutes. Top with Parmesan cheese.

name: Simple Fish Tacos
ingredients: 1/2 cup sour cream (non-fat), 1/4 cup mayonnaise (fat-free), 1/2 cup fresh cilantro (chopped), 1/2 packet taco seasonin (divided), 1 pound cod or white fish fillets (cut into 1 inch pieces), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 cups red and reen cabbae (shredded), 2 cups tomato (diced), 12 corn tortillas (6-inch, warmed), lime wedes (for servin)
directions: 1. In a small bowl, combine sour cream, mayonnaise, cilantro, and 2 Tbsp seasonin mix., 2. In a medium bowl, combine cod, vegetable oil, lemon juice, and remainin seasonin mix; pour into lare skillet. Cook stirrin constantly, over medium-hih heat for 4-5 minutes or until cod flakes easily when tested with a fork., 3. Fill warm tortillas with fish mixture., 4. Top with cabbae, tomato, sour cream mixture, lime wedes, and taco sauce.

name: Simple Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 1 cup brown rice, uncooked, 1 can black beans, low sodium (15 ounces), 4 bell peppers (any color), 1 cup cheddar cheese, shredded (reduced fat), 1 tomato, sliced, 1 cup salsa, salt (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat the oven to 400°F., Cook brown rice accordin to packae directions., Wash the peppers under runnin water., Cut the tops off the peppers and spoon out the seeds., Drain and rinse the black beans., Combine the beans, rice, salsa and salt (optional)., Spoon about 3 Tablespoons of the mixture into the bottom of each pepper., Place a slice of tomato on top of the mixture and sprinkle with 2 tablespoons of cheese., Repeat steps 7 and 8 to fill the pepper completely but do not top with cheese., Bake peppers for 30 minutes, top each with 2 Tablespoons of cheese and continue baking for 15 minutes more.

name: Simply Satisfyin Kale and Tuna Salad
ingredients: 2 cans tuna (2-5 oz. cans), 1 bunch kale (or 1 ba), 2 ounces cherry tomatoes, 1 lemon, raw, 1/4 cup extra virin olive oil, 1/8 cup balsamic vinear, kosher salt (to taste), freshly round pepper (to taste)
directions: Wash kale. Set aside to drain water off., Cut tomatoes in half and lihtly toss in bowl with balsamic vinear, oil and pinch of salt and pepper. Set aside., In a salad bowl, mix tuna and juice from the can ently with squeeze of 1/2 lemon and a pinch of pepper., Massae kale for about 3 minutes to soften it., Add the kale and 1/2 the tomatoes to the tuna, and ently toss until all is coated with dressin., Add remainin tomatoes., Squeeze remainin lemon all over and serve.

name: Skillet Catfish
ingredients: For the spice rub:,1/8 cup cornmeal,1 teaspoon dried oregano,1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper,1 teaspoon dried thyme,1 teaspoon paprika,1/2 teaspoon salt,1/2 teaspoon black pepper,4 4-ounce catfish filets,2 teaspoons vegetable oil,1 lemon or lime (quartered)
directions: Make the spice rub. Put the cornmeal, oreano, cayenne pepper, thyme, paprika, salt and pepper on a plate and combine well., Drede both sides of the catfish in the spice mixture., Put the skillet on the stove and turn the heat to hih.  , When the skillet is hot, add the oil.  Add the fish and cook about 4 minutes on each side, until browned and cooked throuhout., Serve riht away arnished with lemon or lime wedes.

name: Skillet Lasana
ingredients: 8 ounces lasana noodles (or 4 cups of any other type of pasta, uncooked), 1 ricotta cheese, part-skim 15 ounces (or cottae cheese), 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese (rated), 1 1/4 tablespoons Italian seasonin, 1 jar spahetti sauce, low-sodium (24 ounces), 1 packae frozen spinach, thawed & squeezed dry (10 ounces, or chopped broccoli), 2 cups mozzarella cheese, part-skim shredded
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook the noodles as directed on the packae. Drain and set aside., In a small bowl, mix the ricotta cheese (or cottae cheese), 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, and Italian seasonin., Spray a lare skillet well with cookin spray. Do NOT place skillet on heat until all inredients are in skillet. , Spread half of the jar of sauce in skillet. Top with half the cooked noodles (4 lasana noodles)., Spread half of the cheese mixture over the noodles. Top with half the spinach or broccoli., Sprinkle half the mozzarella cheese over the vegetables., Repeat with the remainin noodles, the remainin cheese mixture, the remainin vegetables, the remainin sauce, and the remainin mozzarella cheese., Sprinkle with the rest of the Parmesan cheese. Cover., Turn on the stove top to medium-low until the cheese is melted (approximately 20 minutes). Allow to stand for 5 minutes before servin., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours. Eat within 3 to 5 days.

name: Skillet Meals
ingredients: 1 packae broccoli (10 ounce, frozen, can also use mustard reens, collard reens or spinach), 2 cans stewed tomatoes, low sodium (about 30 oz), 1 cup brown rice (cooked), 1 can white beans (15 ounces, rinsed and drained), pepper (to taste), oreano, basil, or hot pepper (other spices to taste, optional)
directions: 1. Steam reens in the stewed tomatoes usin a small pan, pot, or electric skillet on medium-hih heat., 2. Cook reens 10 to 20 minutes, until they are as soft as you like them. Stir ently., 3. Add the rice, canned beans, and seasonins., 4. Cook until heated throuh.

name: Skillet Noodles and Beef
ingredients: 1/2 pound lean round beef, 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 1 can tomato sauce (15 ounce), 1 1/2 cups water, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon oreano, 1/4 teaspoon basil, 3 cups noodles, uncooked, 1/2 inch wide, 1 packae spinach, frozen, chopped (10 ounce), 1 cup cottae cheese, non-fat, 1/2 cup cheese, part-skim mozzarella, shredded
directions: Brown round beef in a lare skillet. Drain and rinse to remove fat., Add onion, tomato sauce, water, and spices. Cover and brin to a boil., Add noodles. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes., Defrost spinach in the microwave. Stir spinach into skillet mixture. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes., Stir mixture. Spoon cottae cheese on top and sprinkle with shredded mozzarella. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Add water if mixture ets too dry.

name: Skillet Pasta Dinner
ingredients: 1/2 pound round turkey, 85% lean (or round sausae or beef), 1 medium onion, chopped, 2 arlic cloves, minced (approximately 1 teaspoon), 1 can tomato sauce (8 ounce), 1 cup water, 8 ounces uncooked tube pasta (ziti, penne, or macaroni), 2 cups fresh or frozen vegetables (try zuccini and carrots)
directions:
1. Brown the round meat, onion, and arlic in a skillet or heavy saucepan. Drain off any rease.
2. Add the tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, and uncooked pasta.
3. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
4. Add the fresh or frozen vegetables, stir and continue cookin until the pasta and vegetables are tender (about 10 more minutes).

name: Skillet-Braised Chicken
ingredients: 1 chicken breast, about 1-inch thick, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, seasonin, such as salt, pepper, seasonin salt, onion powder or arlic powder (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Season the chicken. In a lihtly oiled skillet over medium-hih heat, sauté the chicken for one minute on each side until lihtly browned., Cover the skillet with a tiht-fittin lid. Reduce the heat to low. Cook for 10 minutes. Do not lift the lid., Turn off the heat. Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes. Do not remove the lid., The chicken is safely cooked when the internal temperature is at least 165 derees F. Check in the thickest part with a food thermometer. If not done, cover and return to low heat for 3 to 5 minutes and check for doneness.

name: Sloppy Garden Joes
ingredients: 1 yellow onion (chopped), 1 carrot (chopped or shredded), 1 reen pepper (chopped), 1 pound round turkey (or chicken), 1 can tomato sauce (8 ounces, unsalted), 1 can whole tomatoes (14.5 ounces, crushed), 4 cans mushrooms (2 ounces each, drained), 1/4 cup barbecue sauce, 6 whole wheat buns (split in half to make 12)
directions: 1. Saute onions, carrots, reen pepper and round turkey or chicken in a pan over medium-heat for 5 minutes., 2. Add tomato sauce, crushed tomatoes, mushrooms, barbecue sauce, and seasonins and brin to boil., 3. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes, stirrin occasionally., 4. Uncover and cook for an additional 3 minutes or until thick., 5. Serve open-faced on toasted or plain whole-wheat buns., 6. Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Slow Cooker Beef Stew
ingredients: 2 pounds stew meat (cut into 1 inch cubes), 1/4 cup flour (all purpose), salt and pepper (optional, to taste), 2 cups water, 2 teaspoons beef bouillon (2 cubes), 1 arlic clove (finely chopped), 3 carrot (sliced), 3 potatoes (diced), 1 onion (chopped), 1 celery stalk (sliced), Add herbs as desired: bay leaf, basil, oreano, etc
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place meat in slow cooker., Mix flour, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl, and pour over meat; stir to coat., Add remainin inredients and stir to mix., Cover and cook on LOW for 8 to 10 hours or HIGH for 4 to 6 hours., Stir stew thorouhly before servin. If usin bay leaf, discard before servin.

name: Slow Cooker Hamburer Stew
ingredients: 1 pound round beef, 90% lean, 1/2 cup onion (chopped), 1 cup carrot (chopped), 2 cups potatoes (chopped), 1 cup celery (chopped), 1 can tomatoes (14.5 ounce), 4 cups water, 1/2 oreano, basil or other herb (optional)
directions: 1. Brown round beef in a medium fry pan. Drain fat., 2. Place beef, chopped vegetables, tomatoes and water in slow cooker., 3. Cook on LOW 8 to 10 hours or on HIGH for 4 to 6 hours.

name: Slow Cooker Pork Stew over Brown Rice
ingredients: 2 pounds lean pork stew meat, 3 cups baby carrots, 1 lare onion, sliced, 1 1/2 teaspoons dried thyme leaves, 1/2 teaspoon coarse round black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 clove arlic, minced, 1 1/2 cups complete bran and wheat flakes ready-to-eat cereal (crushed to 3/4 cup), 1 cup dried tart cherries, 3/4 cup 100% apple juice or apple cider, 4 cups hot cooked brown rice
directions: Trim fat from pork., Spray lare pan with non-stick cookin spray. Cook half of the pork at a time until browned., In a 4-6 quart crockery cooker layer carrots, onion, thyme, pepper, salt and arlic. Sprinkle with cereal and cherries., Top with pork and pour apple juice or cider over contents in the cooker., Cover and cook on low settin for 7-8 hours or on hih settin for 3 ½ to 4 hours. , Prepare the brown rice accordin to packae directions toward the end of the stew cookin time. (Brown rice typically takes about 40-45 minutes to cook). , Stir pork mixture and serve over ½ cup brown rice.

name: Slow-Cook Barbecue
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds chuck steak (boneless, 1 1/2 inches thick), 1 arlic clove (peeled and minced), 1/4 cup wine vinear, 1 teaspoon brown suar (1 Tablespoon), 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 cup ketchup, 1 salt (1 teaspoon, optional), 1 teaspoon dry or prepared mustard, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions:
1. Cut the beef on a diaonal, across the rain into slices 1 inch wide and place in a slow cooker.
2. Combine the remainin inredients and pour over the meat.
3. Mix the meat and sauce toether.
4. Cover and cook on low for 3 to 5 hours.
5. Serve on toasted hamburer buns with a mixed reen salad.

name: Smoky Mustard-Maple Salmon
ingredients: 3 tablespoons whole-rain or Dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon pure maple syrup, 1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika or round chipotle pepper, 1/4 teaspoon freshly round pepper, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 16 ounces salmon (skinless, about 4 oz each filet)
directions: Preheat oven to 450 derees., Line a baking sheet with foil and coat with cookin spray., Combine mustard, maple syrup, paprika (or chipotle), pepper, and salt in a small bowl., Place salmon fillets on the prepared baking sheet., Spread the mustard mixture evenly on the salmon., Roast until just cooked throuh (approx. 8-12 minutes).

name: Snappy Rice Dish
ingredients: 1 cup vegetables, frozen or fresh (cut into bite size pieces), 1/2 cup chicken broth, reduced sodium (or use water), 1 cup brown rice, cooked, 1/2 can kidney beans (about 7 oz) or other canned beans, dill weed (fresh snipped or dry, to taste), pepper (to taste)
directions:
1. Cook the vegetables in the chicken broth (or water) usin a small pan, pot, or electric skillet, on medium hih heat.*
2. Cook the vegetables the way you like them (firm or soft), stirrin ently. Add more broth as needed to keep the vegetables moist.
3. Add the rice, canned beans and seasonins. Steam fry until heated throuh.
* Microwave version: Follow the same steps above. Use a microwave safe, covered dish. Stir the vegetables every 2 to 3 minutes. Just before they are cooked, add the rice, beans and herbs. Cook until heated. Rotate the dish & stir ently.

name: Soft Chicken Taco
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, thawed, skin and bone removed from each piece, 1/2 teaspoon vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon arlic, finely chopped, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 2/3 tablespoon taco seasonin or chili powder (optional), 1 reen pepper, sliced, 1 medium onion, sliced, 4 soft tortillas, 6-inch size, 1/4 head Romaine lettuce, sliced thin, 1/4 cup tomatoes, diced, 4 teaspoons fresh tomato salsa, 1 tablespoon parsley or cilantro, chopped (optional)
directions: In a lare bowl, mix chicken, vegetable oil, arlic, salt, and pepper., If usin taco seasonin or chili powder, add them too., Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and place it in the refrierator for about 30 minutes., While the chicken is in the refrierator, cook the pepper and onion, on stovetop, over medium heat until done (about 12 minutes)., Cook the chicken over medium heat. Cook each side about 10 to 15 minutes., Place chicken on a plate. Let it cool for 5 minutes. Cut the chicken into strips., To make the tacos, put chicken on the tortilla first. Add peppers and onion strips next. Top with lettuce, tomato, and salsa. If usin parsley or cilantro, add that too.

name: Soy Marinated Chicken
ingredients: 4 chicken breasts, boneless & skinless, 1 lare orange, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, low-sodium
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Slice the orange to make round slices and set aside., Place 4 chicken breasts in a 1-allon size plastic zipper ba., Add the liquid to the ba with the chicken., Zipper the ba closed and ently massae to mix the liquids and evenly cover the chicken inside the ba., Let the chicken marinate in the ba in the refrierator for 4 or more hours., Preheat oven to 350°F., Spray shallow oven-proof baking dish with non-stick spray lare enouh to place chicken in sinle layer in the baking dish., Remove the chicken from the ba, place in a sinle layer in the baking dish. Throw away the zipper ba from the chicken.,  Bake chicken uncovered for 20 minutes., Turn the chicken over, cover with orange slices that were set aside, and bake 15 more minutes (total of 35 minutes)., Check with a food thermometer. Temperature should reach 165°F.,  Serve chicken topped with an orange slice from the baking dish if desired.

name: Spahetti and Spinach Pesto
ingredients: 1 pound whole wheat spahetti, uncooked (or your favorite pasta shape), 1 packae 10-oz frozen spinach, thawed, well drained, 2 tablespoons canola oil, 1/4 cup rated Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped parsley, 2 cloves arlic, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon dried basil, 2 tablespoons tub mararine, 1/3 cup water, 2 ounces crumbled feta cheese
directions: In a blender (or food processor), combine spinach, oil, Parmesan cheese, parsley, arlic, salt and basil. Mix at medium speed until finely chopped., Melt mararine in water. With blender or processor runnin, radually pour in melted mararine mixture until blended., Cook pasta accordin to packae directions., Toss pesto with cooked pasta. , Sprinkle feta on top and serve.

name: Spahetti with Quick Meat Sauce
ingredients: 1 pound whole-wheat spahetti, 2 teaspoons extra-virin olive oil, 1 lare onion, finely chopped, 1 lare carrot, finely chopped, 1 stalk celery, finely chopped, 4 cloves arlic, minced, 1 tablespoon Italian seasonin, 1 pound lean round beef (90% or leaner), 1 14-oz cans crushed tomatoes, 1/4 cup chopped flat-leaf parsley, 1/2 cup rated Parmesan cheese, 1/2 teaspoon salt
directions: Cook pasta accordin to packae directions. Drain., Meanwhile, heat oil in a lare skillet over medium heat., Add onion, carrot, and celery and cook, stirrin occasionally, until the onion is beinnin to brown, 5-8 minutes., Stir in arlic and Italian seasonin; cook until frarant, about 30 seconds., Add beef and cook, stirrin and breakin up with a spoon, until no loner pink, 3-5 minutes., Increase heat to hih. Stir in tomatoes and cook until thickened, 4-6 minutes., Stir in parsley and salt. Serve the sauce over the pasta, sprinkled with cheese.

name: Spanish Baked Fish
ingredients: 1 pound perch fillets, fresh or frozen, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 onion (small), 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 teaspoons chili powder, 1 teaspoon oreano, 1/8 teaspoon cumin (round)
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 derees F.
2. Lihtly rease the baking dish with butter or mararine.
3. Separate the fish into 4 fillets or pieces.
4. Put the fish pieces in the baking dish.
5. Peel the onion, and cut it into slices.
6. Stir the onion, tomato sauce and spices toether in a small bowl.
7. Pour the onion-spice mix evenly over the fish pieces.
8. Bake about 10 to 20 minutes, until the fish flakes easily with a fork.

name: Spanish Frittata
ingredients: 2 russet potatoes (scrubbed), 6 es, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 medium yellow onion (peeled and chopped), 1/2 teaspoon Kosher salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 derees., Put the potatoes in a non-stick skillet on the stove and cover with cold water. Turn the heat to medium-hih and cook about 15 minutes until the potatoes are easily pierced with a knife., Drain the potatoes well and set aside to cool. Then peel and cut into 1-inch cubes., Put the es, salt, and pepper in the bowl and mix well with a whisk., Return the skillet on the stove and turn the heat to medium-hih.  Add the oil. Add onion and cook about 5 minutes until soft. Add the cubed potatoes., Pour the e mixture over the potatoes and onions. Press down with a spatula to make an even layer and shake ently to prevent stickin. Lower to medium heat and cook about 7 minutes., Transfer the skillet to the oven and cook until the frittata is completely set, about 5 minutes., Gently loosen frittata from the pan. Place a serving plate over the skillet and carefully invert the frittata onto the plate., Slice into 4 wedes. Serve warm.

name: Spanish Omelet
ingredients: 5 potatoes (small, peeled and sliced), 1 tablespoon olive oil (or vegetable cookin spray), 1/2 onion (medium, minced), 1 zucchini (medium, sliced), 1 1/2 cups reen/red peppers (sliced thin), 5 mushrooms (medium, sliced), 3 es (whole, beaten), 5 e whites (beaten), Pepper and arlic salt with herbs (to taste), 3 ounces part skim mozzarella cheese (shredded), 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.
2. Cook potatoes in boilin water until tender.
3. In a nonstick pan, add oil or vegetable spray and warm at medium heat.
4. Add the onion and sauté until brown. Add vegetables and sauté until tender but not brown.
5. In a medium mixin bowl, slihtly beat the es and e whites, pepper, arlic salt, and mozzarella cheese. Stir e cheese mixture into the cooked vegetables.
6. Oil or spray a 10-inch pie pan or ovenproof skillet. Transfer potatoes and es mixture to pan. Spread with parmesan cheese and bake omelet until firm and brown on top, about 20-30 minutes.

name: Speedy Burritos
ingredients: 4 cups potatoes (finely chopped), 1 onion (chopped), 1 bell pepper (red or reen, chopped), 3 arlic cloves (pressed or finely chopped), 2 es (beaten), 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 cheddar cheese (1/2 cup rated, optional), hot sauce (as needed, or salsa), 9 tortillas (flour or corn)
directions:
1. In a lare skillet, heat oil on medium-hih settin.
2. Add onion, reen pepper, potatoes, and arlic. Cook until potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes. Raw potatoes may need loner; check if done with a fork.
3. Reduce heat to medium settin, spread potato mix out to the sides of the skillet, leavin a space in the middle for the es. Add the es and scramble them until cooked (do not mix potatoes until es are cooked firm). Stir all inredients toether.
4. Wrap tortillas around the fillin and top with salsa and cheese.

name: Spicy Baked Fish
ingredients: 16 ounces salmon (fresh or frozen, or any white fish), 1/4 teaspoon paprika, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 1/8 teaspoon oreano (dried), 1/8 teaspoon thyme (dried), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 1/2 tablespoons mararine (soft melted)
directions:
1. If usin frozen fish, thaw in refrierator accordin to packae directions.
2. Preheat oven to 350 derees.
3. Separate (or cut) fish into 4 pieces. Place fish in a 9x13x2 inch baking pan.
4. Combine paprika, arlic and onion powder, pepper, oreano, and thyme in a small bowl.
5. Sprinkle herb mixture (step 4 mixture) and lemon juice evenly over the fish. Then drizzle melted mararine on top.
6. Bake until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 20 to 25 minutes.

name: Spicy Baked Fish II
ingredients: 1 pound cod fillets, fresh or frozen, skinless and thawed (or other white fleshed fish), 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 1/4 cup reen bell pepper (chopped), 1/2 can tomatoes, diced (about 8 ounces), 1/4 teaspoon oreano
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350 derees. Oil or spray a baking dish with vegetable spray.
2. Cut fish into four pieces and place in baking dish.
3. Top fish with onions, reen peppers, tomatoes and seasonin. Bake about 20 minutes or until fish flakes.

name: Spicy Chicken and Potato Soup
ingredients: 1 cup onion, chopped, 1 tablespoon arlic, finely chopped, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/4 pound chicken, thawed, cut up, and skin removed, 4 cups water, 6 small red potatoes, chopped (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium sliced potatoes), 1/4 cup white rice, uncooked (or brown rice), 1/2 teaspoon chili powder (or paprika), 1 cup fresh peas (or 1/2 can, about 8 ounces, low-sodium reen peas), cayenne or jalapeño chilies, diced (1/2 teaspoon, optional), parsley or cilantro, chopped (1/2 cup, optional)
directions: In a lare pot, brown onion and arlic in oil over medium to hih heat for 5 minutes., Add chicken to pot and brown for about 5 minutes., Add water, potatoes, rice, and chili powder to pot., Brin pot to a boil, and cook for 15 minutes., Lower heat and cook for about 15 to 20 minutes. Stir pot every 10 minutes., Add peas and cook for about 8 minutes. If usin cayenne or jalapeño chilies, add that too. Mix well., Remove pot from heat. If usin parsley or cilantro, add that now., Mix well and cover for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Spicy Oven-Baked Chicken
ingredients: 8 lare chicken thihs (trimmed of excess fat), 6 teaspoons hot sauce, 2 teaspoons yellow mustard, 2 teaspoons dried thyme, 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon black pepper
directions: Put chicken, hot sauce, mustard, thyme and arlic in the bowl and mix well. Cover and refrierate at least one hour or up to 24 hours., Heat the oven to 450 derees., Put the chicken on a baking sheet and sprinkle with the salt and pepper., Place in the oven and bake about 50 minutes until crispy and cracklin. Serve riht away.

name: Spicy Southern Barbecued Chicken
ingredients: 5 tablespoons tomato paste, 1/3 tablespoon ketchup, 2 teaspoons honey, 1/3 tablespoon molasses, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 4 teaspoons white vinear, 3/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/8 teaspoon round black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 2 arlic cloves (minced), 1/8 teaspoon iner (rated), 1 1/2 pounds chicken (skinless breasts, drumsticks)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients except chicken in saucepan., Simmer for 15 minutes., Place chicken on lare platter and brush with half the sauce mixture., Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in refrierator for 1 hour., Remove plastic wrap from chicken. Place chicken on baking sheet lined with aluminum foil and broil for 10 minutes on each side to seal in juices., Remove from broiler and add remainin sauce to chicken. Cover with aluminum foil and bake at 350 derees for 30 minutes.

name: Spinach and Meat Cakes
ingredients: 1 pound round beef, or turkey, 7% fat (93% lean), 16 ounces frozen spinach chopped (may substitute a 2 bunches of fresh spinach), 1/2 onion (small, finely chopped), 2 arlic cloves (minced), 1/2 teaspoon salt, black pepper (to taste), 3 cups brown rice
directions: 1. Preheat fryin pan (no oil)., 2. Combine all inredients except brown rice in a lare mixin bowl. Mix well., 3. Form mixture into 12 small balls. Place in fryin pan and flatten into patties usin a spatula., 4. Cook over medium heat until cooked on both sides., 5. Serve over brown rice.

name: Spinach and Mushroom Enchilada Casserole
ingredients: 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1 onion (medium, chopped), 2 arlic cloves (minced), 3 yellow banana chile peppers (seeded, deveined and minced), 3 pounds mushrooms (sliced), 1 cup enchilada sauce (14 ounce can, preferably reen), 8 corn tortillas (6 inch, cut in half), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon oreano leaves (dried), 2 packaes frozen chopped spinach (10 ounce, thawed), 6 1/2 ounces reduced fat Monterey jack cheese (rated)
directions: 1. Heat oil in a very lare non-stick skillet. Add onion, arlic and peppers and stir. Add mushrooms and cook about 15 to 20 minutes, until liquid evaporates. (If pan is not lare enouh, cook mushrooms in batches.), 2. Pour half of the enchilada sauce into a 13x9-inch baking dish., 3. Arrane 8 tortilla halves over the sauce in the baking dish. Preheat the oven to 350 derees. When mushrooms are cooked, stir in the salt and crumble in the oreano leaves. Drain the spinach, squeeze it dry and mix it thorouhly with the mushroom mixture. Spoon half the mushroom mixture into the baking dish, carefully coverin tortillas., 4. Set aside 1/4 cup (about 1 ounce) of rated cheese. Sprinkle the rest of the cheese on top of the mushroom mixture. Layer with the remainin 8 tortilla halves, then the remainin mushroom mixture and enchilada sauce. Sprinkle top of casserole with the remainin 1/4 cup cheese. Cover baking dish with foil and bake for 30 minutes, or until casserole is steamin hot in the center.

name: Spinach Salad with Apples and Eggs
ingredients: 4 lare es, 2 apples, 8 cups fresh spinach, 1 cup dried fis (about 16 fis or one 7-oz pk), 1 cup whole-rain croutons, 1/2 cup liht honey mustard or poppy seed dressin
directions: To hard boil-es: Place es in saucepan lare enouh to hold them in a sinle layer. Add cold water to cover es by 1 inch. Heat over hih heat just to boilin. Remove from heat and cover. Let es stand in hot water about 12 minutes. Drain and fill pan with cold water; let sit 10-15 minutes. Peel and slice. (If makin ahead, refrierate cooked unpeeled es), Prepare other inredients while es are cookin and coolin., Wash, slice, and core apples., Cut apples and dried fis into bite-sized chunks., Wash and drain spinach., To plate, divide inredients evenly amon four plates, top spinach with apples, es, dried fis, and croutons. Drizzle with dressin

name: Spunky Vegetable Pizza
ingredients: 3/4 cup pizza sauce, 1 Italian pizza shell (lare), 1 cup broccoli (chopped), 1 cup carrots (shredded), 1/2 cup bell pepper (red or reen, sliced), 5 ounces mozzarella cheese, part skim (shredded)
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 450°F.
2. Spoon pizza sauce on pizza shell.
3. Put pizza shell on a cookie sheet. Arrane vegetables over sauce. Sprinkle on the cheese.
4. Bake for 10 minutes.
5. When baked, cool pizza for 3 minutes before slicin. Cut into 8 wedes.

name: Stir Fried Beef
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds steak (sirloin), 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 arlic clove (minced), 1 teaspoon vinear, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon round black pepper, 2 onions (lare, sliced), 1 tomato (lare, sliced), 3 cups potatoes (boiled, diced)
directions: 1. Trim fat from steak and cut steak into small, thin pieces., 2. In a lare skillet, heat oil and sauté arlic until arlic is olden., 3. Add steak, vinear, salt, and pepper. Cook for 6 minutes, stirrin beef until brown., 4. Add onion and tomato. Cook until onion is transparent. Serve with boiled potatoes.

name: Stir Fry vegetables and Beef
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon round iner, 1/8 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, reduced sodium, 1/3 cup water, 1 cup carrot (sliced), 2 cups broccoli, 1 bell pepper (chopped), 1 onion (chopped), 2 cups fresh mushrooms (sliced), 2 tablespoons oil, 8 ounces sliced beef
directions: Wash hands and any cookin surface., Mix spices, soy sauce and water; set aside., Wash vegetables. Slice carrots, broccoli and mushrooms. Chop onions and bell peppers., Heat oil in lare fryin pan and add meat when oil is hot; stir until brown., Push meat to the side and in the middle of the pan add carrots, onions and peppers. Cook them for one minute, Add mushrooms and broccoli. Cook until they are tender., Add liquid mixture and cook until bubbly., Reduce heat, cover pan and cook for two more minutes., Serve over whole wheat pasta or brown rice.

name: Stir-Fry with Chicken and Noodles
ingredients: 4 cups water, 2 packaes ramen-style noodles (3 ounces each), 2 chicken breasts, boneless, skinless, cut into strips, 1/4 cup peanut butter, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, reduced sodium, 1/2 cup water, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh iner (or 1/2 teaspoon round iner), 2 carrots, thinly sliced (about 2 cups), 1/2 head cabbae, thinly sliced (about 6 cups), 1/4 cup reen onion, thinly sliced
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Brin 4 cups water to boil in a 2 to 3 quart saucepan. Add noodles, cover, and remove from heat (do not add flavor packets). Wait one minute, drain noodles and set aside., In a small saucepan, combine peanut butter, soy sauce and 1/2 cup water. Heat over low heat, stirrin until smooth. Remove from heat., Heat oil in a lare skillet over medium-hih heat (350 derees F in an electric skillet). Add chicken and cook until no loner pink when cut, about 3 to 5 minutes., Add red pepper, iner, and carrots and cook for 2 to 3 minutes. Add cabbae and cook 3 to 4 minutes or until cabbae is crisp-tender., Stir in reen onion, cooked noodles and peanut sauce. Toss and serve riht away.

name: Stove Top Casserole
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 onion (small, coarsely chopped), 4 potatoes (medium, peeled and sliced 1/4 inch thick), 1 1/2 cups chicken stock, 2 cups reen cabbae (shredded), 1 cup Swiss cheese, shredded, 1/4 cup nuts (chopped)
directions: 1. Heat oil in lare skillet or Dutch oven. Add onions and stir over medium heat until olden., 2. Add potatoes and chicken stock. Cover tihtly, reduce heat to low and simmer until potatoes are almost tender., 3. Add cabbae, cover and simmer for another 5 minutes., 4. Remove cover, sprinkle with cheese and nuts., 5. Let stand just until cheese is melted, about 2 minutes.

name: Stove Top Green Chile Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2/3 onion, chopped, 1/4 cup flour, 2 1/2 cups diced reen chilies, 2 cups chicken broth (low-sodium), 2 cups cooked, shredded chicken breast, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 8 corn tortillas (6 inch), 1 1/2 cups extra-sharp cheddar cheese, finely shredded
directions: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan., Saute the chopped onion in the oil. Add the flour and cook for 1 minute., Add the chilies, chicken broth, chicken and arlic powder. Simmer uncovered for 5 minutes., Mix the cornstarch into about 1/4 cup of cold water until all the lumps are one. Add to the chile and chicken mixture. Cook for 2 more minutes., Tear the tortillas into strips and divide into thirds. Add them to the pan and cook until they are hot, stirrin with a spoon from time to time., Sprinkle the cheese over the enchiladas. Cover the pan and cook until the cheese has melted. Serve immediately.

name: Stovetop Tamale Pie
ingredients: Quick Chili:,1/2 pound ground beef, lean,1 can kidney beans (15 1/2 ounce, drain and save liquid),1/3 cup bean liquid,1 cup tomato puree (canned),1 tablespoon onion (minced),1/8 tablespoon chili powder,Tamale Pie:,8 cans whole kernel corn (12 ounce, not drained),1/2 cup yellow cornmeal,1 dash salt,1 1/4 cups cold water (8 fluid ounces),1/8 teaspoon chili powder
directions:
Prepare Chili:
1. Cook beef in hot skillet until lihtly browned. Drain off fat.
2. Stir in remainin inredients. Brin to a boil.
3. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 10 minutes., Prepare Tamale Pie:
1. Place chili in a 10-inch skillet. Stir in corn. Heat thorouhly.
2. As chili heats, mix cornmeal and salt with water in a sauce pan. Cook over medium heat, stirrin constantly until thickened, about 2 minutes.
3. Spread cornmeal mixture over hot chili to form a crust. Sprinkle with chili powder.
4. Cover and cook over low heat, with lid slihtly ajar, until toppin is set, about 10 minutes., Optional - Top with liht sour cream, or low-fat yoghurt.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 5 bell peppers (red, orange, yellow, or reen), 1 pound round beef, 90% lean, 3/4 cup brown rice, 1/2 can diced tomatoes, low-sodium, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon allspice, 1/4 teaspoon round black pepper
directions:
1. Cut a circular hole in the tops of the bell peppers. Remove seeds and membrane and set aside.
2. In a lare bowl, combine remainin inredients and stir until completely mixed. Fill the bell peppers with meat mixture.
3. Place the stuffed bell peppers in lare stock pot on stove, with the tops facin up. Add 1-inch water to bottom of pot and cover.
4. Place heat on medium, keepin covered for 30-40 minutes until rice is done. Serve.

name: Stuffed Green Peppers
ingredients: 4 reen pepper (lare, washed), 1 pound turkey, round, 85% lean, 1 cup rice, uncooked, 1/2 cup onion (peeled and chopped), 1 1/2 cups tomato sauce, unsalted, round black pepper (to taste)
directions:
1. Cut around the stem of the reen peppers. Remove the seeds and the pulpy part of the peppers.
2. Wash, and then cook reen peppers in boilin water for five minutes. Drain well.
3. In saucepan, brown turkey. Add rice, onion, 1/2 cup tomato sauce and black pepper.
4. Stuff each pepper with the mixture and place in casserole dish.
5. Pour the remainin tomato sauce over the reen peppers.
6. Cover and bake for 30 minutes at 350 derees.

name: Stuffed Summer Squash
ingredients: 2 summer squash, 3 cups cooked brown rice, 1 cup diced tomatoes, 1 cup squash pulp (from summer squash listed above), 1 cup white beans, drained and rinsed, 1 tablespoon fresh basil, 4 tablespoons Parmesan cheese
directions:
1. Wash and cut squash in half, lenthwise. Remove the lare seeds.
2. Steam the squash, skin side down, in a small amount of water in a fry pan or skillet until slihtly tender (but not mushy).
3. Scoop out a ood amount of pulp (1 cup), place in a bowl and mix with stuffin (brown rice throuh Parmesan cheese).
4. Place the squash shells in a baking dish. Stuff the squash with the stuffin mixture.
5. Top with rated Parmesan cheese. Bake at 350°F for about 30 minutes.

name: Summer Vegetable Spahetti
ingredients: 2 cups onions (small, yellow, cut into eihths), 2 cups tomatoes (chopped, peeled, fresh, ripe, about 1 lb), 2 cups squash (thinly sliced yellow and reen, about 1 lb), 1 1/2 cups reen beans (cut fresh, about 1/2 lb), 2/3 cup water, 2 tablespoons parsley (fresh, minced), 1 clove arlic (minced), 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, black pepper (to taste), 1 can tomato paste (6 oz, no salt added), 1 pound spahetti (uncooked), 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese (rated)
directions: 1. Combine first 10 inredients in lare saucepan. Cook for 10 minutes, then stir in tomato paste. Cover and cook ently, 15 minutes, stirrin occasionally until vegetables are tender., 2. Cook spahetti in unsalted water accordin to packae directions., 3. Spoon sauce over drained hot spahetti and sprinkle Parmesan cheese over top.

name: Sure to Please Baked Eggs & Cheese
ingredients: 1 tablespoon oil, 6 es, 1/2 cup non-fat milk, 1/2 cup low-fat cheese (rated), 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons oreano
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees., 2. Put oil in a medium baking dish or small cake pan and heat in the oven for a few minutes., 3. In a bowl, beat es. Mix in remainin inredients. Pour into hot pan., 4. Bake 20 minutes or until es are firm. Serve immediately., * 4 es and 4 e whites may be used instead of 6 es to reduce fat and cholesterol (nutrient analysis reflects this modification).

name: Surfs Up Tacos
ingredients: 1 can tuna (6.5 oz or 5 oz), 1 can kidney beans (15.5 oz can) (rinsed and drained), 1 can mexi-corn or canned corn (drained), 1/3 cup mayonnaise, liht, 2 tablespoons taco seasonin, 2 tablespoons lime juice or juice from one lime, 2 cups lettuce, shredded, 1 1/2 cups cheddar cheese, reduced-fat, 1/2 cup salsa, 12 whole rain tortillas or hard taco shells
directions: 1. In a medium bowl, flake tuna with fork. Stir in beans, corn, mayonnaise, taco seasonin*, and lime juice., 2. Place lettuce, cheese, and salsa in separate bowls., 3. Place tortillas or taco shells on microwave safe plate. Microwave on HIGH for 1 minute.**, 4. To eat, layer tuna mixture, lettuce, and cheese on tortilla. Top with salsa.

name: Sweet Potato Pancakes with Balsamic Maple Mushrooms
ingredients: For Sweet Potato Pancakes,3 medium sweet potatoes or yams (orange flesh),1 cup non-fat milk,1 egg, beaten,2 tablespoons vegetable oil,1 cup whole-wheat flour,2 teaspoons baking powder,1/4 teaspoon salt,Cooking spray, as needed,For Balsamic Maple Mushrooms,1 pound cremini and/or white button\tmushrooms, quartered,1 tablespoon vegetable oil,1/3 cup maple syrup,1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar
directions: Microwave sweet potatoes until soft; let cool. Peel and mash potatoes, usin an electric mixer., Add milk, e, and vegetable oil to potatoes; mix. Sift toether dry inredients and add to potato mixture. Mix on low until just blended., Heat non-stick skillet or riddle over medium heat; coat skillet with cookin spray., Use 1/4 cup of batter per pancake, ladlin into hot skillet.Wait until pancake bubbles and looks slihtly dry on top before flippin over., While pancakes are cookin, heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil in another skillet (do not use non-stick) over medium flame., Add quartered mushrooms and toss coat with oil. Let simmer, stirrin occasionally, until juices run., Add maple syrup and balsamic vinear to pan. Let simmer until sauce reduces and thickens., To serve, stack 2-3 pancakes, alternatin with balsamic maple mushrooms.

name: Taco Salad
ingredients: 3 cups lettuce (Use butterhead or any other head of lettuce, torn into small pieces), 2 tomatoes (chopped, fresh), 1/2 cup reen pepper (chopped), 16 ounces round turkey or round beef, 1 onion (small, chopped), 1 can pinto beans (15 1/2 ounce, drained), 3/4 cup salsa (or taco sauce)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put lettuce in lare bowl. Add tomatoes and reen pepper., Brown meat and onion in fry pan. Drain off fat and liquid., Mix meat, beans and salsa. Add to salad mixture., Serve with additional salsa. Refrierate leftovers.

name: Taco Salad II
ingredients: 1/4 pound lean round beef, 1 1/2 cumin, round (1 1/2 teaspoons, optional), 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 cup kidney or pinto beans (cooked), 1/2 head of lettuce (torn), 1 onion (small, diced), 2 tomatoes (lare, cut up), 1/2 cup cheddar cheese (shredded), 2 cups liht tortilla chips (broken), 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat, 1/2 cup salsa, chunky
directions: 1. Prepare dressin in mixin yoghurt and salsa, then set aside., 2. Brown round beef and drain any fat; add beans, cumin and chili powder and heat throuh., 3. Toss lettuce, tomatoes, onion and cheese in lare bowl., 4. Spoon on meat and bean mixture and top with broken tortilla chips., 5. Offer dressin on the side., 6. Refrierate leftovers within two hours.

name: Taco Soup
ingredients: 1 pound round beef (90% lean), 2 cans diced tomatoes (14.5 ounces each), 3 cups corn (2-15.5 ounce cans, rinsed and drained), 2 cans red kidney beans (15.5 ounces each, rinsed and drained), 1 1/2 teaspoons chili powder, 3/4 teaspoon cumin powder, 3/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/3 cup water
directions: 1. Cook meat in a pot over medium heat until brown., 2. Put meat in a strainer to drain fat. Rinse with hot water., 3. Mix all the inredients in a pot and cook on low for an hour.

name: Tastee Burers
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups lentils, 3 cups water, 1 cup onion (chopped), 1 cup carrot (rated), 3 cups bread crumbs (fresh), 1 e, 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon oreano (crumbled leaf), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 3 tablespoons mararine, 4 ounces cheddar cheese (sliced)
directions: Place lentils in a colander, rinse in cold water and drain., In a medium saucepan, brin water to a boil. Add lentils, reduce heat to low, cover and cook for 15 minutes., Add onion and carrots. Cook 15 minutes more or until lentils are tender., Remove from heat and cool slihtly., Stir in bread crumbs, e, arlic powder, oreano and salt., Melt mararine in lare skillet. Drop lentil mixture by rounded 1/2 cupfuls into hot mararine. Flatten mounds into patties and cook until firm and olden brown on both sides., Top each patty with a thin slice of cheese., Serve immediately., Refrierate leftovers within two hours.

name: Tasty Chicken and Veggie Packets
ingredients: 4 chicken breast (boneless and skinless), 1/4 red onion (julienned), 1 carrot (julienned), 1 red pepper (julienned), 1 celery stalk (julienned), 1/2 zucchini (julienned), 1 clove arlic (minced), 2 tablespoons basil (fresh, chopped), thyme (fresh sprins, optional), parsley (chopped, optional), iner (minced, optional), 2 teaspoons olive oil, 4 teaspoons lemon juice (freshly squeezed (1 Tablespoon + 1 teaspoon)), salt (to taste, optional), pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 derees F., Cut four lare rectanles of parchment paper or aluminum foil and fold in half; unfold., Place each chicken breast in a lare square of foil or parchment paper and season with salt and pepper., Top chicken with your choice of vegetables and seasonins., Drizzle each packet with ½ teaspoon oil and 1 teaspoon lemon juice., Fold the parchment paper or foil in half and then crimp around the edes tihtly in 1/4-inch folds to create a half moon shape., Usin a spatula, transfer the packets to a baking sheet. Bake until the chicken is cooked to an internal temperature of 165 derees F, about 20 minutes, dependin the thickness of the chicken breast.

name: Tasty Fish and Veggie Packets
ingredients: 4 cod fillets (4 ounce each, can also use tilapia, sole, hake, flounder, or other white fish), 1/4 red onion (or scallions), 1 carrot, 1 red pepper, 1 celery stalk, zucchini (optional), Roma tomatoes (optional), 1/2 fennel bulb, 1 clove arlic, 2 tablespoons parsley (chopped), thyme (fresh sprins, optional), basil (chopped, optional), iner (minced, optional), 2 teaspoons olive oil, 4 teaspoons lemon juice, salt (to taste, optional), pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 derees F., Cut four lare rectanles of parchment paper or aluminum foil and fold in half; unfold., Put each fish fillet in a lare square of parchment paper and season with salt and pepper., Top fish with your choice of vegetables and seasonins., Drizzle each packet with ½ teaspoon oil and 1 teaspoon lemon juice., Fold the parchment paper or foil in half and then crimp around the edes tihtly in 1/4-inch folds to create a half moon shape., Usin a spatula, transfer the packets to a baking sheet. Bake until the fish is cooked to an internal temperature of 145 derees F, about 10-12 minutes, dependin the thickness of the fish.

name: Teriyaki Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 1/4 cup water, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1/2 cup teriyaki sauce, reduced sodium, 1 pound round turkey, 85% lean (or thinly sliced), 1 cup water chestnuts, chopped, 1 tablespoon cookin oil, 6 iceber lettuce leaves
directions:
1. Mix the water, cornstarch, and teriyaki sauce.
2. Add meat and water chestnuts.
3. Heat oil in a skillet or heavy saucepan and add meat mixture; stir until cooked throuh.
4. Serve in a lettuce leaf.

name: Terrific Bean Taco
ingredients: 1 onion (small, chopped), 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 2 cups refried beans, 8 taco shells (or flour tortillas, wheat or white), 1/4 head of lettuce (chopped), 2 tomatoes (chopped), 1 cup cheese (shredded), taco sauce (optional)
directions: 1. Stir fry chopped onion in vegetable oil., 2. Stir in refried beans. Heat thorouhly., 3. Spread refried bean mixture in taco shell or on tortilla., 4. Sprinkle with shredded cheese, lettuce, chopped tomatoes and taco sauce, as desired.

name: Tex-Mex Skillet
ingredients: 1/2 medium head lettuce, 1 medium reen bell pepper, 1 lare tomato, 1 small jalapeno pepper, 1 medium red onion, 2 cloves arlic, 2 ounces low-fat cheddar cheese, 1 can of black beans (no salt added), 1 pound lean round beef (turkey or chicken), 2 2/3 cups frozen corn, 1/2 cup water, 3/4 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon round cumin, 8 whole wheat flour tortillas (6 inch), dash round black pepper
directions: Rinse lettuce, bell pepper, tomato, and jalapeño. Rinse and peel onion. Peel arlic., Chop or shred lettuce into bite size pieces. Mince arlic. Halve the jalapeño and bell peppers. Remove seeds with the tip of a knife. Dice peppers., Over a small bowl, rate tomato and onion usin the coarse side of a box rater. Collect all pulp and juices., Grate cheddar cheese., In a colander, drain and rinse beans., In a lare skillet over medium-hih heat, cook meat, bell pepper, and arlic, until meat is lihtly browned. Drain to remove fat., Stir in frozen corn, beans, water, and spices. Brin mixture to a boil. Lower heat and cover. Simmer for 10 minutes, or until most liquid is one., While meat mixture is simmerin, make a salsa. Add jalapeño and a pinch of salt to the rated tomato and onion. Stir and set aside., Divide the meat mixture evenly amon the 8 tortillas. Top each with rated cheese, salsa, and lettuce. Roll up and serve.

name: Thai Pineapple and Chicken
ingredients: 4 cups cooked brown rice (reular or instant), 2 tablespoons peanut or canola oil, divided, 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into 1" cubes, 2 cloves arlic, minced, 1 red bell pepper, cut into chunks, 1 medium onion, cut into chunks, 2 cups cut broccoli florets and stems, 2 cups fresh pineapple chunks, 1 fresh lime, divided, 1 tablespoon Thai fish sauce, 2 tablespoons Thai chili sauce, 1/4 cup chopped cilantro
directions: Cook rice accordin to packae directions., Heat 1 Tbsp oil in a lare skillet. Add cubed chicken, stir fry 4-5 minutes until chicken is done. Remove from skillet., Heat remainin oil. Add arlic and cook one minute., Add bell pepper, onion and broccoli; cook 5 minutes., Add pineapple; cook an additional 3-4 minutes., Return chicken to skillet and stir in juice from ½ lime, fish sauce, chili sauce and cilantro. Cook 1 more minute., Serve over brown rice with lime wedes.

name: The Bosnian Pot
ingredients: 2 1/4 pounds beef, cubed, 1 head cabbae, 2 1/2 carrots (can use 2-3), 3 1/2 tomatoes, lare, 3 1/2 potatoes, lare, 2 medium onions, 2 arlic cloves, sliced (or more), 2 reen peppers, 1/2 tablespoon cookin oil, 1/2 tablespoon vinear, salt and pepper (to taste, optional)
directions:
1. Dice all the vegetables.
2. Combine with the meat and seasonins in a lare pot.
3. Add enouh water to completely cover the mixture and add the oil and vinear.
4. Cook, covered, for two to three hours on low heat until everythin is well done.

name: Three Sisters Soup
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 3/4 cup diced carrot, 1 cup chopped onion, 4 cloves arlic, minced or 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 2 cups diced summer or winter squash (fresh or frozen), 1 1/2 cups corn (fresh or frozen) or a 15-oz can (drained and rinsed), 1 1/2 cups cooked beans (any type) or a 15-oz can (drained and rinsed), 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes or 2 cups diced fresh, 3 cups low-sodium broth (any type), 1 teaspoon cumin, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat oil in a lare pan on medium heat. Add carrot and onion and saute until onions have beun to turn slihtly brown, about 8 to 10 minutes., Add arlic, squash and corn and continue to stir for another 3 to 4 minutes., Add beans, tomatoes, broth, cumin and pepper., Allow soup to come to a boil and then turn heat down to a simmer until all vegetables are tender to taste (15 to 30 minutes, dependin on the vegetables used).

name: Three Sisters Stew
ingredients: 1/2 pound round beef, 1 cup onions, diced, 3 cups water, 3 cups red potatoes, cubed (or 1 1/2 cans, about 24 ounces, low-sodium sliced potatoes, drained), 2 tomatoes, diced (or 1 can, about 15 ounces, low-sodium diced tomatoes, drained), 1 can (15 ounces) low-sodium tomato sauce, 1/2 cup frozen corn kernels (or 1/4 can, about 4 ounces, low-sodium whole kernel corn, drained), 1/2 cup yellow squash, diced (or 1/4 can, about 4 ounces, low-sodium sweet potatoes, drained and diced), 1/2 cup reen squash, diced (or 1/4 can, about 4 ounces, low-sodium carrots, drained), 1/2 can (about 8 ounces) low-sodium kidney beans, drained, 1/2 can (about 8 ounces) low-sodium vegetarian beans, 1/4 cup quick cookin oats, 2 cloves arlic, finely chopped, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: In a small skillet, brown round beef and onions over medium to hih heat for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain fat., In a lare pot, combine cooked round beef, water, and red potatoes., Brin the pot to a boil and cook for 15 minutes., Add all the other inredients to the pot and brin to a boil. Lower heat and simmer for about 25 minutes.

name: Tic Tac Toe Veggie Pizza
ingredients: 1 medium carrot, 1/2 red bell pepper, 1 medium summer squash, 4 whole wheat pita rounds (about 6" diameter), 3/4 cup reduced-sodium pasta sauce, 4 sticks reduced-fat strin mozzarella strin cheese
directions: Place rack in middle of oven and pre-heat oven to 400 °F., For Xs, cut carrot and bell pepper into small sticks about 2 inches lon. For Os, cut summer squash into 12 slices. For rid, pull apart each cheese stick to make 4 strips., Place pita rounds on baking sheet and spread pasta sauce on each., Let kids build tic tac toe pizzas with cheese and vegetables., Bake about 10 minutes or until cheese is bubblin.

name: Tofu with Broccoli
ingredients: 1 pound firm tofu, 4 teaspoons vegetable oil, 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 2 scallions (reen and whites chopped), 1 head broccoli (broken into florets, stems chopped), 1/4 cup water, 1 tablespoon low-sodium soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoon Crushed red pepper flakes, 1 tablespoon Chopped fresh cilantro (or basil leave)
directions: Put the tofu on a cuttin board and cut it in half and then cut each half into 4 equal pieces., Put 2 layers of paper towel on a cuttin board and put the tofu on top. Let drain at least 20 minutes (and up to 2 hours)., Place a skillet over medium heat and when hot, add 2 teaspoons oil.  Add the tofu, one piece at a time, and cook until olden, about 3 minutes per side. Remove the tofu to a plate and set aside., Reheat the skillet and when it is hot, add remainin 2 teaspoons oil. Add arlic and scallions and cook until just olden, about 2 minutes. Add the broccoli and water and raise the heat to hih. Cook until the broccoli is tender, about 4 minutes., Return the tofu to the pan and add the remainin inredients. Stir well.   , Serve with a side of brown rice.

name: Tomato and Garlic Omelet
ingredients: 1/2 slice bread (whole wheat), 1/2 teaspoon olive oil, 1 arlic clove (finely chopped), cookin spray (as needed, nonstick), 3/4 cup e substitute, 2 tablespoons mozzarella cheese (part skim, rated), 1 tomato (lare, chopped), 1 teaspoon basil (dried)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 300°F., 2. Cut the bread into cubes; toss with oil and arlic in a small bowl. Spread the cubes in a sinle layer on a baking sheet and toast in the oven for 15 to 25 minutes, or until olden brown, tossin once or twice. Transfer to a plate to cool., 3. Spray a medium pan with nonstick cookin spray and heat over medium-hih heat. Pour in e substitute., 4. When the e beins to set, spread evenly across the bottom of the pan and reduce the heat to low., 5. Once the top layer of e is almost cooked, sprinkle the cheese and basil on top and scatter the tomatoes and bread over half of the omelet; fold the unfilled omelet half over the fillin. Slide the omelet on a plate and serve.

name: Tomato Basil and Bean Pasta Salad
ingredients: 1 pound ziti pasta (or bow tie pasta), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 cup vinear, 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 1/4 teaspoon round black pepper, 1 cup fresh basil leaves (chopped), 3 tomatoes (lare, coarsely chopped), 1 cup kidney beans (cooked or canned drained, or try arbanzo beans or black beans), 1 mozzarella cheese (1 cup, or provolone cheese, cubed or shredded, optional), 1 walnuts (1/2 cup chopped, optional)
directions: Cook pasta accordin to packae directions. Drain and cool., In a small mixin bowl, whisk toether vegetable oil, vinear, Dijon-style mustard and pepper to make vinairette., In a lare mixin bowl, combine pasta, beans, basil and tomatoes. Pour vinairette over top and toss toether. Cover and chill at least 1 hour., If desired, add nuts and cheese just before servin, tossin aain to combine.

name: Tomato N Cheese Pasta
ingredients: 1 cup pasta, small whole rain (shell, penne, or ziti), 1/4 cup onion, chopped, 2 arlic cloves, minced, 1 tablespoon olive oil (or canola oil), 1 can diced tomatoes, unsalted (14.5 ounces), 1/2 teaspoon basil, 1/2 teaspoon oreano, 1/4 teaspoon suar, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1/4 cup mozzarella, part-skim shredded, 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese
directions:
1. Cook pasta accordin to packae directions; drain.
2. In a small saucepan, cook onion and arlic in oil until tender.
3. Stir in tomatoes, basil, oreano, suar, and pepper.
4. Brin to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered for 15 minutes. Add pasta to sauce.
5. Transfer to a reased 1-quart baking dish. Top with cheeses.
6. Bake, uncovered at 375°F for 10-15 minutes or until cheese is melted.

name: Tortilla Pizzas
ingredients: 12 corn tortillas, small (or flour tortillas), vegetable oil (or mararine), 1 can refried beans (16 ounce), 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 2 ounces fresh or canned reen chili peppers (diced), 3 tablespoons red taco sauce, 3 cups vegetables, such as broccoli, mushrooms, spinach, and red bell pepper (chopped), 1/2 cup cheese, shredded part-skim mozzarella, 1/2 cilantro (1/2 cup chopped, fresh, optional)
directions: 1. Brush one side of each of two tortillas with water. Press the wet sides of the tortillas toether to form a thick crust for the pizza., 2. Brush the outside of the tortillas with a small amount of oil or mararine. Evenly brown both sides in a heated fryin pan. Repeat with the rest of the tortillas. Set aside., 3. Heat refried beans, onion, and half of the chili peppers toether in a medium saucepan, stirrin occasionally. Remove from heat., 4. Spread about 1/3 cup of the bean mixture on each tortilla pizza. Sprinkle with 1 Tablespoon taco sauce, then top with 1/2 cup of the chopped vegetables, 1 teaspoon chili peppers, and 1 Tablespoon cheese for each pizza., 5. Return to fryin pan and heat until cheese melts. Top with cilantro, if desired. Serve immediately.

name: Tostadas Deladas
ingredients: 8 flour tortillas, 2 cups refried beans (fat-free), 2 cups lettuce (shredded), 1 cup tomatoes (diced), 1 cup cheese (rated)
directions: 1. Wash hands and cookin area., 2. Turn on oven to 350°F., 3. Place tortillas on a cookie sheet and put in oven for 10 minutes or until crispy., 4. Wash and cut your lettuce and tomatoes., 5. Spread two lare tablespoons of refried beans on each tortilla., 6. Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, and rated cheese., 7. Serve immediately and refrierate leftovers.

name: Tuna Melt Burer
ingredients: 1 can tuna (6 ounce), 2 celery (medium stalks, chopped), 1/2 cup processed American cheese (low sodium, diced), 1/4 cup liht mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon instant minced onion, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 12 whole wheat bread (slices)
directions: 1. Wash hands and cookin area., 2. Preheat oven to 350°F., 3. Drain tuna and break the meat apart with a fork., 4. Wash and chop the celery and dice the cheese., 5. Mix tuna, celery, cheese, liht mayonnaise, dried onion, salt, and pepper into a medium mixin bowl with a wooden spoon., 6. Spread tuna mixture on six of the pieces of whole wheat bread and place a sinle slice of bread on top of each (you will make a total of 6 sandwiches)., 7. Put each sandwich on a square of aluminum foil, then wrap the foil around sandwiches, foldin edes securely, 8. Bake about 20 minutes or until hot in the middle. Cool slihtly before servin.

name: Tuna Pasta
ingredients: 8 ounces uncooked spahetti (or other pasta), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil (or canola oil), 1 small onion, chopped, 1/2 cup chopped broccoli (or zucchini), 1 1/2 cups tomato-based pasta sauce, 1 can tuna, drained (6.5 ounces, packed in water), salt (to taste, optional), Parmesan cheese (2 Tablespoons, optional), pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook spahetti accordin to packae, drain., Heat oil in a lare skillet or pan over medium heat. Add onion and broccoli (or zucchini). Cook until softened., Stir in tomato-based pasta sauce. Brin to a boil. Turn heat to low and simmer for 3 minutes., Add drained tuna into the sauce mixture. Stir just enouh to heat the tuns., Add salt and pepper to taste (optional). Add cooked spahetti to the sauce. Stir the pasta and sauce mixture until mixed toether uniformly., Optional: Add 2 Tablespoons Parmesan cheese to cooked mixture of pasta and sauce., Serve hot.

name: Tuna Pasta Casserole
ingredients: 12 ounces pasta shells, or other pasta, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1/2 cup chopped reen pepper, 1/2 tablespoon oil, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, reduced sodium (10.75 ounces, or cream of celery, chicken or cheddar), 1 can diced tomatoes (14.5 ounce), 2 cans tuna (6.5 ounces each, packed in water), shredded cheese (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook pasta accordin to packae directions and drain., In a lare skillet or pot, cook onion and pepper in oil., Add cream soup, diced tomatoes and tuna to onion and pepper., Mix with pasta. Put in baking dish., Cook at 350°F or for 25 minutes until bubbly., Top with cheese if desired and return to oven for 5 minutes to melt.

name: Tuna Salad on Greens
ingredients: 4 whole rain crackers, 4 cups romaine lettuce (chopped), 1 carrot (peeled and rated), 1 tomato (chopped), 1/4 red onion (chopped), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 3 tablespoons vinear (red wine), 1 teaspoon Italian seasonin, dash black pepper (fresh cracked), 6 ounces tuna, low sodium, canned in water (drained), 1/3 cup mayonnaise, low-fat, 1/4 cup celery (chopped), 1/4 cup reen onion (chopped)
directions: 1. Place lettuce, vegetables, oil, vinear and herbs in a lare salad bowl. Toss toether., 2. Mix inredients for tuna salad in another medium sized mixin bowl., 3. Assemble salad by placin reens on a lare plate. Top with a scoop of tuna salad.

name: Turkey and Cucumber Sandwich
ingredients: 4 slices whole wheat bread, 4 slices enriched white bread, 1/2 cup plain fat free yoghurt, 2 fresh dill spris (chopped), 1/2 cup cucumbers, chopped, 1/4 cup onion, chopped, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 8 ounces turkey breast, thinly sliced (or you can use fat free, low-sodium deli turkey), Additional cucumber slices, as desired, 1/8 teaspoon salt (optional)
directions: Mix the yoghurt, dill, onion, pepper and chopped cucumbers., Divide the yoghurt/cucumber mixture on all 8 slices of bread., Top the whole wheat bread with turkey and cucumber slices., Cover with the white bread slices.

name: Turkey Meatloaf
ingredients: 1 pound round turkey (85% lean), 1/2 cup oats (reular, dry), 1 e (lare), 1 tablespoon onion (dehydrated, or one small onion, minced), 1/4 cup ketchup, 2 celery stalk (chopped), 2 arlic clove (minced), 1/2 reen pepper (seeded and diced)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees., 2. Combine all inredients and mix well., 3. Bake in loaf pan for 25 minutes or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165 derees. Check the temperature with a meat thermometer., 4. Cut into five slices and serve.

name: Turkey Patties
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds round turkey (85% lean), 1 cup bread crumbs, 1 e, 1/4 cup reen onion (chopped), 3 teaspoons prepared mustard, 1/2 cup chicken broth, nonstick cookin spray
directions: 1. Mix round turkey, bread crumbs, e, onions, and mustard in a lare bowl. Shape into 4 patties, about 1/2 inch thick., 2. Spray a lare skillet with cookin spray. Add patties and cook, turnin once to brown other side. Cook until olden brown outside and white inside, about 10 minutes. Remove., 3. Add chicken broth to skillet and boil over hih heat until slihtly thickened, about 1 to 2 minutes. Pour sauce over patties., 4. Serve on buns.

name: Turkey Salad with Orange Vinairette
ingredients: 1/4 cup orange juice, 2 tablespoons vinear, white wine, 2 tablespoons onion (finely chopped), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 dash pepper, 1 tablespoon oil, 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 4 cups salad reens (torn), 2 cups cooked turkey breast (cut into julienne strips), 1 cup mandarin orange sections (drained), 1/2 cup celery (sliced)
directions: "1. In a jar with tiht-fittin lid, combine all vinairette inredients; shake well. If you dont have a container with a tiht-fittin lid, place inredients in a small mixin bowl and mix toether with a whisk.", 2. In lare bowl, combine all salad inredients; toss ently., 3. Serve with vinairette. If desired, arnish with fresh strawberries.

name: Turkey Stuffed Cabbae
ingredients: 1 head of cabbae, 1/2 pound lean round beef (90% lean), 1/2 pound round turkey (85% lean), 1 onion (small, minced), 1 slice whole wheat bread (stale, crumbled), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 cup water, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 1 can diced tomatoes (14.5 oz), 1 onion (small, sliced), 1 cup water, 1 carrot (medium, sliced), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 2 teaspoons brown suar (2 Tablespoons), 1 tablespoon corn starch
directions: 1. Rinse and core cabbae. Carefully remove 10 outer leaves, place in saucepan, and cover with boilin water. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove and drain cooked cabbae leaves on paper towels., 2. Shred 1/2 cup of raw cabbae and set aside., 3. Brown round beef and turkey and minced onion in skillet. Drain fat., 4. Place cooked and drained meat mixture, bread crumbs, water, and pepper into mixin bowl., 5. Drain tomatoes, reserving liquid, and add 1/2 cup of tomato juice from can to meat mixture. Mix well; then place 1/4 cup of fillin on each parboiled, drained cabbae leaf. Place folded side down in skillet., 6. Add tomatoes, sliced onion, water, shredded cabbae, and carrot. Cover and simmer about 1 hour (or until cabbae is tender), bastin occasionally., 7. Remove cabbae rolls to serving platter; keep warm., 8. Mix lemon juice, brown suar, and cornstarch toether in small bowl. Add to vegetables and liquid in skillet, and cook, stirrin occasionally, until thickened and clear. Serve over cabbae rolls.

name: Turkey Tostadas
ingredients: 2 cups cooked turkey (cut into bite-size pieces, or 2 cups round turkey, browned in a skillet and drained), 2 tablespoons taco seasonin (chili), 1 1/2 cups water, 4 corn tortillas, 1/4 cup refried beans (low-fat or fat-free), 1/4 cup Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese (shredded, low-fat), 1/2 cup tomatoes (chopped), 1/2 cup lettuce (shredded), 2 tablespoons onion (chopped), 8 tablespoons taco sauce (1/2 cup), plain yoghurt (low-fat or fat-free optional), uacamole (or mashed avacado optional)
directions: 1. Wash and prepare vegetables., 2. In a lare skillet over medium heat, combine turkey, taco seasonin, and water., 3. Brin mixture to boil, reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes, stirrin occasionally., 4. Place tortillas on a cookin sheet. Bake at 375° for 4-7 minutes or until tortillas are crispy., 5. Spread tortillas with a tablespoon of beans. Top with 1/4 meat mixture and cheese., 6. Return tortillas to oven to cook for 2-3 minutes or until cheese is melted., 7.
