Top with tomatoes, lettuce, onions and taco sauce. Garnish with yoghurt and uacamole, if desired.

name: Tuscan Potato Skillet
ingredients: 10 petite red potatoes, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 pound chicken pieces, 2 tablespoons extra virin olive (divided), 1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary (or 1 teaspoon dried rosemary), 4 cloves arlic (minced), 2 1/2 cups frozen reen beans (thawed, 12 oz. ba), 1 lemon (zested and juiced)
directions: Cut each potato into 4 wedes. Place in a lare microwave-safe bowl and season with salt and pepper. Microwave on HIGH for 4 minutes. Stir and microwave for 4 minutes more., While potatoes are cookin, cut each chicken tenderloin into 4 equal pieces., Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a lare skillet over medium-hih heat. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes or until nicely browned, stirrin frequently., Add remainin oil and potatoes; cook and stir for 5 minutes more to brown potatoes and fully cook chicken., Stir in rosemary, arlic, reen beans, lemon zest and juice. Cook for a few minutes more to heat throuh. Season to taste with salt and pepper

name: Two Bean Chili
ingredients: 1/2 pound round beef, 1/2 can (about 8 ounces) low-sodium kidney beans, drained, 1/2 can (about 8 ounces) low-sodium vegetarian beans, 1/2 cup onion, diced, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 2 1/2 cups low-sodium tomato juice, 1/4 teaspoon pepper
directions: In a medium-size pot, brown round beef over medium to hih heat for 8 to 10 minutes. Drain fat., Add kidney beans, vegetarian beans, onions, chili powder, tomato juice, and pepper., Cook over low heat for about 40 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Un-fried Chicken
ingredients: 4 pounds chicken pieces, skin removed, 8 yoghurt, non-fat plain (8 ounce), 1 1/2 cups bread crumbs (or crushed cereal), non-stick cookin spray
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 325 derees., 2. Coat chicken with yoghurt. Roll in bread crumbs or crushed cereal., 3. Spray baking sheets with non-stick cookin spray and place chicken pieces on them., 4. Bake 1 hour, turnin chicken pieces after first 30 minutes or when chicken browns., 5. Serve. Refrierate leftovers.

name: Uncooked Tomato Sauce
ingredients: 6 tomatoes (lare, cut into chunks), 1 tablespoon arlic (minced), 1/2 onion, medium (finely chopped), 1/2 reen pepper (finely chopped), 3 tablespoons fresh basil (chopped), 1/2 teaspoon dried oreano, 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt and pepper (optional, to taste), 6 cups pasta (cooked), 6 tablespoons Parmesan cheese (rated)
directions: Chop tomatoes and mix with all the remainin inredients in a lare bowl., Let the mixture stand at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Toss with hot cooked pasta or rice and top with rated Romano or Parmesan cheese.

name: Vegetable and Turkey Stir Fry
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 thin slices of iner root (minced), 1 arlic clove (peeled and minced), 16 ounces turkey (cooked, cut into 1/2 inch cubes), 1/2 teaspoon suar, 2 packaes vegetables, fresh or frozen (10 ounce packae, chopped), water (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat fry pan. Add oil and heat on hih temperature., Add iner, arlic, turkey and vegetables. Stir fry about 1 minute to coat with oil., Adjust heat to prevent scorchin. Add suar. If vegetables are tender, stop cookin at this time., If the vegetables are firm, add 1-2 tablespoons of water, cover and cook for 2 minutes or until tender., Serve at once, or if you wish to add a ravy:, Mix the ravy inredients well, pour over vegetables and turkey, cook for 30 seconds.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
ingredients: 2 cups white rice, cooked, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 1/4 cup onion, chopped (could also use reen onion), 1 packae frozen vegetables (10 ounce), 1 tablespoon soy sauce, reduced sodium, dash pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Make 2 cups of cooked white rice. Use the packae directions to make the rice., Chop 1/2 cup of celery and 1/4 cup of onion., Heat the oil in a skillet or lare fryin pan., Add the celery and onion. Stir fry for 2 minutes., Add the vegetables to the pan. Keep stirrin the vegetables until they are tender-crisp., Add the cooked rice., Sprinkle with soy sauce and pepper., Stir fry for 2 minutes until the rice is heated and the flavors are blended.

name: Vegetable Soup with Chicken
ingredients: 1 can chicken (about 12 ounces), 3 cups water, 3 ears corn (or 1 can low-sodium whole kernel corn), 1 can low-sodium peas (about 15 ounces), 1 pound fresh carrots, peeled and diced (or 1 can low-sodium carrots, about 15 ounces), 2 pounds potatoes, peeled and diced (or 2 cans low-sodium sliced potatoes, about 15 ounces each)
directions: In a lare pot, heat the chicken and water over medium to hih heat until hot., Cut the kernels off the ears of corn., Add the corn kernels and all other inredients to the pot and boil for 10 seconds., Lower the heat and simmer for about 30 minutes.

name: Vegetable Stew
ingredients: 3 cups water, 1 vegetable bouillon (low sodium, cube), 2 cups white potatoes (cut into 2-inch strips), 2 cups carrot (sliced), 4 cups summer squash (cut into 1-inch chunks), 1 cup summer squash (cut into 4 chunks), 1 3/4 cups sweet corn, 15 ounces, rinsed and drained (or 2 ears of fresh corn, cut off the cob), 1 teaspoon thyme, 2 arlic (cloves, minced), 1 reen onion (stalk, chopped), 1/2 reen chili pepper (small, chopped), 1 cup onion (coarsley chopped), 1 cup tomatoes (diced)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put water and bouillon in lare pot and brin to a boil., Add potatoes and carrots and simmer for 5 minutes., Add remainin inredients, except for tomatoes, and continue cookin for 15 minutes over medium heat., Remove 4 chunks of squash and puree in blender., Return pureed mixture to pot and let cook for 10 minutes more., Add tomatoes and cook for another 5 minutes., Remove from heat and let sit for 10 minutes to allow stew to thicken.

name: Vegetable Stroanoff
ingredients: 1/2 pound medium shaped whole wheat pasta (cooked), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 red onion, 2 cloves arlic (peeled and minced), 2 carrots (diced), 1 medium zucchini (diced), 1 red bell pepper (cored and seeded and chopped), 1 tablespoon dried basil, 1 can 14.5 ounce low-sodium diced tomatoes (includin the liquid), 2 tablespoons low-sodium tomato paste, 1/2 cup plain yoghurt (or liht or heavy cream)
directions: To cook the pasta, fill a pot halfway with water. Brin it to a boil over hih heat. When it has boiled, add the pasta and cook until just tender about 12 minutes. Drain the pasta and set aside., While the pasta is cookin, cook the stroanoff: Put a skillet over medium heat and when it is hot, add the oil.  Add the onion, arlic, carrots, zucchini, pepper and dried basil and cook until soft and olden, about 20 minutes. , Add the tomatoes and cook until the sauce comes toether, about 20 minutes. , Put the yoghurt and tomato paste in the bowl, stirrin until smooth. , Turn the heat off and move the vegetables in the skillet to one side. Gradually add the tomato paste mixture to the other side of the skillet, stirrin all the while. Turn the heat to low and cook about 5 minutes, until heated throuh., Add the cooked pasta and stir until mixed.

name: Vegetarian Chili
ingredients: 2 onion (lare, cut into 1/4 inch pieces), 1 reen bell pepper (cut into 1/4 inch pieces), 3 arlic clove, 2 jalapeno chilis (fresh, diced), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 tablespoon cumin (round), 2 cans whole tomatoes, low sodium (28 ounces total - cut into 1/4 inch pieces or 8 medium fresh tomatoes), 2 zucchini (medium - cut into 1/4 inch pieces), 2 summer squash (medium - cut in to 1/4 inch pieces), 1 can kidney beans (16 ounce, rinsed), 1 cup cilantro (or coriander) (chopped, fresh), salt and pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare pot saute onions, bell pepper, arlic, and jalapeno in oil over medium hih heat for about 5 minutes - stirrin often., Add chili powder, cumin, half of the chopped cilantro, salt and pepper, and continue cookin for another 3 minutes, stirrin occasionally., Add the tomatoes, zucchini, squash, and brin mixture to a simmer., Simmer for 15 minutes, stirrin occasionally., Add beans, and continue to simmer for another 5 minutes., Serve the mixture hot. Put remainin cilantro on top.

name: Veggie Bean Wrap
ingredients: 2 reen or red bell pepper (seeded and chopped), 1 onion (peeled and sliced), 1 can black beans, 50% less salt (15 ounce, drained and rinsed), 2 mano (chopped), 1 lime, juiced, 1/2 cup fresh cilantro (chopped), 1 avocado (peeled and diced), 4 flour tortillas (10 inch)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a nonstick pan, sauté bell peppers and onion for 5 minutes over medium heat. Add beans, stir well. Reduce heat to low and simmer about 5 minutes., In a small bowl, combine manos, lime juice, cilantro, and avocado. Reserve 1/2 mixture for toppin., Fill warmed tortillas with 1/4 bean mixture and 1/4 mano mixture., Fold ends of the tortillas over. Roll up to make wraps. Top veggie bean wraps with remainin mano mixture.

name: Veggie Burers
ingredients: 1 can (about 15 ounces) low-sodium whole kernel corn, finely chopped, 1/2 cup cornmeal, 1/2 cup onion, finely chopped, 1/2 cup reen pepper, finely chopped, 1/2 cup cooked white rice, 1/4 teaspoon chili powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon cayenne or jalapeño chilies, seeds removed and finely chopped, (optional), Nonstick cookin spray, 6 flour tortillas, 6-inch size
directions: In a lare bowl, combine corn and cornmeal., Add onions, reen pepper, rice, chili powder, and pepper. If usin cayenne and jalapeño chilies, add them too. Mix well., Form the burer mixture into 6 equal patties about 1/2 inch thick, and refrierate for 1 hour., Preheat the oven to 350 derees F., Spray both sides of the patties with nonstick cookin spray., In a lare pan, brown both sides of the patties over medium to hih heat for 5 to 8 minutes., Bake the patties in the oven for 10 minutes., Toast the flour tortillas in the oven for 8 minutes., Place patty on half of tortilla and fold tortilla over to serve like a taco.

name: Veggie Chow Mein
ingredients: 6 ounces spahetti noodles (or thin flat e noodles), 4 teaspoons oil, 1 onion (medium, finely chopped), 2 arlic clove (finely chopped), 1 cup carrot (rated), 2 teaspoons chicken bouillon, 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, 1 cup broccoli (cut into small pieces), 1 cup celery (chopped), 1 cup bell pepper (reen or red, finely chopped), 4 teaspoons soy sauce, reduced sodium
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Prepare noodles accordin to packae directions. Drain and set aside., Cook onion and arlic with oil in fryin pan for 1 minute over medium/hih heat., Add carrot, chicken bouillon, and pepper sauce. Stir., Add broccoli, celery, and bell pepper and continue to stir., Reduce heat to low and add noodles and soy sauce. Mix well over low heat for 3 to 5 minutes., Add salt and pepper to taste.

name: Veggie Noodles
ingredients: 1 pound pasta, uncooked, 2 cups vegetables (fresh or canned, drained), 1 cup spahetti sauce, 1/2 cup cheese (rated or shredded)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Boil water in a cookin pot. Add the pasta. Turn down the heat to medium-low; cook accordin to box directions. Pour pasta and water into colander to drain., Add vegetables and spahetti sauce to cookin pot. Cook over medium-low heat just until the vegetables are hot. , Return cooked, drained pasta back to cookin pot and mix toether., Sprinkle with cheese just before servin.

name: Veggie Omelet in a Mu
ingredients: 2 es, 2 tablespoons 1% low-fat milk (or nonfat/skim milk), 1 pinch salt, 1 pinch pepper, 1/4 cup finely chopped mushrooms (or your favorite vegetables), 2 tablespoons shredded cheddar cheese (or your favorite cheese)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Lihtly rease the inside of a 12-ounce microwave-safe mu., Use a fork to combine the es, milk, salt and pepper in the mu and stir well.  Mix in the vegetables and cheese., Microwave on HIGH for 45 seconds. Stir. Return to the microwave and cook on HIGH until the mixture has puffed and set, 60 to 90 seconds. The omelet may look wet on the top but it will dry as it cools., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Veggie Quesadillas
ingredients: cookin oil spray, 1 small zucchini (small, washed and chopped), 1/2 broccoli head (washed and chopped), 1 reen bell pepper (washed, seeded and chopped), 1 onion (medium, peeled and chopped), 1 carrot (scrubbed and shredded), 4 whole wheat tortillas (10-inch), 1 cup cheddar cheese (shredded low-fat), 1/2 cup salsa
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Spray pan with cookin oil spray., Cook vegetables on medium heat for 4-5 minutes, stirrin frequently. Remove from pan., Spray pan with cookin spray. Place tortilla in the pan. Sprinkle with half the vegetables and half of the cheese., Place the other tortilla on top. Cook on medium heat for 4-6 minutes or until the cheese starts to melt and the bottom tortilla starts to brown., Flip quesadilla. Cook for 4 minutes or until tortilla browns., Repeat steps 3-5., Cut each quesadilla in half. Serve with salsa.

name: Vidalia Onion and Tomato Salad with Grilled Tuna
ingredients: For the Salad:,1/2 pound ahi (yellowfin) tuna steak (fresh or frozen),1/2 teaspoon olive oil,2 tomatoes, cut into wedges,1 large head lettuce (Boston, Romaine or Bibb) (washed, dried, and torn into bite-sized pieces),1/2 Vidalia onion, thinly sliced,For the Dressing:,1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil,1/4 cup lemon juice, fresh or bottled,2 teaspoons white wine vinegar,1 teaspoon Dijon mustard,1/4 teaspoon salt,1/8 teaspoon black pepper,1/4 teaspoon thyme,1/4 teaspoon marjoram
directions: Heat rill., Whisk toether dressin inredients in a small bowl., Cut tuna into 1" chunks and skewer and place on two-three 3" skewers; brush lihtly with olive oil. Season lihtly with salt and pepper., Grill skewered tuna until fish is opaque and flakes with a fork (145 °F); remove from rill., In a lare bowl, toss dressin with all vegetable inredients. To serve, divide salad on four individual plates; top with tuna.

name: Walleye Chowder
ingredients: 4 slices bacon, cooked and chopped, 3 tablespoons butter, 1/2 cup celery, chopped, 1 yellow onion, chopped, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 4 cups cold milk (low-fat or nonfat), 2 cups red potatoes, 1 pound walleye, thawed, cut into chunks (2- 8 ounce fillets), 2 tablespoons fresh parsley or reen onions, chopped, Salt and pepper to taste
directions: Heat butter in a lare pot over medium-hih heat. Add celery and onions and sauté until softened., Stir in flour to form a roux (a mixture of fat and flour used to thicken sauces or soups). Slowly whisk in the milk., Add the potatoes and bacon and stir ently. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes or until potatoes are cooked throuh., Add fish chunks and cook for an additional 6-8 minutes or until fish reaches the appropriate internal temperature., Season to taste with salt and pepper. Garnish with parsley or reen onions and serve.

name: Wheat Berry Chili
ingredients: 1 cup wheat berries, 3 cups water, 1 lare onion, chopped, 1/2 reen pepper, chopped, 1/2 yellow pepper, chopped, 4 teaspoons chili powder, or to taste, 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 1 can 8-ounce tomato sauce, unsalted, 2 cans (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes, 2 cups beef broth, 99% fat free, reduced sodium, 1 can 15-ounce kidney beans, unsalted, 1 can 15-ounce white beans, unsalted
directions: Cook wheat berries in 3 cups of water for 1 hour until tender; add more water if necessary, drain., Rinse with cool water and drain thorouhly., In the microwave on medium heat, cook onion, reen and yellow pepper for 1 minute, or until desired softness., In a 4-quart pot, combine remainin inredients with wheat berries and microwaved vegetables., On stovetop, brin to a boil and simmer uncovered 1 hour or until desired consistency is reached, stirrin occasionally.

name: White Chili
ingredients: 4 cups white beans (cooked*), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 red pepper (chopped), 1 onion (lare, chopped), 1 chopped reen chili (can adjust to taste), 3 arlic (cloves, minced), 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon oreano, 2 cups chicken broth (low sodium), 2 cups milk, low-fat (1%), 1/4 cup cilantro, 3/4 pound chicken (cooked and cubed), 6 corn tortillas (toasted and cut into 1 inch squares)
directions: Saute peppers and onion in olive oil., Add reen chili, arlic, spices and chicken broth. Simmer for 20 minutes., Add milk, cooked beans, and cooked chicken. Allow to thicken before addin cilantro. Heat throuh., Top chili with crisp tortillas before servin.

name: Wonderful Stuffed Potatoes
ingredients: 4 potatoes (medium, baking), 3/4 cup cottae cheese (low-fat 1%), 1/4 cup milk (low-fat 1%), 2 tablespoons mararine (soft tub), 1 teaspoon dill weed, 3/4 teaspoon herb seasonin, 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (or ~ 4 dashes), 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese (2 teaspoons, rated)
directions:
1. Prick potatoes with fork. Bake at 425°F for 60 minutes or until fork is easily inserted.
2. Cut potatoes in half lenthwise. Carefully scoop out potato, leavin about 1/2 inch of pulp inside shell. Mash pulp in lare bowl.
3. Mix in by hand remainin inredients except Parmesan cheese. Spoon mixture into potato shells.
4. Sprinkle top with 1/4 teaspoon of Parmesan cheese.
5. Place on baking sheet and return to oven. Bake 15-20 minutes or until tops are olden brown.

name: Yellow Potato and Red Pepper Shrimp Sauté
ingredients: 3 medium yellow potatoes, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 cloves arlic (minced), 1 small onion (chopped), 1 medium red bell pepper (coarsely chopped), 1/2 cup white rape juice, 1/2 cup water, 1 teaspoon vinear, 12 ounces frozen jumbo shrimp (peeled and deveined, no-sodium-added), 1 medium fresh zucchini (cut in small chunks), 1 teaspoon Italian seasonin (no-sodium), 1/4 teaspoon round black pepper, 1 lemon (divided), 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese
directions: 1. Pierce the skin of each potato with a fork; microwave potatoes on hih for 2 minutes. Turn potatoes over and microwave 2 more minutes. Remove from microwave and let cool slihtly., 2. While potatoes are coolin, heat olive oil in lare saucepan. Add arlic, onion, and bell pepper, and cook about 3-4 minutes., 3. Cube potatoes. Add juice, water, and vinear to saucepan; brin to boil. Add shrimp, zucchini, potatoes, and seasonin. Return to boil, and simmer 5-8 minutes, until shrimp, potatoes, and zucchini are done. The flesh of the shrimp should be an opaque color., 4. Halve the lemon; squeeze juice from half the lemon into the saucepan., 5. Serve the Parmesan cheese and lemon wedes cut from the remainin lemon half.

name: Zesty Lemon Fish
ingredients: 1/2 pound fish fillets (whitefish, cod or halibut), 1/2 onion, small (sliced), 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon canola oil, 3/4 teaspoon lemon pepper, 1/2 teaspoon dried parsley, dried paprika (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Separate fish into two serving size pieces. Place on an unreased baking sheet., Top with onion slices., Drizzle lemon juice and oil evenly over fish., Sprinkle lemon pepper, parsley, and dust with paprika (optional)., Cover and let stand for 5 minutes. Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with fork.

name: Ziny Lemon Chicken Pasta
ingredients: 8 ounces whole wheat spahetti, uncooked, 1 tablespoon tub mararine, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 20 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast (cut into 3/4-inch pieces), 5 reen onions, sliced, 1 clove lare arlic, minced, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1 1/3 cups chicken broth, 2/3 cup skim milk, 2 teaspoons prepared mustard, 1/4 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice
directions: Combine flour, salt, pepper and cayenne in a saucepan; radually add chicken broth and skim milk, stirrin with a wire whisk until smooth., Place over medium heat and cook, stirrin constantly, until thickened. Add mustard and lemon juice. Allow to cool. , Heat mararine and oil in a skillet. Add chicken pieces, reen onions and arlic. Sauté until chicken is just firm and cooked throuh, about 10 minutes., Prepare pasta accordin to packae directions and drain. Combine sauce, chicken and pasta mixture., Put into a 2 ½-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle top with almonds, chopped chives and paprika (if usin)., Bake at 375° for 10 minutes or until heated throuh.

name: Zucchini Casserole
ingredients: 16 ounces sausae (1 pound, round), 1 onion (small, diced), 3 zucchini (small, diced), 3 squash (small, yellow, diced), 3 potatoes (medium, peeled and diced), 1 can tomatoes (Italian stewed, cut up)
directions: Brown sausae and onion toether in a skillet; drain. Mix all inredients toether and place in a casserole dish., Cover with foil and bake at 350 derees for 45 minutes.

name: 5 A Day Salad
ingredients: 4 cups spinach (fresh), 4 cups romaine lettuce, 2 cups reen pepper (chopped, or use red, yellow, or orange), 2 cups cherry tomatoes, 1 cup broccoli (chopped), 1 cup cauliflower (chopped), 1 cup yellow squash (sliced), 1 cup cucumber (sliced), 2 cups carrot (chopped), 1 cup zucchini (sliced)
directions: Wash all of the vegetables and mix them toether in a lare mixin bowl., Top this colorful meal with the nonfat or low-fat dressin of your choice.

name: A Simple Mexican Salad
ingredients: 2 cucumbers, 2 oranges, 1 lemon or lime (the juice), 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Wash the cucumbers, oranges and lemon or lime under cold runnin water., Slice the cucumbers. Peel and cut the oranges into small pieces., Place cucumber slices and orange pieces in a medium size bowl. Add chili powder, lemon or lime juice and salt.

name: Any Days a Picnic Chicken Salad
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups chicken breast (cooked, diced), 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 3 packaes pickle relish (2/3 tablespoon), 1/2 cup mayonnaise (liht)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients., Refrierate until ready to serve., Use within 1-2 days. Chicken salad does not freeze well.

name: Apple & Chicken Salad
ingredients: 2 red apples (such as Cameo Apples), 2 celery stalks (diced), 2 chicken breasts (skinless, cooked, diced, about 2 cups), 1/4 cup plain non-fat Greek yoghurt, 1/2 cup raisins, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon round black pepper, 16 lettuce leaves (Bibb, Romaine, reen or red leaf)
directions: Cut apples in quarters; remove core and chop., In a medium size bowl, mix all inredients, except lettuce., To serve, arrane lettuce on serving plates top with apple and chicken salad.

name: Apple Banana Salad with Peanuts
ingredients: 12 ounces lettuce mix, 2 ripe bananas, 2 1/2 medium apples, sliced (14 oz. of sliced apples), 3/4 cup unsalted dry roasted peanuts
directions: Whisk toether dressin inredients., Slice bananas., In a lare salad bowl, toss mixed reens, banana and apple slices, peanuts, and dressin.

name: Apple Coleslaw
ingredients: 2 cups cabbae, 1 carrot (medium, rated), 1/2 reen pepper (chopped), 1 apple (chopped), 5 tablespoons yoghurt, low-fat, 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, low-fat, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1/4 teaspoon dill weed
directions: Wash your hands with soap and water., Wash the cabbae. Cut it into fine shreds, until you have 2 cups of cabbae., Peel the carrot. Grate it with a rater., Chop half a reen pepper into small pieces., Remove the core, and chop the apple., Put the cabbae, carrot, reen pepper, and apple in a lare mixin bowl. Stir toether., Put the yoghurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, and dill weed in a small bowl. Stir toether to make a dressin., Pour the dressin over the salad. Toss to mix.

name: Apple Cranberry Salad Toss
ingredients: 1 head of lettuce (about 10 cups), 2 apples (medium, sliced), 1/2 cup walnuts (chopped), 1 cup dried cranberries, 1/2 cup reen onion (sliced), 3/4 cup vinairette dressin
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Toss lettuce, apples, walnuts, cranberries, and onions in a lare bowl., Add dressin; toss to coat. Serve immediately.

name: Apple Salad
ingredients: 2 cups apple (diced), 1 cup celery (diced), 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 cup nuts, 2 tablespoons lite mayonnaise-type dressin (or mayonnaise), 1/16 cup orange juice (1 tablespoon)
directions: Mix orange juice with salad dressin or mayonnaise., Toss apples, celery, raisins and nuts with the dressin mixture.

name: Apple Salad with Sweet & Tany Yoghurt Dressin
ingredients: 1 cup diced apple, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1/2 cup diced celery, 1/2 cup rated carrots, 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla (can use 1/2 to 3/4 cup)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water. , Wash apples, celery, and carrots before dicin/ratin., Toss apples with lemon juice., Add celery, carrots and raisins., Fold yoghurt into apple mixture., Cover. Chill for at least 1 hour before servin., Refrierate leftovers.

name: Avocado, Potato, and Grilled Chicken Salad
ingredients: 3 medium red potatoes, 1 fresh, ripe avocado, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 4 reen onions (chopped), 1/2 medium red bell pepper (chopped), 8 ounces frozen pre-cooked rilled chicken strips (about 8 strips) (thawed, cut into bite-size pieces), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon cider vinear, 1/2 cup lemon non-fat yoghurt, 1 teaspoon round black pepper
directions: In a medium sauce pan, boil potatoes about 20 minutes, until just tender; run under cold water to cool, and cut into chunks., Peel avocado and cut into chunks; coat with lemon juice., Whisk olive oil, vinear, yoghurt, and pepper in a small bowl., Place all inredients in lare bowl. Gently toss.

name: Banana Waldorf
ingredients: 3 bananas (peeled and sliced), 1 apple (cored and sliced, with peel), 4 cups yoghurt (nonfat vanilla), 1 pinch cinnamon, 1/8 cup walnuts
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix all inredients toether in lare mixin bowl., Place in individual serving dishes and chill until ready to serve, up to 1 hour., This dessert looks reat when topped with a sprinkle of round cinnamon.

name: Beet & White Bean Salad
ingredients: Dressing:,2 tablespoons cider vinegar,1 tablespoon Dijon mustard,1/2 teaspoon sugar,1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil,salt and ground black pepper, to taste,Salad:,2 3/4 cups whole beets, well drained and each cut in half (or 16-ounce can),1 can white kidney beans (cannellini) (15-ounce can),1/2 cup reduced fat crumbled blue cheese,1/2 cup coarsely chopped walnuts, toasted,baby arugula leaves (optional)
directions: Prepare dressin: In small bowl combine cider vinear, Dijon mustard, and suar. Gradually add olive oil until well blended. Season with salt and pepper., Prepare Salad: In lare bowl combine beets and white kidney beans; toss with dressin., To serve, place aruula leaves on platter or in serving bowl; top with beet mixture., Sprinkle with crumbled blue cheese and walnuts.

name: Beets, Beans, and Greens
ingredients: 1/4 cup lemon juice (or vinear), 1 arlic clove, finely chopped, 2 teaspoons mustard, salt and pepper (to taste, optional), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 cups sliced cooked beets (can use canned or fresh), 1 head of lettuce (washed and torn into pieces), 2 cups cooked beans, rinsed (any kind)
directions: To make dressin, combine lemon juice, arlic, mustard, oil, salt and pepper (optional) in a lare bowl., Place the sliced beets in a small bowl. Toss 1 tablespoon of the dressin with the beets to coat., Toss the reens and beans with the remainin dressin in the lare bowl., Place onto plates and top with beets.

name: Bell Pepper and Apple Coleslaw
ingredients: For the Dressing:,1 tablespoon vegetable oil,1/4 cup apple juice,2 tablespoons cider vinegar,2 teaspoons Dijon mustard,1/4 teaspoon salt,1 dash black pepper,For the Salad:,1 small head green or Napa cabbage,1 orange or red bell pepper,1 Gala or Fuji apple,1/4 cup sliced almonds
directions: Whisk toether dressin inredients., Shred or thinly slice cabbae., Cut apple and pepper into small chunks., Place cabbae, apples, pepper and almonds in lare bowl., Drizzle with dressin and toss.

name: Bell Pepper and Potato Salad
ingredients: 6 small red potatoes (quartered), 1/2 cup Italian dressin, liht, 1 1/2 teaspoons mustard, spicy brown, 1 tablespoon parsley (chopped, fresh), 3/4 teaspoon arlic salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper (round), 1/2 cup reen bell pepper (chopped), 1/2 cup red bell pepper (chopped), 1/2 cup reen onion (sliced)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook potatoes in boilin water over hih heat until tender, about 10 minutes., Drain well and let cool., Place potatoes in a medium bowl and set aside., In a small bowl, combine dressin, mustard, parsley, and seasonins., Pour mixture over potatoes and toss well., Carefully stir in bell peppers and reen onions., Cover and chill until ready to serve.

name: Broccoli Salad
ingredients: 6 cups broccoli (chopped), 1 cup raisins, 1 red onion (medium, peeled and diced), 2 tablespoons suar, 8 bacon slices (cooked and crumbled, optional), 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 3/4 cup mayonnaise, low-fat
directions: Combine all inredients in a medium bowl, and mix well., Chill for 1 to 2 hours., Serve.

name: Brussel Sprouts, Cranberry, and Bulur Salad
ingredients: 1/3 cup dried bulur, 1 cup boilin water, 2 cups Brussels sprouts (1/2 pound), 1/2 cup dried cranberries, 1/4 cup chopped nuts (any type), 1/4 cup orange juice, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons vinear, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cover bulur with boilin water and let stand until soft, about 30 minutes. Pour off any excess water., Rinse and trim Brussels sprouts. Cut in half lenthwise then slice crosswise into thin strips., In a lare bowl combine bulur, Brussels sprouts, cranberries and nuts., In a small bowl or jar with a lid, combine orange juice, oil, vinear, salt and pepper. Mix or shake well. Pour dressin over salad and serve.

name: Bulur Chickpea Salad
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups water, 1 cup bulur (coarse, available in bulk from natural foods stores), 1 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/3 tablespoon minced onion, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, reduced sodium, 1/2 cup scallions (chopped, reen onions), 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 cup carrot (chopped), 3/4 cup canned chickpeas (arbanzo beans, drained and rinsed)
directions: Brin water to boil in medium saucepan. Stir in bulur, parsley, minced onion, and soy sauce. Cover and reduce heat; simmer 15-20 minutes (until all water is absorbed and bulur is not too crunchy). Do not overcook., Remove from heat and allow to cool; fluff with fork., Combine dressin inredients; stir well. Pour over bulur mixture and mix well., Stir in scallions, raisins, carrots, and chickpeas. Cover and chill for several hours. Store in refrierator.

name: Cabbae Salad
ingredients: 4 cups cabbae (shredded or thinly sliced), 1/4 cup carrot (rated or finely sliced), 1/4 cup celery (thinly sliced), 1/4 cup reen pepper (chopped), 1/3 tablespoon onion (finely chopped), 1/2 teaspoon dill (or basil or parsley), 1/2 cup mayonnaise, liht or low-fat, 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 1 teaspoon mustard, 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon suar
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Wash and prepare vegetables for choppin., Use a cheese rater or slice all vegetables thinly with a sharp knife., Put in a lare bowl., Add herbs to taste., Mix mayonnaise, yoghurt, mustard, lemon juice, and suar in a small bowl. Blend well. Add to vegetables., Mix well. Keep in refrierator until ready to eat.

name: Caribbean Bean Salad
ingredients: 4 cups romaine lettuce (chopped), 1/4 cup red onion, 1 cup black beans (canned, drained and rinsed), 1 orange (peeled and diced), 1 tomato (diced), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 3 tablespoons red wine vinear, 1 teaspoon oreano (dried), black pepper (to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Toss all inredients toether in lare salad bowl., Serve immediately or refrierate up to one hour.

name: Carrot Raisin Salad
ingredients: 4 carrots (medium, peeled, and rated), 1/4 cup raisins, 2 teaspoons suar, 1 lemon, juiced
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a medium bowl, thorouhly mix carrots, raisins, suar, and lemon juice., Serve chilled.

name: Cherry Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup pitted and halved sweet cherries, 1 cup cubed cantaloupe, 1 cup halved reen rapes, 1 medium banana, peeled and sliced, 1/4 cup orange juice (juice from 1/2 orange), 1/4 cup flaked coconut (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, mix toether the cut fruit., Pour orange juice over fruit and stir in coconut, if desired.

name: Chicken and Cranberry Salad
ingredients: 12 ounces chicken, cooked and diced (1 1/2 cups), 1/2 cup vinairette dressin, 1 cup dried cranberries (or cherries), 1/8 cup almonds (sliced), 1 head of lettuce (chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Toss chicken, cranberries, and almonds with dressin., Serve on a mound of chopped lettuce.

name: Chicken Club Salad
ingredients: 1 cup pasta (uncooked whole wheat, small, such as macaroni or rotelle), 6 cups Romaine lettuce (well washed and torn, or spinach), 2 cups reen peppers, fresh, chopped (or choose a combination of bell peppers, celery, cauliflower florets, cucumber, carrots*), 2 cups tomatoes (chopped), 1 1/2 cups cubed cooked skinless chicken (1/2 pound skinless, boneless chicken), 1/2 cup Italian dressin (lowfat), 1 e (hard cooked, optional), 1/4 cup cheese (shredded, or cheese crumbles)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook pasta accordin to packae directions; drain and cool., Place 1 1/2 cups of the Romaine lettuce in each of 4 lare bowls or plates., Combine chopped vegetables, chicken, and pasta., Add dressin; toss lihtly to coat. Divide evenly amon the 4 bowls., Top each serving with a few e slices, if desired, and 1 tablespoon of the shredded cheese.

name: Chicken Pasta Salad
ingredients: 2 cups cooked small pasta, 1 1/2 cups canned chicken (drained), 1 cup diced bell pepper, 1/2 cup sliced reen onion, 1 cup shredded yellow squash, 1/2 cup canned corn kernels (drained), 1/2 cup frozen peas, 1 can (15 oz) black beans, low sodium (rinsed and drained), 1/2 cup fat-free Italian dressin
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook pasta accordin to packae directions, drain; rinse., Combine first eiht inredients (pasta throuh black beans) in a lare bowl., Toss ently with salad dressin., Chill for several hours to blend flavors.

name: Chicken Rice Salad
ingredients: 4 cups lettuce, 2 cups brown rice (cooked), 2 cups chicken breast, skinless roasted, 1 tomato (cored and diced), 1 reen pepper (cored and diced), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 lemon, juiced, 2 tablespoons vinear (flavored), hot pepper sauce (optional), Italian herb mix and black pepper to taste (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Toss all inredients toether in a lare salad bowl., Use personal taste preferences to determine the amounts of seasonins., Serve immediately. This salad looks reat when served on a lare plate with a few of the seasonins sprinkled on top.

name: Chicken Salad with Ramen Noodles
ingredients: 1 packae Ramen noodles (any flavor), 8 cups cabbae (shredded, or cabbae salad mix), 1/4 cup scallions (minced), 1 cup bell pepper (red or reen), 2 chicken breast (cooked and chilled, cut into cubes), 1/2 cup peanuts (dry roasted, unsalted)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Break up noodles. Set aside., In a small bowl make dressin with suar, vinear, olive oil, and flavor packet. Stir well., In a lare bowl, add peppers, scallions, unsalted peanuts, and other vegetables if you like. Add cooked chicken and cabbae., Pour on the dressin and combine. Sprinkle noodles on top., Serve cold.

name: Chicken Waldorf Salad
ingredients: 1/3 cup low-fat mayonnaise, 1/3 cup nonfat or low-fat plain yoghurt, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 3 cups cooked chicken breast, chopped, 1 medium red apple, diced, 1 cup red or reen rapes, halved, 1 cup celery, sliced, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts, divided (toasted if desired)
directions: Whisk mayonnaise, yoghurt, lemon juice and salt in a lare bowl., Add chicken, apple, rapes, celery, and half of the walnuts. Stir to coat well., Serve topped with the remainin walnuts.

name: Chicken, Rice, and Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 cup brown or white rice, cooked, 2 teaspoons parsley, dried (or 2 Tablespoons fresh, finely chopped), 1/2 teaspoon black pepper (round), 1/4 clove arlic (finely chopped), 1 tablespoon ranch dressin, fat-free, 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, fat-free, 1 cup apple or cantaloupe (cut into chunks), 1/3 cup rape halves (red or purple, cut into chunks), 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 1 1/4 cups chicken, cooked (cut into bite-size pieces), 6 lettuce leaves
directions: Wash your hands with soap and water., If not usin leftover or "planned over" rice, cook rice accordin to packae directions without addin salt. Chill., In a serving bowl, mix parsley, black pepper, arlic, dressin, and mayonnaise toether., Add cooled rice, apple, rapes, celery, and chicken. Stir ently., Serve cold on a bed of clean lettuce leaves, if desired., Cover and refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Citrus Salad
ingredients: 1 rapefruit (peeled), 1 orange (peeled), 10 cups fresh reens (lettuce), 1 red onion (small, sliced thin), 2 tablespoons cider vinear, 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon water, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon cumin
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cut fruit into bite size pieces., Toss with lettuce and onion. Mix remainin inredients for dressin. Drizzle over salad and toss just before servin.

name: Cobb Salad with Pears
ingredients: For the Salad:,2 canned pear halves,6 cups mesclun mix baby greens,1/2 tablespoon Parmesan cheese,1 1/3 cups carrots, grated,3 tablespoons walnuts,For the Dressing:,1/4 cup pear juice,1/4 teaspoon cider vinegar,1/4 teaspoon honey,1/4 teaspoon dijon mustard,1 dash salt and black pepper,1/4 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil
directions: For the dressin, mix pear juice, vinear, honey, mustard, and salt and pepper and olive oil in a blender., Put mixed reens in lare mixin bowl, drizzle dressin over reens and mix toether., Add remainin chopped pear, walnuts, and rated carrots and toss lihtly., Portion out 1 cup of salad and top with 1/2 tablespoon rated Parmesan cheese.

name: Confetti Grain Salad
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups brown rice, uncooked, 3 cups water, 2 lemons (juiced), 3 reen onions (also called scallions), 1/4 cup parsley (minced), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 dash black pepper (to taste), 1/4 cup olive oil (or other vegetable oil), 1 1/2 cups vegetables (of your favorite, cut into small pieces)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Wash rice and put into a 2-quart pot with water. Brin to boil, then lower heat to simmer, and cook uncovered until all the water is absorbed. (approximately 45 minutes), Pour into medium sized bowl and allow to cool., Pour lemon juice over rice and stir. When rice is cooled to lukewarm, add vegetables, salt, pepper, and oil., Stir and chill at least 1 hour. This dish also can be served warm.

name: Confetti Slaw
ingredients: 1/4 head of cabbae (reen), 2 carrots, 1/4 cup raisins, 1/4 cup peanuts, 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 1/16 cup orange juice (1 tablespoon)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Slice and cut cabbae into thin strips. Place pieces in lare mixin bowl., Peel and rate carrots. Add to mixin bowl., Measure raisins and peanuts. Add to mixin bowl., Mix all inredients toether., Combine yoghurt and orange juice in small bowl., Add yoghurt mixture to cabbae mixture, stirrin to combine inredients thorouhly.

name: Corn and Bean Medley
ingredients: 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 1 cup corn (canned, whole-kernel), 3/4 cup kidney beans (dry, cooked), 3/4 teaspoon chili powder, hot pepper flakes (1/4 teaspoon, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain the canned corn, but reserve the liquid from the can., Heat 3 tablespoons of liquid from canned corn in saucepan., Cook onion in liquid until soft, about 2 minutes., Add corn, kidney beans, chili powder, and hot red pepper flakes to onion mixture., Cook over low heat for about 10 minutes.

name: Corn and Green Chili Salad
ingredients: 2 cups corn (frozen and thawed), 1 can diced tomatoes with reen chilies (10 ounce), 1/2 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1/3 cup reen onion (sliced), 2 tablespoons cilantro (fresh chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients in a medium bowl., Mix well.

name: Corn Salad with Fat-free Ranch Dressin
ingredients: 2 cups whole kernel corn (fresh or frozen - cooked and drained), 3/4 cup tomato (chopped), 1/2 cup reen pepper (chopped), 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 1/4 cup Ranch dressin, fat-free
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In bowl, combine vegetables., Stir in dressin., Cover and refrierate until ready to serve.

name: Corn Salad with Fresh Basil and Lemon
ingredients: 6 ears of corn (about 3 cups), 2 tablespoons chopped red onion, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, teaspoon suar (pinch), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil (or 1 tsp dried basil)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cook corn in boilin water or in the microwave., Cut corn from the cob. Add onion., In a small bowl, whisk toether lemon juice and suar. Add oil and combine., Stir the oil/lemon mixture, basil, and salt and pepper to taste (optional)., Refrierate at least 30 minutes.

name: Corn, Blueberry, and Wild Rice Salad
ingredients: 6 ears sweet corn, husked (or 1 ½ cups frozen corn or canned corn, drained), 1 cup frozen blueberries, 1 small cucumber, finely chopped, 1/4 cup finely chopped red onion, 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 1 cup wild rice, cooked, 1 jalapeno pepper, 4 tablespoons lime juice, 4 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons honey or maple syrup, 1/2 teaspoon round cumin, 1/2 teaspoon salt
directions: In a lare pot, brin salted water to a boil.Add corn. Cook covered for 5 minutes, or until tender. If usin corn on the cob, remove corn from the cob after cookin., In a serving bowl, combine corn, blueberries, cucumber, red onion, cilantro, wild rice, and jalapeno., For dressin: in a screw-top jar, combine lime juice, oil, honey, cumin, and salt. Cover and shake well to combine. If you do not have a screw-top jar you can whisk inredients in a small bowl., Add dressin to salad and toss.

name: Country Style Potato Salad
ingredients: 3 potatoes (medium), 1 cup celery (chopped), 1/2 cup onion (minced), 1 cup peas (frozen), 1 teaspoon mustard (prepared), 1/2 cup mayonnaise, low-fat, 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, black pepper (fresh cracked, to taste), lettuce and tomato (Garnish, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Wash potatoes, leave skin on and cut in bite-sized chunks., Place in pan and cover with water. Brin to a boil, lower to simmer and cook uncovered until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes., Drain in colander and sprinkle lihtly with cold water., In the mean time, put the rest of the inredients in a lare mixin bowl. Drain potatoes well and add to the bowl., Mix well and refrierate until ready to use., Garnish with fresh lettuce and sliced tomatoes.

name: Cranberry Salad
ingredients: 3 packaes strawberry elatin (3 oz. packaes, can also use raspberry), 4 cups water, 1 can cranberry sauce, 1/4 cup suar, 2 tablespoons orange peel rind (rated), 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 cup crushed pineapple (drained), 2 cups diced celery, 3/4 cup walnuts
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Make elatin and refrierate until partially set., Beat cranberry sauce., Grate orange peel into suar and add to cranberry sauce with rest of inredients., Fold mixture into partially set elatin. Refrierate until set. Serve.

name: Crunchy Chicken Salad
ingredients: 2 cups cooked chicken (chunked), 1/2 cup celery, 1/4 cup reen pepper, 1/4 onion, 1/2 cucumber, 1/2 cup rapes, 1 apple (small, diced, leave the peel on), 1/4 cup yoghurt, plain
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Use leftover cooked chicken, or cook enouh chicken to make 2 cups of chicken pieces., Chop the celery and reen pepper into small pieces., Peel and chop 1/4 of an onion., Peel and chop half of a cucumber., Chop the apple into pieces. It’s okay to leave the peel on the apple., Cut the rapes in half., Put all the inredients in a lare bowl. Stir toether.

name: Cuban Salad
ingredients: For the Dressing:,3 tablespoons vegetable oil,1/4 cup fresh lime juice (1 large or 2 small limes),1 teaspoon garlic (peeled and minced),1/4 teaspoon Kosher salt,1/4 teaspoon black pepper,For the Salad:,1 head Romaine lettuce (washed, patted dry with paper towels, and torn into bite-sized pieces),2 large tomatoes (diced),1 red onion (finely diced),6 radishes (thinly, sliced )
directions: Put the oil, lime juice, arlic, salt, and pepper in the small bowl and mix well. Lemon juice can be used instead of lime juice.

name: Cucumber Blueberry Salad
ingredients: Vinaigrette,1 1/2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil,2 tablespoons white balsamic (or other) vinegar,1 tablespoon lime juice, freshly squeezed or bottled,1 teaspoon sugar,1/4 teaspoon salt,1/8 teaspoon pepper,Salad,1 cup fresh blueberries,1 medium greenhouse-grown cucumber, cut into small chunks,4 cups fresh arugula,1/4 medium red onion, thinly sliced,1/4 cup crumbled reduced-fat Feta cheese,2 tablespoons coarsely chopped walnuts (toasted optional),4 slices whole grain bread
directions: In a small bowl whisk toether vinairette inredients., In a lare bowl mix toether all salad inredients, except bread., When ready to serve, add vinairette to salad and toss., Toast bread, then cut into four pieces.

name: Cucumber Salad
ingredients: 1 cucumber (lare, peeled and thinly sliced), 2 tablespoons yoghurt, low-fat, 1 tablespoon vinear, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon water, 1 teaspoon dill weed, 1 dash pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel and thinly slice cucumber., Mix all other inredients in the mixin bowl., Add cucumber slices and stir until coated., Chill until servin.

name: Cucumber Salad with Tomatoes
ingredients: 2 cups cucumber (diced), 1 cup tomato (seeded and diced), 1/4 cup onion (chopped sweet), 2 cups couscous or rice, cooked, 2 teaspoons dill weed (chopped dried or fresh), 1/2 cup Italian salad dressin, low-fat
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Toss toether the cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, couscous (or rice), dill, and salad dressin., Chill for 1 hour., Serve.

name: Curried Chicken Salad
ingredients: 4 cooked cooled chicken thihs (about 3 cups shredded), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/8 cup low-fat yoghurt, 1 tablespoon curry powder (or more to taste), 2 celery stalks (diced or sliced), 1 apple (cored and diced), 1/4 cup mandarin oranges, canned, drained, 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro (and/or basil leaves)
directions: Put chicken in a bowl and add remainin inredients. Mix to combine., Cover and refrierate at least one hour and up three days.

name: Curried Chickpea Salad
ingredients: 2 cans chickpeas, rinsed and drained, 1/2 cup celery, diced, 1/2 cup apple, diced, 1/4 cup red onion, diced, 1/4 cup cranberries, dried, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, low-fat or vean mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon dijon mustard, 2 teaspoons curry powder, 1/4 teaspoon thyme, dried, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, round, salt (1/2 teaspoon, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Add the chickpeas to a lare bowl and mash with a potato masher. You can mash them to be as smooth or coarse as you desire., Add all of the remainin inredients to the bowl and mix until everythin is combined.

name: Curtido Salvadoreno (Cabbae Salad)
ingredients: 1 head of cabbae (chopped), 2 carrots (small, rated), 1 onion (small), dried red pepper (optional, 1/2 teaspoon), 1/2 teaspoon oreano, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon brown suar, 1/4 cup vinear, 1/2 cup water
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Blanch the cabbae with boilin water for 1 minute. Discard the water., Place the cabbae in a lare bowl and add rated carrots, sliced onion, red pepper, oreano, olive oil, salt, brown suar, vinear, and water., Place in the refrierator for at least 2 hours before servin.

name: Easy Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 can fruit cocktail (16 ounce, drained), 2 banana (sliced), 2 orange (cut into bite-size pieces), 2 apple (cut into bite-size pieces), 1 yoghurt, low-fat piña colada (8 ounces)
directions: Mix fruit in a lare bowl., Add yoghurt and mix well., Chill in refrierator before servin.

name: Easy Greek Salad
ingredients: 6 romaine lettuces leaves (torn into 1 1/2 inch pieces), 1 cucumber (medium, peeled and sliced), 1 tomato (medium, chopped), 1/2 cup red onion (sliced), 1/3 cup feta cheese (crumbled), 2 tablespoons olive oil (extra-virin), 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon oreano (dried), 1/2 teaspoon salt
directions: Combine lettuce, cucumber, tomato, onion, and cheese in lare serving bowl. Whisk toether oil, lemon juice, oreano, and salt in small bowl., Pour over lettuce mixture; toss until coated. Serve immediately.

name: E Salad
ingredients: 4 hard boiled es (finely chopped), 2 packet of pickle relish (2/3 tablespoon), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon mustard (wet), 1/4 cup mayonnaise
directions: Put the es in a pan of cold water. Simmer for 20 minutes., Cool promptly in cold water, then in refrierator, so the es will be easy to shell., Remove the shells from es, and chop the es finely., Mix all the inredients toether.

name: European Salad
ingredients: 12 ounces chicken breast (pre-sliced), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon round black pepper, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 3 reen onions (sliced), 1 lare yellow bell pepper, cut in strips (about 1 1/2 cups), 16 cherry tomatoes, 1 10-oz packae European blend salad reens, 1 1/2 cups whole rain croutons (about 24 croutons), fresh round pepper, to taste
directions: Place all vinairette inredients in a blender, blend until smooth; set aside. (Note: Vinairette can be made ahead and refrierated.), Season chicken with salt and pepper., Heat olive oil in a lare skillet., Sauté chicken until cooked thorouhly; remove from pan, and let cool., Slice onions., Toss cut vegetables with European blend salad reens., On individual serving plates, top salad with chicken and croutons, drizzle with dressin, and finish with fresh round pepper, if desired.

name: Fiesta Rice Salad
ingredients: 1 cup brown rice (cooked), 1 carrot (shredded), 1 cup broccoli (chopped fine), 1 red onion (small, chopped), 1 cup tomato (chopped), 1 bell pepper (sweet, reen, red, yellow), 1 can kidney beans (15oz, drained, rinsed), 2 tablespoons cilantro (or other fresh herbs) (chopped fine), 2 tablespoons red wine vinear (or white or cider), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, salt and pepper (to taste, optional)
directions: Wash and chop vegetables and mix with cooked rice., In a small bowl, add vinear, oil, dill, salt and pepper. (Or use your favorite dressin.) Pour over rice mixture., Add beans and toss well. Serve cold and enjoy!

name: Fruit & Feta Salad
ingredients: For the Vinaigrette:,2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar,1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil,1 dash black pepper,For the Salad:,2 cups watermelon chunks,2 cups cantaloupe chunks,1/4 cup medium red onion, thinly sliced,6 cups fresh spinach or arugula,1/2 cup reduced-fat feta cheese crumbles,1/4 cup pine nuts
directions: Whisk toether vinairette inredients., Toss with remainin inredients and serve.

name: Fruit Cole Slaw
ingredients: 1/2 cabbae (head, shredded (2 quarts)), 1 can fruit cocktail (16 ounce, juice packed, drained), 1 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, lemon (juice of 1), 1/2 cup honey, 1/4 cup vinear, 1 banana (sliced), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper
directions: Shred cabbae., Combine all inredients in a lare bowl.

name: Fruit Salad with Jicama
ingredients: 3 cups jicama, sliced (small), 2 cups watermelon (cut into pieces), 1 mano, 1 papaya (small), 1 lime, cut into small pieces, 2 kiwifruit, 1 teaspoon lime or orange juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon chili powder
directions: Wash, peel, and cut the jicama into thin slices., Wash, peel, and cut the rest of the fruit (includin the lime) into slices or small pieces., On a lare plate, arrane the fruit. Sprinkle the lime or orange juice over the fruit., In a small bowl, mix the salt and chili powder. Sprinkle over the fruit and serve., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Garden Cannellini Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 teaspoons white wine vinear, 1/2 cup apple juice, 1 tablespoon tomato basil arlic seasonin blend, no-salt
directions: Whisk toether dressin inredients in a small bowl., In a small sauté pan, toast almond slivers until olden., Remove from pan and let cool., In a medium bowl, toss dressin with all inredients except lettuce., Refrierate until ready to serve., To serve, place lettuce leaves on individual plates; top with salad.

name: Garden Orchard Salad
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups broccoli florets (coarsely chopped), 1/2 cup carrots (rated), 1/2 cup cauliflower (coarsely chopped), 1/2 cup apple (chopped, cored and diced, not peeled), 1/4 cup reen onion (sliced), 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 1/4 cup peanuts, unsalted, dry-roasted (chopped)
directions: Wash your hands and work area., Mix all inredients toether in a serving bowl., Cover and refrierate for 2 hours or loner to allow flavors to blend. Serve cold., Cover and refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Garden Waldorf Salad
ingredients: 3 cups broccoli florets, 1 cup carrot (rated), 1 1/2 cups cauliflower (sliced), 1 cup apple (chopped), 1/2 cup reen onion (chopped), 1 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 1/4 cup peanuts
directions: Toss all inredients toether in a lare mixin bowl., Refrierate until ready to serve, up to 6 hours., Serve chilled.

name: Ginery Quinoa with Green Beans
ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 1 1/2 cups water or broth, 2 cups reen beans, 2 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice, freshly squeezed, 1 tablespoon olive oil or cookin oil, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, reduced sodium, 1/4 teaspoon iner, round
directions: Toast to quinoa in a dry skillet over medium heat, stirrin constantly for about 3 minutes., Put quinoa in a medium pot and add water or broth., Brin to a boil, then let simmer until all of the water is absorbed and quinoa is tender (10 to 20 minutes)., Set aside and leave uncovered to cool., While quinoa is coolin, microwave the reen beans until just tender., Rinse in cold water to stop the cookin process., In a lare bowl, combine the quinoa, olive oil or cookin oil, sesame oil, reen beans, lemon juice, soy sauce, and fresh or round iner. Stir well., Season with salt and pepper., Serve at room temperature.

name: Grape and Cashew Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 3/4 cup dry roasted cashews (unsalted, coarsely chopped), 1 cup low-fat cottae cheese, 1 1/2 cups red rapes (quartered), 1 celery stalk (chopped), round black pepper to taste, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley (chopped), 8 lettuce leaves, 8 slices whole-rain bread
directions: In a medium bowl, mix cottae cheese, rapes, celery, cashews, parsley, and round black pepper., Toast bread and build sandwiches followin steps 3 and 4., Spread 1/4 salad mix on 4 of the bread slices., Add two lettuce leaves to each sandwich; top with 2nd bread slice.

name: Grapefruit Spinach Salad
ingredients: 4 1/2 cups fresh spinach, washed and drained, 1 can sliced mushrooms, drained (2 ounce cans), 1 cup water chestnuts, diced (5 oz can), 2 rapefruits, sectioned and diced, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon vinear, 2 us fluid ounces rapefruit juice, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, low-sodium, 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon dry mustard
directions: Tear spinach coarsely and place in lare salad bowl., Add mushrooms, water chestnuts, and rapefruit., Mix toether oil, vinear, rapefruit juice, soy sauce, hot pepper sauce, salt, and dry mustard., Toss dressin with spinach mixture and serve.

name: Greek Salad with Chicken
ingredients: For the Dressing:,1/2 cup Greek yogurt, fat-free,2 teaspoons lemon juice,2 teaspoons olive oil,1 clove garlic,1 teaspoon oregano,1/4 teaspoon salt,1/4 teaspoon pepper,For the Salad:,1 head romaine lettuce,1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, cut in half,1 cucumber, diced,1/4 cup red onion, sliced,1/4 cup black olives, cut in half,1 cup cooked chicken breast, cubed,1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled
directions: To make the dressin, add Greek yoghurt, lemon juice, olive oil, arlic, oreano, salt, and pepper to a small bowl. Mix well to combine., Cover dressin and refrierate for at least 1 hour., Wash lettuce and tear into bite-sized pieces. Place in lare salad bowl and add tomatoes, cucumbers, red onion, olives, and chicken., Sprinkle with feta cheese., Top with yoghurt dressin and enjoy.

name: Green Beans and New Potatoes
ingredients: 3 1/2 cups frozen reen beans (16 oz ba), 8 potatoes (small, washed, peeled, and halved), 1 sprin onion (scallion) (medium, chopped), 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Add all inredients to a lare stock pot and cover with water., Brin to a boil and reduce to medium heat., Cook until reen beans and potatoes are tender.

name: Grilled Asparaus and Shrimp Quinoa Salad with Lemon Vinairette
ingredients: 2 cups fresh asparaus, lare spears (cut into 1" pieces), 1/2 yellow or red bell pepper (cut into 1/2" pieces), 1 clove arlic (minced), 1 14 ounce can quartered artichoke hearts (drained), 12 ounces fresh or frozen lare raw shrimp (peeled and deveined), 1 1/2 cups dry quinoa (cooked accordin to packae directions)
directions: Place vinairette inredients in a small bowl and whisk; set aside., Cut vegetables as directed., Heat rill and rillin tray., Place vegetables and shrimp in a lare bowl; add about 1/3 of the vinairette (about 3 tablespoons) and toss., Spread shrimp-vegetable mixture over hot rillin tray., Grill, turnin shrimp and vegetables, until the flesh of the shrimp is an opaque color (about 5 to 6 minutes); remove from rill., Serve rill mixture over cooked quinoa, and drizzle with vinairette.

name: Grilled Lamb Salad
ingredients: 3 reen onions (sliced), 12 ounces boneless le of lamb, cut into 1-inch cubes (if cubed lamb is not available at your meat market, ask the butcher to prepare it for you), 4 bamboo skewers, 6 cups shredded Savoy, Napa, or reen cabbae, 2 carrots (shredded), 2 tablespoons black or white sesame seeds, 1 small jicama, julienned (optional)
directions: Mix marinade/dressin inredients; divide evenly., Place lamb cubes in a lass dish; pour half of the marinade/dressin over the lamb., Cover and refrierate at least two hours., In a lare bowl, toss cabbae, carrots, jicama (optional), onions, and sesame seeds., Remove lamb and discard marinade., Soak bamboo skewers in water for 30 minutes; divide lamb amon the 4 skewers., On hot rill, cook the lamb skewers 5 to 6 minutes per side (or to desired deree of doneness)., Remove lamb from skewers, add to salad, and toss., To serve, divide salad evenly on four plates. Drizzle with remainin dressin.

name: Harvest Vegetable Salad
ingredients: 2 cups romaine lettuce (washed), 1 cup cilantro leaves (washed), 1 cup parsnips (peeled), 1 cup carrots (peeled), 1 cup turnips (peeled)
directions: Combine romaine lettuce and cilantro, and divide onto four plates., Place parsnips, carrots, and turnips into 1 quart of boilin water. Return water to a simmer, cook vegetables for 2 minutes. Strain into a colander., Mix inredients for the dressin riht before use., Place hot vegetables on top of reens and top with homemade dressin.

name: Hearty Vegetable Salad with Herb Dressin
ingredients: 3 cups cauliflower florets (fresh or frozen, thawed), 2 cups broccoli florets (fresh or frozen, thawed), 1 can red kidney beans (15 1/2 ounce, drained), 2 carrots, sliced diaonally (medium), 1 cup olives, lare pitted (sliced), 2 reen onion (sliced), 1/4 cup red wine vinear, 1/4 cup vegetable oil (or olive oil), 1 tablespoon cilantro or parsley (chopped), 1 clove arlic (minced), 1 teaspoon suar, 1/2 dried basil (1/2 teaspoon, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In lare bowl, combine all salad inredients., In a small jar with a tiht fittin lid, combine all dressin inredients and shake well., Pour dressin over vegetables and stir to coat vegetables. Cover; refrierate 1 to 4 hours to marinate, tossin occasionally.

name: Herb Potato Salad
ingredients: 1/4 tablespoon salt, 5 small potatoes (1 pound), radish (1/2 sliced, optional), 1/2 teaspoon basil (dried), 1/4 teaspoon thyme (dried), 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 3 tablespoons yoghurt, non-fat plain, 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, reduced calorie, 1 1/2 teaspoons prepared mustard, 1/2 teaspoon arlic (chopped)
directions: Scrub potatoes and cut into cubes., Place in medium saucepan and cover with water. Brin to a boil., Cover, reduce heat and simmer 12 minutes or until potatoes are done. Drain., Mix dressin inredients., Combine hot potatoes, dressin, radishes, basil, thyme, and onion powder. Serve hot or cold.

name: Homemade Ranch Dressin
ingredients: 2 teaspoons dried, minced onions, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 tablespoon dried parsley, 1 cup Greek yoghurt, plain, fat-free, 1 cup buttermilk
directions: Collect and measure all inredients before startin to prepare the recipe., Add the dried onion, salt, arlic powder, and dried parsley to a bowl, and stir ently to combine., Add the Greek yoghurt and buttermilk, and stir until spices are evenly distributed., Chill before servin., Keep leftovers refrierated, and eat within 1 week.

name: Italian Pasta Salad
ingredients: 4 cups pasta, cooked, 2 cups broccoli (blanched, pieces), 1 cup carrot (cooked, slices), 1/2 cup red pepper (strips), 1/4 cup reen onion (sliced), 1/2 cup Italian salad dressin, liht or reduced fat (can use 1/2 to 3/4 cup)
directions: 1. Mix all inredients toether and refrierate for about 30 minutes before servin.\n

name: Kale Salad with Yoghurt Dressin
ingredients: 4 cups kale (1 bunch), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 lemon (zested and juiced), 1 lime (zested and juiced), 1 cup Greek yoghurt (plain, fat-free), 1/2 cup cilantro (chopped or torn, stems included), 1/2 cup pumpkin seeds, toasted (pepitas), 1 jalapeño chile pepper (seeds removed and diced, optional), salt and pepper (optional, to taste)
directions: Wash your hands., Wash and dry kale. Remove stems and tear into bite-size pieces., Season kale with salt, pepper, 1Tablespoon of olive oil, lemon juice, and lime juice., With your hands, massae kale until you can no loner feel resistance., Season yoghurt with salt and pepper, lemon and lime zest and remainin 1Tablespoon of oil. Mix in cilantro and jalapeno pepper, if desired., With a spoon, mix massaed kale with yoghurt dressin., Toss pumpkin seeds over salad.

name: Kale with Nuts and Raisins
ingredients: 1/4 cup nuts, chopped, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 cloves arlic, chopped, 1 cup kale, stems removed and chopped (1 bunch), 1/2 cup raisins, salt (optional, to taste)
directions:
1. Heat oven to 350°F.
2. On a baking sheet, toast nuts for 5 minutes.
3. Heat oil in fryin pan on medium heat.
4. Add arlic and kale to fryin pan and cook for 4 minutes.
5. Add raisins and nuts and cook for 1 minute more.
6. Add salt to taste (optional)

name: Leaf Finer Salad
ingredients: 4 iceber lettuce leaves (lare), 1 cucumber (sliced), 1 beet (shredded), 1 carrot, medium (shredded), 6 tablespoons sunflower seeds, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 2 teaspoons balsamic vinear
directions: 1. Lay lettuce leaves on a flat surface. Top each leaf with all inredients: cucumbers, carrots, beets, and sunflower seeds., 2. Drizzle each leaf with olive oil and balsamic vinear., 3. Slowly roll the leaf with all inredients.

name: Lentil Vegetable Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup lentils (washed), 2 cups potatoes (1 can, about 15 ounces, sliced), 1 cup peas (frozen), 2 carrot (lare, shredded), 1 tablespoon parsley, 2 tablespoons red wine vinear, 3 teaspoons mustard, 1/4 cup olive oil
directions: 1. Boil 1 cup water in a saucepan., 2. Add the lentils. Cook for 20 minutes over low heat until tender, then drain., 3. Cook the peas for 3 minutes in another saucepan. Then remove from heat., 4. Rinse and drain the peas., 5. Wash, peel, and shred the carrots., 6. Put the cooked lentils, sliced potatoes, peas, and shredded carrots in a bowl., 7. Put the parsley, vinear, mustard, and olive oil in another bowl. Stir well., 8. Pour the dressin over the lentil vegetable salad.

name: Maical Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 can pineapple chunks (20 ounce), 1/2 pound rapes, seedless, red or reen, 2 bananas, 1 3/4 cups milk, non-fat or low-fat, 1 packae puddin mix, instant, lemon or vanilla (3 1/2 ounce)
directions: 1. Drain off the juice. Put chunks in a lare bowl., 2. Rinse the rapes and drain. Add the rapes to the bowl., 3. Peel the bananas and cut into bite-sized pieces. Add to the bowl., 4. Pour the milk over the fruit. While slowly stirrin the fruit mixture, sprinkle in the puddin mix., 5. Let the mixture stand for 5 minutes and serve., 6. Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Main Dish Salad
ingredients: 1/2 head of red cabbae, 1/2 head of romaine lettuce, 3 carrot (medium), 1 cucumber, 1 reen pepper, 2 broccoli stalks, 3 tomatoes (medium), 3 cans kidney beans or arbanzo beans (16 ounce), 6 ounces cheese, rated low-fat cheddar, 1/4 cup salad dressin, non-fat
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Wash and drain all vegetables well., Thickly slice red cabbae, tear lettuce into pieces, peel and rate (or slice) carrots and cucumber, cut broccoli into florets and tomato into wedes., Combine all salad inredients in a bowl., Add salad dressin and toss toether lihtly just before servin.

name: Mano Berry Rotini Salad
ingredients: 1 cup (4 oz) whole-wheat rotini pasta, uncooked, 1 ripe mano, 1 cup raspberries, 1 cup blueberries, 2 cups Fresh Baby Spinach, 1/2 cup reduced-fat feta cheese
directions: In a small bowl, whisk vinairette inredients; set aside., Boil water and cook rotini accordin to packae instructions. Drain cooked rotini and rinse in cool water., While rotini is cookin, cut mano into chunks, removin peel and pit., Place salad inredients in a lare bowl; drizzle with vinairette. Toss ently.

name: Marinated Three-Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 can cannellini (white) beans (15 ounce), 1 can cut reen beans (8 ounce), 1 can red kidney beans (8 ounce), 1 onion (medium, chopped), 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 8 ounces Italian salad dressin (fat-free)
directions: 1. Wash hands with soap and water., 2. Drain the canned beans., 3. Peel and chop the onion., 4. In a lare bowl, combine the cannellini beans, reen beans, kidney beans, onion, and celery., 5. Pour the Italian dressin over the vegetables and toss lihtly., 6. Cover the bowl and marinate in the refrierator for at least one hour. The salad can be left in the refrierator over niht., 7. Drain before servin.

name: Mediterranean Chicken and White Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 cup skinless cooked chicken (diced into 1/2 inch pieces), 1 can 15.5 ounce low-sodium white beans (drained and rinsed with cold water), 1 cucumber (peeled and diced into 1/2 inch pieces), 1/4 red or white onion (peeled and chopped into 1/2 inch pieces), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 tablespoon dried basil or parsley leaves, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions: Put everythin in the bowl and ently toss., Serve riht away, or cover and refrierate for up to 2 days.

name: Mixed Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 can mandarin oranges, drained, 1 can fruit cocktail, drained, 1 can pineapple chunks, drained, 2 apples (chopped), 1 banana (sliced)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix all inredients toether., Cover and chill until ready to serve., Refrierate leftovers.

name: Oprahs Outtasiht Salad
ingredients: 2 cups salad reens (of your choice), 1 cup vegetables (tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots, reen beans) (chopped), 1 cup pineapple chunks, drained (canned in juice, or fresh orange sements)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put mixed salad reens on a lare platter or in a salad bowl., In a lare bowl, mix chopped vegetables and pineapple or orange sements., Add dressin and stir., Spoon mixture over salad reens., Top with raisins and nuts. Serve.

name: Pasta Primavera Salad
ingredients: 12 ounces pasta (any shape), 1 packae frozen mixed vegetables, 1 packae dry vegetable soup mix, 1 cup low-fat salad dressin, unsalted ((mayonnaise type)), 1/2 cup cheese, reduced-fat (shredded), 3 hard boiled es (sliced)
directions:
1. Cook pasta accordin to packae directions. Rinse in cold water to stop cookin and prevent stickin. Drain.
2. Cook vegetables until just tender. Drain and cool.
3. Combine cold pasta, vegetables, envelope of soup mix and salad dressin.
4. Top with sliced es and cheese.
5. Refrierate until time to serve.

name: Pasta Salad
ingredients: 3 cups pasta, uncooked, 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 1 bell pepper (medium, chopped), 1/2 cup carrot (diced), 1/2 cup broccoli (chopped), 1/3 cup mayonnaise, 1 1/2 tablespoons arlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions: 1. Cook pasta accordin to packae directions., 2. Drain and place in bowl or pan., 3. Add the rest of the inredients and mix well., 4. Cool in refrierator before servin.

name: Pasta Salad with Herb Vinairette
ingredients: 6 ounces uncooked whole wheat pasta, cooked, drained, 1 cup chopped fresh broccoli, 3/4 cup chopped tomato, 1/2 cup Shredded carrot, 6 hard cooked es (cut into wedes)
directions: Whisk dressin inredients in small bowl until blended., Combine pasta, broccoli, tomato and carrot in lare bowl; toss. Pour dressin over pasta mixture; toss until evenly coated. Add es; toss briefly., Refrierate, covered, at least 4 hours to blend flavors.

name: Pineapple Avocado Chicken Salad
ingredients: 1 avocado (divided), 2 tablespoons non-fat plain Greek yoghurt, 1 tablespoon rice vinear, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper
directions: Mash ½ avocado in a small dish; add yoghurt, rice vinear, salt and pepper., Cut remainin avocado into small chunks and mix toether with pineapple, bell pepper, carrots, cabbae, reen onion and chicken., Add dressin; mix ently., Fill pita pockets and serve.

name: Pink Party Salad
ingredients: 4 potatoes (washed and cut in half), 3 cups beets, cooked (peeled and diced), 1 cup peas, reen, fresh or frozen, 3 es, hard boiled, 1 apple, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 tablespoons vinear, 1 tablespoon suar
directions: 1. Boil the potatoes in 2 cups of water in a deep kettle. Cover and cook over moderate heat for about 20 minutes, until the potatoes are tender., 2. When thorouhly cool, dice potatoes and place in a bi bowl., 3. Add diced beets and mix with the potatoes., 4. Set aside 1/4 cup of peas for arnishin and add the rest to the bowl., 5. Save 1 e to use as a arnish. Chop the rest and add to the bowl., 6. Peel the skin off the apple and remove the core. Cut the apple into small pieces, place in a small bowl and sprinkle with lemon juice. Add apple to the salad., 7. Add the vinear, olive oil and suar., 8. Mix thorouhly. Chill and serve.

name: Potato Salad
ingredients: 1 pound potatoes (4 medium potatoes), 1 cup onion (diced), 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 1/2 cup mayonnaise, low-fat, 1/4 cup sweet pickle relish
directions: Scrub the potatoes, and peel them., Cut the potatoes into 1-inch cubes., Put the potatoes into a saucepan. Cover with water., Brin the potatoes to a boil on medium heat., Let the potatoes simmer for 15 minutes until they’re soft., Drain the hot water, and let the potatoes cool., While the potatoes are coolin, peel and chop some onions until you have 1 cup of chopped onions., Chop the celery until you have ½ cup of chopped celery., Put the chopped onion and celery in a medium mixin bowl., Add the mayonnaise and pickle relish. Stir toether., Add the cooled potatoes. Stir aain., Cover the bowl. Put in the fride for at least 2 hours before servin.

name: Potato Salad
ingredients: 15 new potatoes (scrubbed and quartered), 2 tablespoons plain nonfat Greek yoghurt, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 6 teaspoons yellow mustard (or Dijon mustard), 3 celery stalks (chopped), 2 scallions (whites and reens chopped), 1/2 cup fresh parsley leaves (chopped)
directions: Put potatoes in a pot and cover with cold water. , Brin to a boil over hih heat and cook about 15 minutes, until potatoes are tender., Drain and set aside to cool to room temperature., While potatoes are coolin, mix the yoghurt, olive oil, and mustard in a small bowl., Add the yoghurt mixture to the cooled potatoes and ently mix. , Stir in the celery, scallions, and parsley., Serve riht away or cover and refrierate up to 2 days.

name: Quick N Cool Summer Salad
ingredients: 14 ounces elbow macaroni, 1 can reen beans (16 ounce, drained, or other vegetable), 1 can tuna packed in water (6.5 ounces, drained and flaked), 1 cup cheese (diced), 1/2 cup sweet pickles (diced), 1/2 cup onion (diced), 1 cup yoghurt, plain, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, liht, 1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon seasoned pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Prepare elbow macaroni accordin to packae directions and drain., Add vegetables, tuna, onions, cheese, and pickles., Mix yoghurt, salad dressin, lemon juice, salt and seasoned pepper., Toss with macaroni mixture., Chill before servin., Refrierate leftovers promptly.

name: Quick and Easy Baked Potato Salad
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds red potatoes, 1 cup non-fat plain yoghurt, 1/3 cup minced onion, 1/2 cup shredded reduced fat cheddar cheese, 4 tablespoons snipped fresh chives, 3 tablespoons real bacon bits or pieces, 1/4 teaspoon salt, Freshly round pepper to taste, chopped fresh parsley (optional)
directions: Place whole potatoes (do not poke) into microwave-safe dish., Cover dish. (If coverin dish with plastic wrap, poke small hole in plastic)., Microwave on hih for 10 to 12 minutes dependin on strenth of microwave., Use oven mitts or a towel to remove dish from microwave; carefully remove cover from dish due to steam build up and let cool., Cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces and place in a lare bowel with remainin inredients; stir and mix well.

name: Quick Black Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 can black beans (15 ounces), 1 1/2 10-ounce packaes frozen corn, 1/2 cup salsa
directions: 1. Leave frozen corn in the fride overnight to defrost. If you foret to do this ahead of time, defrost it in the microwaves., 2. Drain and rinse the black beans., 3. Combine all inredients toether and serve as a side dish.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup quinoa (dry), 1 1/2 cups water, 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 teaspoons lime juice, 1/4 teaspoon cumin, 1/4 teaspoon coriander (round, dried cilantro seeds), 2 tablespoons cilantro (chopped), 2 scallions (medium, minced), 1 can black beans (15.5 ounce can, rinsed and drained), 2 cups tomato (chopped), 1 red bell pepper (medium, chopped), 1 reen bell pepper (medium, chopped), 2 reen chiles (minced, to taste), black pepper (to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Rinse the quinoa in cold water. Boil water in a saucepan, and then add the quinoa., Return to boil, and then simmer until the water is absorbed, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool for 15 minutes., While quinoa is cookin, mix olive oil, lime juice, cumin, coriander, chopped cilantro, and scallions in a small bowl, and set aside., Combine chopped vegetables with the black beans in a lare bowl, and set aside., Once quinoa has cooled, combine all inredients and mix well., Cover and refrierate until ready to serve.

name: Rainbow Veggie Salad
ingredients: 1 can red kidney beans (15.5 ounces, drained and rinsed), 1 can black beans (15.5 ounces, drained and rinsed), 3 carrot (scrubbed and sliced), 1 yellow squash (medium, washed and sliced), 1 zucchini (medium, washed and sliced), 1/2 cup liht Italian dressin, 1/2 teaspoon pepper
directions: 1. Mix all the vegetables toether in a lare bowl., 2. Pour dressin over vegetables., 3. Sprinkle with pepper., 4. Stir ently, coatin all vegetables., 5. Cover and refrierate at least 8 hours.

name: Red Potato Salad
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt, plain fat-free, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, low-fat, 1 tablespoon yellow mustard, 4 medium red potatoes (about 1 pound), 1/2 cup celery, chopped, 1/4 cup onion, finely chopped, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper
directions: To prepare sauce, combine yoghurt, mayonnaise and mustard in a small bowl. Mix well and refrierate., Wash potatoes and place in pot. Cover with water about 1 inch above potatoes., Brin water and potatoes to a boil and simmer until potatoes are fork tender., Drain potatoes and set aside to cool., When potatoes are cooled, cut into bite-sized cubes. Place cut potatoes into lare bowl., Add celery, onions, salt, and pepper to potatoes. Top with sauce and mix well., Garnish with parsley and enjoy.

name: Roasted Chickpeas (Garbanzo Beans)
ingredients: 1 can (16 oz) arbanzo beans (drained and rinsed), 1 tablespoon canola oil, 1/8 teaspoon salt, spices of your choice (try arlic, paprika, sae, etc.)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 400 derees F., 2. Drain and rinse the beans until there is no foamy residue. Pick out the skins and discard. Wrap the drained beans in a clean towel to dry thorouhly., 3. Measure oil into a 9 x 13 baking dish or foil lined pan. Pour beans into dish, sprinkle with salt and spices. Mix oil and spices well to coat all the beans., 4. Bake for 45-60 minutes, stirrin or shakin every 15 minutes. Loner makes more crunch, but watch to prevent burnin!

name: Sanchico Tuna Salad
ingredients: 1 can chunk liht tuna (in water, 6.5 ounce can), 1 cup Roma tomatoes (diced), 1/4 cup red onions (diced), 1 lare avocado (diced), 2 teaspoons lime juice, 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 lare mano (firm)
directions: Drain tuna. Transfer to a mixin bowl and mix well with avocado for texture., Add tomatoes, onion, pepper, lime juice, salt, mano.

name: Shrimp Confetti Salad Sandwich with Grapes
ingredients: 1/2 pound frozen cooked cocktail shrimp (thawed, peeled, and deveined), 1 8-oz can yellow corn kernels (no salt added, drained), 1 cup canned black beans (no salt added, drained and rinsed), 1 stalk celery (diced), 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 2 tablespoons reduced-fat mayonnaise, 1/2 tablespoon salt-free Caribbean citrus seasonin, 8 slices whole-rain bread, 2 tomatoes (sliced), 4 leaves Bibb lettuce or other leaf lettuce
directions: Chop shrimp coarsely., Mix toether shrimp salad inredients (everythin except for the bread, tomato slices, and lettuce)., Divide salad evenly amon 4 slices of bread; spread to edes of bread., Top with tomato slices, lettuce, and second bread slice.

name: Simply Satisfyin Kale and Tuna Salad
ingredients: 2 cans tuna (2-5 oz. cans), 1 bunch kale (or 1 ba), 2 ounces cherry tomatoes, 1 lemon, raw, 1/4 cup extra virin olive oil, 1/8 cup balsamic vinear, kosher salt (to taste), freshly round pepper (to taste)
directions: Wash kale. Set aside to drain water off., Cut tomatoes in half and lihtly toss in bowl with balsamic vinear, oil and pinch of salt and pepper. Set aside., In a salad bowl, mix tuna and juice from the can ently with squeeze of 1/2 lemon and a pinch of pepper., Massae kale for about 3 minutes to soften it., Add the kale and 1/2 the tomatoes to the tuna, and ently toss until all is coated with dressin., Add remainin tomatoes., Squeeze remainin lemon all over and serve.

name: Snappy Cole Slaw
ingredients: 2 cups cabbae (shredded), 1/4 cup cider vinear, 1/4 cup water, 2 tablespoons suar, 1/2 teaspoon mustard, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
directions:
1. Wash and shred the cabbae with a knife or rater. Put in a mixin bowl.
