2. Brin the vinear and water to a boil in the saucepan. Remove from heat and add other inredients except cabbae to the saucepan.
3. Continue to cook this mixture in the saucepan until the suar is dissolved and hot, then pour over the shredded cabbae.
4. Toss. Refrierate until chilled to blend flavors.

name: Somali Summer Salad
ingredients: 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 3 apples, 2 reen peppers, 3 tomatoes, 2 cucumbers, salt and pepper (optional)
directions:
1. In a lare bowl, combine oil and lemon juice.
2. Dice all the fruits and vegetables and then add to the bowl.
3. Add salt and pepper to taste (optional).
4. Serve chilled.
5. Best served within 24 hours.

name: South of the Border Salad
ingredients: 3 cups corn, low sodium (drained and rinsed), 2 cans black beans (15.5 ounces each, drained and rinsed), 1 can diced tomatoes with reen chilies (10 ounces), 1 onion (medium, chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix the salad inredients in a lare bowl., Mix the dressin inredients in a small bowl., Pour dressin over corn mixture and mix well., Cover and refrierate for at least 2 hours.

name: Spinach Black Bean Salad
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vinear, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon dried oreano, 1/2 teaspoon dried basil, 1/8 round nutme (1/8 teaspoon, optional), 2 cups spinach (washed), 1 1/2 cups Black beans, low-sodium, canned, drained and rinsed, 2 tomatoes (chopped), 1 red onion (small, chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, combine vinear, oil, mustard, arlic, oreano, basil and nutme., Wash, drain and chop spinach., Add spinach, black beans, tomatoes and onions to vinear and oil. Toss well and serve.

name: Spinach Rice Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup Italian dressin (reduced fat, unsalted), 3 teaspoons soy sauce, reduced sodium, 1/2 teaspoon suar, 3 cups cooked brown rice, 2/3 cup fresh spinach (washed and cut into thin strips), 2/3 cup sliced celery, 1/2 cup thinly sliced reen onion (includin tops), bacon bits (optional)
directions: 1. Combine dressin, soy sauce, and suar. Stir into chilled rice., 2. Cover and chill salad., 3. Add celery, onion, and spinach before servin., 4. Shake on bacon bits if desired.

name: Spinach Salad with Apples and Eggs
ingredients: 4 lare es, 2 apples, 8 cups fresh spinach, 1 cup dried fis (about 16 fis or one 7-oz pk), 1 cup whole-rain croutons, 1/2 cup liht honey mustard or poppy seed dressin
directions: To hard boil-es: Place es in saucepan lare enouh to hold them in a sinle layer. Add cold water to cover es by 1 inch. Heat over hih heat just to boilin. Remove from heat and cover. Let es stand in hot water about 12 minutes. Drain and fill pan with cold water; let sit 10-15 minutes. Peel and slice. (If makin ahead, refrierate cooked unpeeled es), Prepare other inredients while es are cookin and coolin., Wash, slice, and core apples., Cut apples and dried fis into bite-sized chunks., Wash and drain spinach., To plate, divide inredients evenly amon four plates, top spinach with apples, es, dried fis, and croutons. Drizzle with dressin

name: Spinach Salad with Apples and Raisins
ingredients: 2/3 packae baby spinach (10 ounces, washed. Could also use Kale or other reens), 1 1/2 apples (chopped, can use 1-2 apples), 1 cup raisins, 1/4 cup canola oil, 1/4 cup apple cider vinear, 1/4 cup suar, 1/16 teaspoon arlic powder (pinch)
directions: 1. Combine spinach, apples and raisins.\n2. Mix all dressin inredients and pour over salad just prior to servin.\n

name: Splendid Fruit Salad
ingredients: 2 apples, medium (chopped), 1 banana (chopped), 3/4 container yoghurt, low-fat vanilla (6 ounces), 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/16 cup orange juice (1 Tablespoon)
directions: 1. Mix yoghurt, cinnamon, and orange juice in a medium bowl.\n2. Wash and chop the fruit and add to the yoghurt mixture.\n3. Stir and serve.

name: Summer Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 cup strawberries (diced, fresh or frozen), 1 cup watermelon (cubed), 1 cup pineapple chunks, fresh or canned packed in natural juice (and do not drain)
directions: Stir fruit toether in a medium sized bowl., Cover and chill. Serve as soon as possible.

name: Summer Salad
ingredients: 2 cups salad reens, 6 reen onions (thinly sliced, with tops), 6 mushrooms (lare, fresh, thinly sliced), 1/4 cup walnuts (coarsely chopped), 3/4 cup parsley (fresh, finely chopped), 3/4 cup Tany Dressin
directions: 1. Wash and dry reens. Tear into bite-sized pieces and place in lare salad bowl.\n2. Add onion, mushrooms, walnuts and parsley. Just before servin, toss with dressin.\n

name: Sunshine Salad
ingredients: 5 cups spinach leaves (packed, washed, and dried well), 1/2 red onion (sliced thin), 1/2 red pepper (sliced), 1 cucumber (whole, sliced), 2 orange (peeled and chopped into bite-size pieces), 1/3 cup vinairette dressin ("lite", around 15 calories per tablespoon or less)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Toss all inredients toether in a lare bowl. Add dressin and toss aain., Serve immediately.

name: Taco Salad
ingredients: 3 cups lettuce (Use butterhead or any other head of lettuce, torn into small pieces), 2 tomatoes (chopped, fresh), 1/2 cup reen pepper (chopped), 16 ounces round turkey or round beef, 1 onion (small, chopped), 1 can pinto beans (15 1/2 ounce, drained), 3/4 cup salsa (or taco sauce)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put lettuce in lare bowl. Add tomatoes and reen pepper., Brown meat and onion in fry pan. Drain off fat and liquid., Mix meat, beans and salsa. Add to salad mixture., Serve with additional salsa. Refrierate leftovers.

name: Taco Salad II
ingredients: 1/4 pound lean round beef, 1 1/2 cumin, round (1 1/2 teaspoons, optional), 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 cup kidney or pinto beans (cooked), 1/2 head of lettuce (torn), 1 onion (small, diced), 2 tomatoes (lare, cut up), 1/2 cup cheddar cheese (shredded), 2 cups liht tortilla chips (broken), 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat, 1/2 cup salsa, chunky
directions: 1. Prepare dressin in mixin yoghurt and salsa, then set aside., 2. Brown round beef and drain any fat; add beans, cumin and chili powder and heat throuh., 3. Toss lettuce, tomatoes, onion and cheese in lare bowl., 4. Spoon on meat and bean mixture and top with broken tortilla chips., 5. Offer dressin on the side., 6. Refrierate leftovers within two hours.

name: Tany Crisp Vegetable and Pasta Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup pasta, uncooked (such as bowties, shells, macaroni, etc), 1/4 cup vinear, 1 tablespoon suar, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon round black pepper, 1/2 cucumber (medium, peeled, seeded, and coarsely chopped), 1/2 carrot (medium, thinly sliced), 1/2 red pepper (sliced, could use reen or yellow), 1/2 cup broccoli florets (coarsely chopped), 2 tablespoons onion, reen or red (sliced), 1 tablespoon dried parsley (can use fresh if available)
directions: 1. Wash your hands with soap and water., 2. Cook pasta accordin to packae directions but do not add salt to cookin water. Drain, rinse with cool water, and drain aain., 3. In a small saucepan, combine vinear, suar, salt, arlic powder and black pepper. Stir and heat over medium heat until suar is dissolved, but do not boil. Let cool., 4. Rinse, drain, and chop remainin inredients. Combine in a shallow container, such as an 8x8 inch pan., 5. Add cooked pasta, and vinear mixture. Mix ently., 6. Cover and refrierate overnight to allow flavors to blend., 7. Top with parsley and serve cold., 8. Cover and refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Three Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 cup kidney beans, cooked (see recipe), 1 cup reen beans (cut, canned or cooked), 2 cups yellow wax beans (canned or cooked), 1 reen pepper (diced), 2/3 cup onion (thinly sliced), 1/2 cup celery (thinly sliced), 2 arlic (cloves, whole), 1/2 cup wine vinear, 1/4 cup oil, 1/4 cup suar, 1/4 teaspoon oreano, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper
directions: 1. Mix beans, vegetables and arlic cloves in a lare bowl., 2. Mix vinear, oil, and suar in a saucepan. Heat until suar dissolves. Cool slihtly., 3. Stir seasonins into vinear mixture. Pour over vegetables. Toss lihtly. Chill overnight., 4. Remove arlic before servin.

name: Tofu Salad
ingredients: 3/4 pound tofu (firm), 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, reduced calorie, 3 teaspoons brown mustard, 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce, low-sodium, 1/2 cup celery (diced), 1 tablespoon onion (diced), 1/2 reen pepper (seeded and diced), 1 tablespoon parsley (minced)
directions: 1. Prepare tofu by drainin the water from the packae and placin tofu between two plates. Put a heavy object on top and let stand for 10 to 15 minutes. Drain the water that collects on the bottom plate every few minutes., 2. In a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise, mustard and soy sauce., 3. In a medium bowl, combine the diced tofu, celery, onion, pepper, and parley; stir in the mayonnaise mixture and toss ently to coat., 4. Refrierate covered until the flavors are blended - at least one hour., 5. Use as a sandwich fillin or on top of whole rain crackers.

name: Tomato and Cucumber Salad
ingredients: Salad,4 large tomatoes, cubed,1 large cucumber, chopped,1 cup red onion, chopped,1 cup green pepper, chopped,1/3 cup parsley, chopped,Dressing,1/3 cup apple cider vinegar,1 tablespoon olive oil,2 cloves garlic, minced,1/2 teaspoon salt,1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper,1/2 teaspoon sugar
directions: 1. In a lare bowl, combine the salad inredients., 2. In a small bowl, mix the dressin inredients toether., 3. Pour the dressin over the salad. Mix well., 4. Refrierate for at least 1 hour before servin.

name: Tomato Basil and Bean Pasta Salad
ingredients: 1 pound ziti pasta (or bow tie pasta), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 cup vinear, 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 1/4 teaspoon round black pepper, 1 cup fresh basil leaves (chopped), 3 tomatoes (lare, coarsely chopped), 1 cup kidney beans (cooked or canned drained, or try arbanzo beans or black beans), 1 mozzarella cheese (1 cup, or provolone cheese, cubed or shredded, optional), 1 walnuts (1/2 cup chopped, optional)
directions: Cook pasta accordin to packae directions. Drain and cool., In a small mixin bowl, whisk toether vegetable oil, vinear, Dijon-style mustard and pepper to make vinairette., In a lare mixin bowl, combine pasta, beans, basil and tomatoes. Pour vinairette over top and toss toether. Cover and chill at least 1 hour., If desired, add nuts and cheese just before servin, tossin aain to combine.

name: Tuna Apple Salad
ingredients: 1 can tuna, packed in water (12 ounces), 2 tablespoons red onion (minced), 1 apple (cored and chopped), 1 cup celery (chopped), 1 cup olden raisins, 5 tablespoons Italian dressin, liht, 2 cups salad reens, 2 Pita bread, whole wheat (cut in half)
directions: 1. In a small bowl, stir toether tuna, onion, apple, celery, raisins, and 2 Tablespoons of dressin., 2. In another bowl, toss toether salad reens with remainin dressin., 3. Carefully open pita breads and fill with equal amounts of reens and tuna salad.

name: Tuna Apple Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 1 apple (such as Fuji or Pink Lady Washinton), 1 can 12-oz chunk liht tuna (drained), 2 tablespoons low-fat plain yoghurt, 2 tablespoons reduced-fat mayonnaise, 1/2 cup raisins (or chopped fis), 1/4 cup chopped walnuts, 1/8 teaspoon round black pepper, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley (optional), 1/2 teaspoon curry powder (optional), 8 leaves lettuce (Bibb, Romaine, reen, or red leaf), 8 slices whole-rain bread
directions: Cut apple in quarters; remove core and chop., In a medium size bowl, mix all salad inredients, except tuna., Gently fold in tuna., Make sandwiches,usin lettuce and whole-rain bread (toasted, if desired), and fill with tuna apple salad.

name: Tuna Salad II
ingredients: 2 cans tuna, drained (5 ounces each), 1 cup celery, chopped, 1/8 cup mayonnaise, 1/8 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 1 cup rapes, seedless (cut in half), 7 lettuce leaves, washed and separated
directions:
1. In a medium-sized bowl, combine drained tuna, celery, mayonnaise and yoghurt and stir.
2. Add rapes to mixture and stir ently.
3. Cover and chill until ready to serve.
4. Serve over lettuce leaves.

name: Turkey Potato Salad
ingredients: 6 ounces turkey, cooked and diced, 1/4 cup celery, chopped, 1 cup potato (cooked, peeled, and diced), 1 tablespoon onion, chopped, 1/4 cup reen pepper, chopped (2 Tablespoons), 2 tablespoons salad dressin, mayonnaise-type, 1/4 teaspoon prepared mustard, 1/8 teaspoon salt
directions: 1. Mix turkey, celery, potato, onion, and reen pepper.\n2. Mix salad dressin, mustard and salt. Stir lihtly into turkey mixture.\n3. Chill.

name: Turkey Salad with Orange Vinairette
ingredients: 1/4 cup orange juice, 2 tablespoons vinear, white wine, 2 tablespoons onion (finely chopped), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 dash pepper, 1 tablespoon oil, 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 4 cups salad reens (torn), 2 cups cooked turkey breast (cut into julienne strips), 1 cup mandarin orange sections (drained), 1/2 cup celery (sliced)
directions: "1. In a jar with tiht-fittin lid, combine all vinairette inredients; shake well. If you dont have a container with a tiht-fittin lid, place inredients in a small mixin bowl and mix toether with a whisk.", 2. In lare bowl, combine all salad inredients; toss ently., 3. Serve with vinairette. If desired, arnish with fresh strawberries.

name: Vegetable Salad
ingredients: 1 can whole kernel corn (12 ounce, drained), 1 can carrots (14 1/2 ounce, drained), 1 can chickpeas (arbanzo beans), 1 tablespoon onion (finely chopped), 1 tablespoon red pepper (chopped), 1 can diced tomatoes (reserve 1/3 cup liquid), 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1/3 cup vinear, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 2 tablespoons honey
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain corn, carrots and chickpeas. Throw away liquid. Rinse vegetables and drain aain., Drain tomatoes but save 1/3 cup of the liquid., Mix corn, carrots, chickpeas, tomatoes, onion, and reen pepper in a lare bowl., Mix toether all other inredients in a separate bowl., Pour over vegetables., Cover and set aside for at least 3 hours in the refrierator.

name: Zesty Citrus Coleslaw
ingredients: 4 cups shredded cabbae (16 ounce ba of coleslaw mix), 1 1/3 cups mandarin oranges, canned (drained), peanuts (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix toether the coleslaw mix, peanuts (if usin), and mandarin oranges in a lare bowl., Stir in the Italian salad dressin and soy sauce.

name: Zesty Pasta Primavera Salad
ingredients: 2 cups whole rain rotini pasta, uncooked¹, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 1/2 teaspoons Italian seasonin, 1/8 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1 1/2 cups cucumber, chopped, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 1/2 cup carrots, sliced, 1/4 cup red onion, minced, 3 tablespoons Parmesan cheese
directions:
Wash hands with soap and water., 1. Cook pasta accordin to the packae directions.
2. Drain and set aside.
3. In a lare bowl, whisk oil, lemon juice, Italian seasonin, and red pepper flakes.
4. Add cooked pasta, cucumber, tomato, carrots, red onion, and Parmesan cheese to the dressin.
5. Mix well and chill for 2 hours before servin.

name: Asian Mano Chicken Wraps
ingredients: 2 ripe manos (peeled, pitted, and diced), 1 1/2 cups chopped roasted chicken breast, 2 reen onions (sliced), 2 tablespoons fresh basil (chopped), 1/2 red bell pepper (chopped), 1 1/2 cups shredded Savoy or Napa cabbae, 2 medium carrots (rated), 1/3 cup fat-free cream cheese, 3 tablespoons natural creamy peanut butter (unsalted), 2 teaspoons low-sodium soy sauce, 4 whole-wheat tortillas (8")
directions: Cut manos, vegetables, and chicken. Place in a mixin bowl and toss until well mixed., In a small mixin bowl, whisk toether cream cheese, peanut butter, and soy sauce., To assemble: lay out tortillas on a flat surface. On each tortilla, spread 1/4 of cream cheese mixture and top with mano, vegetable, and chicken mix. Roll up tihtly, tuckin in ends of tortilla. Secure with toothpicks., To serve, cut each wrap in half., If not serving immediately, refrierate; keeps well overnight.

name: Chicken Apple Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 1/4 pound cooked, shredded chicken, 1 cup chopped celery (1 stalk), 1/2 cup chopped apple (1 apple), 1/3 cup liht mayonnaise, 1 lemon, juiced, 1 small box (1 1/2 oz) raisins, 8 slices whole wheat bread, chopped walnuts (1 cup, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients except for bread toether in a bowl., Create 4 sandwiches on whole wheat bread.

name: Chicken Salad and Peach Sandwich
ingredients: 4 slices of whole rain bread, 1/2 cup cooked chicken (diced), 1/2 cup canned peach slices (drained and diced), 1 celery stalk, 1/2 cup apples (Fuji, Gala, or Braeburn), 1 small onion, 1 1/2 tablespoons mayonnaise (nonfat), 1 tablespoon chopped walnut
directions: Mix toether the chicken, apples, peaches, celery, onion, walnuts, and mayonnaise in a small bowl., Spoon mixture onto 2 slices of the bread.

name: Curried Chickpea Salad
ingredients: 2 cans chickpeas, rinsed and drained, 1/2 cup celery, diced, 1/2 cup apple, diced, 1/4 cup red onion, diced, 1/4 cup cranberries, dried, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, low-fat or vean mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon dijon mustard, 2 teaspoons curry powder, 1/4 teaspoon thyme, dried, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, round, salt (1/2 teaspoon, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Add the chickpeas to a lare bowl and mash with a potato masher. You can mash them to be as smooth or coarse as you desire., Add all of the remainin inredients to the bowl and mix until everythin is combined.

name: E Salad
ingredients: 4 hard boiled es (finely chopped), 2 packet of pickle relish (2/3 tablespoon), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon mustard (wet), 1/4 cup mayonnaise
directions: Put the es in a pan of cold water. Simmer for 20 minutes., Cool promptly in cold water, then in refrierator, so the es will be easy to shell., Remove the shells from es, and chop the es finely., Mix all the inredients toether.

name: Falafel with Yoghurt Sandwich
ingredients: 1 cup dry arbanzo beans (chick peas, sorted and rinsed), 3 cups water, 1/4 cup oil, 1 arlic (clove, crushed), 1 onion (medium, chopped), 1 teaspoon parsley (1 spri or about 1 teaspoon, chopped), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1/3 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, 1 cup plain yoghurt (low-fat), 1 onion (medium, chopped), 4 whole wheat pita bread (pockets), flour, tomatoes, sliced (optional), lettuce (optional), bread crumbs (optional (see note))
directions: Put beans and water in lare pot and soak by the overnight or quick-soak method., Cook until tender, about 2 hours. Add more water if necessary. Drain., Slowly heat oil and sauté arlic and 1 onion until tender (5 to 7 minutes)., Mash cooked beans, sautéed vegetables, parsley, salt, lemon juice and hot pepper sauce until smooth., With floured hands, form ovals with bean mixture (about 1/4 cup each). Roll in flour., Fry falafel, with the remainin oil in skillet, until olden brown. Drain on paper towel., Combine yoghurt with remainin onion., Serve falafel in pocket bread topped with yoghurt.

name: Fruity Thai Pita Pockets
ingredients: 1 can tropical fruit salad in 100% juice (15 ounces), 4 whole-rain pita pockets, 4 cups fresh spinach (torn), 1/4 cup fresh cilantro (optional)
directions: In a colander over a bowl, drain fruit salad well; reserve 3 tablespoons juice., In a small bowl, whisk toether reserved juice, peanut butter, cream cheese, and soy sauce., Place drained fruit, spinach, and cilantro (if desired) in a bowl; mix ently., Add sauce and toss., Slice a small portion off each pita. Tuck the slice inside the bottom of the pita., Fill each pita pocket with the fruit-spinach mixture., Wrap individually in plastic wrap and refrierate. Will keep well overnight.

name: Grape and Cashew Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 3/4 cup dry roasted cashews (unsalted, coarsely chopped), 1 cup low-fat cottae cheese, 1 1/2 cups red rapes (quartered), 1 celery stalk (chopped), round black pepper to taste, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley (chopped), 8 lettuce leaves, 8 slices whole-rain bread
directions: In a medium bowl, mix cottae cheese, rapes, celery, cashews, parsley, and round black pepper., Toast bread and build sandwiches followin steps 3 and 4., Spread 1/4 salad mix on 4 of the bread slices., Add two lettuce leaves to each sandwich; top with 2nd bread slice.

name: Grilled Cheese with Peaches
ingredients: 8 slices whole rain bread, 1 15-oz can of peaches, drained, 8 slices low-fat cheddar cheese, 7 1/2 cups spinach, 4 teaspoons vegetable oil
directions: Heat the 4 teaspoons of vegetable oil in a lare non-stick pan over medium heat., Place 4 slices of whole rain bread in the pan., Layer (in this order) one slice of cheese, a handful of spinach, 4 to 6 peach slices, another slice of cheese, and a slice of bread on top of each oriinal slice of bread., After 4 to 5 minutes, flip each sandwich and cook another 4 to 5 minutes.

name: Peanut Butter and Apple Wraps
ingredients: 1 whole wheat tortilla (8 inch), 1/4 cup peanut butter, reduced-fat, 2 tablespoons ranola cereal, 1/2 apple, sliced (suest Red Delicious apple)
directions:
1. Lay tortilla flat and spread peanut butter over 2/3 of the tortilla leavin edes at sides
2. Sprinkle 2 Tablespoons ranola over peanut butter.
3. Cut apple slices into small chunks and place them on top of the ranola.
4. Fold over the edes of the tortilla and roll up "burrito style"
5. Eat and Enjoy.

name: Peanut, Peach, N Pineapple Wrap
ingredients: 1 can sliced peaches (15 oz, drained), 1 can pineapple tidbits in juice (drained), 1/2 cup red or reen bell pepper (chopped), 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 4 whole wheat tortillas (10-inch), 1/2 cup chunky peanut butter, 3 cups lettuce (shredded)
directions: In a medium bowl, combine peaches, pineapple, bell pepper and cinnamon., Warm the tortillas., Spread 2 tablespoons of peanut butter on one side of each tortilla, leavin room on the edes., Spoon equal portions of the peach mixture over peanut butter, then top with lettuce., Fold the side and bottom edes of each tortilla toward the middle over the fillin, then roll so the tortilla covers the fillin.

name: Shrimp Confetti Salad Sandwich with Grapes
ingredients: 1/2 pound frozen cooked cocktail shrimp (thawed, peeled, and deveined), 1 8-oz can yellow corn kernels (no salt added, drained), 1 cup canned black beans (no salt added, drained and rinsed), 1 stalk celery (diced), 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 2 tablespoons reduced-fat mayonnaise, 1/2 tablespoon salt-free Caribbean citrus seasonin, 8 slices whole-rain bread, 2 tomatoes (sliced), 4 leaves Bibb lettuce or other leaf lettuce
directions: Chop shrimp coarsely., Mix toether shrimp salad inredients (everythin except for the bread, tomato slices, and lettuce)., Divide salad evenly amon 4 slices of bread; spread to edes of bread., Top with tomato slices, lettuce, and second bread slice.

name: Tuna Apple Salad
ingredients: 1 can tuna, packed in water (12 ounces), 2 tablespoons red onion (minced), 1 apple (cored and chopped), 1 cup celery (chopped), 1 cup olden raisins, 5 tablespoons Italian dressin, liht, 2 cups salad reens, 2 Pita bread, whole wheat (cut in half)
directions: 1. In a small bowl, stir toether tuna, onion, apple, celery, raisins, and 2 Tablespoons of dressin., 2. In another bowl, toss toether salad reens with remainin dressin., 3. Carefully open pita breads and fill with equal amounts of reens and tuna salad.

name: Tuna Apple Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 1 apple (such as Fuji or Pink Lady Washinton), 1 can 12-oz chunk liht tuna (drained), 2 tablespoons low-fat plain yoghurt, 2 tablespoons reduced-fat mayonnaise, 1/2 cup raisins (or chopped fis), 1/4 cup chopped walnuts, 1/8 teaspoon round black pepper, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley (optional), 1/2 teaspoon curry powder (optional), 8 leaves lettuce (Bibb, Romaine, reen, or red leaf), 8 slices whole-rain bread
directions: Cut apple in quarters; remove core and chop., In a medium size bowl, mix all salad inredients, except tuna., Gently fold in tuna., Make sandwiches,usin lettuce and whole-rain bread (toasted, if desired), and fill with tuna apple salad.

name: Tuna Slider with Green Chiles
ingredients: 5 ounces canned tuna, packed in water, drained and flaked, 1 can chopped reen chilies (1-4.25 oz. can), 1/4 cup diced celery, 1/4 cup diced red onion, 1/4 cup reduced fat mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro or parsley, 6 slider rolls, split, Lettuce leaves
directions: In lare bowl combine tuna, reen chilies, celery, red onion, mayonnaise and chopped cilantro; toss to mix well., Top bottom half of each roll with lettuce leaves; top with some tuna mixture and top half of roll.

name: Turkey and Cucumber Sandwich
ingredients: 4 slices whole wheat bread, 4 slices enriched white bread, 1/2 cup plain fat free yoghurt, 2 fresh dill spris (chopped), 1/2 cup cucumbers, chopped, 1/4 cup onion, chopped, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 8 ounces turkey breast, thinly sliced (or you can use fat free, low-sodium deli turkey), Additional cucumber slices, as desired, 1/8 teaspoon salt (optional)
directions: Mix the yoghurt, dill, onion, pepper and chopped cucumbers., Divide the yoghurt/cucumber mixture on all 8 slices of bread., Top the whole wheat bread with turkey and cucumber slices., Cover with the white bread slices.

name: Veggie Bean Wrap
ingredients: 2 reen or red bell pepper (seeded and chopped), 1 onion (peeled and sliced), 1 can black beans, 50% less salt (15 ounce, drained and rinsed), 2 mano (chopped), 1 lime, juiced, 1/2 cup fresh cilantro (chopped), 1 avocado (peeled and diced), 4 flour tortillas (10 inch)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a nonstick pan, sauté bell peppers and onion for 5 minutes over medium heat. Add beans, stir well. Reduce heat to low and simmer about 5 minutes., In a small bowl, combine manos, lime juice, cilantro, and avocado. Reserve 1/2 mixture for toppin., Fill warmed tortillas with 1/4 bean mixture and 1/4 mano mixture., Fold ends of the tortillas over. Roll up to make wraps. Top veggie bean wraps with remainin mano mixture.

name: Ambrosia
ingredients: 1 can pineapple chunks (in juice, 20 oz., drained), 1 1/3 cups mandarin orange (drained), 1 banana (peeled and sliced), 1 1/2 cups rape (seedless), 3/4 cup marshmallows (miniature), 1/3 cup coconut (flaked), 1 cup vanilla yoghurt, low-fat (8 ounces)
directions: Drain pineapple and oranges. Use juice as beverae., Combine fruit with marshmallows and coconut., Fold in yoghurt., Chill., Serve.

name: Any Days a Picnic Chicken Salad
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups chicken breast (cooked, diced), 1/2 cup celery (chopped), 1/4 cup onion (chopped), 3 packaes pickle relish (2/3 tablespoon), 1/2 cup mayonnaise (liht)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients., Refrierate until ready to serve., Use within 1-2 days. Chicken salad does not freeze well.

name: Apple Sandwiches
ingredients: 1 medium apple, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1 tablespoon raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Cut apple in half from the stem down and lay each half cut-side down on a cuttin board. Slice each half into 6 half-round slices and cut out the core., Spread 1/2 teaspoon peanut butter on one side of each apple slice., Put 4 to 6 raisins on top of the peanut butter on one apple slice. Top with another apple slice, peanut-butter side down. Squeeze ently., Continue with remainin apple slices.

name: Apple Tuna Sandwiches
ingredients: 1 can tuna, packed in water (6.5 ounces, drained), 1 apple, 1/4 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 1 teaspoon mustard, 1 teaspoon honey, 6 slices whole wheat bread, 3 lettuce leaves
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Wash and peel the apple. Chop it into small pieces., Drain the water from the can of tuna., Put the tuna, apple, yoghurt, mustard, and honey in a medium bowl. Stir well., Spread 1/2 cup of the tuna mix onto each 3 slices of bread., Top each sandwich with a washed lettuce leaf and a slice of bread.

name: Applesauce
ingredients: 7 apples (cut in quarters), 1/2 cup water, 1/4 cup suar
directions: Wash and then cut apples in quarters. Apples can be peeled, but fiber will be decreased., Combine apples and water in saucepan. Heat to boilin. Turn heat to low as soon as the water is boilin., Simmer over low heat for 15 to 20 minutes or until apples are tender. Stir occasionally to prevent stickin., Stir in suar and heat until suar is dissolved.

name: Avocado and Corn Salsa
ingredients: 1 avocado (diced), 3/4 cup frozen corn kernels, thawed, 1/2 cup rape tomatoes, quartered, 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, chopped, 2 teaspoons lime juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Toss avocado, corn, tomatoes, cilantro, lime juice, and salt in a medium bowl., Chill one hour and then serve.

name: Baked Bananas
ingredients: 6 bananas, sliced lenthwise, 18 teaspoons packed brown suar (6 Tablespoons), 4 tablespoons mararine or butter, 1/2 cup raisins, or other dried chopped fruit, 1/3 cup chopped pecans
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F., Lihtly rease a 9x13 inch pan., Arrane the split bananas in the pan., Top evenly with brown suar, small pieces of mararine, raisins, and pecans., Bake for 30 minutes.

name: Baked Cauliflower Tots
ingredients: 2 cups rated or finely chopped cauliflower rice (about half a medium head), 1 e, 3 tablespoons flour, 1/4 cup rated cheddar cheese, 1/4 teaspoon salt
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Lihtly rease a baking sheet., In a medium bowl, combine all inredients and mix well., Press mixture toether to make about 15 small balls or los and put them on the baking sheet with space between each one., Bake for 20 minutes or until cooked throuh. For extra crispy tots, broil for an extra 2 minutes. Watch closely to avoid burnin.

name: Baked Tortilla Chips
ingredients: 3 whole wheat flour tortillas, 10" across (or corn), 3 sprays of cookin oil spray, salt (dash, optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven or toaster oven to 400 °F., Lihtly rease a baking sheet with the cookin spray., Cut tortillas into 8 sections (as if you were cuttin a pizza) and place on baking sheet., Spray tops of tortilla sections with cookin spray and lihtly salt, if desired., "Bake for 10 minutes, until crisp and liht brown, watchin closely so the chips dont burn."

name: Banana Cocoa Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat vanilla yoghurt, 1 medium banana, 2 teaspoons cocoa powder, 1 ice cube tray (or paper cups)
directions: Mash banana with a fork., Mix banana and yoghurt well., Stir in cocoa powder., Divide into 4 small paper cups (or 8 mini muffin cups) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws)., Freeze., Enjoy as a frozen treat!

name: Banana Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
ingredients: 3 bananas (ripe), 1/3 cup mararine (or butter), 2 cups quick-cookin oats (uncooked), 1/4 cup skim milk, 1/2 cup raisins, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Put the mararine in a small saucepan. Melt it on low heat., Put all the inredients in a mixin bowl. Mix really well., Let the mix stand for about 5 minutes, until the oats are wet., Lihtly rease the cookie sheet., For each cookie, spoon out about 1 tablespoon of douh and drop it onto the reased cookie sheet., Bake the cookies for 15 to 20 minutes., Let the cookies cool on the cookie sheet for about 1 minute., Move the cookies to wire racks or a towel. Let them cool completely.

name: Batido (Smoothie)
ingredients: 2 cups papaya chunks (fresh or frozen), 2 bananas (overripe, sliced), 1 cup plain low-fat yoghurt, 1 cup ice cubes
directions: Put all the inredients in the blender., Put the lid on tihtly. Turn the blender to a medium settin and blend until the ice is chopped and the mixture is smooth, about 1 minute., Serve riht away or cover and refrierate up to 4 hours.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
ingredients: 6 Enlish muffins, 3/4 cup barbecue sauce, 1 1/2 cups chicken (cooked, cut-up), 3/4 cup cheddar cheese (shredded, smoked or reular), 1 bell pepper (chopped)
directions: Wash hands and any cookin surface., Heat oven to 450 °F., Slice Enlish muffins in half and place on unreased, lare cookie sheet., Cut up bell pepper., Spread barbecue sauce on Enlish muffins to within ¼ inch of edes. Top with chicken, cheese and bell pepper., Bake 7 to 12 minutes or until cheese is melted.

name: Berries with Banana Cream
ingredients: 1/3 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 1/2 banana (ripe), 1/2 ounce fruit juice (orange works well), 2 cups sliced strawberries, 1 teaspoon honey, 1 dash cinnamon
directions: Combine yoghurt, banana, and juice and mash with a fork until most chunks are one., Wash and slice strawberries., Top the berries with the yoghurt banana mixture., Top with honey and cinnamon.

name: Black Bean and Sweet Potato Quesadillas
ingredients: nonstick cookin spray, 1 medium sweet potato (cooked and cut into pieces), 1 cup black beans, canned (low-sodium), 1 small onion, 1 clove arlic, 1 1/2 teaspoons round cumin, 1 1/2 teaspoons paprika, 1/2 lare chili pepper, 2 tablespoons sour cream, low-fat OR reduced fat plain yoghurt, 8 whole wheat tortillas, 1/4 cup cheddar cheese, reduced-fat, 1/2 cup baby spinach
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Sauté onion and arlic (usin nonstick cookin spray) in a medium size pan until soft., Add sweet potatoes, black beans, spices, and jalapeno., Heat until just warm., Spread potato mixture over tortilla, then top with baby spinach, cheese, and onion., Top with second tortilla., Heat a pan on hih heat and spray with nonstick cookin spray., Brown quesadilla about one minute on each side until the inside is warm and the cheese is melted.

name: Black Bean Burrito
ingredients: 1 1/3 cups black beans (cooked, mashed with 1 teaspoon canola oil, or use canned vegetarian refried beans), 4 tortillas, corn, 2 tablespoons onion (chopped), 1/2 cup tomatoes (chopped), 1/2 cup salsa, low-sodium, 4 tablespoons yoghurt, non-fat plain, 2 tablespoons cilantro (chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix beans with onion and tomatoes., Microwave tortillas between the two sheets of slihtly damp white paper towels on hih for 15 seconds., Divide bean mixture between the tortillas., Fold each tortilla to enclose fillin., Place on microwave-safe dish and spoon salsa over each burrito., Microwave on hih for 15 seconds., Serve topped with yoghurt and cilantro.

name: Black Bean Salsa
ingredients: 1 can (15.5 oz) black beans (drained and rinsed), 1 reen bell pepper (diced), 1 red bell pepper (diced), 1 onion (diced), 2 cans diced tomatoes (canned, drained), 2 cloves arlic (diced), 2 teaspoons round cumin, 1 teaspoon dried cilantro, 3 tablespoons rice vinear (can use other vinear such as red wine vinear or apple cider vinear)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain and rinse beans., Put beans and tomatoes into lare mixin bowl., Dice peppers, onion, and arlic. Add to mixin bowl., Mix cumin, cilantro, and vinear. Pour on top of beans and vegetables., Stir well.

name: Breakfast Parfait
ingredients: 2 cups pineapple, canned and chopped, 1 cup berries, frozen (thawed), 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 1 banana (peeled and sliced), 1/3 cup raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In lasses or bowls, layer pineapple, berries, yoghurt, banana, and raisins.

name: Bugs on a Log
ingredients: "Logs",1 celery stalk (cut into 3 pieces),apple slices,carrot, raw (sliced into 3 inch pieces),Spread,1 tablespoon cream cheese, low-fat,"Bugs",1 tablespoon raisins (regular or golden),unsweetened whole grain cereal,peanuts (chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Choose one "lo" option and top with a spread., Sprinkle with a "bu."

name: Bulur Chickpea Salad
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups water, 1 cup bulur (coarse, available in bulk from natural foods stores), 1 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/3 tablespoon minced onion, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, reduced sodium, 1/2 cup scallions (chopped, reen onions), 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 cup carrot (chopped), 3/4 cup canned chickpeas (arbanzo beans, drained and rinsed)
directions: Brin water to boil in medium saucepan. Stir in bulur, parsley, minced onion, and soy sauce. Cover and reduce heat; simmer 15-20 minutes (until all water is absorbed and bulur is not too crunchy). Do not overcook., Remove from heat and allow to cool; fluff with fork., Combine dressin inredients; stir well. Pour over bulur mixture and mix well., Stir in scallions, raisins, carrots, and chickpeas. Cover and chill for several hours. Store in refrierator.

name: Butterfly Bite
ingredients: 3 celery (stalks), 12 twist pretzels (lare, 3 rin), 6 tablespoons creamy peanut butter, 3 tablespoons raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Clean celery with vegetable brush under cool runnin water., Cut celery in half cross wise., Fill center of each celery stick with one tablespoon of peanut butter. This is the body of the butterfly, Add two pretzels to form the butterfly’s wins., Use extra pretzel pieces for antenna and raisins for decoration.

name: Buttermilk Scones
ingredients: 1 cup whole-wheat flour, 3/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/3 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup raisins, 4 tablespoons butter, melted (1/4 cup), 2/3 cup buttermilk
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Combine the flours, suar, baking powder, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Mix well., Add raisins and mix lihtly., In a small bowl, combine melted butter and buttermilk. Add liquid inredients to flour mixture; mix ently., Spoon douh into 9 equal mounds on a reased baking sheet. Bake until well browned, 18 to 20 minutes., Serve hot or at room temperature. Best eaten the same day you bake them.

name: Celery with Apricot Blue Cheese Spread
ingredients: 2 tablespoons crumbled blue cheese, 3 tablespoons fat-free cream cheese, 1/2 cup fat-free yoghurt (plain), 4 dried apricots, 4 dried fis or dates, 1/4 cup pecans, 8 stalks celery
directions: Chop dried fruit and pecans., Mix blue cheese, cream cheese, and yoghurt with a fork or hand mixer until smooth., Stir in chopped, dried fruit and pecans. Refrierate spread until ready for use., Slice celery stalks into 3-4 inch sticks., Fill celery pieces with spread.

name: Cherry Pineapple Delight
ingredients: 2 cups water (boilin), 1 packae elatin (8 serving size, cherry, suar-free), 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 can (20 oz) pineapple chunks (in juice, not drained), 2 cans (11 oz) mandarin oranges (in liht syrup, drained), 16 ice cubes (lare)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Pour boilin water into a lare bowl. Add the elatin and cinnamon to boilin water. Stir for at least 2 minutes until elatin is completely dissolved., Drain pineapple, reserving the juice. Add enouh ice (or cold water) to the juice to measure 1 1/2 cups. Add the elatin mixture and stir until the ice is completely melted., Refrierate for about 45 minutes or until the elatin is slihtly thickened (consistency of unbeaten e white)., Reserve 1/4 cup each of the pineapple and orange. Add remainin pineapple and oranges to the elatin. Pour into 1 1/2 quart serving bowl., Refrierate for 4 hours or until firm. Garnish with reserved pineapple and oranges.

name: Cherry Puff Pancake
ingredients: 3 es, 1/2 cup fat free (skim) milk (or 1% milk), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon suar, 1/8 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 tablespoons mararine (or butter), 2 cups halved, pitted sweet cherries, fresh or frozen, thawed and drained, ¼ cup sliced almonds (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 450 °F., In a medium bowl or blender, beat the es, milk, and vanilla toether until well blended., Mix the flour, suar, and cinnamon toether. Add to the liquid inredients and mix until there are no lumps., Put mararine or butter in a 10- or 11-inch oven proof skillet or a 2 1/2- to 3-quart baking dish. Place the skillet or dish in the hot oven until the mararine or butter is melted and bubbly. Remove from the oven. Quickly spread the cherries across the bottom of the hot skillet or dish., Pour the batter over the cherries and sprinkle with almond slices, if usin., Return to the oven and bake for 15 to 20 minutes until the edes are browned and the puffs in the middle are olden. Cool slihtly before cuttin into 4 pieces. The center puffs will flatten durin coolin.

name: Cherry Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup pitted and halved sweet cherries, 1 cup cubed cantaloupe, 1 cup halved reen rapes, 1 medium banana, peeled and sliced, 1/4 cup orange juice (juice from 1/2 orange), 1/4 cup flaked coconut (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, mix toether the cut fruit., Pour orange juice over fruit and stir in coconut, if desired.

name: Chickpea Dip
ingredients: 3 arlic cloves, 1/4 cup yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 1 tablespoon lemon juice (fresh), 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 1 can (19 oz) chickpeas (drained arbanzo beans)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put all inredients into a food processor and blend until smooth., Serve at room temperature with pita chips, crackers, carrots, or other dippin vegetables.

name: Chili Popcorn
ingredients: 4 cups popcorn, 1 tablespoon mararine (melted), 1 teaspoon chili powder, teaspoon arlic powder (dash)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix popcorn and mararine in a bowl., Mix seasonins thorouhly and sprinkle over popcorn. Mix well., Serve immediately and enjoy with family and friends.

name: Chocolate Chip Yoghurt Cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup suar, 1/2 cup brown suar (firmly packed), 1/2 cup mararine, 1/2 cup yoghurt (non-fat, plain), 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla, 3/4 cup flour (all-purpose), 1 cup flour (whole wheat), 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 cup chocolate chips (miniature, or carob chips)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat oven to 375 °F., In a lare bowl combine suar, brown suar and mararine; beat until liht and fluffy., Add yoghurt and vanilla; blend well. Stir in flour and baking soda; mix well. Stir in chocolate chips., Drop douh by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto un-reased cookie sheets. Bake at 375 °F for 8 to 12 minutes or until liht and olden brown., Cool 1 minute, remove from cookie sheets.

name: Chunky Garbanzo Bean Dip
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) arbanzo beans, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons chopped onions, lemon pepper (to taste), salt (to taste)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain and rinse the beans and mash in a small bowl with a fork or potato masher until most of the beans have been crushed. If you have a food processor, you can use it for this step., Stir in oil and onion alon with lemon pepper and salt to taste. The mixture will be chunky, not smooth.

name: Cinnamon-Raisin Breakfast Mix
ingredients: 1/4 cup suar, 1 teaspoon round cinnamon, 1/4 cup mararine, tub-style, 1 1/2 cups square, whole-rain corn cereal, 1 1/2 cups square, whole-rain rice cereal, 1 1/2 cups square, whole-rain wheat cereal, 1/2 cup raisins or dried cranberries
directions: In small bowl, mix suar and cinnamon; set aside. , In lare microwavable bowl, microwave butter uncovered on HIGH about 40 seconds, or until melted., Stir in cereals until evenly coated. Microwave uncovered 2 minutes, stirrin after 1 minute. , Sprinkle half of the suar mixture evenly over cereals; stir. Sprinkle with remainin suar mixture; stir., Microwave uncovered 1 minute., Stir in raisins or dried cranberries. Spread on paper towels to cool.

name: Cookie Cutter Appetizers
ingredients: 1 whole wheat tortilla, 2 tablespoons cream cheese, low-fat, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 cup chopped vegetables (recommended: broccoli, carrots, red pepper, reen onion)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F., Cut out multiple shapes from 1 whole wheat tortilla usin cookie cutters., Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick cookin spray., Place cut out tortilla shapes onto cookie sheet., Bake in oven for 12 to 15 minutes or until olden brown., While tortillas are baking, mix low-fat cream cheese with arlic powder. Set aside., Wash and chop mixed vegetables., Once tortilla cut outs are finished baking, let cool., Spread the cream cheese mixture onto each cut out shape and decorate with mixed vegetables.

name: Corn Toasties
ingredients: 2 cups cornmeal, 1 cup all-purpose flour (sifted), 2 tablespoons suar, 1 1/2 tablespoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 3/4 cup buttermilk (made from 2 teaspoons vinear + 3/4 cup milk, made from non-fat dry milk powder), 1/4 cup e mix (dry, mixed with 1/4 cup water), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, combine cornmeal, flour, suar, baking powder, salt, and baking soda., In another bowl, combine buttermilk, e mix, and vegetable oil. Beat until well blended., Add buttermilk mixture all at once to dry inredients. Stir until well mixed., Turn mixture onto a lihtly floured board and knead only 10 times., Roll out to a thickness of 1/4 inch and cut with a 3/4-inch-round cutter., Cook on a warm unreased riddle or fryin pan for about 10 minutes on each side.

name: Cranberry Pumpkin Muffins
ingredients: 2 cups flour, 3/4 cup suar, 3 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 3/4 teaspoon allspice, 1/3 cup vegetable oil, 2 es (lare), 3/4 cup pumpkin (canned), 2 cups cranberries (fresh or frozen chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 °F., Sift toether dry inredients (flour throuh allspice) and set aside., Beat oil, es, and pumpkin toether until well blended., Add the wet inredients (pumpkin mixture) to the dry inredients all at once. Stir until moistened., Fold in chopped cranberries., Spoon into paper lined muffin cups.

name: Crispy Taquitos
ingredients: 3 servings Pico de Gallo, 1/2 cup chicken (cooked, finely chopped), 1/2 cup corn (no salt added, canned or frozen, thawed), 1/4 cup reen onion (chopped), 1/4 cup bell pepper (reen, chopped), 1/2 cup cheddar cheese (shredded, reduced fat, or Monterey jack or queso fresco), 12 corn tortillas, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Heat oven to 425 °F. In a medium bowl, combine 1 cup Pico de Gallo, chicken, corn, reen onion, bell pepper, and cheese., Soften tortillas on the stovetop or in the microwave oven, and spoon a heapin tablespoon of fillin onto the center of each tortilla. Roll up tihtly and secure each with a toothpick., Place rolled tortillas seam side down on a baking sheet and brush each lihtly with oil. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until crisp and lihtly browned., Place 3 taquitos on each plate and serve with remainin Pico de Gallo.

name: Crunchy Berry Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 1 cup blueberries or strawberries (fresh or frozen thawed), 1/2 cup low-fat ranola (or crunchy cereal)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Spoon yoghurt into lass., Top with fruit and ranola.

name: Crunchy Vegetable Wraps
ingredients: 4 tablespoons cream cheese, low-fat, 2 flour tortillas, 1/6 tablespoon Ranch seasonin mix (1/2 teaspoon), 1/4 cup broccoli (washed and chopped), 1/4 cup carrot (peeled and rated), 1/4 cup zucchini (washed and cut into small strips), 1/4 cup summer squash (yellow, washed and cut into small strips), 1/2 tomato (diced), 1/8 cup reen bell pepper (seeded and diced), 2 tablespoons chives (chopped fine)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a small bowl, stir ranch seasonin into cream cheese; chill., Wash and chop vegetables., Steam broccoli in microwave for 1 minute with 1 tablespoon of water., Spread cream cheese onto flour tortilla, stayin one inch from ede. Sprinkle vegetables over cream cheese. Roll tortilla tihtly., Chill for 1 to 2 hours before serving (the wrap will hold its shape better). With a sharp knife slice into circles and serve.

name: Cucumber, Yoghurt and Herb Dip
ingredients: 2 cups yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 2 cucumbers (medium, peeled, seeded, and rated), 1/2 cup sour cream (non-fat), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon dill (fresh), 1 arlic clove (chopped), 1 cup cherry tomatoes, 1 cup broccoli florets, 1 cup carrots (baby)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel, seed, and rate one cucumber. Slice other cucumber and set aside., Mix yoghurt, rated cucumber, sour cream, lemon juice, dill, and arlic in a serving bowl. Chill for 1 hour., Arrane tomatoes, cucumbers, broccoli, and carrots on a colorful platter. Serve with cucumber dip.

name: Curry Vegetable Dip
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 1/4 cup carrots (shredded), 2 tablespoons reen onions (minced), 1 tablespoon salad dressin (mayonnaise-type), 1 teaspoon suar, 1/4 teaspoon curry powder, 1 dash pepper
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix inredients in a bowl., Chill., Serve with crisp raw vegetables pieces, such as celery, carrot, or summer squash sticks.

name: Delicious Oven French Fries
ingredients: 2 potatoes (lare, about 2 pounds), 8 cups water (ice), 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon white pepper (round), 1/4 teaspoon allspice, 1 teaspoon pepper flakes (hot), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
directions: Scrub potatoes and cut into 1/2 inch strips., Place potato strips into ice water, cover, and chill for 1 hour or loner., Remove potatoes and dry strips thorouhly., Place arlic powder, onion powder, salt, white pepper, allspice, and pepper flakes in plastic ba., Toss potatoes in spice mixture., Brush potatoes with oil., Place potatoes in nonstick shallow baking pan., Cover with aluminum foil and place in 475 °F oven for 15 minutes., Remove foil and continue baking uncovered for additional 15 to 20 minutes or until olden brown. Turn fries occasionally to brown on all sides.

name: Dried Bananas
ingredients: 1 banana, acidic fruit juice (lemon, lime, orange, pineapple) to reduce brownin (optional), cinnamon or other flavorins (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Slice bananas into 1/8 to 1/4-inch slices., (Optional) Dip banana slices into fruit juice to reduce brownin. Sprinkle with cinnamon or other flavorins if desired., Dry until pieces bend like thick leather and no loner feel sticky.

name: Dutch Apple Yoghurt Dessert
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 1/2 cup applesauce, unsweetened, 1 tablespoon raisins (seedless), 1/8 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1 teaspoon brown suar, 1 tablespoon nuts (as toppin or crunchy cereal)
directions: Wash hands thorouhly with warm water and soap., Combine all inredients in a small bowl., Cover and refrierate until chilled., Eat and enjoy as a snack or as a dessert.

name: Eale Nest
ingredients: 2 canned peach halves, 2 tablespoons cottae cheese, low-fat (1 ounce), 1/2 tablespoon raisins (6 raisins)
directions: Wash hands; et out inredients and utensils., Place one peach half, cut side up, in center of plate for nest., Place 1 tablespoon of cottae cheese in center of nest., Place raisins on cottae cheese to make es., Enjoy your Eale Nest.

name: Easiest Banana Ice Cream
ingredients: 2 1/2 bananas (can use 2-3 bananas), 3 tablespoons 1% milk, chocolate syrup (optional)
directions: When bananas have become very ripe, peel and slice them into medium size round pieces. Place on a plastic wrap covered baking sheet and put in freezer overnight., Place frozen bananas in a food processor or blender with a small splash of milk (not over 1/4 cup total)., Pulse food processor or blender until bananas bein to break up. They will be tiny balls of bananas at this point., Usin a spoon or rubber spatula, scrape down the banana mixture. Continue runnin the food processor until the mixture is smooth and creamy. This may take a few minutes. The ice cream will look and tasted like soft serve ice cream when finished., Serve in an ice cream cone or in a small bowl with a small ribbon of chocolate syrup on top (optional).

name: Easy Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 can fruit cocktail (16 ounce, drained), 2 banana (sliced), 2 orange (cut into bite-size pieces), 2 apple (cut into bite-size pieces), 1 yoghurt, low-fat piña colada (8 ounces)
directions: Mix fruit in a lare bowl., Add yoghurt and mix well., Chill in refrierator before servin.

name: Enlish Muffin Veggie Pizza
ingredients: 1 cup broccoli (cooked chopped), 4 Enlish muffins, 1 cup pizza sauce (or spahetti sauce), 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded, part skim, 1/4 cup carrot (4 tablespoons, shredded), 1/3 tablespoon Parmesan cheese (1 teaspoon, rated)
directions: Cut the broccoli to make 1 cup of chopped broccoli., Put the broccoli in a saucepan with water. Cook on medium until tender., Drain the water from the saucepan. Let the broccoli cool., Cut 4 Enlish muffins in half. Toast the 8 muffin halves., Shred the mozzarella cheese to make 1/2 cup of shredded cheese., Peel and shred the carrots to make 3 tablespoons shredded carrots., Spoon 2 tablespoons pizza sauce over each Enlish muffin half., Sprinkle 1 tablespoon shredded mozzarella cheese on top of each half., Put 2 tablespoons broccoli and 1 teaspoon shredded carrots on top of each half., Sprinkle each half with 1 teaspoon rated parmesan cheese., Toast in the toaster oven for 2 minutes, until the cheese melts.

name: Fabulous Fi Bars
ingredients: 3 cups dried fis (chopped, 16 ounces), 1/2 cup walnuts (chopped), 1/3 cup suar, 1/4 cup orange juice (juice from 1/2 orange), 2 tablespoons hot water, 1/2 cup mararine (softened, or butter), 1 cup packed brown suar, 1 lare e, 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 1/4 cups old fashioned rolled oats
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 °F. Lihtly rease a 9x13 inch baking pan., Combine fis, walnuts, suar, orange juice, and hot water in a mixin bowl and set aside., Mix toether mararine or butter and brown suar until creamy. Add e and mix until smooth., Mix flour and baking soda. Stir into e mixture. Blend in oats to make soft douh., Reserve 1 cup of douh for toppin. With floured finertips, press the remainin douh into a thin layer on the bottom of the baking pan., Spread fi mixture evenly over the douh. Crumble reserved douh over top, allowin fi mixture to show., Bake 30 minutes or until olden brown. Cool completely in baking pan. Cut into 24 bars (about 2 1/2 x 2 inches).

name: Fiesta Hummus
ingredients: 1 can arbanzo beans, 1/2 teaspoon cumin, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 dash cayenne pepper, 2 arlic cloves (minced), 1/2 cup yoghurt (plain, non-fat), 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1 jalapeno pepper (finely chopped), 2 tablespoons cilantro (chopped)
directions: Drain and mash arbanzo beans in blender, food processor, or with fork. Add remainin inredients., Blend until smooth., Chill one hour or overnight., Serve on crackers or tortilla chips. Promptly refrierate leftovers.

name: Fiesta Mix
ingredients: 1 cup cereal with fruit (flakes with raisins type), 1 cup bran cereal (chex type), 1 cup cereal ("O" type), 1/4 cup raisins, 1/4 cup peanuts, 1/4 cup shredded coconut
directions: Mix cereals toether in a lare bowl., Add raisins, peanuts, and coconut; mix well., Eat it dry or with milk.

name: Food Group Funny Face
ingredients: 1 tablespoon peanut butter, 1 raham cracker (lare, or use whole rain or saltine crackers), 1 tablespoon cheddar cheese (shredded), 3 raisins, 2 peas (lare reen), 1/2 rape (cut in half)
directions: Spread peanut butter on a cracker in the shape of a face., Sprinkle rated cheese at top for hair., Place raisins on cracker for mouth., Use peas for eyes and 1/2 rape for nose.

name: Fresh Fruit with Cinnamon Yoghurt Dip
ingredients: 1 apple, 1 banana, 1 orange, 1/4 cup orange juice, 1 cup vanilla yoghurt (low-fat), 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Core and slice the apple., Slice banana into thin circles., Peel the orange and break it into sections., Pour the orange juice into a small bowl., Dip the fruit pieces into the orange juice to prevent brownin., Arrane on a plate., Mix the yoghurt and cinnamon in a small bowl., Put the bowl of yoghurt and cinnamon next to the fruit. Use it as a dip for the fruit.

name: Frozen Banana Pops
ingredients: 2 bananas, ripe, 1/8 cup orange juice or lemon juice (2 Tablespoons)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Peel each banana and cut in half (width-wise)., Insert craft stick into bottom of each banana half. Dip each banana half into juice., Wrap in foil and freeze for two or more hours.

name: Frozen Fruit Cups
ingredients: 3 bananas, 3 cartons yoghurt, non-fat strawberry (8 ounces each), 10 ounces strawberries, frozen (thawed and undrained), 8 ounces crushed pineapple (undrained, canned)
directions: Line 18 muffin-tin cups with paper baking cups., Dice or mash bananas and place in a lare mixin bowl., Stir in remainin inredients., Spoon into muffin-tin cups and freeze at least 3 hours or until firm. Remove frozen cups and store in a plastic ba in freezer., Before servin, remove paper cups and let stand 10 minutes.

name: Frozen Fruit Pops
ingredients: 1 cup crushed pineapple, 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat fruit (8 ounces), 6 us fluid ounces orange juice, frozen concentrate (thawed)
directions: Mix the inredients in a medium-size bowl. Divide into 4 paper cups., Freeze until slushy - about 60 minutes. Insert a wooden stick half way throuh the center of each fruit pop., Freeze until hard or at least 4 hours. Peel away the paper cup before you eat the fruit pop.

name: Fruit and Peanut Butter Dip
ingredients: 1 cup apple slices, 1 cup banana slices, 1 cup pear slices, 1 cup rapes, 1 cup strawberries, 1 cup melon slices, 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat plain, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 1/3 cup peanut butter
directions: Prepare fruit by washin and slicin if necessary., Arrane fruit on a plate around a small bowl., To make dip, combine yoghurt, vanilla, and peanut butter in a small bowl., Mix well., Chill dip in refrierator until ready to serve.

name: Fruit and Yoghurt Breakfast Shake
ingredients: 1 banana (medium, very ripe, peeled), 3/4 cup pineapple juice, 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 1/2 cup strawberries (remove stems and rinse)
directions: Blend banana with pineapple juice, yoghurt and strawberries in a blender., Blend until smooth., Divide shake between 2 lasses and serve immediately.

name: Fruit Compote
ingredients: 1 cup pineapple chunks (8 ounce can), 1 1/2 cups orange juice, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1 banana (medium, peeled and sliced), 1 pear (sliced in cubes), 2 peaches (sliced in cubes)
directions: Drain the juice from the canned pineapple into a small saucepan., Stir in orange juice and cornstarch. Blend until smooth., Brin to a boil over medium heat, stirrin constantly., Let the juice mix cool to room temperature., While the juice mix is coolin, peel and slice the banana. Wash the pear and peaches and cut them into cubes., Pour the cooled juice mix into a lare bowl. Add the pieces of pineapple, banana, pear, and peaches. Stir toether.

name: Fruit Dip
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla (8 oz), 1 us fluid ounce orange juice, 100% juice, frozen concentrate (thawed), 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 1/2 teaspoons brown suar (1/2 tablespoon), 2 apples (red, cored and sliced), 1 pear (cored and sliced), 1 peach (pitted and sliced)
directions: In a small bowl, combine yoghurt, orange juice concentrate, lime juice, and brown suar., Mix well., Place bowl containin dip on a lare plate and surround with fruit.

name: Fruit Dippers
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 2 cups peanuts (chopped), 2 cups fruit (rapes, banana slices, apple wedes, strawberries)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine yoghurt and peanuts. Mix with a spoon., Place a toothpick in the center of each fruit., Dip fruit into the yoghurt peanut mixture.

name: Fruit Juice Slush
ingredients: 12 ounces fruit juice concentrate (100%), 12 us fluid ounces water, 3 cups ice
directions: In a blender, place juice concentrate, water, and half of ice., To prevent spillae, do not pass the top line of the blender., Blend while radually addin remainin ice. Serve.

name: Fruit Kabob
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups ripe banana slices (about 16 slices), 1 1/2 cups watermelon cubes (about 16 cubes), 1 cup clementine sections (about 16 sections)
directions: Thread the fruit onto the skewers, alternatin and arranin the pieces however you like., Serve riht away.

name: Fruit Kabobs with Yoghurt Dip
ingredients: 1 cup watermelon (chunks), 1 cup pineapple (chunks), 1 cup rapes, red seedless, 1 cup strawberries (stemmed), 2 kiwifruits (peeled and cut into quarters)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place fruit chunks on bamboo skewers. Place fruit kabobs on platter., Place liht strawberry yoghurt in bowl. Serve kabobs with yoghurt on the side.

name: Fruit Milk Shakes
ingredients: 1 cup milk (or water), 1/2 cup non-fat dry milk, 2 bananas (ripe, or 1/3 cup orange juice concentrate), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 10 lare ice cubes
directions: Place everythin toether into a blender., Blend for 30 seconds to 1 minute.

name: Fruit Pizza To Go
ingredients: 1 Enlish muffin (whole wheat), 2 tablespoons whipped fat-free strawberry cream cheese, 2 strawberries, sliced, 2 rapes, sliced, 2 slices mandarin oranges
directions: Toast the Enlish muffin until olden brown. Spread cream cheese on toasted muffin., Arrane sliced strawberries, rapes, and orange slices on top of the cream cheese.

name: Fruit Salsa
ingredients: 1 cup strawberries (diced), 1 banana (diced), 1 kiwifruit (peeled and diced), 1 apple (cored and diced), 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/4 cup suar, 1/4 teaspoon nutme, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine fruits in a medium mixin bowl and add lemon juice., Stir in suar, nutme, and cinnamon. Mix well., Refrierate until serving time.

name: Fruit Slush
ingredients: 2 2/3 cups cantaloupe or watermelon (coarsely chopped, seeded, peeled), kiwifruit (1 2/3 cup coarsely chopped, optional), suar (2 tablespoons, optional), 2 tablespoons lime juice, 2 cups water, ice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a blender, puree fruit with suar and lime juice until smooth., Combine fruit mixture and water in a lare pitcher., If desired, pour throuh a strainer to eliminate pulp., Cover and refrierate for up to a week., To serve, stir well and pour into tall lasses over ice.

name: Fruit Smoothie II
ingredients: 3 cups strawberries, frozen (or other frozen fruit), 2 cups milk, low-fat, 1 banana, lare, 1 cup yoghurt (plain or vanilla)
directions: Defrost the frozen fruit just enouh so that it will blend easily., Pour the milk into the blender., Add the pieces of frozen fruit to the milk in the blender., Add the banana and yoghurt., Blend until smooth, about 30 to 45 seconds.

name: Fruit Snake
ingredients: 2 bananas (medium), 4 raisins
directions: Wash hands; et out inredients and utensils., Peel banana and use butter knife to cut banana in half lenthwise., Place 2 banana halves on small plate end to end, in an "s" shape., Add raisins to the top of banana as eyes., Enjoy your Fruit Snake.

name: Fruit Yoghurt Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 cup yoghurt, fruit-flavored (low-fat), 1/2 banana (medium), 1/2 cup rape, 1/4 cup dry crunchy cereal (Grape Nuts or ranola cereals are ood)
directions: Peel and slice the banana., Spoon the rapes into a tall plastic cup., Put 3 spoonsful of yoghurt on top of the rapes., Spoon sliced bananas on top of the yoghurt., Add the rest of the yoghurt., Sprinkle the cereal on top.

name: Fruit Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 low fat yoghurt, pina colada (8 ounces), 2 1/2 cups strawberries (sliced frozen, thawed)
directions: Combine inredients. Pour into 3 ounce paper cups., Freeze about 30 minutes; then stick a wooden popsicle/ craft stick in the center of each cup., Freeze overnight until firm. To eat pops, peel off paper cups., For variety, try other fruit flavored yoghurts and frozen fruit or fruit juice concentrates.

name: Fruity Thai Pita Pockets
ingredients: 1 can tropical fruit salad in 100% juice (15 ounces), 4 whole-rain pita pockets, 4 cups fresh spinach (torn), 1/4 cup fresh cilantro (optional)
directions: In a colander over a bowl, drain fruit salad well; reserve 3 tablespoons juice., In a small bowl, whisk toether reserved juice, peanut butter, cream cheese, and soy sauce., Place drained fruit, spinach, and cilantro (if desired) in a bowl; mix ently., Add sauce and toss., Slice a small portion off each pita. Tuck the slice inside the bottom of the pita., Fill each pita pocket with the fruit-spinach mixture., Wrap individually in plastic wrap and refrierate. Will keep well overnight.

name: Granola Bars
ingredients: 1 cup honey, 1 cup peanut butter, 3 1/2 cups rolled oats, 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 cup carrot (rated), 1/2 cup coconut
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F., Peel and rate the carrots., Put the honey and peanut butter in a lare saucepan. Cook on low heat until they melt., Remove the pan from the heat. Turn off the burner., Add oatmeal, raisins, carrots, and coconut to the saucepan. Stir well, and let it cool until you can safely touch it with your hands., Put the mix into a 9x13 inch baking pan., Press the mix firmly into the bottom of the pan., Bake for 25 minutes., Cut into 24 bars.

name: Grape Salsa
ingredients: 2 cups cut rapes, 1/2 cup sliced reen onions, 1/2 cup diced Anaheim chili, fresh or canned, 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, 2 tablespoons vinear, 1 clove arlic, minced or 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon hot sauce
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine all inredients in a medium bowl and mix well. Let stand at least 1 hour. Drain off excess liquid before servin.

name: Grilled Fruit
ingredients: 1 cup pineapple chunks, 1 peach (cubed), 1 banana (sliced)
directions: Place fruit chunks on a skewer to make kabobs., Grill or broil on low heat until the fruit is hot and slihtly olden.

name: Grilled Steak and Peppers Salad with Pears
ingredients: 2 cups (4 oz) white-wheat rotini pasta (uncooked), 1 yellow bell pepper, 1 red bell pepper, 1/2 teaspoon olive oil, 12 ounces boneless choice beef top sirloin, 2 pears, 3 cups aruula, 1/4 cup crumbled Goronzola cheese
directions: In a small bowl, whisk olive oil, vinear, rape or apple juice, salt, and herb blend., Boil water and cook pasta accordin to packae instructions. Drain pasta, rinse in cool water., Heat rill, rub peppers with 1/2 tsp olive oil. Grill whole peppers, turnin as needed, until skin beins to brown and bubble. At the same time, rill beef sirloin to 145 °F, turnin once. Remove from rill, let cool slihtly., Slice peppers into strips, discardin seeds and stem. Cut sirloin across the rain into thin slices. Slice pears into thin wedes., Toss aruula and pasta in lare bowl., To serve, evenly divide pasta-aruula onto four plates, arrane beef, peppers, and pears on top, drizzle with vinairette, and sprinkle with crumbled Goronzola cheese.

name: Grilled vegetables
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 arlic cloves (finely chopped), 3 sweet potatoes (cut into 1-inch slices), 3 corn cobs (cut into 2-inch sections), 1 eplant (cut into 1/2-inch slices), 12 reen onions (trimmed)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix oil and arlic in a lare bowl. Add vegetables and toss., Place vegetable on broiler pan or rill. Cook 10 minutes, turnin twice until vegetables are tender., Place vegetables on platter. Serve.

name: Hidin Rabbits
ingredients: 2 celery stalks (each piece cut in half lenthwise), 4 small cauliflower florets (cut in half), 2 tablespoons peanut butter
directions:
1. Place one piece of celery in center of plate with the center facin up.
2. Use a butter knife to spread peanut butter on top edes.
3. Place second piece of celery on top, formin a lo. Cut lo in half. 
4. Repeat steps 1-3 with remainin 2 pieces of celery.
5. Place cauliflower florets on ends of each lo, securin with remainin peanut butter.
6. Enjoy your Hidin Rabbits.

name: Honey Milk Balls
ingredients: 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup peanut butter, 1/2 cup dry milk, non-fat, 1/2 cup cereal (crushed)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix honey and peanut butter., Gradually add dry milk and mix well., Chill for easier handlin., With reased hands, form into small balls., Roll in crushed cereal flakes., Chill until firm., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Honeydew Summer Salad Wedes
ingredients: 1 honeydew melon, 1 packae elatin, lemon flavored (3 ounce), 1/2 cup water (boilin), 1/2 cup water (iced), ice cubes, 1 cup whole strawberries (hulled)
directions: Cut melon in half; scoop out seeds., Pat the inside of the melon dry usin paper towels., Dissolve elatin in boilin water., Combine ice water and ice cubes to make one cup., Add to elatin and stir until slihtly thickened., Remove any un-melted ice., Place each melon half in a small bowl to hold straiht and firm., Place half of strawberries in each melon half., Pour elatin mixture over berries., Cover with plastic wrap and chill until firm, about 3 hours., To serve, cut into wedes.

name: Hummus
ingredients: 2 cups arbanzo beans, cooked (chickpeas), 2 cloves arlic (minced), 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 tablespoon sesame tahini (sesame paste or substitute peanut butter for a sweet taste), 2 tablespoons olive oil
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mash the arbanzo beans until smooth (if you have a blender, put the beans and lemon juice into it and blend)., Add the arlic, lemon juice, tahini and oil. Mix well.\n

name: Kale Chips
ingredients: 1 cup bunch kale (or chard, spinach, or collards), 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil
directions:
1. Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper (optional).
2. Wash and dry kale. With a knife or kitchen scissors, carefully remove the leaves from the thick stems. Tear into bite-size pieces.
3. Place kale pieces on cookie sheet.
4. Drizzle olive oil over kale and then sprinkle with seasonins of choice.
5. Bake 10 to 15 minutes or until kale is crisp and edes are brown but not burned.

name: Layered Black Bean Dip
ingredients: 1 can black beans (15 ounce, drained and rinsed), 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon dried oreano, 1/8 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/2 cup salsa (thick and chunky), 1/2 cup sour cream (liht), 1/4 cup reen onion (chopped), 2 ounces cheddar cheese, reduced fat (rated)
directions: 1. Mash beans and mix with onion powder, dried oreano, arlic powder and cayenne pepper. Spread on a serving dish., 2. Top with salsa, sour cream, reen onions and rated cheese.

name: Leaf Finer Salad
ingredients: 4 iceber lettuce leaves (lare), 1 cucumber (sliced), 1 beet (shredded), 1 carrot, medium (shredded), 6 tablespoons sunflower seeds, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 2 teaspoons balsamic vinear
directions: 1. Lay lettuce leaves on a flat surface. Top each leaf with all inredients: cucumbers, carrots, beets, and sunflower seeds., 2. Drizzle each leaf with olive oil and balsamic vinear., 3. Slowly roll the leaf with all inredients.

name: Lentil Tacos
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups dry lentils (sorted and rinsed), 4 cups water, 1/2 reen pepper (chopped), 4 cloves arlic (minced), hot pepper flakes (1/2 teaspoon, optional), 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1/2 teaspoon basil, 2/3 cup tomato paste, 1/4 cup raisins (optional)
directions: 1. Cook lentils in 3 cups water for 10 minutes., 2. Add remainin inredients and simmer for 30 minutes\n(Add more water if necessary)., 3. Serve with corn tortillas. Can also be served over rice or noodles.

name: Los Blueberry Coffee Cake
ingredients: 1 e, 1/2 cup non-fat milk, 1/2 cup yoghurt, non-fat vanilla, 3 tablespoons canola oil, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 teaspoons lemon peel (rated, yellow only), 2 cups flour, all purpose, 1/2 cup suar, 4 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups fresh (or frozen unsweetened) blueberries
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 400 derees. Position rack in the center of the oven., In a lare bowl whisk toether the e, milk, yoghurt, oil and lemon peel., Sift the flour, suar, baking powder and salt onto the liquid inredients. Usin a fork, stir very lihtly, just until inredients are combined., Gently fold in the blueberries. Pour the batter into an 8- or 9-inch baking pan coated with nonstick spray., In a small bowl combine the toppin inredients. Sprinkle evenly over the cake batter., Bake a 400 derees for 30 to 35 minutes or until the top is lihtly browned and a wooden toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean., Allow the cake to cool in the baking pan on a wire rack for at least 10 minutes., Serve warm or at room temperature.

name: Maical Fruit Salad
ingredients: 1 can pineapple chunks (20 ounce), 1/2 pound rapes, seedless, red or reen, 2 bananas, 1 3/4 cups milk, non-fat or low-fat, 1 packae puddin mix, instant, lemon or vanilla (3 1/2 ounce)
directions: 1. Drain off the juice. Put chunks in a lare bowl., 2. Rinse the rapes and drain. Add the rapes to the bowl., 3. Peel the bananas and cut into bite-sized pieces. Add to the bowl., 4. Pour the milk over the fruit. While slowly stirrin the fruit mixture, sprinkle in the puddin mix., 5. Let the mixture stand for 5 minutes and serve., 6. Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Mano Shake
ingredients: 2 cups milk (low-fat 1%), 1 fresh pitted mano (or 4 Tablespoons of frozen mano juice), 1 banana (medium), 2 ice cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Put all inredients into a blender., Blend until foamy., Serve immediately.

name: Melon and Mint
ingredients: 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1/4 cup fresh mint leaves, 6 teaspoons packed brown suar (2 Tablespoons), 3 cups watermelon cubes, 3 cups honeydew cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Blend lime juice, mint leaves and brown suar toether in a small food processor., Place melon cubes in a bowl. Drizzle dressin over melon and toss ently.

name: Microwave Baked Apple
ingredients: 4 apple (lare, baking), 1/2 cup brown suar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon
directions: 1. Wash apples and remove core., 2. Cut a thin slice off bottom of each apple to form a flat surface. Place apples in a microwave safe baking dish., 3. Mix brown suar and cinnamon in a small dish. Spoon mixture into center of apples., 4. Cover wax paper and microwave on hih power 6 to 10 minutes or until apples are soft.

name: Mias "Crumbs"
ingredients: 4 tortillas (lare), 3 tablespoons canola oil, 1/4 cup bell pepper, 1/4 cup onion, 4 e (lihtly beaten), 4 tablespoons cheddar cheese, low-fat (rated)
directions: Wash hands and cookin area., Tear tortillas into small pieces., Heat oil in a medium-sized pan., Add tortillas and stir until pieces bein to brown., Add peppers and onion; sauté until soft., Add es; stir until the es are cooked., Remove from heat and sprinkle on the rated cheese., Cover the pan and let cheese melt., Serve immediately.

name: Mini Caprese Bites
ingredients: 4 cherry tomatoes, 1 cheese stick, part-skim, 8 fresh basil (leaves), 1 teaspoon olive oil (or other vegetable oil), 1 teaspoon balsamic vinear (or other vinear)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Slice strin cheese into 4 equal parts. , On a toothpick, skewer one cherry tomato, 2 basil leaves, and 1 piece strin cheese. , Drizzle finished kebabs evenly with olive oil and balsamic vinear.

name: Mousse a la Banana
ingredients: 2 tablespoons milk (low-fat, 1%), 4 teaspoons suar, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 banana (medium, cut into quarters), 1 cup yoghurt (plain, low-fat), 8 slices banana slices (1/4 inch)
directions: 1. Place milk, suar, vanilla, and banana in blender. Process 15 seconds at hih speed until smooth., 2. Pour mixture into a small bowl; fold in yoghurt. Chill. Spoon into four dessert dishes; arnish each with two banana slices just before servin.

name: Mozz Totz
ingredients: 12 ounces mozzarella strin cheese (fat-free), 1/2 cup milk (1% low fat), 1/2 teaspoon oreano (dried), 1/2 teaspoon basil (dried), 1/2 cup bread crumbs, 1/2 cup marinara sauce (prepared, warmed), cookin spray (non-stick)
directions: 1. Wash hands with soap and water., 2. Preheat oven to 350°., 3. Line a baking sheet with foil and spray lihtly with cookin spray., 4. Remove cheese from packae and cut into bite size pieces., 5. In a small non-stick skillet mix oreano and basil with bread crumbs., 6. Cook over medium heat, stirrin occasionally until crumbs are lihtly browned, about 5 minutes., 7. Dip each piece of cheese in milk and then into toasted bread crumbs, coatin completely., 8. Place on baking sheet about 1 1/2 inches apart., 9. Spray strin cheese lihtly with non-stick cookin spray., 10. Bake 5-6 minutes or until heated throuh. (cheese may melt slihtly and lose shape. Simply press it back into place)., 11. Dip in warmed marinara sauce and enjoy.

name: No Bake Breakfast Cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup honey (or liht corn syrup), 1/2 cup non-fat dry milk (instant), 1/2 cup raisins (or chopped dates), 1/2 cup creamy peanut butter, 2 1/2 cups crushed flaked cereal
directions: 1. Heat honey and peanut butter in a medium saucepan over low heat. Stir until blended., 2. Remove from heat. Stir in dry milk., 3. Fold in cereal and raisins. Drop by heapin Tablespoons onto waxed paper to form mounds., 4. Cool to room temperature. Store in refrierator.

name: Oat Snack Cakes
ingredients: 6 cups oatmeal (raw), 2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 cup flour (all purpose), 1 cup suar, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 3/4 cup mararine (softened), 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 2 teaspoons vanilla flavorin, 2 e whites (beaten), 1 tablespoon water, 1 cup raisins
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 derees. Mix toether oatmeal, flour, suar, baking soda, salt and cinnamon in a lare bowl., 2. Cut in mararine until mixture resembles coarse meal., 3. Combine oil, vanilla, e whites, and water. Stir into dry inredients and rasins, mixin only until it holds toether., 4. Wash hands thorouhly, then dip in cornmeal or flour. Pinch off pieces of douh and form into balls about 1 inch in diameter., 5. Place balls on baking pan (sprayed with non-stick cookin spray) and press out slihtly to about 1/4 inch in thickness., 6. Bake 15-20 minutes or until lihtly browned. Cool, then store in an airtiht container.

name: Oven-Fried Yucca
ingredients: 1 pound yucca (cassava) (cut into 3-inch sections and peeled (or 1 pound peeled frozen yucca)), 1 cookin spray (as needed, non-stick)
directions: 1. In a kettle, combine the yucca with enouh cold water to cover it by 1 inch. Brin the water to a boil, and slowly simmer the yucca for 20 to 30 minutes, or until it is tender., 2. Preheat oven to 350 F., 3. Transfer the yucca with a slotted spoon to a cuttin board. Let it cool and cut it lenthwise into 3/4-inch wide wedes, discardin the thin woody core., 4. Spray cookie sheet with the nonstick cookin oil spray. Spread yucca wedes on cookie sheet and spray wedes with cookin oil spray. Cover with foil paper and bake for 8 minutes. Uncover and return to oven to bake for an additional 7 minutes.

name: Pea Guacamole
ingredients: 2 cups frozen peas, thawed, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1/2 cup rape tomatoes, halved, 1/4 cup red onion, chopped, 1 can reen chilies, drained, diced (4 oz), 3 tablespoons cilantro (chopped), 1 clove Fresh arlic, minced, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, salt (to taste, optional)
directions: 1. Mash peas until smooth. , 2. Add the lime juice, tomato, onion, reen chilies, cilantro, arlic, salt (if usin), and black pepper. Mix well. , 3. Serve with an assortment of raw vegetables and whole-rain tortilla chips.

name: Peach Cooler
ingredients: 2 cups milk, low-fat, 1 cup canned peaches (drained, or 1 cup of sliced fresh peaches), 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice, 1 nutme (dash, if desired)
