directions: 1. Put the inredients in a blender. Blend well., 2. Sprinkle with nutme if you like., 3. Serve cold.

name: Peachy Peanut Butter Pita Pockets
ingredients: 2 pita pockets (medium, whole wheat), 1/4 cup peanut butter (reduced fat, chunky), 1/2 apple (cored and thinly sliced), 1/2 banana (thinly sliced), 1/2 peach (fresh, thinly sliced)
directions: Cut pitas in half to make 4 pockets and warm in the microwave for about 10 seconds to make them more flexible., Carefully open each pocket and spread a thin layer of peanut butter on the inside walls., Fill with a combination of apple, banana, and peach slices. Serve at room temperature.

name: Peachy Pops
ingredients: 2 peaches, 2/3 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 2 cups orange juice, 6 paper cups, 6 spoons
directions: 1. Use a knife to remove the skin from the peaches, and to chop the peaches., 2. Spoon the peaches into each of the 6 paper cups., 3. Place the yoghurt in a medium mixin bowl., 4. Slowly pour and stir the orange juice into the yoghurt. Mix well., 5. Pour some of the juice and yoghurt mix into each cup to cover the peaches., 6. Place a spoon in the center of each cup., 7. Cut 6 squares of aluminum foil bi enouh to cover the tops of cups. Stab each spoon handle throuh each piece of foil. The foil will hold the spoon in the center of the cup., 8. Place cups in the freezer for at least 4 hours., 9. Just before servin, peel the paper cups away from the pops to eat.

name: Peanut Butter n Fruit-wich
ingredients: 1 slice whole wheat bread, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1/4 apple (thinly sliced, can also use banana), 1/8 Carrot, rated (2 Tablespoons, optional)
directions: Spread 2 Tablespoons peanut butter on bread., Place fruit slices on top., Optional: Top with rated carrot.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Breakfast Shake
ingredients: 1 cup milk (fat free or 1%), 1/2 cup banana (frozen, slices), 1 tablespoon peanut butter, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, cocoa powder (as needed, sweet, optional)
directions: 1. Combine all inredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy., 2. Pour into a tall lass and arnish with a sprinkle of cocoa powder, if desired.

name: Peanut Butter Cereal Bars
ingredients: 1/2 cup honey (see Notes), 1 cup peanut butter, 2 cups rice cereal, 2 cups quick oats, 1 cup raisins or other dried fruit
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a saucepan, brin honey to a boil., Reduce heat to low and stir in peanut butter., Add cereal, oats and raisins; mix well. Remove from heat, Lihtly rease an 8x8-inch baking pan. Press mixture into pan. When cool, cut into 16 bars., Store in an airtiht container for up to a week.

name: Pear Kabobs with Strawberry Dippin Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla, 4 tablespoons strawberry preserves, 2 pears (cored and cut into 1-inch cubes), 2 cups strawberries (stems removed), 2 bananas (cut into 1-inch slices), 1 can pineapple chunks, drained (20 ounces)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a small bowl, combine the vanilla yoghurt and strawberry preserves. Set aside., Thread the fruits by alternatin the pears, strawberries, bananas, and pineapple onto the skewers., Serve the fruit skewers with a dollop of the strawberry sauce on the side.

name: Pear Party Salsa
ingredients: 1 pear (cored and finely chopped), 1 apple (cored and finely chopped), 2 kiwi (cored and finely chopped), 1 orange ( peeled and finely chopped), 2 tablespoons honey, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, cinnamon raham crackers (optional)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine pear, apple, kiwi, and orange in a medium-size bowl., Pour honey and lemon juice over fruit and ently toss., Scoop up bites of fruit salsa usin bites of cinnamon raham crackers (optional).

name: Pear PB&J Bouquet
ingredients: 1 pear, 8 teaspoons peanut butter, 1 1/3 tablespoons strawberry preserves (4 teaspoons), 8 slices whole rain wheat bread
directions: 1. Use a flower-shaped cookie cutter to cut each slide of bread. If bread sticks to cutter, ently push the petals out with your finers., 2. Wash the pear and dry it with a paper towel. Cut the pear in half, and remove the core. Cut each pear half into four slices, then cut each slice into five pieces. You will only use the center three pieces of each slice, so o ahead and eat the end pieces., 3. Spread 1 teaspoon of peanut butter in a circle in the center of each of the flowers. Place 3 pieces of pear on the peanut butter on each flower. Arrane the pears so the skin is facin out and the white centers are touchin in the middle., 4. Drizzle 1/2 teaspoon of strawberry preserves in the center of each flower and over the pears.

name: Pear Rabbit
ingredients: 3 canned pear halves, 1 tablespoon raisin
directions: 1. Wash hands; et out inredients and utensils., 2. Place 2 pear halves, flat side down, on a small plate to make the body., 3. Use butter knife to cut a tail, ears and feet from another pear half. Add each part to the body., 4. Use butter knife to cut one raisin in half and place on small end for eyes., 5. Enjoy your pear rabbit!

name: Pears in a Pod
ingredients: 4 celery stalks (cleaned and cut into 3-inch lon pieces), 1/2 cup creamy peanut butter, 2 pears (cored and cut into chunks)
directions: 1. Spread the peanut butter into the center of the celery pieces., 2. Place the pear chunks on top of the peanut butter., 3. Serve on a plate and enjoy with your friends.

name: Peter Pumpkin Squares
ingredients: 1 can pumpkin (15 ounces), 1 1/2 cups brown suar, packed, 4 es, 3/4 cup oil (cookin), 1 1/2 cups flour (all-purpose), 1 1/2 cups rolled oats, 1 tablespoon round cinnamon, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, mararine or butter (to rease the pan)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 derees., 2. In a medium bowl, stir toether the pumpkin, brown suar, es, and oil. Mix well., 3. In a lare bowl, mix the flour, oats, cinnamon, baking powder, and baking soda., 4. Add the pumpkin mix to the flour mix. Stir well., 5. Grease a 9" x 13" baking pan with butter or mararine., 6. Pour the batter into the reased baking pan., 7. Bake for 30 minutes.

name: Pocket Fruit Pies
ingredients: 4 flour tortillas (8 inch), 2 peaches, pears, or apples (medium), 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 6 teaspoons brown suar, packed, 1/8 teaspoon nutme (round), 2 tablespoons milk (fat-free), suar (optional)
directions: 1. Warm tortillas in microwave or oven to make them easier to handle., 2. Peel and chop fruit into pieces., 3. Place 1/4 of the fruit on half of each tortilla., 4. In a small bowl, stir toether brown suar, cinnamon and nutme. Sprinkle over fruit., 5. Roll up the tortillas, startin at the end with the fruit., 6. Place on an reased baking sheet and make small slashes to allow steam to escape. Brush with milk and sprinkle with additional suar, if desired., 7. Back at 350 deree in oven for 8-12 minutes or until lihtly brown., 8. Serve warm or cool.

name: Popcorn Treats
ingredients: 2 tablespoons mararine (melted, or butter), 5 cups popcorn (popped), 3/4 cup raisins, 1 cup shredded wheat (bite-size), 1 tablespoon suar (brown or white), 1 1/4 teaspoons cinnamon
directions: Pop popcorn., Mix popped corn, raisins, and cereal in a lare bowl., Mix suar and cinnamon in small dish., Drizzle melted mararine or butter over mixture., Add suar and cinnamon mixture., Shake or stir until all inredients are evenly distributed.

name: Potato Cakes
ingredients: 2 cups potatoes (cold, mashed, made from instant potato flakes), 1/2 cup flour (all-purpose, unsifted), 2 tablespoons onion (finely chopped), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
directions: Put mashed potatoes into a bowl., Add flour and onion. Mix well., Pat potato mixture on a lihtly floured board until 1/2 inch thick., Cut with a 3-inch-round cutter., Place on a baking sheet, cover and refrierate until just before cookin., Heat oil in a fryin pan or riddle., Fry cakes over medium heat, turnin to brown on both sides. Serve immediately.

name: Potato Skins with Buffalo Chicken
ingredients: 12 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast, 1 cup water, 4 medium russet potatoes (about 6 oz each), 9 teaspoons hot pepper sauce, 1/4 cup non-fat milk, 1/4 cup fat-reduced sour cream, 2 tablespoons mararine, 1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese, 2 reen onions, 2 medium tomatoes, 4 celery stalks
directions: Center oven rack and preheat oven to 425 °F., Place chicken in a sauté pan, add water, and cover. Simmer for 20 minutes and remove from pan; let cool slihtly. When chicken is cool enouh to handle, shred usin two forks, one in each hand., While chicken is simmerin, wash and scrub potatoes with a clean vegetable brush under runnin water and slit each one lenthwise about 1-inch deep., Place potatoes in a microwave-safe dish and microwave on hih, uncovered, for about 10 minutes. Let cool slihtly., Slice each potato in half lenth-wise, scoop out potato, leavin a 1/4 inch shell. Mash potato toether with hot pepper sauce, sour cream, mararine, and milk. Fold in blue cheese and shredded chicken., Spoon mixture into potato skins slihtly dentin center (to hold fresh toppins after baking)., Place filled potato skins on a 9x13" baking sheet and bake about 15-20 minutes until tops are olden brown., Dice tomatoes and reen onions. Cut celery stalks into four inch sticks., To serve, top potatoes with onions and tomatoes. Serve celery sticks on the side for scoopin potato contents.

name: Pretzel Shapes
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dry yeast, 1/2 cup water (warm), 1 teaspoon honey, 1 1/3 cups flour, 1 teaspoon salt
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 425 derees., 2. In a small bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water, add honey and let set for a few minutes., 3. In a lare mixin bowl, measure flour and salt., 4. Add yeast mixture to flour mixture and stir until it forms a smooth ball. Add a little more flour if the douh is sticky., 5. Knead douh on countertop or douh board until it forms a smooth ball. Add a little flour if the douh is sticky., 6. Divide douh into 12 pieces about the size of a walnut. Roll each ball into a snake and then twist to make a pretzel, letter or other fun shape., 7. Place pretzels on a baking sheet lihtly coated with cookin spray. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes until olden brown.

name: Pumpkin Bread
ingredients: 1 can pumpkin (15 ounce), 1 cup suar, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 1 1/2 cups flour (all purpose), 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup raisins
directions: Preheat oven to 350 derees., 1. In a lare mixin bowl, beat toether pumpkin, suar, oil, and yoghurt., 2. In a medium bowl, combine the flours, baking powder, soda, cinnamon, and salt; add to pumpkin mixture, stirrin until just moistened., 3. Stir in raisins., 4. Pour into 2 reased 9x5x3 inch loaf pans and bake for about 1 hour., 5. Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes; remove from pan and cool completely.

name: Pumpkin Cookies
ingredients: 1 3/4 cups pumpkin (pureed, cooked), 1 1/2 cups brown suar, 2 es, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 1/4 cups whole wheat flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 1 teaspoon nutme, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon round iner, 1 cup raisins, 1 cup walnuts (chopped)
directions: Preheat oven to 400 °F., Mix pumpkin, brown suar, es, and oil thorouhly., Blend dry inredients and add to pumpkin mixture., Add raisins and nuts., Drop by teaspoonfuls on reased cookie sheet., Bake 10 to 12 minutes until olden brown.

name: Pumpkin Puddin
ingredients: 1 can pumpkin (15 ounces, or 2 cups cooked mashed squash such as Hubbard), 2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice (or 1 teaspoon cinnmamon, 1/2 teaspoon iner, 1/4 teaspoon nutme and 1/4 teaspoon cloves), 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups milk (1% low-fat), 1 vanilla puddin (instant, 3.5 oz (small box))
directions: 1. Remember to start by washin your hands. In a lare bowl mix pumpkin, salt and pumpkin spice toether., 2. Slowly stir in milk and mix well. Add instant puddin mix and stir for 2 minutes until it thickens. Refrierate until serving time.

name: Rise and Shine Cobbler
ingredients: 1 cup peaches (canned, drained and sliced), 1 cup pear halves (canned, drained and sliced), 6 prunes (pitted, each cut in half), 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 orange, 1 cup ranola, low-fat
directions: In a lare microwave-safe bowl, mix peaches, pears, prunes, and vanilla extract., Rub an orange aainst a rater to remove 1 teaspoon of the orange peel. Then, cut the orange in half and squeeze 1/4 cup orange juice. Add orange peel and juice to fruit mixture. Stir., Top with ranola., Microwave on hih for 5 minutes. Let stand for 2 minutes., Spoon into 4 bowls and serve warm.

name: Roasted Pumpkin Seed Snack Mix
ingredients: 2 cups crispy rice or wheat cereal squares, 1/2 cup roasted whole pumpkin seeds, 1/3 cup slivered almonds, 1/2 cup dried cranberries, 1/2 cup raisins
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Mix all inredients toether and serve.

name: Salmon Spread
ingredients: 1 can salmon (about 15 1/2 ounce), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon horseradish, 1 cup yoghurt, fat-free plain, 1 tablespoon dill weed (dried), 4 reen onion (chopped, or 1/4 cup onion, or onion powder to taste), parsley (for arnish)
directions:
1. Drain salmon and flake with a fork into a bowl.
2. Mix in all other inredients.
3. Serve on bread, crackers, or a rice cake.
4. Sprinkle chopped parsley to arnish.

name: Simple Fish Tacos
ingredients: 1/2 cup sour cream (non-fat), 1/4 cup mayonnaise (fat-free), 1/2 cup fresh cilantro (chopped), 1/2 packet taco seasonin (divided), 1 pound cod or white fish fillets (cut into 1 inch pieces), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 cups red and reen cabbae (shredded), 2 cups tomato (diced), 12 corn tortillas (6-inch, warmed), lime wedes (for servin)
directions: 1. In a small bowl, combine sour cream, mayonnaise, cilantro, and 2 Tbsp seasonin mix., 2. In a medium bowl, combine cod, vegetable oil, lemon juice, and remainin seasonin mix; pour into lare skillet. Cook stirrin constantly, over medium-hih heat for 4-5 minutes or until cod flakes easily when tested with a fork., 3. Fill warm tortillas with fish mixture., 4. Top with cabbae, tomato, sour cream mixture, lime wedes, and taco sauce.

name: Sloppy Garden Joes
ingredients: 1 yellow onion (chopped), 1 carrot (chopped or shredded), 1 reen pepper (chopped), 1 pound round turkey (or chicken), 1 can tomato sauce (8 ounces, unsalted), 1 can whole tomatoes (14.5 ounces, crushed), 4 cans mushrooms (2 ounces each, drained), 1/4 cup barbecue sauce, 6 whole wheat buns (split in half to make 12)
directions: 1. Saute onions, carrots, reen pepper and round turkey or chicken in a pan over medium-heat for 5 minutes., 2. Add tomato sauce, crushed tomatoes, mushrooms, barbecue sauce, and seasonins and brin to boil., 3. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes, stirrin occasionally., 4. Uncover and cook for an additional 3 minutes or until thick., 5. Serve open-faced on toasted or plain whole-wheat buns., 6. Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: Soft Pretzels
ingredients: 1 tablespoon yeast, cup warm water (100-110 derees F), 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 e, 1 tablespoon suar, 2 sesame seeds (2 Tablespoons, optional)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. Lihtly rease 2 baking sheets., 2. In lare bowl, sprinkle yeast over warm water (if water is too hot, it will kill the yeast). Stir until well blended., 3. Combine white and wheat flour in a separate bowl., 4. Stir in suar, ½ teaspoon salt and 2½ to 3 cups flour to make a soft, sticky douh. Turn douh onto well-floured surface., 5. To knead, fold douh in half and push douh flat with heels of hands. Turn douh 1/4 turn. Repeat for 5 to 7 minutes. If needed, add more flour until douh is smooth and elastic. Douh should not stick to hands or counter., 6. Cut douh into 12 even pieces (about olf-ball size)., To Form Pretzels:\n1. Roll one piece of douh into 15 inch lon rope., 2. Cross left side over middle, creatin loop., 3. Fold riht side of rope up and over first loop to form pretzel shape., To Bake:\n1. Place pretzels 3 inch apart on baking sheet. Enlare holes in pretzels by insertin finer into holes. This will prevent them from closin durin baking., 2. In small bowl, mix e and 1 Tablespoon water toether. Brush on pretzels. Sprinkle with sesame seeds., 3. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until olden brown. Best if eaten warm.

name: Speedy Burritos
ingredients: 4 cups potatoes (finely chopped), 1 onion (chopped), 1 bell pepper (red or reen, chopped), 3 arlic cloves (pressed or finely chopped), 2 es (beaten), 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 cheddar cheese (1/2 cup rated, optional), hot sauce (as needed, or salsa), 9 tortillas (flour or corn)
directions:
1. In a lare skillet, heat oil on medium-hih settin.
2. Add onion, reen pepper, potatoes, and arlic. Cook until potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes. Raw potatoes may need loner; check if done with a fork.
3. Reduce heat to medium settin, spread potato mix out to the sides of the skillet, leavin a space in the middle for the es. Add the es and scramble them until cooked (do not mix potatoes until es are cooked firm). Stir all inredients toether.
4. Wrap tortillas around the fillin and top with salsa and cheese.

name: Spicy Fruit Cup
ingredients: 2 cups strawberries (fresh), 1 can mandarin orange sections (16 ounce), 1 can pears (16 ounce), 1 cup pineapple chunks, in its own juice (16 ounce can), 1 cup juice, orange, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon (round), 1/4 teaspoon nutme (round)
directions: 1. Cut the strawberries in half., 2. Open the can of mandarin oranges. Drain off the syrup., 3. Open the can of pears. Drain off the juice. Slice the pears., 4. Open the can of pineapple, but don’t drain off the juice., 5. Put the undrained pineapple, orange juice, cinnamon, and nutme in a mixin bowl. Stir toether., 6. Carefully stir in the mandarin oranges, pears, and strawberries., 7. Refrierate for 1 to 4 hours before servin.

name: Spinach Black Bean Salad
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vinear, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon dried oreano, 1/2 teaspoon dried basil, 1/8 round nutme (1/8 teaspoon, optional), 2 cups spinach (washed), 1 1/2 cups Black beans, low-sodium, canned, drained and rinsed, 2 tomatoes (chopped), 1 red onion (small, chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In a lare bowl, combine vinear, oil, mustard, arlic, oreano, basil and nutme., Wash, drain and chop spinach., Add spinach, black beans, tomatoes and onions to vinear and oil. Toss well and serve.

name: Springtime Cereal
ingredients: 3/4 cup wheat and barley nuet cereal, 1/4 cup bran cereal (100%), 2 tablespoons sunflower seeds (2 teaspoons, toasted), 2/3 tablespoon almonds (2 teaspoons, toasted, sliced), 1 tablespoon raisins, 1/2 cup banana (sliced), 1 cup strawberries (sliced), 1 cup yoghurt (raspberry or strawberry, low-fat)
directions: 1. Mix the wheat and barley nuet cereal, bran cereal, sunflower seeds, and almonds in a medium bowl., 2. Add the raisins, the bananas, and half of the strawberries., 3. Gently stir in the yoghurt and divide between two bowls., 4. Scatter the remainin strawberries over the top and enjoy!

name: Strawberry Kiwi Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat vanilla yoghurt, 1 kiwi (chopped), 4 lare strawberries (about a 1/2 cup, chopped), 1 ice cube tray (or paper cups)
directions: Cut fruit into small pieces., Mix fruit and yoghurt., Divide into 4 small paper cups (or 8 ice cubes) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws)., Freeze., Enjoy as a frozen treat!

name: Strawberry Mano Feta Toast Points
ingredients: 1 ripe mano (divided), 2 cups strawberries (divided), 1/2 cup fat free feta cheese crumbles, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinear, 1 cup basil leaves (plus 2 tbsp for toppin), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 4 slices whole-wheat bread
directions: Peel and pit mano. Dice 3/4 of mano and 3/4 of strawberries; place in lare bowl with feta cheese. Put remainin fruit, 1/4 cup basil, vinear and oil in a blender and blend., Pour blended vinairette over fruit-feta mix and toss ently., Chop remainin basil leaves., Toast bread slices and cut each slice diaonally., Top toast points with dressed fruit-feta mix and chopped basil.

name: Strawberry SMores
ingredients: 2 strawberries, 1 raham cracker (broken in half), 1/8 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla (2 tablespoons)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Rinse the strawberries in water., Slice the strawberries., Add the yoghurt and strawberries to 1/2 of raham cracker., Top with the other 1/2 of raham cracker., Enjoy immediately.

name: Strawberry Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat strawberry yoghurt, 6 lare strawberries, fresh or frozen, 1 ice cube tray (or paper cups)
directions:
Cut strawberries into small pieces.
 , Mix fruit and yoghurt.
 , Divide into 4 small paper cups (or 8 ice cubes) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws).
 , Freeze.
 , Enjoy as a frozen treat!

name: Summer Breeze Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup plain yoghurt (non-fat), 6 strawberries (medium), 1 cup pineapple (crushed, canned in juice), 1 banana (medium), 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 4 ice cubes
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place all inredients in blender and puree until smooth., Serve in frosted lass.

name: Sweet and Juicy Raisin Tapenade
ingredients: 1 cup California raisins, 1/4 cup pitted Kalamata olives (drained), 2/3 tablespoon walnuts, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinear, 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1 lare whole rain pita bread (approximately 16 wedes or melba rounds)
directions: Place tapenade inredients in food processor., Run until raisins, olives, and walnuts are finely chopped., Can be made ahead and refrierated., Serve with melba rounds or pita wedes.

name: Sweet and Savory Peanut Butter Dip
ingredients: 3 tablespoons peanut butter (creamy), 2 tablespoons apple butter, 2 tablespoons milk (skim), 1 tablespoon soy sauce (reduced sodium), 1 1/2 teaspoons lime juice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Combine peanut butter, apple butter, milk and soy sauce in a small bowl., Whisk toether until very smooth., Store tihtly, sealed in refrierator., Serve with celery or other crunchy fruits and vegetables.

name: Sweet Potato Patties
ingredients: 3 sweet potatoes, 1 cup bread crumbs (crushed), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
directions: 1. Wash the sweet potatoes., 2. Bake the sweet potatoes in a microwave until they are soft., 3. Remove the peels from the sweet potatoes., 4. Put the sweet potatoes in a medium bowl. Mash them with a fork., 5. Crush the bread crumbs on a cuttin board with a rollin pin or jar., 6. Put the crushed bread crumbs in a small bowl., 7. Shape sweet potato into 6 small patties., 8. Roll each patty in the crushed crumbs., 9. Heat the oil in a fryin pan on medium heat., 10. Brown each patty on both sides in the oil.

name: Terrific Bean Taco
ingredients: 1 onion (small, chopped), 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 2 cups refried beans, 8 taco shells (or flour tortillas, wheat or white), 1/4 head of lettuce (chopped), 2 tomatoes (chopped), 1 cup cheese (shredded), taco sauce (optional)
directions: 1. Stir fry chopped onion in vegetable oil., 2. Stir in refried beans. Heat thorouhly., 3. Spread refried bean mixture in taco shell or on tortilla., 4. Sprinkle with shredded cheese, lettuce, chopped tomatoes and taco sauce, as desired.

name: Tic Tac Toe Veggie Pizza
ingredients: 1 medium carrot, 1/2 red bell pepper, 1 medium summer squash, 4 whole wheat pita rounds (about 6" diameter), 3/4 cup reduced-sodium pasta sauce, 4 sticks reduced-fat strin mozzarella strin cheese
directions: Place rack in middle of oven and pre-heat oven to 400 °F., For Xs, cut carrot and bell pepper into small sticks about 2 inches lon. For Os, cut summer squash into 12 slices. For rid, pull apart each cheese stick to make 4 strips., Place pita rounds on baking sheet and spread pasta sauce on each., Let kids build tic tac toe pizzas with cheese and vegetables., Bake about 10 minutes or until cheese is bubblin.

name: Tofu Salad
ingredients: 3/4 pound tofu (firm), 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, reduced calorie, 3 teaspoons brown mustard, 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce, low-sodium, 1/2 cup celery (diced), 1 tablespoon onion (diced), 1/2 reen pepper (seeded and diced), 1 tablespoon parsley (minced)
directions: 1. Prepare tofu by drainin the water from the packae and placin tofu between two plates. Put a heavy object on top and let stand for 10 to 15 minutes. Drain the water that collects on the bottom plate every few minutes., 2. In a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise, mustard and soy sauce., 3. In a medium bowl, combine the diced tofu, celery, onion, pepper, and parley; stir in the mayonnaise mixture and toss ently to coat., 4. Refrierate covered until the flavors are blended - at least one hour., 5. Use as a sandwich fillin or on top of whole rain crackers.

name: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
ingredients: 8 tomatoes (ripe, Roma plum, chopped), 2 arlic clove (minced), 1/2 red onion (chopped), 6 basil leaves (fresh), 2 tablespoons olive oil (extra-virin), salt (optional, to taste), pepper (optional, to taste), 2 mini French bread (or Italian, cut into 1/2 inch diaonal slices)
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 400 derees F., 2. Combine tomatoes, arlic, onion, basil and olive oil in a bowl. Season with salt and freshly round black pepper, to taste (optional). Set aside., 3. Arrane bread on a baking sheet in a sinle layer. Bake about 5 to 7 minutes until it beins to brown slihtly., 4. Remove bread from oven and transfer to a serving platter., 5. Serve the tomato mixture in a bowl with a serving spoon and let everyone help themselves. Or place some on each slice of bread before servin. If addin the tomato mixture yourself, add it at the last\nminute or the bread may become soy.

name: Tortilla Chips and Bean Dip
ingredients: 4 corn tortillas, 1 can kidney beans (16 ounce), 1/4 cup salsa, 1/4 cup sour cream, non-fat, 1/2 cup cheddar cheese (shredded), 1 cup lettuce (shredded)
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400 derees., 2. Place tortillas in a stack on cuttin board. With a sharp knife, cut stack into eiht pieces, formin trianles or wedes., 3. Lay tortillas pieces out in sinle layer on baking sheet. Set aside while makin dip., 4. Open canned beans. Pour beans in colander; rinse and drain. Place beans in a small mixin bowl and mash with a potato masher. Spread beans over bottom of baking dish., 5. Measure salsa and spread over beans., 6. Measure sour cream and spread over beans., 7. Grate and measure cheese; sprinkle over bean mixture., 8. Place lettuce wede on cuttin board. Slice into thin strips; set aside., 9. Place both the baking sheet with tortilla pieces and the dip in preheated oven. Bake about 8 minutes or until tortilla pieces are crisp and dip is bubbly. Sprinkle lettuce over dip and serve with tortilla chips., Create-a-Flavor Chanes
- Use Monterey Jack or another cheese.
- Substitute black beans for kidney beans.
- Substitute 1/4 cup chopped fresh tomatoes for taco sauce.
- Spread one small can chopped reen chilis over beans.

name: Tostadas Deladas
ingredients: 8 flour tortillas, 2 cups refried beans (fat-free), 2 cups lettuce (shredded), 1 cup tomatoes (diced), 1 cup cheese (rated)
directions: 1. Wash hands and cookin area., 2. Turn on oven to 350°F., 3. Place tortillas on a cookie sheet and put in oven for 10 minutes or until crispy., 4. Wash and cut your lettuce and tomatoes., 5. Spread two lare tablespoons of refried beans on each tortilla., 6. Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, and rated cheese., 7. Serve immediately and refrierate leftovers.

name: Trail Mix Bars
ingredients: 3 cups crispy rice cereal, 3 cups toasted oat cereal, 1 1/2 cups raisins, 1/2 cup sunflower seeds, 1 cup honey, 3/4 cup suar, 16 ounces jar chunky peanut butter (or 1 jar), 1 teaspoon vanilla
directions: Combine dry inredients in bowl., Combine honey and suar in pan and brin to a boil., Add peanut butter and vanilla, stir until peanut butter melts., Pour mixture over cereal and mix well., Press into a 13x9" pan and cool.

name: Trail Treat
ingredients: Choose Two of These:,pretzels (1 cup),square corn, rice or wheat cereal (1 cup),1 cup round oat cereal,1 cup popcorn,goldfish crackers (1 cup),Choose Two of These,1/4 cup raisins,dried cranberries (1/4 cup),dried banana chips (1/4 cup),dried pineapple (1/4 cup),1/4 cup peanuts,soy nuts (1/4 cup)
directions: Wash hands; et out utensils., Choose the inredients you want to use., Measure the suested amounts of chosen inredients and add to mixin bowl., Mix inredients usin stirrin spoon and divide evenly into 4 storae bas., Enjoy your Trail Treat.

name: Tropical Mornin Treat
ingredients: 1/4 cup orange juice, 1 apple, 1 orange, 1 banana
directions: Place orange juice in bowl., Wash apple and dry. Remove the seeds and dice. Coat apple surfaces with orange juice to prevent brownin., Peel orange and break into sections. Cut sections into small pieces., Peel and slice banana into 1/4 inch circles., Combine all fruit and orange juice lihtly in a bowl and mix toether. Chill or serve immediately.

name: Tropical Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat vanilla yoghurt, 1/2 cup mano pieces (fresh or frozen), 1/2 cup pineapple pieces (fresh, canned, or frozen), 1/4 cup cup coconut water, 1 ice cube tray (or paper cups)
directions: Place all inredients into blender., Blend on hih until smooth., Pour into 4 small paper cups (or 8 ice cubes) and place in popsicle sticks (or cut paper straws)., Freeze., Enjoy as a frozen treat!

name: Tuna Melt Burer
ingredients: 1 can tuna (6 ounce), 2 celery (medium stalks, chopped), 1/2 cup processed American cheese (low sodium, diced), 1/4 cup liht mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon instant minced onion, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 12 whole wheat bread (slices)
directions: 1. Wash hands and cookin area., 2. Preheat oven to 350°F., 3. Drain tuna and break the meat apart with a fork., 4. Wash and chop the celery and dice the cheese., 5. Mix tuna, celery, cheese, liht mayonnaise, dried onion, salt, and pepper into a medium mixin bowl with a wooden spoon., 6. Spread tuna mixture on six of the pieces of whole wheat bread and place a sinle slice of bread on top of each (you will make a total of 6 sandwiches)., 7. Put each sandwich on a square of aluminum foil, then wrap the foil around sandwiches, foldin edes securely, 8. Bake about 20 minutes or until hot in the middle. Cool slihtly before servin.

name: Tuna Quesadillas
ingredients: 1 can tuna fish, packed in water (drained), 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, liht, 4 flour tortillas, 1/2 cup cheddar cheese, low-fat (rated)
directions: 1. Mix tuna with mayonnaise., Microwave:\n1. Spoon filin onto half of each tortilla. Top fillin with cheese and fold tortilla in half. Microwave on hih for 60 seconds. Turn the plate halfway throuh cookin time., Stove:\n1. Divide mixture onto two tortillas. Top with cheese and the remainin two tortillas. Spray a skillet with non-stick cookin spray. Brown quesadillas on both sides., 2. Cut in half before servin.

name: Tuna Salad II
ingredients: 2 cans tuna, drained (5 ounces each), 1 cup celery, chopped, 1/8 cup mayonnaise, 1/8 cup yoghurt, low-fat plain, 1 cup rapes, seedless (cut in half), 7 lettuce leaves, washed and separated
directions:
1. In a medium-sized bowl, combine drained tuna, celery, mayonnaise and yoghurt and stir.
2. Add rapes to mixture and stir ently.
3. Cover and chill until ready to serve.
4. Serve over lettuce leaves.

name: Tuna Veggie Antipasto
ingredients: 2 cups carrot (raw, chopped or any of your favorite raw veggies), 2 1/2 cups celery (raw, chopped or any of your favorite raw veggies), 8 cans tuna, in water (6.5 ounce liht, drained and flaked), 1 can white beans (15 ounces, or your favorite beans), 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese (rated), 1/4 cup vinear (or juice of 2 lemons), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon dried dill (or 1 tablespoon fresh dill), 1 teaspoon arlic (chopped)
directions: Wash and trim vegetables. Chop into bite size pieces. Place in lare bowl., Combine vinear, dill (or other herbs), arlic and oil. Pour over vegetables., Drain and rinse beans. Break up tuna into smaller chunks., Combine vegetables, beans and tuna; toss ently., Marinate salad overnight to combine flavors., Chill and serve as a liht summer lunch or as a picnic side dish.

name: Turkey Pinwheel Appetizers
ingredients: 8 ounces cream cheese, low-fat (arlic and herb), 6 flour tortillas (8 inch), 6 slices turkey (low sodium, 6 ounces), 3 Roma tomatoes (medium, chopped), 3 cups baby spinach leaves (fresh)
directions: 1. Place tortillas on microwaveable plate or paper towel; microwave uncovered on HIGH 10 - 15 seconds to soften., 2. Spread about 2 Tablespoons cream cheese over each tortilla. Top with a slice of turkey, chopped tomatoes and spinach., 3. Roll up lihtly; then wrap in plastic wrap. Refrierate 2 - 3 hours to blend flavors. Cut each roll into eiht 1-inch slices. Arrane with cut side down on serving plate.

name: Turtle Apple
ingredients: 1 apple (small or medium), 10 slices of mandarin oranges, drained
directions:
1. Wash hands; et out inredients and utensils.
2. Wash apple. Cut in half (see notes).
3. Place apple half in center of small plate.
4. Put mandarin oranges next to apple for arms, les, and head.
5. Enjoy your Turtle Apple.

name: Vegetable Medley with Salsa Dip
ingredients: 2 carrots (cut into 3-inch sticks), 2 celery stalks (cut into 3-inch sticks), 1 cup bell pepper (reen or other color), 1 cup sour cream, fat free, 1 cup fresh salsa (see recipe below)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Arrane vegetables on a platter., In a small bowl, mix sour cream and salsa. Serve.

name: Vegetable Pinwheels
ingredients: 2 ounces cream cheese, softened (3 1/2 Tablespoons), 1/8 cup canned corn, drained (2 Tablespoons), 2 tablespoons chopped reen chilies, drained, 2/3 tablespoon chopped onion (2 teaspoons), 2 tablespoons salsa, 3 lare flour tortillas (10 inch)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Drain the corn and reen chilis.  Collect, chop and measure all inredients before startin to prepare the recipe.  , Mix cream cheese, corn, reen chilies, onions and salsa toether in a bowl., Spread mixture on tortillas, roll up tihtly, and wrap in plastic wrap., Cut in 1-inch slices, and serve immediately, or store in the refrierator until ready to serve.

name: Vegetable Snake
ingredients: 1 cucumber, small, 1 tomato, small (or 2 rape tomatoes)
directions:
1. Wash hands with soap and water.
2. Wash inredients.
3. Put cucumber slices (see notes) on a small plate to form a snake.
4. Add 2 slices of tomatoes for eyes.
5. Enjoy your Vegetable Snake.

name: Veggie Quesadillas
ingredients: cookin oil spray, 1 small zucchini (small, washed and chopped), 1/2 broccoli head (washed and chopped), 1 reen bell pepper (washed, seeded and chopped), 1 onion (medium, peeled and chopped), 1 carrot (scrubbed and shredded), 4 whole wheat tortillas (10-inch), 1 cup cheddar cheese (shredded low-fat), 1/2 cup salsa
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Spray pan with cookin oil spray., Cook vegetables on medium heat for 4-5 minutes, stirrin frequently. Remove from pan., Spray pan with cookin spray. Place tortilla in the pan. Sprinkle with half the vegetables and half of the cheese., Place the other tortilla on top. Cook on medium heat for 4-6 minutes or until the cheese starts to melt and the bottom tortilla starts to brown., Flip quesadilla. Cook for 4 minutes or until tortilla browns., Repeat steps 3-5., Cut each quesadilla in half. Serve with salsa.

name: Veggie Stuffed Pita
ingredients: 2 zucchini (medium, 2 1/2 cups chopped), 4 carrot (medium, 1 1/4 cups rated), 2 cups broccoli (chopped), 12 ounces cheddar cheese, low-fat, 1/2 teaspoon oreano, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon arlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 12 mini pitas (whole wheat, 4 inch across)
directions: 1. Wash vegetables., 2. Remove the broccoli flowers from stems, cut the flowers into small florets and put into mixin bowl., 3. Peel carrots and cut off the ends. Grate carrots and put into mixin bowl., 4. Slice the zucchini into thin slices. Cut each slice into quarters and put into bowl., 5. Grate the cheese and put into a separate bowl., 6. Measure oreano, pepper, arlic powder, onion powder and mix toether., 7. Heat oil in a skillet. Put the spices in the heated oil and then add the mixture of vegetables to the pan. Stir vegetables with a wooden spoon and saute about 5 minutes. When the vegetables are slihtly tender, remove from heat., 8. Spoon vegetable mixture into the pita. Top the hot vegetables with 1 ounce rated cheese.

name: Very Berry Muesli
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat fruit yoghurt, 1 cup old fashioned rolled oats (raw), 1/2 cup fat free milk (or 1% milk), 1/2 cup dried fruit (try raisins, apricots, dates), 1/2 cup apple, chopped (about 1/3 of a medium apple), 1/2 cup frozen blueberries, 1/4 cup toasted walnuts (chopped)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., In medium bowl, mix oats, yoghurt and milk., Cover and refrierate for 6 to 12 hours., Add dried and fresh fruit, and mix ently., Serve scoops of muesli in small dishes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped nuts.

name: Waldorf Salad
ingredients: 1/4 cup walnuts (chopped), 2 apples (cored and diced), 1 cup celery (diced), 1/2 cup raisins, 1/4 cup plain yoghurt, non-fat, 1/2 teaspoon suar, 1 teaspoon lemon juice
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Preheat oven to 350 derees., Place chopped walnuts on a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes. Stir occasionally until they are evenly toasted., Combine apples, celery, nuts, and raisins., Stir toether yoghurt, suar, and lemon juice. Pour over apple mixture and toss lihtly., Refrierate leftovers within 2 hours.

name: White Bean Bruschetta
ingredients: 1 whole-wheat French bauette, cut into 12 thin slices alon the bias, 1/4 cup olive oil, divided, 1 cup white onion, chopped, 4 cloves arlic, minced, 1 teaspoon dried basil, 1 teaspoon dried oreano, 1 cup canned navy beans, rinsed and drained, 2 tomatoes, cored and cubed, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinear
directions: Slice the bauette on the diaonal into thin slices (about 12 slices for a bauette)., In a lare sauté pan, heat 2 T of the olive oil over medium heat., Place the bread slices in the pan and cook on medium hih heat until sizzlin and olden. Before flippin the bread, add an additional tablespoon of olive oil to the pan and cook the second side until olden. , For the toppin, cook the onions and the remainin tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat until the onions are soft, about 7 minutes., Add the arlic, basil and oreano and cook another minute or two, until frarant., Add beans and continue cookin for another five minutes on low heat. Add the tomatoes and turn off the heat, allowin tomatoes to warm without cookin., Drizzle the balsamic vinear into the pan and ently stir. , Scoop heapin spoonfuls of the tomato-bean mixture onto the rilled bread and enjoy.

name: Wild Rice Muffins
ingredients: Cookin spray, 1 1/2 cups bakery mix, 1/4 cup suar, 2 teaspoons cinnamon, 2 bananas, mashed, 3/4 cup milk, 1/4 cup applesauce, 1 cup wild rice, cooked, walnuts, chopped (optional)
directions:
Wash hands with soap water., 1. Preheat the oven to 400 °F. Spray a 12-cup muffin pan with cookin spray.
2. In a medium bowl, mix bakery mix, suar, and cinnamon.
3. In a separate bowl, mix bananas, milk, and applesauce.
4. Add banana mixture to dry mixture and stir.
5. Fold in wild rice and nuts.
6. Spoon ¼ cup of the batter into each muffin cup. Bake for 20–25 minutes.

name: Yoghurt Berry Parfait
ingredients: 2 cups yoghurt, low fat (or fat-free, any flavor*), 1 cup banana (sliced), 1/2 cup blueberries (fresh), 1/2 cup strawberries (fresh, sliced), other optional fruit (raspberries, peaches, pineapple and/or manos), 1 cup ranola
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Line up 4 parfait or other tall lasses., Spoon 1/2 cup of yoghurt into each lass., Sprinkle with ranola., Top with about 1/4 cup of fruit.

name: Yoghurt Pops
ingredients: 3/4 cup yoghurt, fat-free (flavored or plain), 3/4 cup fruit juice
directions:
1. Put the yoghurt and juice in a bowl.
2. Stir toether well.
3. Pour the mix into paper cups.
4. Stick a popsicle stick in the center of the mix in the cup.
5. Place the yoghurt pops in the freezer until they turn solid.

name: Yoghurt Popsicles
ingredients: 6 us fluid ounces frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed, 2 cups yoghurt, low-fat vanilla
directions:
1. Pour yoghurt into melted juice concentrated and stir until smooth.
2. Place cups toether on a baking sheet.
3. Pour yoghurt/juice mixture into paper cups.
4. Cover the cups with a sheet of aluminum foil.
5. Insert stick for each popsicle by makin a slit in foil over the center of each cup.
6. Freeze popsicles until firm.
7. Run warm water on the outside of each cup to loosen each popsicle from the cup.

name: Yoghurt Smoothie in a Bag
ingredients: 1/4 cup yoghurt, low-fat vanilla (or plain), 1 tablespoon milk, 1%, 2/3 tablespoon frozen fruit juice concentrated (2 teaspoons, thawed)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place inredients in a heavy duty snack-sized plastic ba., Squish the ba until all inredients are mixed, then stick a straw in a ba to drink the smoothie.

name: Yummy Bean Dip
ingredients: 1/3 cup beans, low-sodium canned or cooked (pinto work reat), 1/3 tablespoon yoghurt, non-fat plain (1 teaspoon), 1 tablespoon salsa
directions: Wash hands with soap and water., Place beans in a small, resealable plastic ba. Sqeeze out extra air and seal. Mash beans with finers., Add yoghurt and salsa. Seal ba and mix with finers., Open ba or cut off corner of ba and squeeze out dip.

name: Zucchini Pancakes
ingredients: 2 cups rated zucchini, 1 tablespoon finely chopped onion, 1 e, beaten, 1 1/2 tablespoons flour, 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese, 1/4 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/2 teaspoon arlic powder, salt and pepper (to taste, optional), 1 tablespoon olive oil (or cookin spray)
directions: Grate zucchini and mix with the other inredients, except the oil. Blend well., Form the mixture into patties 3-4 inches in diameter., Heat the oil. Cook pancakes for 3-4 minutes per side. Remove and drain on paper towels.
